atk-s0513a1:7_0: Tassa pāde namassitvā, katvā dhammassa cañjaliṃ;
atk-s0513a1:26_0: Bhāsissaṃ bhāsato taṃ me, sādhu gaṇhantu sādhavoti.
atk-s0513a1:28_2: santikenidānanti imāni tīṇi nidānāni dassetvā vaṇṇiyamānā ye naṃ suṇanti,
atk-s0513a1:28_3: tehi samudāgamato paṭṭhāya viññātattā yasmā suṭṭhu viññātā nāma hoti,
atk-s0513a1:28_4: tasmā taṃ tāni nidānāni dassetvā vaṇṇayissāma.
atk-s0513a1:29_0: Tattha ādito tāva tesaṃ nidānānaṃ paricchedo veditabbo.
atk-s0513a1:29_1: Dīpaṅkarapādamūlasmiñhi katābhinīhārassa mahāsattassa yāva vessantarattabhāvā cavitvā tusitapure nibbatti,
atk-s0513a1:29_3: Tusitabhavanato pana cavitvā yāva bodhimaṇḍe sabbaññutappatti,
atk-s0513a1:29_5: Santikenidānaṃ pana tesu tesu ṭhānesu viharato tasmiṃ tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne labbhatīti.
atk-s0513a1:31_1: ito kira kappasatasahassādhikānaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake amaravatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:31_2: Tattha sumedho nāma brāhmaṇo paṭivasati ubhato sujāto mātito ca pitito ca saṃsuddhagahaṇiko yāva sattamā
atk-s0513a1:31_3: kulaparivaṭṭā akkhitto anupakuṭṭho jātivādena abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya
atk-s0513a1:31_5: So aññaṃ kammaṃ akatvā brāhmaṇasippameva uggaṇhi.
atk-s0513a1:31_7: Athassa rāsivaḍḍhako amacco āyapotthakaṃ āharitvā suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimuttādibharite gabbhe vivaritvā “ettakaṃ te, kumāra,
atk-s0513a1:31_10: ettakaṃ ayyakapayyakāna”nti yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā dhanaṃ ācikkhitvā “etaṃ paṭipajjāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:31_12: “imaṃ dhanaṃ saṃharitvā mayhaṃ pitupitāmahādayo paralokaṃ gacchantā ekaṃ kahāpaṇampi gahetvā na gatā,
atk-s0513a1:31_13: mayā pana gahetvā gamanakāraṇaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:31_14: So rañño ārocetvā nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā mahājanassa dānaṃ datvā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbaji.
atk-s0513a1:31_15: Imassa panatthassa āvibhāvatthaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne sumedhakathā kathetabbā.
atk-s0513a1:31_16: Sā panesā kiñcāpi buddhavaṃse nirantaraṃ āgatāyeva,
atk-s0513a1:31_17: gāthāsambandhena pana āgatattā na suṭṭhu pākaṭā.
atk-s0513a1:31_18: Tasmā taṃ antarantarā gāthāya sambandhadīpakehi vacanehi saddhiṃ kathessāma.
atk-s0513a1:33_0: Kappasatasahassādhikānañhi catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake dasahi saddehi avivittaṃ “amaravatī”ti ca “amara”nti ca laddhanāmaṃ nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:37_9: khādathā”ti dasamena saddenāti imehi dasahi saddehi avivittaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:47_0: Lakkhaṇe itihāse ca, sadhamme pāramiṃ gato”ti. – vuttaṃ;
atk-s0513a1:48_0: Athekadivasaṃ so sumedhapaṇḍito uparipāsādavaratale rahogato hutvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisinno cintesi –
atk-s0513a1:48_5: evaṃbhūtena mayā ajātiṃ ajaraṃ abyādhiṃ adukkhaṃ sukhaṃ sītalaṃ amatamahānibbānaṃ pariyesituṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0513a1:48_6: avassaṃ bhavato muccitvā nibbānagāminā ekena maggena bhavitabba”nti.
atk-s0513a1:50_0: Dukkho punabbhavo nāma, sarīrassa ca bhedanaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:55_0: “Atthi hehiti so maggo, na so sakkā na hetuye;
atk-s0513a1:57_1: yathā hi loke dukkhassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ sukhaṃ nāma atthi,
atk-s0513a1:57_2: evaṃ bhave sati tappaṭipakkhena vibhavenāpi bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:57_3: Yathā ca uṇhe sati tassa vūpasamabhūtaṃ sītampi atthi,
atk-s0513a1:57_4: evaṃ rāgādīnaṃ aggīnaṃ vūpasamena nibbānenāpi bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:57_5: Yathā ca pāpassa lāmakassa dhammassa paṭipakkhabhūto kalyāṇo anavajjadhammopi atthiyeva,
atk-s0513a1:57_6: evameva pāpikāya jātiyā sati sabbajātikkhepanato ajātisaṅkhātena nibbānenāpi bhavitabbamevāti.
atk-s0513a1:64_1: yathā nāma gūtharāsimhi nimuggena purisena dūrato pañcavaṇṇapadumasañchannaṃ mahātaḷākaṃ disvā “katarena
atk-s0513a1:64_2: nu kho maggena ettha gantabba”nti taṃ taḷākaṃ gavesituṃ yuttaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:64_5: Evameva kilesamaladhovane amatamahānibbānataḷāke vijjante tassa agavesanaṃ na amatanibbānamahātaḷākassa doso.
atk-s0513a1:64_6: Yathā ca corehi samparivārito puriso palāyanamagge vijjamānepi sace na palāyati,
atk-s0513a1:64_9: Evameva kilesehi parivāretvā gahitassa purisassa vijjamāneyeva nibbānagāmimhi sive magge maggassa agavesanaṃ nāma na maggassa doso,
atk-s0513a1:64_11: Yathā ca byādhipīḷito puriso vijjamāne byādhitikicchake vejje sace taṃ vejjaṃ gavesitvā byādhiṃ na tikicchāpeti,
atk-s0513a1:64_14: Evameva yo kilesabyādhipīḷito puriso kilesavūpasamamaggakovidaṃ vijjamānameva ācariyaṃ na gavesati,
atk-s0513a1:66_0: Na gavesati taṃ taḷākaṃ, na doso taḷākassa so.
atk-s0513a1:68_0: Na gavesati taṃ taḷākaṃ, na doso amatantaḷe.
atk-s0513a1:70_0: Na palāyati so puriso, na doso añjasassa so.
atk-s0513a1:72_0: Na gavesati taṃ maggaṃ, na doso sivamañjase.
atk-s0513a1:74_0: Na tikicchāpeti taṃ byādhiṃ, na doso so tikicchake.
atk-s0513a1:76_0: Na gavesati taṃ ācariyaṃ, na doso so vināyake”ti.
atk-s0513a1:77_1: yathā maṇḍanajātiko puriso kaṇṭhe āsattaṃ kuṇapaṃ chaḍḍetvā sukhī gacchati,
atk-s0513a1:77_2: evaṃ mayāpi imaṃ pūtikāyaṃ chaḍḍetvā anapekkhena nibbānanagaraṃ pavisitabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:77_3: Yathā ca naranāriyo ukkārabhūmiyaṃ uccārapassāvaṃ katvā na taṃ ucchaṅgena vā ādāya dasantena vā veṭhetvā gacchanti,
atk-s0513a1:77_5: evaṃ mayāpi imaṃ pūtikāyaṃ anapekkhena chaḍḍetvā amataṃ nibbānanagaraṃ pavisituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0513a1:77_6: Yathā ca nāvikā nāma jajjaraṃ nāvaṃ anapekkhā chaḍḍetvā gacchanti,
atk-s0513a1:77_7: evaṃ ahampi imaṃ navahi vaṇamukhehi paggharantaṃ kāyaṃ chaḍḍetvā anapekkho nibbānapuraṃ pavisissāmi.
atk-s0513a1:77_8: Yathā ca puriso nānāratanāni ādāya corehi saddhiṃ maggaṃ gacchanto attano ratananāsabhayena te chaḍḍetvā khemaṃ maggaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0513a1:77_12: Tasmā mayā imaṃ corasadisaṃ kāyaṃ chaḍḍetvā nibbānanagaraṃ pavisituṃ vaṭṭatīti.
atk-s0513a1:85_0: Chaḍḍayitvāna gacchissaṃ, vaccaṃ katvā yathā kuṭiṃ.
atk-s0513a1:94_0: Evaṃ sumedhapaṇḍito nānāvidhāhi upamāhi imaṃ nekkhammūpasaṃhitaṃ atthaṃ cintetvā sakanivesane aparimitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:94_1: bhogakkhandhaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayena kapaṇaddhikādīnaṃ vissajjetvā mahādānaṃ datvā vatthukāme ca kilesakāme
atk-s0513a1:94_2: ca pahāya amaranagarato nikkhamitvā ekakova himavante dhammikaṃ nāma pabbataṃ nissāya assamaṃ katvā tattha
atk-s0513a1:94_3: paṇṇasālañca caṅkamañca māpetvā pañcahi nīvaraṇadosehi vivajjitaṃ “evaṃ samāhite citte”tiādinā nayena
atk-s0513a1:94_4: vuttehi aṭṭhahi kāraṇaguṇehi samupetaṃ abhiññāsaṅkhātaṃ balaṃ āharituṃ tasmiṃ assamapade navadosasamannāgataṃ
atk-s0513a1:94_5: sāṭakaṃ pajahitvā dvādasaguṇasamannāgataṃ vākacīraṃ nivāsetvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbaji.
atk-s0513a1:94_6: Evaṃ pabbajito aṭṭhadosasamākiṇṇaṃ taṃ paṇṇasālaṃ pahāya dasaguṇasamannāgataṃ rukkhamūlaṃ upagantvā sabbaṃ
atk-s0513a1:94_7: dhaññavikatiṃ pahāya pavattaphalabhojano hutvā nisajjaṭṭhānacaṅkamanavaseneva padhānaṃ padahanto sattāhabbhantareyeva
atk-s0513a1:94_8: aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ pañcannañca abhiññānaṃ lābhī ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:109_1: paṇṇasālā sumāpitā”ti imāya pāḷiyā sumedhapaṇḍitena assamapaṇṇasālācaṅkamā sahatthā māpitā viya vuttā.
atk-s0513a1:109_3: mahāsattaṃ “himavantaṃ ajjhogāhetvā ajja dhammikaṃ pabbataṃ pavisissāmī”ti nikkhantaṃ disvā sakko devānamindo vissakammadevaputtaṃ āmantesi – “tāta,
atk-s0513a1:109_6: So tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā ramaṇīyaṃ assamaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:109_9: Bhagavā pana tadā attano puññānubhāvena nipphannaṃ taṃ assamapadaṃ sandhāya sāriputta,
atk-s0513a1:112_0: Āha. Tattha sukato mayhanti sukato mayā. Paṇṇasālā sumāpitāti paṇṇacchadanasālāpi me sumāpitā ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:113_10: Mudusamatale pana phāsuvihāraṃ āgamma kammaṭṭhānaṃ sampajjati.
atk-s0513a1:113_12: Caṅkamassa anto vā majjhe vā koṭiyaṃ vā rukkhe sati pamādamāgamma caṅkamantassa nalāṭaṃ vā sīsaṃ vā paṭihaññatīti antorukkhatā dutiyo doso.
atk-s0513a1:113_13: Tiṇalatādigahanacchanne caṅkame caṅkamanto andhakāravelāyaṃ uragādike pāṇe akkamitvā vā māreti,
atk-s0513a1:113_14: tehi vā daṭṭho dukkhaṃ āpajjatīti gahanacchannatā tatiyo doso.
atk-s0513a1:113_15: Atisambādhe caṅkame vitthārato ratanike vā aḍḍharatanike vā caṅkamantassa paricchede pakkhalitvā nakhāpi
atk-s0513a1:113_18: ekaggataṃ na labhatīti ativisālatā pañcamo doso.
atk-s0513a1:113_19: Puthulato pana diyaḍḍharatanaṃ dvīsu passesu ratanamattaanucaṅkamaṃ dīghato saṭṭhihatthaṃ mudutalaṃ samavippakiṇṇavālukaṃ
atk-s0513a1:113_20: caṅkamaṃ vaṭṭati cetiyagirimhi dīpappasādakamahindattherassa caṅkamanaṃ viya,
atk-s0513a1:114_5: raṭṭhaṃ pīḷetvā dhanasāraṃ vā sīsakahāpaṇādīni vā gaṇhantesu rājakulesu raṭṭhapīḷanakilesābhāvo,
atk-s0513a1:114_11: yathā tasmiṃ assame vasantena sakkā honti imāni aṭṭha samaṇasukhāni vindituṃ,
atk-s0513a1:115_0: Abhiññābalamāharinti pacchā tasmiṃ assame vasanto kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā abhiññānaṃ samāpattīnañca uppādanatthāya
atk-s0513a1:115_1: aniccato dukkhato vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā thāmappattaṃ vipassanābalaṃ āhariṃ.
atk-s0513a1:115_2: Yathā tasmiṃ vasanto taṃ balaṃ āharituṃ sakkomi,
atk-s0513a1:115_3: evaṃ taṃ assamaṃ tassa abhiññatthāya vipassanābalassa anucchavikaṃ katvā māpesinti attho.
atk-s0513a1:116_2: tadā kira kuṭileṇacaṅkamādipaṭimaṇḍitaṃ pupphūpagaphalūpagarukkhasañchannaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ madhurasalilāsayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:116_3: apagatavāḷamigabhiṃsanakasakuṇaṃ pavivekakkhamaṃ assamaṃ māpetvā alaṅkatacaṅkamassa ubhosu antesu ālambanaphalakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:116_4: saṃvidhāya nisīdanatthāya caṅkamavemajjhe samatalaṃ muggavaṇṇasilaṃ māpetvā antopaṇṇasālāyaṃ jaṭāmaṇḍalavākacīratidaṇḍakuṇḍikādike
atk-s0513a1:116_7: aggisālāyaṃ aṅgārakapalladāruādīnīti evaṃ yaṃ yaṃ pabbajitānaṃ upakārāya saṃvattati,
atk-s0513a1:116_8: taṃ taṃ sabbaṃ māpetvā paṇṇasālāya bhittiyaṃ “ye keci pabbajitukāmā ime parikkhāre gahetvā pabbajantū”ti
atk-s0513a1:116_9: akkharāni chinditvā devalokameva gate vissakammadevaputte sumedhapaṇḍito himavantapabbatapāde girikandarānusārena
atk-s0513a1:116_10: attano nivāsānurūpaṃ phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ olokento nadīnivattane vissakammanimmitaṃ sakkadattiyaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:116_11: assamaṃ disvā caṅkamanakoṭiṃ gantvā padavalañjaṃ apassanto “dhuvaṃ pabbajitā dhuragāme bhikkhaṃ pariyesitvā
atk-s0513a1:116_12: kilantarūpā āgantvā paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā nisinnā bhavissantī”ti cintetvā thokaṃ āgametvā “ativiya cirāyanti,
atk-s0513a1:116_13: jānissāmī”ti paṇṇāsālākuṭidvāraṃ vivaritvā anto pavisitvā ito cito ca olokento mahābhittiyaṃ akkharāni vācetvā “mayhaṃ kappiyaparikkhārā ete,
atk-s0513a1:116_14: ime gahetvā pabbajissāmī”ti attano nivatthapārutaṃ sāṭakayugaṃ pajahi.
atk-s0513a1:117_0: Navadosamupāgatanti sāṭakaṃ pajahanto nava dose disvā pajahinti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a1:117_1: Tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitānañhi sāṭakasmiṃ nava dosā upaṭṭhahanti.
atk-s0513a1:117_5: Kiliṭṭho hi dhovitabbo ca rajitabbo ca hoti.
atk-s0513a1:117_7: Jiṇṇassa hi tunnaṃ vā aggaḷadānaṃ vā kātabbaṃ hoti.
atk-s0513a1:117_11: Yathā hi naṃ paccatthikā na gaṇhanti,
atk-s0513a1:118_2: ime nava dose disvā sāṭakaṃ pahāya vākacīraṃ nivāsesiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:118_3: muñjatiṇaṃ hīraṃ hīraṃ katvā ganthetvā katavākacīraṃ nivāsanapārupanatthāya ādiyinti attho.
atk-s0513a1:119_2: appagghaṃ sundaraṃ kappiyanti ayaṃ tāva eko ānisaṃso,
atk-s0513a1:120_3: So kira varasāṭakayugaṃ omuñcitvā cīvaravaṃse laggitaṃ anojapupphadāmasadisaṃ rattaṃ vākacīraṃ gahetvā nivāsetvā,
atk-s0513a1:120_5: punnāgapupphasantharasadisaṃ sakhuraṃ ajinacammaṃ ekaṃsaṃ katvā jaṭāmaṇḍalaṃ paṭimuñcitvā cūḷāya saddhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:120_6: niccalabhāvakaraṇatthaṃ sārasūciṃ pavesetvā muttajālasadisāya sikkāya pavāḷavaṇṇaṃ kuṇḍikaṃ odahitvā
atk-s0513a1:120_7: tīsu ṭhānesu vaṅkakājaṃ ādāya ekissā kājakoṭiyā kuṇḍikaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:120_8: ekissā aṅkusapacchitidaṇḍakādīni olaggetvā khāribhāraṃ aṃse katvā,
atk-s0513a1:120_9: dakkhiṇena hatthena kattaradaṇḍaṃ gahetvā paṇṇasālato nikkhamitvā saṭṭhihatthe mahācaṅkame aparāparaṃ caṅkamanto attano vesaṃ oloketvā –
atk-s0513a1:120_12: buddhapaccekabuddhādīhi sabbehi dhīrapurisehi vaṇṇitā thomitā ayaṃ pabbajjā nāma,
atk-s0513a1:120_17: labhissāmi maggaphalasukha”nti ussāhajāto khārikājaṃ otāretvā caṅkamavemajjhe muggavaṇṇasilāpaṭṭe suvaṇṇapaṭimā
atk-s0513a1:120_18: viya nisinno divasabhāgaṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamayaṃ paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā,
atk-s0513a1:120_19: bidalamañcakapasse kaṭṭhattharikāya nipanno sarīraṃ utuṃ gāhāpetvā,
atk-s0513a1:120_20: balavapaccūse pabujjhitvā attano āgamanaṃ āvajjesi “ahaṃ gharāvāse ādīnavaṃ disvā amitabhogaṃ anantayasaṃ
atk-s0513a1:120_21: pahāya araññaṃ pavisitvā nekkhammagavesako hutvā pabbajito,
atk-s0513a1:120_22: ito dāni paṭṭhāya pamādacāraṃ carituṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0513a1:121_9: na etto atirekatarā viya me gehasampadā paññāyatī”ti paṇṇasālāya dose vicinanto aṭṭha dose passi.
atk-s0513a1:122_1: mahāsamārambhena dabbasambhāre samodhānetvā karaṇapariyesanabhāvo eko ādīnavo,
atk-s0513a1:122_2: tiṇapaṇṇamattikāsu patitāsu tāsaṃ punappunaṃ ṭhapetabbatāya nibandhajagganabhāvo dutiyo,
atk-s0513a1:122_4: avelāya vuṭṭhāpiyamānassa cittekaggatā na hotīti uṭṭhāpaniyabhāvo tatiyo,
atk-s0513a1:122_6: gehaṃ paviṭṭhena yaṃkiñci pāpaṃ sakkā kātunti garahāpaṭicchādanabhāvo pañcamo,
atk-s0513a1:122_10: Iti ime aṭṭha ādīnave disvā mahāsatto paṇṇasālaṃ pajati.
atk-s0513a1:123_1: guṇe dasahupāgatanti channaṃ paṭikkhipitvā dasahi guṇehi upetaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ upagatosmīti vadati.
atk-s0513a1:123_9: tattha hi pāpaṃ karonto lajjatīti garahāya appaṭicchannabhāvo catuttho;
atk-s0513a1:123_10: abbhokāsavāso viya kāyaṃ na santhambhetīti kāyassa asanthambhanabhāvo pañcamo;
atk-s0513a1:123_16: rukkhamūlasenāsanassa gatagataṭṭhāne sulabhatāya anapekkhabhāvo dasamoti ime dasa guṇe disvā rukkhamūlaṃ upāgatosmīti vadati.
atk-s0513a1:124_0: Imāni ettakāni kāraṇāni sallakkhetvā mahāsatto punadivase bhikkhāya gāmaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:124_1: Athassa sampattagāme manussā mahantena ussāhena bhikkhaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:124_2: So bhattakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā assamaṃ āgamma nisīditvā cintesi “nāhaṃ āhāraṃ na labhāmīti pabbajito,
atk-s0513a1:124_5: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ vāpitaropitadhaññanibbattaṃ āhāraṃ pajahitvā pavattaphalabhojano bhaveyya”nti.
atk-s0513a1:124_6: So tato ṭṭhāya tathā katvā ghaṭento vāyamanto sattāhabbhantareyeva aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca abhiññāyo ca nibbattesi.
atk-s0513a1:129_0: Evaṃ abhiññābalaṃ patvā sumedhatāpase samāpattisukhena vītināmente dīpaṅkaro nāma satthā loke udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:129_1: Tassa paṭisandhijātisambodhidhammacakkappavattanesu sakalāpi dasasahassī lokadhātu saṃkampi sampakampi sampavedhi,
atk-s0513a1:129_4: Sumedhatāpaso samāpattisukhena vītināmento neva taṃ saddamassosi,
atk-s0513a1:134_0: Tasmiṃ kāle dīpaṅkaradasabalo catūhi khīṇāsavasatasahassehi parivuto anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno rammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:134_2: Rammanagaravāsino “dīpaṅkaro kira samaṇissaro paramātisambodhiṃ patvā pavattavaradhammacakko anupubbena
atk-s0513a1:134_3: cārikaṃ caramāno rammanagaraṃ patvā sudassanamahāvihāre paṭivasatī”ti sutvā sappinavanītādīni ceva bhesajjāni
atk-s0513a1:134_4: vatthacchādanāni ca gāhāpetvā gandhamālādihatthā yena buddho,
atk-s0513a1:134_7: tanninnā tappoṇā tappabbhārā hutvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā gandhamālādīhi pūjetvā ekamantaṃ
atk-s0513a1:134_8: nisinnā dhammadesanaṃ sutvā svātanāya nimantetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:135_0: Te punadivase mahādānaṃ sajjetvā nagaraṃ alaṅkaritvā dasabalassa āgamanamaggaṃ alaṅkarontā udakabhinnaṭṭhānesu
atk-s0513a1:135_1: paṃsuṃ pakkhipitvā samaṃ bhūmitalaṃ katvā rajatapaṭṭavaṇṇaṃ vālukaṃ ākiranti,
atk-s0513a1:135_5: Tasmiṃ kāle sumedhatāpaso attano assamapadā uggantvā tesaṃ manussānaṃ uparibhāgena ākāsena gacchanto
atk-s0513a1:135_6: te haṭṭhatuṭṭhe manusse disvā “kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti ākāsato oruyha ekamantaṃ ṭhito manusse pucchi –
atk-s0513a1:144_2: dīpaṅkaradasabalo sammāsambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko cārikaṃ caramāno amhākaṃ nagaraṃ patvā sudassanamahāvihāre paṭivasati.
atk-s0513a1:144_8: mayāpi imehi manussehi saddhiṃ dasabalassa maggaṃ alaṅkarituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:144_10: “sace bho tumhe etaṃ maggaṃ buddhassa alaṅkarotha,
atk-s0513a1:144_13: Te “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā “sumedhatāpaso iddhimā”ti jānantā udakabhinnokāsaṃ sallakkhetvā “tvaṃ imaṃ ṭhānaṃ alaṅkarohī”ti adaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:144_14: Sumedho buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ gahetvā cintesi “ahaṃ imaṃ okāsaṃ iddhiyā alaṅkarituṃ sakkomi,
atk-s0513a1:144_15: evaṃ alaṅkato pana mama manaṃ na paritosessati,
atk-s0513a1:144_16: ajja mayā kāyaveyyāvaccaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti paṃsuṃ āharitvā tasmiṃ padese pakkhipi.
atk-s0513a1:145_0: Tassa tasmiṃ padese analaṅkateyeva dīpaṅkaro dasabalo mahānubhāvānaṃ chaḷabhiññānaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ catūhi
atk-s0513a1:145_1: satasahassehi parivuto devatāsu dibbagandhamālādīhi pūjayantīsu dibbasaṅgītesu pavattantesu manussesu
atk-s0513a1:145_2: mānusakagandhehi ceva mālādīhi ca pūjayantesu anantāya buddhalīḷāya manosilātale vijambhamāno sīho viya
atk-s0513a1:145_4: Sumedhatāpaso akkhīni ummīletvā alaṅkatamaggena āgacchantassa dasabalassa dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:145_5: asītiyā anubyañjanehi anurañjitaṃ byāmappabhāya samparivāritaṃ maṇivaṇṇagaganatale nānappakārā vijjulatā
atk-s0513a1:145_6: viya āveḷāveḷabhūtā ceva yugalayugalabhūtā ca chabbaṇṇaghanabuddharasmiyo vissajjentaṃ rūpaggappattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:145_7: attabhāvaṃ oloketvā “ajja mayā dasabalassa jīvitapariccāgaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0513a1:145_9: maṇiphalakasetuṃ pana akkamanto viya saddhiṃ catūhi khīṇāsavasatasahassehi mama piṭṭhiṃ maddamāno gacchatu,
atk-s0513a1:145_10: taṃ me bhavissati dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti kese mocetvā ajinacammajaṭāmaṇḍalavākacīrāni kāḷavaṇṇe
atk-s0513a1:145_11: kalale pattharitvā maṇiphalakasetu viya kalalapiṭṭhe nipajji.
atk-s0513a1:152_0: ‘Idha bījāni ropissaṃ, khaṇo eva mā upaccagā’.
atk-s0513a1:156_0: Buddho buddhoti cintento, maggaṃ sodhemahaṃ tadā.
atk-s0513a1:173_0: Mā naṃ kalale akkamittho, hitāya me bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:174_0: So kalalapiṭṭhe nipannakova puna akkhīni ummīletvā dīpaṅkaradasabalassa buddhasiriṃ sampassamāno evaṃ cintesi –
atk-s0513a1:174_2: sabbakilese jhāpetvā saṅghanavako hutvā rammanagaraṃ paviseyyaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:174_3: Aññātakavesena pana me kilese jhāpetvā nibbānappattiyā kiccaṃ natthi.
atk-s0513a1:174_4: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ dīpaṅkaradasabalo viya paramābhisambodhiṃ patvā dhammanāvaṃ āropetvā mahājanaṃ saṃsārasāgarā uttāretvā pacchā parinibbāyeyyaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:174_6: Tato aṭṭha dhamme samodhānetvā buddhabhāvāya abhinīhāraṃ katvā nipajji.
atk-s0513a1:189_0: Manussattabhāvasmiṃyeva hi ṭhatvā buddhattaṃ patthentassa patthanā samijjhati,
atk-s0513a1:189_1: na nāgassa vā supaṇṇassa vā devatāya vā patthanā samijjhati.
atk-s0513a1:189_3: na itthiyā vā paṇḍakanapuṃsakaubhatobyañjanakānaṃ vā patthanā samijjhati.
atk-s0513a1:189_4: Purisassāpi tasmiṃ attabhāve arahattappattiyā hetusampannasseva patthanā samijjhati,
atk-s0513a1:189_6: Hetusampannassāpi jīvamānakabuddhasseva santike patthentassa patthanā samijjhati,
atk-s0513a1:189_7: parinibbute buddhe cetiyasantike vā bodhimūle vā patthentassa na samijjhati.
atk-s0513a1:189_8: Buddhānaṃ santike patthentassāpi pabbajjāliṅge ṭhitasseva samijjhati,
atk-s0513a1:189_12: Guṇasampannenāpi yena attano jīvitaṃ buddhānaṃ pariccattaṃ hoti,
atk-s0513a1:189_15: Adhikārasampannassāpi yassa buddhakārakadhammānaṃ atthāya mahanto chando ca ussāho ca vāyāmo ca pariyeṭṭhi ca,
atk-s0513a1:190_1: sace hi evamassa “yo sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ ekodakībhūtaṃ attano bāhubalena uttaritvā pāraṃ gantuṃ samattho,
atk-s0513a1:190_3: Yo vā pana sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ veḷugumbasañchannaṃ byūhitvā madditvā padasā gacchanto pāraṃ gantuṃ samattho,
atk-s0513a1:190_5: Yo vā pana sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ sattiyo ākoṭetvā nirantaraṃ sattiphalasamākiṇṇaṃ padasā akkamamāno pāraṃ gantuṃ samattho,
atk-s0513a1:190_7: Yo vā pana sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ vītaccitaṅgārabharitaṃ pādehi maddamāno pāraṃ gantuṃ samattho,
atk-s0513a1:190_9: Yo etesu ekampi attano dukkaraṃ na maññati,
atk-s0513a1:190_10: “ahaṃ etampi taritvā vā gantvā vā pāraṃ gahessāmī”ti evaṃ mahantena chandena ca ussāhena ca vāyāmena ca pariyeṭṭhiyā ca samannāgato hoti,
atk-s0513a1:190_13: Sumedhatāpaso pana ime aṭṭha dhamme samodhānetvā buddhabhāvāya abhinīhāraṃ katvā nipajji.
atk-s0513a1:191_0: Dīpaṅkaropi bhagavā āgantvā sumedhatāpasassa sīsabhāge ṭhatvā maṇisīhapañjaraṃ ugghāṭento viya pañcavaṇṇappasādasampannāni
atk-s0513a1:191_1: akkhīni ummīletvā kalalapiṭṭhe nipannaṃ sumedhatāpasaṃ disvā “ayaṃ tāpaso buddhattāya abhinīhāraṃ katvā nipanno,
atk-s0513a1:191_3: udāhu no”ti anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ pesetvā upadhārento “ito kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni atikkamitvā
atk-s0513a1:191_4: gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti ñatvā ṭhitakova parisamajjhe byākāsi –
atk-s0513a1:191_5: “passatha no tumhe imaṃ uggatapaṃ tāpasaṃ kalalapiṭṭhe nipanna”nti? “Evaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:191_9: ito kappasatasahassādhikānaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake gotamo nāma buddho bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:191_10: Tasmiṃ panassa attabhāve kapilavatthu nāma nagaraṃ nivāso bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:191_18: paripakkañāṇo mahābhinikkhamanaṃ katvā mahāpadhānaṃ padahitvā nigrodhamūle pāyāsaṃ paṭiggahetvā nerañjarāya
atk-s0513a1:191_19: tīre paribhuñjitvā bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha assattharukkhamūle abhisambujjhissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:195_0: Aparimeyye ito kappe, buddho loke bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:205_0: Pitā suddhodano nāma, ayaṃ hessati gotamo.
atk-s0513a1:207_0: Kolito upatisso ca, aggā hessanti sāvakā;
atk-s0513a1:212_0: Sumedhatāpaso “mayhaṃ kira patthanā samijjhissatī”ti somanassappatto ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:212_1: Mahājano dīpaṅkaradasabalassa vacanaṃ sutvā “sumedhatāpaso kira buddhabījaṃ buddhaṅkuro”ti haṭṭhatuṭṭho ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:212_2: Evañcassa ahosi “yathā nāma puriso nadiṃ taranto ujukena titthena uttarituṃ asakkonto heṭṭhātitthena uttarati,
atk-s0513a1:212_3: evameva mayampi dīpaṅkaradasabalassa sāsane maggaphalaṃ alabhamānā anāgate yadā tvaṃ buddho bhavissasi,
atk-s0513a1:212_4: tadā tava sammukhā maggaphalaṃ sacchikātuṃ samatthā bhaveyyāmā”ti patthanaṃ ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:212_5: Dīpaṅkaradasabalopi bodhisattaṃ pasaṃsitvā aṭṭhahi pupphamuṭṭhīhi pūjetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi,
atk-s0513a1:212_6: tepi catusatasahassasaṅkhā khīṇāsavā bodhisattaṃ gandhehi ca mālehi ca pūjetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:212_7: Devamanussā pana tatheva pūjetvā vanditvā pakkantā.
atk-s0513a1:213_0: Bodhisatto sabbesaṃ paṭikkantakāle sayanā vuṭṭhāya “pāramiyo vicinissāmī”ti puppharāsimatthake pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:213_1: Evaṃ nisinne bodhisatte sakaladasasahassacakkavāḷadevatā sannipatitvā sādhukāraṃ datvā “ayya sumedhatāpasa,
atk-s0513a1:213_2: porāṇakabodhisattānaṃ pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ‘pāramiyo vicinissāmā’ti nisinnakāle yāni pubbanimittāni nāma paññāyanti,
atk-s0513a1:213_7: tvaṃ attano vīriyaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā paggaṇhā”ti bodhisattaṃ nānappakārāhi thutīhi abhitthuniṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:227_0: Narā nāgā ca gandhabbā, abhivādetvāna pakkamuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:231_0: Pītiyā ca abhissanno, pallaṅkaṃ ābhujiṃ tadā.
atk-s0513a1:241_0: Tāni ajja padissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0513a1:243_0: Tāni ajja padissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0513a1:245_0: Tāni ajja padissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0513a1:247_0: Tepajja pupphitā sabbe, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0513a1:248_0: ‘Latā vā yadi vā rukkhā, phalabhārā honti tāvade;
atk-s0513a1:249_0: Tepajja phalitā sabbe, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0513a1:251_0: Tepajja ratanā jotanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0513a1:252_0: ‘Mānusakā ca dibbā ca, turiyā vajjanti tāvade;
atk-s0513a1:255_0: Tepi ajja pavassanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0513a1:259_0: Tepajja nibbutā aggī, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0513a1:261_0: Tepi ajja padissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0513a1:267_0: Tepajja āsayā chuddhā, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0513a1:268_0: ‘Na hoti arati sattānaṃ, santuṭṭhā honti tāvade;
atk-s0513a1:269_0: Tepajja sabbe santuṭṭhā, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0513a1:272_0: ‘Rāgo tadā tanu hoti, doso moho vinassati;
atk-s0513a1:273_0: Tepajja vigatā sabbe, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0513a1:275_0: Tena liṅgena jānāma, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0513a1:277_0: Tena liṅgena jānāma, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0513a1:279_0: Sopajja vāyati gandho, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0513a1:281_0: Tepajja sabbe dissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0513a1:283_0: Tepajja sabbe dissanti, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavissasi.
atk-s0513a1:284_0: ‘Kuṭṭā kavāṭā selā ca, na hontāvaraṇā tadā;
atk-s0513a1:286_0: ‘Cutī ca upapatti ca, khaṇe tasmiṃ na vijjati;
atk-s0513a1:290_0: Bodhisatto dīpaṅkaradasabalassa ca dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatānañca vacanaṃ sutvā bhiyyoso mattāya sañjātussāho
atk-s0513a1:290_3: Yathā hi ākāse khittaleḍḍussa patanaṃ dhuvaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:290_8: evameva buddhānaṃ vacanaṃ nāma dhuvaṃ amoghaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:294_0: Vitathaṃ natthi buddhānaṃ, dhuvaṃ buddho bhavāmahaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:295_0: “Yathā khittaṃ nabhe leḍḍu, dhuvaṃ patati bhūmiyaṃ;
atk-s0513a1:305_0: So “dhuvāhaṃ buddho bhavissāmī”ti evaṃ katasanniṭṭhāno buddhakārake dhamme upadhāretuṃ “kahaṃ nu kho buddhakārakadhammā,
atk-s0513a1:305_3: vidisāsū”ti anukkamena sakalaṃ dhammadhātuṃ vicinanto porāṇakabodhisattehi āsevitanisevitaṃ paṭhamaṃ dānapāramiṃ disvā evaṃ attānaṃ ovadi –
atk-s0513a1:305_5: tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya paṭhamaṃ dānapāramiṃ pūreyyāsi.
atk-s0513a1:305_6: Yathā hi nikkujjito udakakumbho nissesaṃ katvā udakaṃ vamatiyeva,
atk-s0513a1:305_8: evameva dhanaṃ vā yasaṃ vā puttaṃ vā dāraṃ vā aṅgapaccaṅgaṃ vā anoloketvā sampattayācakānaṃ sabbaṃ icchiticchitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:305_9: nissesaṃ katvā dadamāno bodhirukkhamūle nisīditvā buddho bhavissasī”ti paṭhamaṃ dānapāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā
atk-s0513a1:307_0: Uddhaṃ adho dasa disā, yāvatā dhammadhātuyā.
atk-s0513a1:310_0: “Imaṃ tvaṃ paṭhamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0513a1:315_0: Dadāhi dānaṃ nissesaṃ, kumbho viya adhokato”ti.
atk-s0513a1:316_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttaripi upadhārayato dutiyaṃ sīlapāramiṃ disvā etadahosi –
atk-s0513a1:316_3: Yathā hi camarīmigo nāma jīvitampi anoloketvā attano vālameva rakkhati,
atk-s0513a1:316_4: evaṃ tvampi ito paṭṭhāya jīvitampi anoloketvā sīlameva rakkhanto buddho bhavissasī”ti dutiyaṃ sīlapāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:321_0: “Imaṃ tvaṃ dutiyaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0513a1:324_0: Upeti maraṇaṃ tattha, na vikopeti vāladhiṃ.
atk-s0513a1:326_0: Parirakkha sabbadā sīlaṃ, camarī viya vāladhi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:327_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttaripi upadhārayato tatiyaṃ nekkhammapāramiṃ disvā etadahosi “sumedhapaṇḍita,
atk-s0513a1:327_2: Yathā hi ciraṃ bandhanāgāre vasamāno puriso na tattha sinehaṃ karoti,
atk-s0513a1:327_4: evameva tvampi sabbabhave bandhanāgārasadise katvā sabbabhavehi ukkaṇṭhito muccitukāmo hutvā nekkhammābhimukhova hohi,
atk-s0513a1:327_5: evaṃ buddho bhavissasī”ti tatiyaṃ nekkhammapāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:332_0: “Imaṃ tvaṃ tatiyaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0513a1:335_0: Na tattha rāgaṃ janeti, muttimeva gavesati.
atk-s0513a1:338_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttaripi upadhārayato catutthaṃ paññāpāramiṃ disvā etadahosi –
atk-s0513a1:338_3: Hīnamajjhimukkaṭṭhesu kañci avajjetvā sabbepi paṇḍite upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ puccheyyāsi.
atk-s0513a1:338_4: Yathā hi piṇḍacāriko bhikkhu hīnādikesu kulesu kiñci avajjetvā paṭipāṭiyā piṇḍāya caranto khippaṃ yāpanaṃ labhati,
atk-s0513a1:338_5: evaṃ tvampi sabbapaṇḍite upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchanto buddho bhavissasī”ti catutthaṃ paññāpāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:343_0: “Imaṃ tvaṃ catutthaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0513a1:346_0: Kulāni na vivajjento, evaṃ labhati yāpanaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:349_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttaripi upadhārayato pañcamaṃ vīriyapāramiṃ disvā etadahosi –
atk-s0513a1:349_3: Yathā hi sīho migarājā sabbairiyāpathesu daḷhavīriyo hoti,
atk-s0513a1:349_4: evaṃ tvampi sabbabhavesu sabbairiyāpathesu daḷhavīriyo anolīnavīriyo samāno buddho bhavissasī”ti pañcamaṃ vīriyapāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:354_0: “Imaṃ tvaṃ pañcamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0513a1:360_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttaripi upadhārayato chaṭṭhaṃ khantipāramiṃ disvā etadahosi –
atk-s0513a1:360_4: Yathā hi pathaviyaṃ nāma sucimpi pakkhipanti asucimpi,
atk-s0513a1:360_8: evaṃ tvampi sammānanāvamānanakkhamova samāno buddho bhavissasī”ti chaṭṭhaṃ khantipāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:365_0: “Imaṃ tvaṃ chaṭṭhamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0513a1:368_0: Sabbaṃ sahati nikkhepaṃ, na karoti paṭighaṃ tayā.
atk-s0513a1:371_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttaripi upadhārayato sattamaṃ saccapāramiṃ disvā etadahosi –
atk-s0513a1:371_3: Asaniyā matthake patamānāyapi dhanādīnaṃ atthāya chandādivasena sampajānamusāvādaṃ nāma mākāsi.
atk-s0513a1:371_4: Yathā hi osadhitārakā nāma sabbautūsu attano gamanavīthiṃ jahitvā aññāya vīthiyā na gacchati,
atk-s0513a1:371_6: evameva tvampi saccaṃ pahāya musāvādaṃ nāma akarontoyeva buddho bhavissasī”ti sattamaṃ saccapāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:376_0: “Imaṃ tvaṃ sattamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0513a1:379_0: Samaye utuvasse vā, na vokkamati vīthito.
atk-s0513a1:382_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttaripi upadhārayato aṭṭhamaṃ adhiṭṭhānapāramiṃ disvā etadahosi –
atk-s0513a1:382_5: Yathā hi pabbato nāma sabbadisāsu vātehi pahaṭopi na kampati na calati,
atk-s0513a1:382_7: evameva tvampi attano adhiṭṭhāne niccalo hontova buddho bhavissasī”ti aṭṭhamaṃ adhiṭṭhānapāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:387_0: “Imaṃ tvaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0513a1:388_0: Tattha tvaṃ acalo hutvā, sambodhiṃ pāpuṇissasi.
atk-s0513a1:393_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttaripi upadhārayato navamaṃ mettāpāramiṃ disvā etadahosi –
atk-s0513a1:393_2: tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya navamaṃ mettāpāramimpi pūreyyāsi.
atk-s0513a1:393_4: Yathā hi udakaṃ nāma pāpajanassāpi kalyāṇajanassāpi sītibhāvaṃ ekasadisaṃ katvā pharati,
atk-s0513a1:393_5: evameva tvampi sabbasattesu mettacittena ekacittova honto buddho bhavissasī”ti navamaṃ mettāpāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:398_0: “Imaṃ tvaṃ navamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0513a1:399_0: Mettāya asamo hohi, yadi bodhiṃ pattumicchasi.
atk-s0513a1:404_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttaripi upadhārayato dasamaṃ upekkhāpāramiṃ disvā etadahosi –
atk-s0513a1:404_4: Yathā hi pathavī nāma sucimpi asucimpi pakkhippamānā majjhattāva hoti,
atk-s0513a1:404_5: evameva tvampi sukhadukkhesu majjhattova honto buddho bhavissasī”ti dasamaṃ upekkhāpāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:409_0: “Imaṃ tvaṃ dasamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0513a1:415_1: “imasmiṃ loke bodhisattehi pūretabbā bodhiparipācanā buddhakārakadhammā ettakāyeva,
atk-s0513a1:415_3: imāpi dasa pāramiyo uddhaṃ ākāsepi natthi,
atk-s0513a1:415_7: Evaṃ tāsaṃ hadaye patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ disvā sabbāpi tā daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāya punappunaṃ sammasanto anulomapaṭilomaṃ sammasati,
atk-s0513a1:415_14: jīvitapariccāgo dānaparamatthapāramī nāmāti dasa pāramiyo dasa upapāramiyo dasa paramatthapāramiyo yantatelaṃ
atk-s0513a1:415_15: vinivaṭṭento viya mahāmeruṃ matthaṃ katvā cakkavāḷamahāsamuddaṃ āluḷento viya ca sammasi.
atk-s0513a1:415_16: Tassevaṃ dasa pāramiyo sammasantassa dhammatejena catunahutādhikadviyojanasatasahassabahalā ayaṃ mahāpathavī hatthinā akkantanaḷakalāpo viya,
atk-s0513a1:415_17: pīḷiyamānaṃ ucchuyantaṃ viya ca mahāviravaṃ viravamānā saṅkampi sampakampi sampavedhi,
atk-s0513a1:415_18: kulālacakkaṃ viya telayantacakkaṃ viya ca paribbhami.
atk-s0513a1:417_0: Tatuddhaṃ natthi aññatra, daḷhaṃ tattha patiṭṭhaha.
atk-s0513a1:421_0: Telayante yathā cakkaṃ, evaṃ kampati medanī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:422_0: Mahāpathaviyā kampamānāya rammanagaravāsino saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontā yugantavātabbhāhatā mahāsālā viya mucchitamucchitāva papatiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:422_1: ghaṭādīni kulālabhājanāni pavaṭṭantāni aññamaññaṃ paharantāni cuṇṇavicuṇṇāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:422_2: Mahājano bhītatasito satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā “kiṃ nu kho bhagavā nāgāvaṭṭo ayaṃ bhūtayakkhadevatāsu aññatarāvaṭṭoti na hi mayaṃ etaṃ jānāma,
atk-s0513a1:422_3: apica kho sabbopi ayaṃ mahājano upadduto,
atk-s0513a1:422_4: kiṃ nu kho imassa lokassa pāpakaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:422_7: Atha satthā tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “tumhe mā bhāyatha mā cintayittha,
atk-s0513a1:422_9: Yo so mayā ajja sumedhapaṇḍito ‘anāgate gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī’ti byākato,
atk-s0513a1:422_11: tassa dasa pāramiyo sammasantassa viloḷentassa dhammatejena sakaladasasahassilokadhātu ekappahārena kampati, ceva,
atk-s0513a1:424_0: Pavedhamānā sā tattha, mucchitā sesi bhūmiyaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:430_0: Sabbo upadduto loko, taṃ vinodehi cakkhuma’.
atk-s0513a1:432_0: Vissatthā hotha mā bhātha, imasmiṃ pathavikampane.
atk-s0513a1:437_0: Mahājano tathāgatassa vacanaṃ sutvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho mālāgandhavilepanaṃ ādāya rammanagarā nikkhamitvā bodhisattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:437_1: upasaṅkamitvā mālādīhi pūjetvā vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā rammanagarameva pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:437_2: Bodhisattopi dasa pāramiyo sammasitvā vīriyaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāya nisinnāsanā vuṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:442_0: Atha bodhisattaṃ āsanā vuṭṭhahantaṃ sakaladasasahassacakkavāḷadevatā sannipatitvā dibbehi mālāgandhehi pūjetvā vanditvā “ayya sumedhatāpasa,
atk-s0513a1:442_1: tayā ajja dīpaṅkaradasabalassa pādamūle mahatī patthanā patthitā,
atk-s0513a1:442_3: mā te bhayaṃ vā chambhitattaṃ vā ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:442_6: Yathā pupphūpagaphalūpagā rukkhā samaye pupphanti ceva phalanti ca,
atk-s0513a1:442_7: tatheva tvampi samayaṃ anatikkamitvā khippaṃ sambodhimuttamaṃ phusassū”tiādīni thutimaṅgalāni payirudāhaṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:442_8: evaṃ payirudāhitvā attano attano devaṭṭhānameva agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:442_9: Bodhisattopi devatāhi abhitthuto “ahaṃ dasa pāramiyo pūretvā kappasatasahassādhikānaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:442_10: matthake buddho bhavissāmī”ti vīriyaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāya nabhaṃ abbhuggantvā himavantameva agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:445_0: “Vedayanti ca te sotthiṃ, devā mānusakā ubho;
atk-s0513a1:446_0: Mahantaṃ patthitaṃ tuyhaṃ, taṃ labhassu yathicchitaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:448_0: Mā te bhavantvantarāyā, phusa khippaṃ bodhimuttamaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:451_0: “Yathā ye keci sambuddhā, pūrayuṃ dasa pāramī;
atk-s0513a1:452_0: Tatheva tvaṃ mahāvīra, pūraya dasa pāramī.
atk-s0513a1:460_0: Tatheva lokā muccitvā, viroca siriyā tuvaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:464_0: Te dhamme paripūrento, pavanaṃ pāvisī tadā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:466_0: Rammanagaravāsinopi kho nagaraṃ pavisitvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:466_1: Satthā tesaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā mahājanaṃ saraṇādīsu patiṭṭhāpetvā rammanagaramhā nikkhamitvā tato uddhampi
atk-s0513a1:466_2: yāvatāyukaṃ tiṭṭhanto sabbaṃ buddhakiccaṃ katvā anukkamena anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0513a1:470_0: Kañci pañcasu sīlesu, sīle dasavidhe paraṃ.
atk-s0513a1:472_0: Kassaci asame dhamme, deti so paṭisambhidā.
atk-s0513a1:499_0: “Ye keci tena samayena, jahanti mānusaṃ bhavaṃ;
atk-s0513a1:512_0: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:515_0: “Sā ca iddhi so ca yaso, tāni ca pādesu cakkaratanāni;
atk-s0513a1:517_0: Dīpaṅkarassa pana bhagavato aparabhāge ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā koṇḍañño nāma satthā udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:517_5: Tadā bodhisatto vijitāvī nāma cakkavattī hutvā koṭisatasahassasaṅkhassa buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:517_6: Satthā bodhisattaṃ “buddho bhavissasī”ti byākaritvā dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0513a1:517_7: So satthu dhammakathaṃ sutvā rajjaṃ niyyādetvā pabbaji.
atk-s0513a1:517_8: So tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca abhiññāyo ca uppādetvā aparihīnajjhāno brahmaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:517_9: Koṇḍaññassa buddhassa pana rammavatī nāma nagaraṃ,
atk-s0513a1:517_12: bhaddo ca subhaddo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0513a1:517_14: tissā ca upatissā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0513a1:520_0: Tassa aparabhāge ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā ekasmiṃyeva kappe caturo buddhā nibbattiṃsu maṅgalo, sumano, revato,
atk-s0513a1:520_6: Vemātikabhātā kirassa ānandakumāro nāma navutikoṭisaṅkhāya parisāya saddhiṃ dhammassavanatthāya satthu santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:520_8: so saddhiṃ parisāya saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a1:520_9: Satthā tesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ pubbacaritaṃ olokento iddhimayapattacīvarassa upanissayaṃ disvā dakkhiṇahatthaṃ pasāretvā “etha,
atk-s0513a1:520_11: Sabbe taṅkhaṇaññeva iddhimayapattacīvaradharā saṭṭhivassamahātherā viya ākappasampannā hutvā satthāraṃ vanditvā parivārayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:521_0: Yathā pana aññesaṃ buddhānaṃ samantā asītihatthappamāṇāyeva sarīrappabhā ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:521_1: na evaṃ tassa tassa pana bhagavato sarīrappabhā niccakālaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuṃ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:521_2: Rukkhapathavipabbatasamuddādayo antamaso ukkhalikādīni upādāya suvaṇṇapaṭṭapariyonaddhā viya ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:521_4: Ettakaṃ kālaṃ candimasūriyādayo attano pabhāya virocituṃ nāsakkhiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:521_6: Divā sūriyālokena viya sattā niccaṃ buddhālokeneva vicariṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:521_8: pāto ravanakasakuṇādīnañca vasena loko rattindivaparicchedaṃ sallakkhesi.
atk-s0513a1:522_0: Kiṃ pana aññesaṃ buddhānaṃ ayamānubhāvo natthīti?
atk-s0513a1:522_2: Tepi hi ākaṅkhamānā dasasahassiṃ vā lokadhātuṃ tato vā bhiyyo ābhāya phareyyuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:522_3: Maṅgalassa pana bhagavato pubbapatthanāvasena aññesaṃ byāmappabhā viya sarīrappabhā niccakālameva dasasahassilokadhātuṃ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:522_4: So kira bodhisattacariyakāle vessantarasadise attabhāve ṭhito saputtadāro vaṅkapabbatasadise pabbate vasi.
atk-s0513a1:522_5: Atheko kharadāṭhiko nāma yakkho mahāpurisassa dānajjhāsayataṃ sutvā brāhmaṇavaṇṇena upasaṅkamitvā mahāsattaṃ dve dārake yāci.
atk-s0513a1:522_6: Mahāsatto “dadāmi brāhmaṇassa puttake”ti haṭṭhapahaṭṭho udakapariyantaṃ pathaviṃ kampento dvepi dārake adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:522_7: Yakkho caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ ālambanaphalakaṃ nissāya ṭhatvā passantasseva mahāsattassa mūlakalāpe viya dve dārake khādi.
atk-s0513a1:522_8: Mahāpurisassa yakkhaṃ oloketvā mukhe vivaṭamatte aggijālaṃ viya lohitadhāraṃ uggiramānaṃ tassa mukhaṃ disvāpi kesaggamattampi domanassaṃ na uppajji.
atk-s0513a1:522_9: “Sudinnaṃ vata me dāna”nti cintayato panassa sarīre mahantaṃ pītisomanassa udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:522_10: So “imassa me nissandena anāgate imināva nīhārena rasmiyo nikkhamantū”ti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:522_11: Tassa taṃ patthanaṃ nissāya buddhabhūtassa sarīrato rasmiyo nikkhamitvā ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ phariṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:523_1: So kira bodhisattakāle ekassa buddhassa cetiyaṃ disvā “imassa buddhassa mayā jīvitaṃ pariccajituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:523_2: daṇḍadīpikāveṭhananiyāmena sakalasarīraṃ veṭhāpetvā ratanamattamakuḷaṃ satasahassagghanikaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ
atk-s0513a1:523_3: sappissa pūrāpetvā tattha sahassavaṭṭiyo jālāpetvā taṃ sīsenādāya sakalasarīraṃ jālāpetvā cetiyaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:523_5: Evaṃ yāva aruṇuggamanā vāyamantassāpissa lomakūpamattampi usumaṃ na gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a1:523_7: Dhammo hi nāmesa attānaṃ rakkhantaṃ rakkhati.
atk-s0513a1:524_0: “Dhammo have rakkhati dhammacāriṃ, dhammo suciṇṇo sukhamāvahāti;
atk-s0513a1:525_0: Esānisaṃso dhamme suciṇṇe, na duggatiṃ gacchati dhammacārī”ti. ;
atk-s0513a1:526_0: Imassāpi kammassa nissandena tassa bhagavato sarīrobhāso dasasahassilokadhātuṃ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:527_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto suruci nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā “satthāraṃ nimantessāmī”ti upasaṅkamitvā madhuradhammakathaṃ sutvā “sve mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhatha,
atk-s0513a1:527_7: sabbehipi saddhiṃ mayhaṃ gehe bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathāti.
atk-s0513a1:527_9: Brāhmaṇo svātanāya nimantetvā gehaṃ gacchanto cintesi –
atk-s0513a1:528_0: Tassa sā cintā caturāsītiyojanasahassamatthake ṭhitassa devarañño paṇḍukambalasilāsanassa uṇhabhāvaṃ janesi.
atk-s0513a1:528_1: Sakko “ko nu kho maṃ imamhā ṭhānā cāvetukāmo”ti dibbacakkhunā olokento mahāpurisaṃ disvā “suruci nāma
atk-s0513a1:528_2: brāhmaṇo buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā nisīdanaṭṭhānatthāya cintesi,
atk-s0513a1:528_3: mayāpi tattha gantvā puññakoṭṭhāsaṃ gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vaḍḍhakivaṇṇaṃ nimminitvā vāsipharasuhattho mahāpurisassa purato pāturahosi.
atk-s0513a1:528_4: So “atthi nu kho kassaci bhatiyā kattabba”nti āha.
atk-s0513a1:528_5: Mahāpuriso taṃ disvā “kiṃ kammaṃ karissasī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:528_7: gehaṃ vā maṇḍapaṃ vā yo yaṃ kāreti,
atk-s0513a1:528_17: dvādasaterasayojanappamāṇo padeso kasiṇamaṇḍalaṃ viya samatalo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:528_18: So “ettake ṭhāne sattaratanamayo maṇḍapo uṭṭhahatū”ti cintetvā olokesi.
atk-s0513a1:528_20: Tassa sovaṇṇamayesu thambhesu rajatamayā ghaṭakā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:528_27: yassa mandavāteritassa pañcaṅgikasseva tūriyassa madhurasaddo niggacchati,
atk-s0513a1:528_31: “Koṭisatasahassasaṅkhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āsanāni ca ādhārakāni ca pathaviṃ bhinditvā uṭṭhahantū”ti cintesi,
atk-s0513a1:529_0: Ettakaṃ māpetvā brāhmaṇassa santikaṃ gantvā “ehi ayya,
atk-s0513a1:529_1: tava maṇḍapaṃ oloketvā mayhaṃ bhatiṃ dehī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:529_3: olokentassevassa sakalasarīraṃ pañcavaṇṇāya pītiyā nirantaraṃ phuṭaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:529_6: mayhaṃ pana ajjhāsayaṃ mayhaṃ guṇaṃ āgamma addhā sakkabhavanaṃ uṇhaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:529_7: tato sakkena devaraññā ayaṃ maṇḍapo kārito bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:529_8: “Na kho pana me yuttaṃ evarūpe maṇḍape ekadivasaṃyeva dānaṃ dātuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:529_10: Bāhirakadānañhi kittakampi samānaṃ bodhisattānaṃ tuṭṭhiṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0513a1:529_11: alaṅkatasīsaṃ pana chinditvā añjitaakkhīni uppāṭetvā hadayamaṃsaṃ vā ubbaṭṭetvā dinnakāle bodhisattānaṃ cāgaṃ nissāya tuṭṭhi nāma hoti.
atk-s0513a1:529_12: Amhākampi hi bodhisattassa sivijātake devasikaṃ pañca kahāpaṇasatasahassāni vissajjetvā catūsu dvāresu
atk-s0513a1:529_13: nagaramajjhe ca dānaṃ dentassa taṃ dānaṃ cāgatuṭṭhiṃ uppādetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0513a1:529_14: Yadā panassa brāhmaṇavaṇṇena āgantvā sakko devarājā akkhīni yāci,
atk-s0513a1:529_15: tadā tāni uppāṭetvā dadamānasseva hāso uppajji,
atk-s0513a1:529_17: Evaṃ dānaṃ nissāya bodhisattānaṃ titti nāma natthi.
atk-s0513a1:529_18: Tasmā sopi mahāpuriso “sattāhaṃ mayā koṭisatasahassasaṅkhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dānaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0513a1:529_19: tasmiṃ maṇḍape buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nisīdāpetvā sattāhaṃ gavapānaṃ nāma dānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:529_20: Gavapānanti mahante mahante kolambe khīrassa pūretvā uddhanesu āropetvā ghanapākapakke khīre thoke taṇḍule
atk-s0513a1:529_25: Te pana bhikkhū attano attano ānubhāvena nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:529_26: Pariyosānadivase sabbabhikkhūnaṃ pattāni dhovāpetvā bhesajjatthāya sappinavanītamadhuphāṇitādīni pūretvā ticīvarehi saddhiṃ adāsi,
atk-s0513a1:530_0: Satthā anumodanaṃ karonto “ayaṃ puriso evarūpaṃ mahādānaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0513a1:530_1: ko nu kho bhavissatī”ti upadhārento “anāgate kappasatasahassādhikānaṃ dvinnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake
atk-s0513a1:530_2: gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti disvā mahāpurisaṃ āmantetvā “tvaṃ ettakaṃ nāma kālaṃ atikkamitvā gotamo
atk-s0513a1:530_4: Mahāpuriso byākaraṇaṃ sutvā “ahaṃ kira buddho bhavissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:530_6: pabbajissāmī”ti cintetvā tathārūpaṃ sampattiṃ kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya pahāya satthu santike pabbajitvā buddhavacanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:530_7: uggaṇhitvā abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā āyupariyosāne brahmaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:531_0: Maṅgalassa pana bhagavato nagaraṃ uttaraṃ nāma ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:531_3: sudevo ca dhammaseno ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0513a1:531_5: sīvalī ca asokā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0513a1:531_8: Navutivassasahassāni ṭhatvā parinibbute pana tasmiṃ bhagavati ekappahāreneva dasa cakkavāḷasahassāni ekandhakārāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:534_0: Evaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuṃ andhakāraṃ katvā parinibbutassa tassa bhagavato aparabhāge sumano nāma satthā udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:534_5: Tadā mahāsatto atulo nāma nāgarājā ahosi mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo.
atk-s0513a1:534_6: So “buddho uppanno”ti sutvā ñātisaṅghaparivuto nāgabhavanā nikkhamitvā koṭisatasahassabhikkhuparivārassa
atk-s0513a1:534_7: tassa bhagavato dibbatūriyehi upahāraṃ kāretvā mahādānaṃ pavattetvā paccekaṃ dussayugāni datvā saraṇesu
atk-s0513a1:534_9: Sopi naṃ satthā “anāgate buddho bhavissasī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0513a1:534_10: Tassa bhagavato nagaraṃ khemaṃ nāma ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:534_13: saraṇo ca bhāvitatto ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0513a1:534_15: soṇā ca upasoṇā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0513a1:537_0: Tassa aparabhāge revato nāma satthā udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:537_5: Tadā bodhisatto atidevo nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya sirasmiṃ añjaliṃ
atk-s0513a1:537_6: ṭhapetvā tassa satthuno kilesappahāne vaṇṇaṃ vatvā uttarāsaṅgena pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:537_8: Tassa pana bhagavato nagaraṃ dhaññavatī nāma ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:537_11: varuṇo ca brahmadevo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0513a1:537_13: bhaddā ca subhaddā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0513a1:540_0: Tassa aparabhāge sobhito nāma satthā udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:540_5: Tadā bodhisatto ajito nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:540_7: Tassa pana bhagavato sudhammaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:540_10: asamo ca sunetto ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0513a1:540_12: nakulā ca sujātā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0513a1:543_0: Tassa aparabhāge ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā ekasmiṃyeva kappe tayo buddhā nibbattiṃsu anomadassī padumo nāradoti.
atk-s0513a1:543_5: Tadā bodhisatto eko yakkhasenāpati ahosi mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo anekakoṭisatasahassānaṃ yakkhānaṃ adhipati.
atk-s0513a1:543_6: So “buddho uppanno”ti sutvā āgantvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:543_8: Anomadassissa pana bhagavato candavatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:543_11: nisabho ca anomo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0513a1:543_13: sundarī ca sumanā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0513a1:546_0: Tassa aparabhāge padumo nāma satthā udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:546_4: tatiye agāmake araññe mahāvanasaṇḍavāsīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dve satasahassāni.
atk-s0513a1:546_5: Tadā tathāgate tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe vasante bodhisatto sīho hutvā satthāraṃ nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpannaṃ
atk-s0513a1:546_6: disvā pasannacitto vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pītisomanassajāto tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ naditvā sattāhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:546_7: buddhārammaṇapītiṃ avijahitvā pītisukheneva gocarāya apakkamitvā jīvitapariccāgaṃ katvā payirupāsamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:546_8: Satthā sattāhaccayena nirodhā vuṭṭhito sīhaṃ oloketvā “bhikkhusaṅghepi cittaṃ pasādetvā saṅghaṃ vandissatīti bhikkhusaṅgho āgacchatū”ti cintesi.
atk-s0513a1:546_11: Satthā tassa manaṃ oloketvā “anāgate buddho bhavissasī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0513a1:546_12: Padumassa pana bhagavato campakaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:546_15: sālo ca upasālo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0513a1:546_17: rāmā ca surāmā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0513a1:549_0: Tassa aparabhāge nārado nāma satthā udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:549_5: Tadā bodhisatto isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā pañcasu abhiññāsu aṭṭhasu ca samāpattīsu ciṇṇavasī hutvā buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0513a1:549_6: bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā lohitacandanena pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:549_8: Tassa bhagavato dhaññavatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:549_11: saddasālo ca jitamitto ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0513a1:549_13: uttarā ca phaggunī ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0513a1:552_0: Nāradabuddhassa aparabhāge ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā ito satasahassakappamatthake ekasmiṃ kappe ekova padumuttarabuddho nāma udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:552_5: Tadā bodhisatto jaṭilo nāma mahāraṭṭhiyo hutvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa sacīvaraṃ dānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:552_7: Padumuttarassa pana bhagavato kāle titthiyā nāma nāhesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:552_12: devalo ca sujāto ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0513a1:552_14: amitā ca asamā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0513a1:555_0: Tassa aparabhāge sattati kappasahassāni atikkamitvā sumedho sujāto cāti ekasmiṃ kappe dve buddhā nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:555_5: Tadā bodhisatto uttaro nāma māṇavo hutvā nidahitvā ṭhapitaṃyeva asītikoṭidhanaṃ vissajjetvā buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0513a1:555_6: bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā dhammaṃ sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya nikkhamitvā pabbaji.
atk-s0513a1:555_8: Sumedhassa bhagavato sudassanaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:555_11: saraṇo ca sabbakāmo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0513a1:555_13: rāmā ca surāmā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0513a1:558_0: Tassa aparabhāge sujāto nāma satthā udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:558_5: Tadā bodhisatto cakkavattirājā hutvā “buddho uppanno”ti sutvā upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0513a1:558_6: bhikkhusaṅghassa saddhiṃ sattahi ratanehi catumahādīparajjaṃ datvā satthu santike pabbaji.
atk-s0513a1:558_7: Sakalaraṭṭhavāsino raṭṭhuppādaṃ gahetvā ārāmikakiccaṃ sādhentā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa niccaṃ mahādānaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:558_8: Sopi naṃ satthā “anāgate buddho bhavissasī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0513a1:558_9: Tassa bhagavato nagaraṃ sumaṅgalaṃ nāma ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:558_12: sudassano ca sudevo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0513a1:558_14: nāgā ca nāgasamālā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0513a1:558_16: So kira mandacchiddo ghanakkhandho upari niggatāhi mahāsākhāhi morapiñchakalāpo viya virocittha.
atk-s0513a1:561_0: Tassa aparabhāge ito aṭṭhārasakappasatamatthake ekasmiṃ kappe piyadassī,
atk-s0513a1:561_7: Tadā bodhisatto kassapo nāma māṇavo tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāraṃ gato hutvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā koṭisatasahassadhanapariccāgena
atk-s0513a1:561_8: saṅghārāmaṃ kāretvā saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:561_9: Atha naṃ satthā “aṭṭhārasakappasataccayena buddho bhavissasī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0513a1:561_10: Tassa bhagavato anomaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:561_13: pālito ca sabbadassī ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0513a1:561_15: sujātā ca dhammadinnā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0513a1:564_0: Tassa aparabhāge atthadassī nāma satthā udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:564_5: Tadā bodhisatto susīmo nāma mahiddhiko tāpaso hutvā devalokato mandāravapupphacchattaṃ āharitvā satthāraṃ pūjesi,
atk-s0513a1:564_7: Tassa bhagavato sobhitaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:564_10: santo ca upasanto ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0513a1:564_12: dhammā ca sudhammā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0513a1:564_15: sarīrappabhā samantato sabbakālaṃ yojanamattaṃ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0513a1:567_0: Tassa aparabhāge dhammadassī nāma satthā udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:567_5: Tadā bodhisatto sakko devarājā hutvā dibbagandhapupphehi ca dibbatūriyehi ca pūjaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0513a1:567_7: Tassa bhagavato saraṇaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:567_10: padumo ca phussadevo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0513a1:567_12: khemā ca sabbanāmā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0513a1:570_0: Tassa aparabhāge ito catunavutikappamatthake ekasmiṃ kappe ekova siddhattho nāma buddho udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:570_5: Tadā bodhisatto uggatejo abhiññābalasampanno maṅgalo nāma tāpaso hutvā mahājambuphalaṃ āharitvā tathāgatassa adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:570_6: Satthā taṃ phalaṃ paribhuñjitvā “catunavutikappamatthake buddho bhavissasī”ti bodhisattaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0513a1:570_7: Tassa bhagavato nagaraṃ vebhāraṃ nāma ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:570_10: sambalo ca sumitto ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0513a1:570_12: sīvalī ca surāmā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0513a1:572_0: Nihanitvā tamaṃ sabbaṃ, sūriyo abbhuggato yathā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:573_0: Tassa aparabhāge ito dvānavutikappamatthake tisso phussoti ekasmiṃ kappe dve buddhā nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:573_5: Tadā bodhisatto mahābhogo mahāyaso sujāto nāma khattiyo hutvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā mahiddhikabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:573_6: patvā “buddho uppanno”ti sutvā dibbamandāravapadumapāricchattakapupphāni ādāya catuparisamajjhe gacchantaṃ
atk-s0513a1:573_9: Sopi naṃ satthā “ito dvānavutikappe buddho bhavissasī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0513a1:573_10: Tassa bhagavato khemaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:573_13: brahmadevo ca udayo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0513a1:573_15: phussā ca sudattā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0513a1:576_0: Tassa aparabhāge phusso nāma satthā udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:576_5: Tadā bodhisatto vijitāvī nāma khattiyo hutvā mahārajjaṃ pahāya satthu santike pabbajitvā tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā mahājanassa dhammakathaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0513a1:576_8: Tassa bhagavato kāsī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:576_11: surakkhito ca dhammaseno ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0513a1:576_13: cālā ca upacālā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0513a1:579_0: Tassa aparabhāge ito ekanavutikappe vipassī nāma bhagavā udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:579_5: Tadā bodhisatto mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo atulo nāma nāgarājā hutvā sattaratanakhacitaṃ sovaṇṇamayaṃ mahāpīṭhaṃ bhagavato adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:579_6: Sopi naṃ “ito ekanavutikappe buddho bhavissasī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0513a1:579_7: Tassa bhagavato bandhumatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:579_10: khaṇḍo ca tisso ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0513a1:579_12: candā ca candamittā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0513a1:579_15: sarīrappabhā sadā satta yojanāni pharitvā aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0513a1:581_0: Vipassī nāma nāmena, loke uppajji cakkhumā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:582_0: Tassa aparabhāge ito ekatiṃsakappe sikhī ca vessabhū cāti dve buddhā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:582_5: Tadā bodhisatto arindamo nāma rājā hutvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa sacīvaraṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā
atk-s0513a1:582_6: sattaratanapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ hatthiratanaṃ datvā hatthippamāṇaṃ katvā kappiyabhaṇḍaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:582_7: Sopi naṃ “ito katiṃsakappe buddho bhavissasī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0513a1:582_8: Tassa bhagavato aruṇavatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:582_11: abhibhū ca sambhavo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0513a1:582_13: sakhilā ca padumā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0513a1:585_0: Tassa aparabhāge vessabhū nāma satthā udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:585_5: Tadā bodhisatto sudassano nāma rājā hutvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa sacīvaraṃ mahādānaṃ datvā
atk-s0513a1:585_6: tassa santike pabbajitvā ācāraguṇasampanno buddharatane cittīkārapītibahulo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:585_7: Sopi naṃ bhagavā “ito ekatiṃsakappe buddho bhavissasī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0513a1:585_8: Tassa pana bhagavato anomaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:585_11: soṇo ca uttaro ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0513a1:585_13: dāmā ca samālā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0513a1:587_0: Vessabhū nāma nāmena, loke uppajji so jino”ti.
atk-s0513a1:588_0: Tassa aparabhāge imasmiṃ kappe cattāro buddhā nibbattā kakusandho,
atk-s0513a1:588_5: Tadā bodhisatto khemo nāma rājā hutvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa sapattacīvaraṃ mahādānañceva
atk-s0513a1:588_6: añjanādibhesajjāni ca datvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pabbaji.
atk-s0513a1:588_8: Kakusandhassa pana bhagavato khemaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:588_11: vidhuro ca sañjīvo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0513a1:588_13: sāmā ca campakā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0513a1:591_0: Tassa aparabhāge koṇāgamano nāma satthā udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:591_3: Tadā bodhisatto pabbato nāma rājā hutvā amaccagaṇaparivuto satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammadesanaṃ sutvā
atk-s0513a1:591_4: buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā mahādānaṃ pavattetvā paṭṭuṇṇacīnapaṭṭakoseyyakambaladukūlāni
atk-s0513a1:591_5: ceva suvaṇṇapādukañca datvā satthu santike pabbaji.
atk-s0513a1:591_7: Tassa bhagavato sobhavatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:591_10: bhiyyaso ca uttaro ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0513a1:591_12: samuddā ca uttarā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0513a1:594_0: Tassa aparabhāge kassapo nāma satthā udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:594_3: Tadā bodhisatto jotipālo nāma māṇavo hutvā tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū bhūmiyañca antalikkhe ca pākaṭo ghaṭīkārassa kumbhakārassa mitto ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:594_4: So tena saddhiṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammakathaṃ sutvā pabbajitvā āraddhavīriyo tīṇi piṭakāni uggahetvā
atk-s0513a1:594_7: Tassa bhagavato jātanagaraṃ bārāṇasī nāma ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:594_10: tisso ca bhāradvājo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0513a1:594_12: anuḷā ca uruveḷā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0513a1:597_0: Yasmiṃ pana kappe dīpaṅkaro dasabalo udapādi,
atk-s0513a1:597_4: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana tamhā kappā paṭṭhāya sabbepi buddhe dassetuṃ idaṃ vuttaṃ –

atk-s0513a1:641_1: Tathā vīriyapāramitādīnampi pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi.

atk-s0513a1:649_0: Mocesiṃ ekasataṃ khattiye, esā me saccapāramī”ti. –

atk-s0513a1:651_0: “Mātā pitā na me dessā, napi me dessaṃ mahāyasaṃ;
atk-s0513a1:653_0: Evaṃ jīvitampi cajitvā vataṃ adhiṭṭhahantassa adhiṭṭhānapāramitā paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0513a1:654_0: “Na maṃ koci uttasati, napihaṃ bhāyāmi kassaci;
atk-s0513a1:656_0: Evaṃ jīvitampi anoloketvā mettāyantassa mettāpāramitā paramatthapāramī nāma jātā. Lomahaṃsajātake –
atk-s0513a1:659_0: Evaṃ gāmadārakesu niṭṭhubhanādīhi ceva mālāgandhūpahārādīhi ca sukhadukkhaṃ uppādentesupi upekkhaṃ anativattantassa
atk-s0513a1:662_0: Evaṃ mahāpathavikampanādīni mahāpuññāni katvā āyupariyosāne tato cuto tusitabhavane nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:662_1: Iti dīpaṅkarapādamūlato paṭṭhāya yāva ayaṃ tusitapure nibbatti,
atk-s0513a1:665_0: Tusitapure vasanteyeva pana bodhisatte buddhakolāhalaṃ nāma udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:665_5: Tattha “vassasatasahassassa accayena kappuṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti lokabyūhā nāma kāmāvacaradevā muttasirā
atk-s0513a1:665_6: vikiṇṇakesā rudamukhā assūni hatthehi puñchamānā rattavatthanivatthā ativiya virūpavesadhārino hutvā
atk-s0513a1:665_7: manussapathe vicarantā evaṃ ārocenti “mārisā ito vassasatasahassassa accayena kappuṭṭhānaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:665_10: ayañca mahāpathavī sineru ca pabbatarājā uḍḍayhissanti vinassissanti,

atk-s0513a1:665_19: accayena buddho loke uppajjissatī”ti ugghosentā āhiṇḍanti.
atk-s0513a1:665_21: Vassasatassa accayena cakkavattī rājā uppajjissatīti devatā “ito mārisā vassasatassa accayena cakkavattī
atk-s0513a1:666_0: Tesu buddhakolāhalasaddaṃ sutvā sakaladasasahassacakkavāḷadevatā ekato sannipatitvā “asuko nāma satto
atk-s0513a1:666_1: buddho bhavissatī”ti ñatvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā āyācanti.
atk-s0513a1:666_4: saddhiṃ ekacakkavāḷe sannipatitvā tusitabhavane bodhisattassa santikaṃ gantvā “mārisā tumhehi dasa pāramiyo
atk-s0513a1:666_10: so vo idāni kālo mārisā buddhattāya samayo,
atk-s0513a1:667_0: Atha mahāsatto devatānaṃ paṭiññaṃ adatvāva kāladīpadesakulajanettiāyuparicchedavasena pañcamahāvilokanaṃ nāma vilokesi.
atk-s0513a1:667_2: akālo nu kho”ti paṭhamaṃ kālaṃ vilokesi.
atk-s0513a1:667_3: Tattha vassasatasahassato uddhaṃ vaḍḍhitaāyukālo kālo nāma na hoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0513a1:667_4: Tadā hi sattānaṃ jātijarāmaraṇāni na paññāyanti.
atk-s0513a1:667_7: anattā”ti kathentānaṃ “kiṃ nāmetaṃ kathentī”ti neva sotabbaṃ na saddhātabbaṃ maññanti,
atk-s0513a1:667_11: Vassasatato ūnaāyukālopi kālo na hoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0513a1:667_13: ussannakilesānañca dinno ovādo ovādaṭṭhāne na tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0513a1:667_17: vassasatato paṭṭhāya uddhaṃ āyukālo kālo nāma.
atk-s0513a1:668_0: Tato dīpaṃ vilokento saparivāre cattāro dīpe oloketvā “tīsu dīpesu buddhā na nibbattanti,
atk-s0513a1:669_1: katarasmiṃ nu kho padese buddhā nibbattantī”ti okāsaṃ vilokento majjhimadesaṃ passi.
atk-s0513a1:669_18: orato majjhe”ti evaṃ vinaye vutto padeso.
atk-s0513a1:669_21: parikkhepato nava yojanasatānīti etasmiṃ padese buddhā,
atk-s0513a1:669_25: cakkavattirājā aññe ca mahesakkhā khattiyabrāhmaṇagahapatimahāsālā uppajjanti.
atk-s0513a1:670_0: Tato kulaṃ vilokento “buddhā nāma vessakule vā suddakule vā na nibbattanti,
atk-s0513a1:670_1: lokasammate pana khattiyakule vā brāhmaṇakulevāti dvīsuyeva kulesu nibbattanti.
atk-s0513a1:670_4: Suddhodano nāma rājā me pitā bhavissatī”ti kulaṃ passi.
atk-s0513a1:671_0: Tato mātaraṃ vilokento “buddhamātā nāma lolā surādhuttā na hoti,
atk-s0513a1:671_1: kappasatasahassaṃ pana pūritapāramī jātito paṭṭhāya akhaṇḍapañcasīlāyeva hoti.
atk-s0513a1:671_4: kittakaṃ panassā āyūti dasannaṃ māsānaṃ upari satta divasānī”ti passi.
atk-s0513a1:672_0: Iti imaṃ pañcamahāvilokanaṃ viloketvā “kālo me mārisā buddhabhāvāyā”ti devatānaṃ saṅgahaṃ karonto paṭiññaṃ datvā “gacchatha,
atk-s0513a1:672_1: tumhe”ti tā devatā uyyojetvā tusitadevatāhi parivuto tusitapure nandanavanaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:672_3: Tattha naṃ devatā “ito cuto sugatiṃ gaccha,
atk-s0513a1:672_4: ito cuto sugatiṃ gacchā”ti pubbe katakusalakammokāsaṃ sārayamānā vicaranti.
atk-s0513a1:672_5: So evaṃ devatāhi kusalaṃ sārayamānāhi parivuto tattha vicaranto cavitvā mahāmāyāya deviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a1:673_1: tadā kira kapilavatthunagare āsāḷhinakkhattaṃ saṅghuṭṭhaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:673_3: Mahāmāyāpi devī pure puṇṇamāya sattamadivasato paṭṭhāya vigatasurāpānaṃ mālāgandhavibhūtisampannaṃ nakkhattakīḷaṃ
atk-s0513a1:673_4: anubhavamānā sattame divase pātova uṭṭhāya gandhodakena nhāyitvā cattāri satasahassāni vissajjetvā mahādānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:673_5: datvā sabbālaṅkāravibhūsitā varabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ sirigabbhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:673_6: pavisitvā sirisayane nipannā niddaṃ okkamamānā imaṃ supinaṃ addasa –
atk-s0513a1:673_7: ‘cattāro kira naṃ mahārājāno sayaneneva saddhiṃ ukkhipitvā himavantaṃ netvā saṭṭhiyojanike manosilātale
atk-s0513a1:673_8: sattayojanikassa mahāsālarukkhassa heṭṭhā ṭhapetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:673_9: Atha nesaṃ deviyo āgantvā deviṃ anotattadahaṃ netvā manussamalaharaṇatthaṃ nhāpetvā dibbavatthaṃ nivāsāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:673_10: gandhehi vilimpāpetvā dibbapupphāni piḷandhāpetvā tato avidūre eko rajatapabbato atthi,
atk-s0513a1:673_13: Atha bodhisatto setavaravāraṇo hutvā tato avidūre eko suvaṇṇapabbato atthi,
atk-s0513a1:673_14: tattha vicaritvā tato oruyha rajatapabbataṃ abhiruhitvā uttaradisato āgamma rajatadāmavaṇṇāya soṇḍāya
atk-s0513a1:673_15: setapadumaṃ gahetvā koñcanādaṃ naditvā kanakavimānaṃ pavisitvā mātusayanaṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā
atk-s0513a1:674_0: Punadivase pabuddhā devī taṃ supinaṃ rañño ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:674_1: Rājā catusaṭṭhimatte brāhmaṇapāmokkhe pakkosāpetvā gomayaharitūpalittāya lājādīhi katamaṅgalasakkārāya
atk-s0513a1:674_2: bhūmiyā mahārahāni āsanāni paññāpetvā tattha nisinnānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ sappimadhusakkharābhisaṅkhatassa
atk-s0513a1:674_3: varapāyāsassa suvaṇṇarajatapātiyo pūretvā suvaṇṇarajatapātīhiyeva paṭikujjitvā adāsi,
atk-s0513a1:674_5: Atha nesaṃ sabbakāmehi santappitānaṃ supinaṃ ārocāpetvā “kiṃ bhavissatī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:675_0: Bodhisattassa pana mātukucchimhi paṭisandhiggahaṇakkhaṇe ekappahāreneva sakaladasasahassī lokadhātu saṅkampi sampakampi sampavedhi.
atk-s0513a1:675_3: Tassa taṃ siriṃ daṭṭhukāmā viya andhā cakkhūni paṭilabhiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:675_30: thale silātalāni bhinditvā uparūpari satta satta hutvā daṇḍapadumāni nāma nikkhamiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:675_36: alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ mālāsanaṃ viya ca ekamālāmālinī vipphurantavāḷabījanī pupphadhūmagandhaparivāsitā paramasobhaggappattā ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:676_0: Evaṃ gahitapaṭisandhikassa bodhisattassa paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya bodhisattassa ceva bodhisattamātuyā ca
atk-s0513a1:676_1: upaddavanivāraṇatthaṃ khaggahatthā cattāro devaputtā ārakkhaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:676_4: Bodhisattañca antokucchigataṃ vippasanne maṇiratane āvutapaṇḍusuttaṃ viya passati.
atk-s0513a1:676_5: Yasmā ca bodhisattena vasitakucchi nāma cetiyagabbhasadisā hoti,
atk-s0513a1:676_6: na sakkā aññena sattena āvasituṃ vā paribhuñjituṃ vā,
atk-s0513a1:676_7: tasmā bodhisattamātā sattāhajāte bodhisatte kālaṃ katvā tusitapure nibbattati.
atk-s0513a1:676_8: Yathā ca aññā itthiyo dasa māse apatvāpi atikkamitvāpi nisinnāpi nipannāpi vijāyanti,
atk-s0513a1:676_10: Sā pana bodhisattaṃ dasa māse kucchinā pariharitvā ṭhitāva vijāyati.
atk-s0513a1:677_0: Mahāmāyāpi devī pattena telaṃ viya dasa māse kucchinā bodhisattaṃ pariharitvā paripuṇṇagabbhā ñātigharaṃ gantukāmā suddhodanamahārājassa ārocesi –
atk-s0513a1:677_3: Rājā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā kapilavatthuto yāva devadahanagarā maggaṃ samaṃ kāretvā kadalipuṇṇaghaṭadhajapaṭākādīhi
atk-s0513a1:677_4: alaṅkārāpetvā devi suvaṇṇasivikāya nisīdāpetvā amaccasahassena ukkhipāpetvā mahantena parivārena pesesi.
atk-s0513a1:677_5: Dvinnaṃ pana nagarānaṃ antare ubhayanagaravāsīnampi lumbinīvanaṃ nāma maṅgalasālavanaṃ atthi,
atk-s0513a1:677_6: tasmiṃ samaye mūlato paṭṭhāya yāva aggasākhā sabbaṃ ekapāliphullaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:677_7: sākhantarehi ceva pupphantarehi ca pañcavaṇṇā bhamaragaṇā nānappakārā ca sakuṇasaṅghā madhurassarena vikūjantā vicaranti.
atk-s0513a1:677_9: mahānubhāvassa rañño susajjitaṃ āpānamaṇḍalaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:677_10: Deviyā taṃ disvā sālavanakīḷaṃ kīḷitukāmatācittaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:677_12: Sā maṅgalasālamūlaṃ gantvā sālasākhaṃ gaṇhitukāmā ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:677_13: sālasākhā suseditavettaggaṃ viya onamitvā deviyā hatthapathaṃ upagañchi.
atk-s0513a1:677_17: Sālasākhaṃ gahetvā tiṭṭhamānāya evassā gabbhavuṭṭhānaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:677_18: Taṅkhaṇaṃyeva cattāro visuddhacittā mahābrahmāno suvaṇṇajālaṃ ādāya sampattā tena suvaṇṇajālena bodhisattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:677_19: sampaṭicchitvā mātu purato ṭhapetvā “attamanā, devi, hohi,
atk-s0513a1:678_0: Yathā pana aññe sattā mātukucchito nikkhamantā paṭikūlena asucinā makkhitā nikkhamanti,
atk-s0513a1:678_2: So pana dhammāsanato otaranto dhammakathiko viya,
atk-s0513a1:678_4: ca dve ca hatthe dve ca pāde pasāretvā ṭhitakova mātukucchisambhavena kenaci asucinā amakkhito suddho
atk-s0513a1:678_5: visado kāsikavatthe nikkhittamaṇiratanaṃ viya jotayanto mātukucchito nikkhami.
atk-s0513a1:678_6: Evaṃ santepi bodhisattassa ca bodhisattamātuyā ca sakkāratthaṃ ākāsato dve udakadhārā nikkhamitvā bodhisattassa ca mātuyā ca sarīre utuṃ gāhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:679_0: Atha naṃ suvaṇṇajālena paṭiggahetvā ṭhitānaṃ brahmānaṃ hatthato cattāro mahārājāno maṅgalasammatāya sukhasamphassāya ajinappaveṇiyā gaṇhiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:679_2: Manussānaṃ hatthato muccitvā pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya puratthimadisaṃ olokesi,
atk-s0513a1:679_9: uparīti dasa disā anuviloketvā attanā sadisaṃ kañci adisvā “ayaṃ uttarādisā”ti sattapadavītihārena agamāsi,
atk-s0513a1:679_13: Tato sattamapade ṭhito “aggohamasmiṃ lokassā”tiādikaṃ āsabhiṃ vācaṃ nicchārento sīhanādaṃ nadi.
atk-s0513a1:680_0: Bodhisatto hi tīsu attabhāvesu mātukucchito nikkhantamattova vācaṃ nicchāresi mahosadhattabhāve,
atk-s0513a1:680_3: Mahosadhattabhāve kirassa mātukucchito nikkhantamattasseva sakko devarājā āgantvā candanasāraṃ hatthe ṭhapetvā gato,
atk-s0513a1:680_7: Iti osadhaṃ gahetvā āgatattā “osadhadārako”tvevassa nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:680_9: āgatāgatānaṃ andhabadhirādīnaṃ tadeva sabbarogavūpasamāya bhesajjaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:680_11: mahantaṃ idaṃ osadha”nti uppannavacanaṃ upādāya “mahosadho”tvevassa nāmaṃ jātaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:680_12: Vessantarattabhāve pana mātukucchito nikkhanto dakkhiṇahatthaṃ pasāretvā “atthi nu kho, amma,
atk-s0513a1:680_16: tātā”ti puttassa hatthaṃ attano hatthatale katvā sahassatthavikaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:680_17: Imasmiṃ pana attabhāve imaṃ sīhanādaṃ nadīti evaṃ bodhisatto tīsu attabhāvesu mātukucchito nikkhantamattova vācaṃ nicchāresi.
atk-s0513a1:680_20: Yasmiṃ pana samaye amhākaṃ bodhisatto lumbinīvane jāto,
atk-s0513a1:681_1: Taṃ divasaṃyeva ca “kapilavatthunagare suddhodanamahārājassa putto jāto,
atk-s0513a1:681_2: ayaṃ kumāro bodhitale nisīditvā buddho bhavissatī”ti tāvatiṃsabhavane haṭṭhatuṭṭhā devasaṅghā celukkhepādīni pavattentā kīḷiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:681_3: Tasmiṃ samaye suddhodanamahārājassa kulūpako aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī kāḷadevīlo nāma tāpaso bhattakiccaṃ
atk-s0513a1:681_4: katvā divāvihāratthāya tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ gantvā tattha divāvihāraṃ nisinno tā devatā kīḷamānā disvā “kiṃkāraṇā
atk-s0513a1:681_9: so bodhitale nisīditvā buddho hutvā dhammacakkaṃ pavattessati,
atk-s0513a1:681_10: tassa anantaṃ buddhalīḷaṃ daṭṭhuṃ dhammañca sotuṃ lacchāmāti iminā kāraṇena tuṭṭhāmhā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:681_11: Tāpaso tāsaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā khippaṃ devalokato oruyha rājanivesanaṃ pavisitvā paññattāsane nisinno “putto kira te, mahārāja, jāto,

atk-s0513a1:681_16: Sace hi ajānantā bodhisattassa sīsaṃ tāpasassa pādamūle ṭhapeyyuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:681_18: Tāpaso “na me attānaṃ nāsetuṃ yutta”nti uṭṭhāyāsanā bodhisattassa añjaliṃ paggahesi.
atk-s0513a1:681_19: Rājā taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā attano puttaṃ vandi.
atk-s0513a1:682_2: Bodhisattassa lakkhaṇasampattiṃ disvā “bhavissati nu kho buddho,
atk-s0513a1:682_3: udāhu no”ti āvajjetvā upadhārento “nissaṃsayaṃ buddho bhavissatī”ti ñatvā “acchariyapuriso aya”nti sitaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:682_4: Tato “ahaṃ imaṃ buddhabhūtaṃ daṭṭhuṃ labhissāmi nu kho,

atk-s0513a1:682_7: disvā “evarūpaṃ nāma acchariyapurisaṃ buddhabhūtaṃ daṭṭhuṃ na labhissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:682_8: mahatī vata me jāni bhavissatī”ti parodi.
atk-s0513a1:683_0: Manussā disvā “amhākaṃ ayyo idāneva hasitvā puna parodi.
atk-s0513a1:683_2: amhākaṃ ayyaputtassa koci antarāyo bhavissatī”ti pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:683_7: ‘mahatī vata me jāni bhavissatī’ti attānaṃ anusocanto rodāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:683_8: Tato so “kiṃ nu kho me ñātakesu koci etaṃ buddhabhūtaṃ daṭṭhuṃ labhissati,
atk-s0513a1:683_9: na labhissatī”ti upadhārento attano bhāgineyyaṃ nāḷakadārakaṃ addasa.
atk-s0513a1:683_10: So bhaginiyā gehaṃ gantvā “kahaṃ te putto nāḷako”ti?

atk-s0513a1:683_18: Sattāsītikoṭidhane kule nibbattadārakopi “na maṃ mātulo anatthe niyojessatī”ti cintetvā tāvadeva antarāpaṇato
atk-s0513a1:683_19: kāsāyāni ceva mattikāpattañca āharāpetvā kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā “yo loke uttamapuggalo,
atk-s0513a1:683_20: taṃ uddissa mayhaṃ pabbajjā”ti bodhisattābhimukhaṃ añjaliṃ paggayha pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā pattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:683_21: thavikāya pakkhipitvā aṃsakūṭe laggetvā himavantaṃ pavisitvā samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:683_22: So paramābhisambodhiṃ pattaṃ tathāgataṃ upasaṅkamitvā nāḷakapaṭipadaṃ kathāpetvā puna himavantaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a1:683_23: arahattaṃ patvā ukkaṭṭhapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno satteva māse āyuṃ pāletvā ekaṃ suvaṇṇapabbataṃ nissāya ṭhitakova
atk-s0513a1:684_0: Bodhisattampi kho pañcame divase sīsaṃ nhāpetvā “nāmaggahaṇaṃ gaṇhissāmā”ti rājabhavanaṃ catujjātikagandhehi
atk-s0513a1:684_1: vilimpitvā lājāpañcamakāni pupphāni vikiritvā asambhinnapāyāsaṃ pacāpetvā tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāraṅgate aṭṭhasatabrāhmaṇe
atk-s0513a1:684_2: nimantetvā rājabhavane nisīdāpetvā subhojanaṃ bhojetvā mahāsakkāraṃ katvā “kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti lakkhaṇāni
atk-s0513a1:685_0: “Rāmo dhajo lakkhaṇo cāpi mantī, koṇḍañño ca bhojo suyāmo sudatto;
atk-s0513a1:686_0: Ete tadā aṭṭha ahesuṃ brāhmaṇā, chaḷaṅgavā mantaṃ viyākariṃsū”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:687_2: Tesu satta janā dve aṅguliyo ukkhipitvā dvedhā byākariṃsu –
atk-s0513a1:687_3: “imehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgato agāraṃ ajjhāvasamāno rājā hoti cakkavattī,
atk-s0513a1:687_6: Tesaṃ pana sabbadaharo gottato koṇḍañño nāma māṇavo bodhisattassa varalakkhaṇanipphattiṃ oloketvā –
atk-s0513a1:687_8: ekantenesa vivaṭṭacchado buddho bhavissatī”ti ekameva aṅguliṃ ukkhipitvā ekaṃsabyākaraṇaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0513a1:687_9: Ayañhi katādhikāro pacchimabhavikasatto paññāya itare satta jane abhibhavitvā “imehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgatassa agāramajjhe ṭhānaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:687_10: asaṃsayaṃ buddho bhavissatī”ti ekameva gatiṃ addasa,
atk-s0513a1:687_11: tasmā ekaṃ aṅguliṃ ukkhipitvā evaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0513a1:687_12: Athassa nāmaṃ gaṇhantā sabbalokassa atthasiddhikarattā “siddhattho”ti nāmamakaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:688_0: Atha te brāhmaṇā attano gharāni gantvā putte āmantayiṃsu – “tātā,
