atk-s0513a1:897_2: bhojāpetvā manussānaṃ majjhe goṇe nipajjāpetvā sayaṃ balanāyako hutvā khaggahattho tiyāmarattiṃ ārakkhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:897_4: Punadivase pana pātova sabbakiccāni niṭṭhāpetvā goṇe bhojetvā dubbalasakaṭāni chaḍḍāpetvā thirāni gāhāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:897_5: appagghaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ chaḍḍāpetvā mahagghaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ āropāpetvā yathādhippetaṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā diguṇatiguṇena
atk-s0513a1:897_6: mūlena bhaṇḍaṃ vikkiṇitvā sabbaṃ parisaṃ ādāya puna attano nagarameva agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:898_2: apaṇṇakaggāhagāhino pana amanussānaṃ hatthato muccitvā sotthinā icchitaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā puna sakaṭṭhānameva
atk-s0513a1:898_3: paccāgamiṃsū”ti vatvā dvepi vatthūni ghaṭetvā imissā apaṇṇakadhammadesanāya abhisambuddho hutvā imaṃ
atk-s0513a1:902_2: Kāraṇañhi yasmā tadāyattavuttitāya phalaṃ tiṭṭhati nāma,
atk-s0513a1:902_4: “ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato”tiādīsu cassa payogo veditabbo.
atk-s0513a1:902_5: Iti “apaṇṇakaṃ ṭhāna”nti padadvayenāpi “yaṃ ekantahitasukhāvahattā paṇḍitehi paṭipannaṃ ekaṃsikakāraṇaṃ aviraddhakāraṇaṃ niyyānikakāraṇaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:903_0: Yasmā ca pana niyyānikapaṭipadāya etaṃ nāmaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:903_1: tasmāyeva bhagavā apaṇṇakapaṭipadaṃ dassento imaṃ suttamāha –
atk-s0513a1:904_2: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu apaṇṇakapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno hoti,
atk-s0513a1:904_3: yoni cassa āraddhā hoti āsavānaṃ khayāya.
atk-s0513a1:904_12: bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti…pe… evaṃ kho,
atk-s0513a1:905_4: bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yoniso āhāraṃ āhāreti neva davāya na madāya…pe… evaṃ kho,
atk-s0513a1:906_4: bhikkhu divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya…pe… evaṃ kho,
atk-s0513a1:907_1: Ayaṃ pana apaṇṇakapaṭipadā yāva arahattaphalaṃ labbhateva.
atk-s0513a1:908_2: idaṃ pana saparisaṃ bodhisattaṃyeva sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:908_3: Dutiyaṃ āhu takkikāti dutiyanti paṭhamato apaṇṇakaṭṭhānato niyyānikakāraṇato dutiyaṃ takkaggāhakāraṇaṃ aniyyānikakāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:908_4: Āhu takkikāti ettha pana saddhiṃ purimapadena ayaṃ yojanā –
atk-s0513a1:908_5: apaṇṇakaṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃsikakāraṇaṃ aviraddhakāraṇaṃ niyyānikakāraṇaṃ eke bodhisattappamukhā paṇḍitamanussā gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:908_7: te dutiyaṃ sāparādhaṃ anekaṃsikaṭṭhānaṃ viraddhakāraṇaṃ aniyyānikakāraṇaṃ aggahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:908_10: Ye dutiyaṃ “purato bhavitabbaṃ udakenā”ti takkaggāhasaṅkhātaṃ aniyyānikakāraṇaṃ aggahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:909_5: te parihīnā anayabyasanaṃ āpannāti imamatthaṃ bhagavā anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatino vatvā uttari idamāha “etadaññāya medhāvī,
atk-s0513a1:910_0: Tattha etadaññāya medhāvīti “medhā”ti laddhanāmāya vipulāya visuddhāya uttamāya paññāya samannāgato kulaputto
atk-s0513a1:910_1: etaṃ apaṇṇake ceva sapaṇṇake cāti dvīsu atakkaggāhatakkaggāhasaṅkhātesu ṭhānesu guṇadosaṃ vuddhihāniṃ
atk-s0513a1:910_3: Taṃ gaṇhe yadapaṇṇakanti yaṃ apaṇṇakaṃ ekaṃsikaṃ sukkapaṭipadāaparihāniyapaṭipadāsaṅkhātaṃ niyyānikakāraṇaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:910_8: Ayañhi apaṇṇakapaṭipadā nāma sabbesaṃ buddhapaccekabuddhabuddhaputtānaṃ paṭipadā.
atk-s0513a1:910_9: Sabbabuddhā hi apaṇṇakapaṭipadāyameva ṭhatvā daḷhena vīriyena pāramiyo pūretvā bodhimūle buddhā nāma honti,
atk-s0513a1:911_0: Iti bhagavā tesaṃ upāsakānaṃ tisso kulasampattiyo ca cha kāmasagge brahmalokasampattiyo ca datvāpi pariyosāne
atk-s0513a1:911_2: catūsu apāyesu pañcasu ca nīcakulesu nibbattidāyikā sapaṇṇakapaṭipadā nāmāti imaṃ apaṇṇakadhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:911_3: dassetvā uttari cattāri saccāni soḷasahi ākārehi pakāsesi.
atk-s0513a1:911_4: Catusaccapariyosāne sabbepi te pañcasatā upāsakā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:912_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā dassetvā dve vatthūni kathetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānetvā dassesi –
atk-s0513a1:912_4: paṇḍitasatthavāhaputto pana ahameva ahosi”nti desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:916_0: Akilāsunoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:916_3: Tathāgate kira sāvatthiyaṃ viharante eko sāvatthivāsī kulaputto jetavanaṃ gantvā satthu santike dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:916_4: sutvā pasannacitto kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā pabbajitvā upasampadāya pañcavassiko hutvā dve mātikā uggaṇhitvā
atk-s0513a1:916_5: vipassanācāraṃ sikkhitvā satthu santike attano cittaruciyaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā ekaṃ araññaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a1:916_6: vassaṃ upagantvā temāsaṃ vāyamantopi obhāsamattaṃ vā nimittamattaṃ vā uppādetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0513a1:917_2: natthi maññe mayhaṃ imasmiṃ attabhāve maggo vā phalaṃ vā,
atk-s0513a1:917_4: satthu santikaṃ gantvā rūpasobhaggappattaṃ buddhasarīraṃ olokento madhuraṃ dhammadesanaṃ suṇanto viharissāmī”ti puna jetavanameva paccāgamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:917_6: tvaṃ satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā ‘samaṇadhammaṃ karissāmī’ti gato,
atk-s0513a1:917_7: idāni pana āgantvā saṅgaṇikāya abhiramamāno carasi,
atk-s0513a1:917_8: kiṃ nu kho te pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakaṃ pattaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:917_10: ahaṃ maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā alabhitvā “abhabbapuggalena mayā bhavitabba”nti vīriyaṃ ossajitvā āgatomhīti.
atk-s0513a1:917_12: kataṃ daḷhavīriyassa satthu sāsane pabbajitvā vīriyaṃ ossajantena,
atk-s0513a1:917_14: ehi tathāgatassa dassemā”ti taṃ ādāya satthu santikaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:918_1: tumhe etaṃ bhikkhuṃ anicchamānaṃ ādāya āgatā,
atk-s0513a1:918_3: ayaṃ bhikkhu evarūpe niyyānikasāsane pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karonto vīriyaṃ ossajitvā āgato”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:918_4: Atha naṃ satthā āha “saccaṃ kira tayā bhikkhu vīriyaṃ ossaṭṭha”nti? “Saccaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:918_6: “Kiṃ pana tvaṃ bhikkhu evarūpe mama sāsane pabbajitvā ‘appiccho’ti vā ‘santuṭṭho’ti vā ‘pavivitto’ti
atk-s0513a1:918_7: vā ‘āraddhavīriyo’ti vā evaṃ attānaṃ ajānāpetvā ‘ossaṭṭhavīriyo bhikkhū’ti jānāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:918_9: tayā ekena kataṃ vīriyaṃ nissāya marukantāre pañcasu sakaṭasatesu manussā ca goṇā ca pānīyaṃ labhitvā sukhitā jātā,
atk-s0513a1:918_11: So bhikkhu ettakena vacanena upatthambhito ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:919_0: Taṃ pana kathaṃ sutvā bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ yāciṃsu – “bhante,
atk-s0513a1:919_1: idāni iminā bhikkhunā vīriyassa ossaṭṭhabhāvo amhākaṃ pākaṭo,
atk-s0513a1:919_2: pubbe panassa ekassa vīriyaṃ nissāya marukantāre goṇamanussānaṃ pānīyaṃ labhitvā sukhitabhāvo paṭicchanno,
atk-s0513a1:919_6: suṇāthā”ti bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ satuppādaṃ janetvā bhavantarena paṭicchannakāraṇaṃ pākaṭamakāsi.
atk-s0513a1:920_0: Atīte kāsiraṭṭhe bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto satthavāhakule paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:920_1: vayappatto pañcahi sakaṭasatehi vaṇijjaṃ karonto vicarati.
atk-s0513a1:920_3: Tasmiṃ kantāre sukhumavālukā muṭṭhinā gahitā hatthe na tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0513a1:920_4: sūriyuggamanato paṭṭhāya aṅgārarāsi viya uṇhā hoti,
atk-s0513a1:920_6: Tasmā taṃ paṭipajjantā dārudakatilataṇḍulādīni sakaṭehi ādāya rattimeva gantvā aruṇuggamane sakaṭāni
atk-s0513a1:920_7: parivaṭṭaṃ katvā matthake maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā kālasseva āhārakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā chāyāya nisinnā divasaṃ
atk-s0513a1:920_8: khepetvā atthaṅgate sūriye sāyamāsaṃ bhuñjitvā bhūmiyā sītalāya jātāya sakaṭāni yojetvā gacchanti,
atk-s0513a1:921_0: Sopi satthavāho tasmiṃ kāle imināva niyāmena taṃ kantāraṃ gacchanto ekūnasaṭṭhi yojanāni gantvā “idāni
atk-s0513a1:921_1: ekaratteneva marukantārā nikkhamanaṃ bhavissatī”ti sāyamāsaṃ bhuñjitvā sabbaṃ dārudakaṃ khepetvā sakaṭāni
atk-s0513a1:921_3: Niyāmako pana purimasakaṭe āsanaṃ pattharāpetvā ākāse tārakaṃ olokento “ito pājetha,
atk-s0513a1:921_5: So dīghamaddhānaṃ aniddāyanabhāvena kilanto niddaṃ okkami,
atk-s0513a1:921_6: goṇe nivattitvā āgatamaggameva gaṇhante na aññāsi.
atk-s0513a1:921_8: Niyāmako aruṇuggamanavelāya pabuddho nakkhattaṃ oloketvā “sakaṭāni nivattetha nivattethā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:921_9: Sakaṭāni nivattetvā paṭipāṭiṃ karontānaññeva aruṇo uggato.
atk-s0513a1:921_12: idāni naṭṭhamhā”ti sakaṭāni mocetvā parivaṭṭakena ṭhapetvā matthake maṇḍapaṃ katvā attano attano sakaṭassa heṭṭhā anusocantā nipajjiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:922_0: Bodhisatto “mayi vīriyaṃ ossajante sabbe vinassissantī”ti pāto sītalavelāyameva āhiṇḍanto ekaṃ dabbatiṇagacchaṃ
atk-s0513a1:922_1: disvā “imāni tiṇāni heṭṭhā udakasinehena uṭṭhitāni bhavissantī”ti cintetvā kuddālaṃ gāhāpetvā taṃ padesaṃ
atk-s0513a1:922_4: Ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ khaṇitvā paharantānaṃ kuddālo heṭṭhāpāsāṇe paṭihaññi,
atk-s0513a1:922_6: Bodhisatto pana “imassa pāsāṇassa heṭṭhā udakena bhavitabba”nti otaritvā pāsāṇe ṭhito oṇamitvā sotaṃ
atk-s0513a1:922_7: odahitvā saddaṃ āvajjento heṭṭhā udakassa pavattanasaddaṃ sutvā uttaritvā cūḷupaṭṭhākaṃ āha – “tāta,
atk-s0513a1:922_9: tvaṃ vīriyaṃ anossajanto imaṃ ayakūṭaṃ gahetvā āvāṭaṃ otaritvā etasmiṃ pāsāṇe pahāraṃ dehī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:922_10: So tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā sabbesu vīriyaṃ ossajitvā ṭhitesupi vīriyaṃ anossajanto otaritvā pāsāṇe pahāraṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:922_11: Pāsāṇo majjhe bhijjitvā heṭṭhā patitvā sotaṃ sannirumbhitvā aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0513a1:922_14: atirekāni akkhayugādīni phāletvā yāgubhattaṃ pacitvā bhuñjitvā goṇe ca bhojetvā sūriye atthaṅgate udakāvāṭasamīpe
atk-s0513a1:922_16: Te tattha bhaṇḍaṃ vikkiṇitvā diguṇaṃ tiguṇaṃ catugguṇaṃ lābhaṃ labhitvā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:922_17: Te tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā yathākammaṃ gatā,
atk-s0513a1:922_18: bodhisattopi dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammameva gato.
atk-s0513a1:923_0: Sammāsambuddho imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ kathetvā abhisambuddhova imaṃ gāthaṃ kathesi –
atk-s0513a1:925_0: “Akilāsuno vaṇṇupathe khaṇantā, udaṅgaṇe tattha papaṃ avinduṃ;
atk-s0513a1:926_0: Evaṃ munī vīriyabalūpapanno, akilāsu vinde hadayassa santi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:928_16: Imasmiṃ panatthe sabbasaṅgāhakavasena moneyyasaṅkhātāya paññāya samannāgato “munī”ti veditabbo.
atk-s0513a1:928_17: Vīriyabalūpapannoti vīriyena ceva kāyabalañāṇabalena ca samannāgato.
atk-s0513a1:929_0: “Kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca, aṭṭhi ca avasissatu;
atk-s0513a1:931_0: Evaṃ vuttena caturaṅgasamannāgatena vīriyena samannāgatattā analaso.
atk-s0513a1:931_1: Vinde hadayassa santinti cittassapi hadayarūpassapi sītalabhāvakaraṇena “santi”nti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ jhānavipassanābhiññāarahattamaggañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0513a1:932_2: kusīto viharati vokiṇṇo pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehi,
atk-s0513a1:932_6: sukhaṃ viharati pavivitto pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehi,
atk-s0513a1:933_2: Idhāpi āraddhavīriyassa akatābhinivesassa vipassakassa vīriyabalena adhigantabbaṃ tameva sukhavihāraṃ dassento “evaṃ munī vīriyabalūpapanno,
atk-s0513a1:933_5: yathā te vāṇijā akilāsuno vaṇṇupathe khaṇantā udakaṃ labhiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:933_6: evaṃ imasmimpi sāsane akilāsu hutvā vāyamamāno paṇḍito bhikkhu imaṃ jhānādibhedaṃ hadayassa santiṃ labhati.
atk-s0513a1:933_7: So tvaṃ bhikkhu pubbe udakamattassa atthāya vīriyaṃ katvā idāni evarūpe maggaphaladāyake niyyānikasāsane
atk-s0513a1:933_8: kasmā vīriyaṃ ossajasīti evaṃ imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ dassetvā cattāri saccāni pakāsesi,
atk-s0513a1:933_9: saccapariyosāne ossaṭṭhavīriyo bhikkhu aggaphale arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:934_0: Satthāpi dve vatthūni kathetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānetvā dassesi “tasmiṃ samaye vīriyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:934_1: anossajitvā pāsāṇaṃ bhinditvā mahājanassa udakadāyako cūḷupaṭṭhāko ayaṃ ossaṭṭhavīriyo bhikkhu ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:934_3: satthavāhajeṭṭhako pana ahameva ahosi”nti desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:938_0: Idha ce naṃ virādhesīti imampi dhammadesanaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto ekaṃ ossaṭṭhavīriyameva bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:938_1: Tañhi purimanayeneva bhikkhūhi ānītaṃ disvā satthā āha –
atk-s0513a1:938_3: evarūpe maggaphaladāyake sāsane pabbajitvā vīriyaṃ ossajanto satasahassagghanikāya kañcanapātiyā parihīno serivavāṇijo viya ciraṃ socissasī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:939_0: Atīte ito pañcame kappe bodhisatto serivaraṭṭhe kacchapuṭavāṇijo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:939_1: So serivanāmakena ekena lolakacchapuṭavāṇijena saddhiṃ vohāratthāya gacchanto nīlavāhaṃ nāma nadiṃ uttaritvā
atk-s0513a1:939_2: ariṭṭhapuraṃ nāma nagaraṃ pavisanto nagaravīthiyo bhājetvā attano pattavīthiyā bhaṇḍaṃ vikkiṇanto vicari.
atk-s0513a1:939_4: Tasmiñca nagare ekaṃ seṭṭhikulaṃ parijiṇṇaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:939_5: sabbe puttabhātikā ca dhanañca parikkhayaṃ agamaṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:939_6: ekā dārikā ayyikāya saddhiṃ avasesā ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:939_7: tā dvepi paresaṃ bhatiṃ katvā jīvanti.
atk-s0513a1:939_8: Gehe pana tāsaṃ mahāseṭṭhinā paribhuttapubbā suvaṇṇapāti bhājanantare nikkhittā dīgharattaṃ avalañjiyamānā malaggahitā ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:939_11: maṇike gaṇhathā”ti vicaranto taṃ gharadvāraṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a1:939_12: Sā kumārikā taṃ disvā ayyikaṃ āha “amma mayhaṃ ekaṃ piḷandhanaṃ gaṇhā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:939_18: Sā vāṇijaṃ pakkosāpetvā āsane nisīdāpetvā taṃ pātiṃ datvā “ayya,
atk-s0513a1:939_19: imaṃ gahetvā tava bhaginiyā kiñcideva dehī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:939_20: Vāṇijo pātiṃ hatthena gahetvāva “suvaṇṇapāti bhavissatī”ti parivattetvā pātipiṭṭhiyaṃ sūciyā lekhaṃ kaḍḍhitvā
atk-s0513a1:939_21: suvaṇṇabhāvaṃ ñatvā “imāsaṃ kiñci adatvāva imaṃ pātiṃ harissāmī”ti “ayaṃ kiṃ agghati,
atk-s0513a1:939_22: aḍḍhamāsakopissā mūlaṃ na hotī”ti bhūmiyaṃ khipitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:939_23: Ekena pavisitvā nikkhantavīthiṃ itaro pavisituṃ labhatīti bodhisatto taṃ vīthiṃ pavisitvā “maṇike gaṇhatha,
atk-s0513a1:939_24: maṇike gaṇhathā”ti vicaranto tameva gharadvāraṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a1:940_0: Puna sā kumārikā tatheva ayyikaṃ āha.
atk-s0513a1:940_2: paṭhamaṃ āgatavāṇijo pātiṃ bhūmiyaṃ khipitvā gato,
atk-s0513a1:940_3: idāni kiṃ datvā gaṇhissāmā”ti āha. Amma,
atk-s0513a1:940_9: Athassa gehaṃ pavisitvā nisinnassa taṃ pātiṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:940_12: satasahassagghanakabhaṇḍaṃ mayhaṃ hatthe natthī”ti āha. Ayya,
atk-s0513a1:940_13: paṭhamaṃ āgatavāṇijo “ayaṃ aḍḍhamāsakampi na agghatī”ti vatvā bhūmiyaṃ khipitvā gato,
atk-s0513a1:940_14: ayaṃ pana tava puññena suvaṇṇapāti jātā bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:940_16: kiñcideva no datvā imaṃ gahetvā yāhīti.
atk-s0513a1:940_17: Bodhisatto tasmiṃ khaṇe hatthagatāni pañca kahāpaṇasatāni pañcasatagghanakañca bhaṇḍaṃ sabbaṃ datvā “mayhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:940_18: imaṃ tulañca pasibbakañca aṭṭha ca kahāpaṇe dethā”ti ettakaṃ yācitvā ādāya pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:940_19: So sīghameva nadītīraṃ gantvā nāvikassa aṭṭha kahāpaṇe datvā nāvaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0513a1:941_0: Tato lolavāṇijopi puna taṃ gehaṃ gantvā “āharatha taṃ pātiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:941_2: Sā taṃ paribhāsitvā “tvaṃ amhākaṃ satasahassagghanikaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ aḍḍhamāsagghanikampi na akāsi,
atk-s0513a1:941_3: tuyhaṃ pana sāmikasadiso eko dhammiko vāṇijo amhākaṃ sahassaṃ datvā taṃ ādāya gato”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:941_5: mahājānikaro vata me aya”nti sañjātabalavasoko satiṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetuṃ asakkonto visaññī hutvā attano
atk-s0513a1:941_6: hatthagate kahāpaṇe ceva bhaṇḍikañca gharadvāreyeva vikiritvā nivāsanapārupanaṃ pahāya tulādaṇḍaṃ muggaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:941_7: katvā ādāya bodhisattassa anupadaṃ pakkanto nadītīraṃ gantvā bodhisattaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā “ambho, nāvika,
atk-s0513a1:941_11: Itarassapi bodhisattaṃ gacchantaṃ passantasseva balavasoko udapādi,
atk-s0513a1:941_15: So bodhisatte āghātaṃ bandhitvā tattheva jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a1:941_17: Bodhisatto dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:942_0: Sammāsambuddho imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ kathetvā abhisambuddhova imaṃ gāthaṃ kathesi –
atk-s0513a1:946_1: saddhammassa niyāmatanti imasmiṃ sāsane etaṃ saddhammassa niyāmatāsaṅkhātaṃ sotāpattimaggaṃ virādhesi.
atk-s0513a1:946_3: vīriyaṃ ossajanto nādhigacchasi na paṭilabhasīti attho.
atk-s0513a1:946_4: Ciraṃ tvaṃ anutappesīti evaṃ sante tvaṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ socanto paridevanto anutapessasi,
atk-s0513a1:946_5: atha vā ossaṭṭhavīriyatāya ariyamaggassa virādhitattā dīgharattaṃ nirayādīsu uppanno nānappakārāni dukkhāni
atk-s0513a1:946_6: anubhavanto anutappissasi kilamissasīti ayamettha attho. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0513a1:946_7: Serivāyaṃva vāṇijoti “serivā”ti evaṃnāmako ayaṃ vāṇijo yathā.
atk-s0513a1:946_9: yathā pubbe serivanāmako vāṇijo satasahassagghanikaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ labhitvā tassā gahaṇatthāya vīriyaṃ akatvā tato parihīno anutappi,
atk-s0513a1:946_10: evameva tvampi imasmiṃ sāsane paṭiyattasuvaṇṇapātisadisaṃ ariyamaggaṃ ossaṭṭhavīriyatāya anadhigacchanto tato parihīno dīgharattaṃ anutappissasi.
atk-s0513a1:946_12: paṇḍitavāṇijo suvaṇṇapātiṃ viya mama sāsane navavidhampi lokuttaradhammaṃ paṭilabhissasīti.
atk-s0513a1:947_0: Evamassa satthā arahattena kūṭaṃ gaṇhanto imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ dassetvā cattāri saccāni pakāsesi,
atk-s0513a1:947_1: saccapariyosāne ossaṭṭhavīriyo bhikkhu aggaphale arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:948_0: Satthāpi dve vatthūni kathetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānetvā dassesi –
atk-s0513a1:948_2: paṇḍitavāṇijo pana ahameva ahosi”nti desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:952_0: Appakenapi medhāvīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ bhagavā rājagahaṃ upanissāya jīvakambavane viharanto cūḷapanthakattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:953_1: Rājagahe kira dhanaseṭṭhikulassa dhītā attano dāseneva saddhiṃ santhavaṃ katvā “aññepi me imaṃ kammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:953_2: jāneyyu”nti bhītā evamāha “amhehi imasmiṃ ṭhāne vasituṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0513a1:953_3: sace me mātāpitaro imaṃ dosaṃ jānissanti,
atk-s0513a1:953_5: videsaṃ gantvā vasissāmā”ti hatthasāraṃ gahetvā aggadvārena nikkhamitvā “yattha vā tattha vā aññehi ajānanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:954_0: Tesaṃ ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vasantānaṃ saṃvāsamanvāya tassā kucchiyaṃ gabbho patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:954_1: Sā gabbhaparipākaṃ āgamma sāmikena saddhiṃ mantesi “gabbho me paripākaṃ gato,
atk-s0513a1:954_2: ñātibandhuvirahite ṭhāne gabbhavuṭṭhānaṃ nāma ubhinnampi amhākaṃ dukkhameva,
atk-s0513a1:954_7: Sā cintesi “ayaṃ bālo attano dosamahantatāya gantuṃ na ussahati,
atk-s0513a1:954_11: Sā tasmiṃ gehā nikkhante gehaparikkhāraṃ paṭisāmetvā attano kulagharaṃ gatabhāvaṃ anantaragehavāsīnaṃ ārocetvā maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0513a1:955_0: Atha so puriso gharaṃ āgato taṃ adisvā paṭivissake pucchitvā “kulagharaṃ gatā”ti sutvā vegena anubandhitvā antarāmagge sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a1:955_9: Tassa ca dārakassa panthe jātattā “panthako”ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:955_10: Tassā na cirasseva aparopi gabbho patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0513a1:955_12: Tassāpi dārakassa panthe jātattā paṭhamajātassa “mahāpanthako”ti nāmaṃ katvā itarassa “cūḷapanthako”ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:955_13: Te dvepi dārake gahetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva āgatā.
atk-s0513a1:956_0: Tesaṃ tattha vasantānaṃ ayaṃ mahāpanthakadārako aññe dārake “cūḷapitā mahāpitā”ti,
atk-s0513a1:956_1: “ayyako ayyikā”ti ca vadante sutvā mātaraṃ pucchi “amma,
atk-s0513a1:956_6: rājagahanagare pana vo dhanaseṭṭhi nāma ayyako,
atk-s0513a1:956_9: Sā attano agamanakāraṇaṃ puttassa akathetvā puttesu punappunaṃ kathentesu sāmikaṃ āha –
atk-s0513a1:956_11: kiṃ no mātāpitaro disvā maṃsaṃ khādissanti,
atk-s0513a1:956_15: yena kenaci upāyena dārakānaṃ ayyakakulameva daṭṭhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti dvepi janā dārake ādāya anupubbena rājagahaṃ
atk-s0513a1:956_16: patvā nagaradvāre ekissā sālāya nivāsaṃ katvā dārakamātā dve dārake gahetvā āgatabhāvaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ ārocāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:957_0: Te taṃ sāsanaṃ sutvā “saṃsāre vicarantānaṃ na putto na dhītā nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:957_2: na sakkā tehi amhākaṃ cakkhupathe ṭhātuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:957_3: ettakaṃ pana dhanaṃ gahetvā dvepi janā phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā jīvantu,
atk-s0513a1:957_5: Seṭṭhidhītā mātāpitūhi pesitaṃ dhanaṃ gahetvā dārake āgatadūtānaṃyeva hatthe datvā pesesi,
atk-s0513a1:957_8: mahāpanthako pana ayyakena saddhiṃ dasabalassa dhammakathaṃ sotuṃ gacchati.
atk-s0513a1:957_9: Tassa niccaṃ satthu sammukhā dhammaṃ suṇantassa pabbajjāya cittaṃ nami.
atk-s0513a1:957_13: mayhaṃ sakalalokassapi pabbajjāto taveva pabbajjā bhaddikā,
atk-s0513a1:957_15: pabbaja tātā”ti sampaṭicchitvā satthu santikaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:957_19: Satthā aññataraṃ piṇḍacārikaṃ bhikkhuṃ “imaṃ dārakaṃ pabbājehī”ti āṇāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:957_21: So bahuṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā paripuṇṇavasso upasampadaṃ labhi.
atk-s0513a1:957_22: Upasampanno hutvā yoniso manasikāre kammaṃ karonto arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a1:958_2: phalasukhena vītināmento cintesi “sakkā nu kho imaṃ sukhaṃ cūḷapanthakassa dātu”nti.
atk-s0513a1:958_3: Tato ayyakaseṭṭhissa santikaṃ gantvā “mahāseṭṭhi sace tumhe sampaṭicchatha,
atk-s0513a1:958_7: Thero cūḷapanthakadārakaṃ pabbājetvā dasasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:959_0: “Padumaṃ yathā kokanadaṃ sugandhaṃ, pāto siyā phullamavītagandhaṃ;
atk-s0513a1:961_0: Imaṃ ekagāthaṃ catūhi māsehi gaṇhituṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0513a1:961_1: So kira kassapasammāsambuddhakāle pabbajitvā paññavā hutvā aññatarassa dandhabhikkhuno uddesaggahaṇakāle parihāsakeḷiṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:961_2: So bhikkhu tena parihāsena lajjito neva uddesaṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0513a1:961_4: Tena kammena ayaṃ pabbajitvāva dandho jāto,
atk-s0513a1:961_5: gahitagahitaṃ padaṃ uparūpari padaṃ gaṇhantassa nassati.
atk-s0513a1:961_6: Tassa imameva gāthaṃ gahetuṃ vāyamantassa cattāro māsā atikkantā.
atk-s0513a1:962_2: catūhi māsehi ekampi gāthaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkosi,
atk-s0513a1:962_3: pabbajitakiccaṃ pana tvaṃ kathaṃ matthakaṃ pāpessasi,
atk-s0513a1:962_5: Cūḷapanthako buddhasāsane sinehena gihibhāvaṃ na pattheti.
atk-s0513a1:962_7: Jīvako komārabhacco bahuṃ gandhamālaṃ ādāya attano ambavanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ pūjetvā dhammaṃ sutvā uṭṭhāyāsanā
atk-s0513a1:962_11: buddhappamukhāni pañca bhikkhusatāni ādāya amhākaṃ nivesane bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti. “Upāsaka,
atk-s0513a1:962_13: taṃ ṭhapetvā sesānaṃ nimantanaṃ sampaṭicchāmī”ti thero āha.
atk-s0513a1:962_14: Taṃ sutvā cūḷapanthako cintesi “thero ettakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ nimantanaṃ sampaṭicchanto maṃ bāhiraṃ katvā sampaṭicchati,
atk-s0513a1:962_15: nissaṃsayaṃ mayhaṃ bhātikassa mayi cittaṃ bhinnaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:962_17: gihī hutvā dānādīni puññāni karonto jīvissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:963_1: Satthā paccūsakāleyeva lokaṃ olokento imaṃ kāraṇaṃ disvā paṭhamataraṃ gantvā cūḷapanthakassa gamanamagge dvārakoṭṭhake caṅkamanto aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:963_2: Cūḷapanthako gharaṃ gacchanto satthāraṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā vandi.
atk-s0513a1:963_11: bhātarā nikkaḍḍhito kasmā mama santikaṃ nāgañchi?
atk-s0513a1:963_13: mama santike bhavissasī”ti bhagavā cūḷapanthakaṃ ādāya gantvā gandhakuṭippamukhe nisīdāpetvā “cūḷapanthaka,
atk-s0513a1:963_14: tvaṃ puratthābhimukho hutvā imaṃ pilotikaṃ ‘rajoharaṇaṃ rajoharaṇa’nti parimajjanto idheva hohī”ti iddhiyā
atk-s0513a1:963_15: abhisaṅkhataṃ parisuddhaṃ pilotikākhaṇḍaṃ datvā kāle ārocite bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto jīvakassa gehaṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a1:964_0: Cūḷapanthakopi sūriyaṃ olokento taṃ pilotikākhaṇḍaṃ “rajoharaṇaṃ rajoharaṇa”nti parimajjanto nisīdi,
atk-s0513a1:964_1: tassa taṃ pilotikākhaṇḍaṃ parimajjantassa parimajjantassa kiliṭṭhaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:964_3: imaṃ pana attabhāvaṃ nissāya purimapakatiṃ vijahitvā evaṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ jātaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:964_4: aniccā vata saṅkhārā”ti khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapento vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhesi.
atk-s0513a1:964_6: tvaṃ etaṃ pilotikākhaṇḍameva saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ rajorañjitaṃ jātanti mā saññaṃ kari,
atk-s0513a1:964_8: te harāhī”ti vatvā obhāsaṃ vissajjetvā purato nisinno viya paññāyamānarūpo hutvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a1:965_0: “Rāgo rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati, rāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ rajoti;
atk-s0513a1:966_0: Etaṃ rajaṃ vippajahitva bhikkhavo, viharanti te vigatarajassa sāsane.
atk-s0513a1:967_0: “Doso rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati, dosassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ rajoti;
atk-s0513a1:968_0: Etaṃ rajaṃ vippajahitva bhikkhavo, viharanti te vigatarajassa sāsane.
atk-s0513a1:969_0: “Moho rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccati, mohassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ rajoti;
atk-s0513a1:970_0: Etaṃ rajaṃ vippajahitva bhikkhavo, viharanti te vigatarajassa sāsane”ti. ;
atk-s0513a1:971_0: Gāthāpariyosāne cūḷapanthako saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi,
atk-s0513a1:971_2: So kira pubbe rājā hutvā nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karonto nalāṭato sede muccante parisuddhena sāṭakena nalāṭantaṃ puñchi,
atk-s0513a1:971_4: So “imaṃ sarīraṃ nissāya evarūpo parisuddho sāṭako pakatiṃ jahitvā kiliṭṭho jāto,
atk-s0513a1:972_0: Jīvakopi kho komārabhacco dasabalassa dakkhiṇodakaṃ upanāmesi.
atk-s0513a1:972_2: vihāre bhikkhū atthī”ti hatthena pattaṃ pidahi.
atk-s0513a1:972_7: vihāre bhikkhūnaṃ atthibhāvaṃ vā natthibhāvaṃ vā jānāhī”ti purisaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0513a1:972_8: Tasmiṃ khaṇe cūḷapanthako “mayhaṃ bhātiko ‘vihāre bhikkhū natthī’ti bhaṇati,
atk-s0513a1:972_9: vihāre bhikkhūnaṃ atthibhāvamassa pakāsessāmī”ti sakalaṃ ambavanaṃ bhikkhūnaṃyeva pūresi.
atk-s0513a1:972_12: ekacce sajjhāyaṃ karontīti evaṃ aññamaññaṃ asadisaṃ bhikkhusahassaṃ māpesi.
atk-s0513a1:972_13: So puriso vihāre bahū bhikkhū disvā nivattitvā “ayya,
atk-s0513a1:972_14: sakalaṃ ambavanaṃ bhikkhūhi paripuṇṇa”nti jīvakassa ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:975_6: Tena hi tvaṃ gantvā yo paṭhamaṃ “ahaṃ cūḷapanthako”ti vadati,
atk-s0513a1:975_16: Thero sīhanādaṃ nadanto taruṇasīho viya tīṇi piṭakāni saṃkhobhetvā anumodanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:976_0: Satthā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhikkhusaṅghaparivāro vihāraṃ gantvā bhikkhūhi vatte dassite uṭṭhāyāsanā gandhakuṭippamukhe
atk-s0513a1:976_1: ṭhatvā bhikkhusaṅghassa sugatovādaṃ datvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ uyyojetvā surabhigandhavāsitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:976_2: gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā dakkhiṇena passena sīhaseyyaṃ upagato.
atk-s0513a1:976_3: Atha sāyanhasamaye dhammasabhāyaṃ bhikkhū ito cito ca samosaritvā rattakambalasāṇiṃ parikkhipantā viya nisīditvā satthu guṇakathaṃ ārabhiṃsu “āvuso,
atk-s0513a1:976_4: mahāpanthako cūḷapanthakassa ajjhāsayaṃ ajānanto ‘catūhi māsehi ekagāthaṃ gaṇhituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0513a1:976_6: sammāsambuddho pana attano anuttaradhammarājatāya ekasmiṃyevassa antarabhatte saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0513a1:977_0: Atha bhagavā dhammasabhāyaṃ imaṃ kathāpavattiṃ ñatvā “ajja mayā gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti buddhaseyyāya uṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a1:977_1: surattadupaṭṭaṃ nivāsetvā vijjulataṃ viya kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā rattakambalasadisaṃ sugatamahācīvaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:977_2: pārupitvā surabhigandhakuṭito nikkhamma mattavāraṇo viya sīhavikkantavilāsena vijambhamāno sīho viya
atk-s0513a1:977_3: anantāya buddhalīlāya dhammasabhaṃ gantvā alaṅkatamaṇḍapamajjhe supaññattavarabuddhāsanaṃ abhiruyha chabbaṇṇabuddharasmiyo
atk-s0513a1:977_4: vissajjento aṇṇavakucchiṃ obhāsayamāno yugandharamatthake bālasūriyo viya āsanamajjhe nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:977_5: Sammāsambuddhe pana āgatamatte bhikkhusaṅgho kathaṃ pacchinditvā tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:978_0: Satthā mudukena mettacittena parisaṃ oloketvā “ayaṃ parisā ativiya sobhati,
atk-s0513a1:978_1: ekassapi hatthakukkuccaṃ vā pādakukkuccaṃ vā ukkāsitasaddo vā khipitasaddo vā natthi,
atk-s0513a1:978_2: sabbepime buddhagāravena sagāravā buddhatejena tajjitā mayi āyukappampi akathetvā nisinne paṭhamaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā na kathessanti,
atk-s0513a1:978_4: ahameva paṭhamaṃ kathessāmī”ti madhurena brahmassarena bhikkhū āmantetvā “kāya nuttha,
atk-s0513a1:978_7: kā ca pana vo antarākathā vippakatā”ti āha. Bhante,
atk-s0513a1:978_8: na mayaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne nisinnā aññaṃ tiracchānakathaṃ kathema,
atk-s0513a1:978_9: tumhākaṃyeva pana guṇe vaṇṇayamānā nisinnāmha “āvuso mahāpanthako cūḷapanthakassa ajjhāsayaṃ ajānanto ‘catūhi māsehi ekaṃ gāthaṃ gaṇhituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0513a1:978_11: sammāsambuddho pana anuttaradhammarājatāya ekasmiṃyevassa antarabhatte saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0513a1:978_14: cūḷapanthako maṃ nissāya idāni tāva dhammesu dhammamahantataṃ patto,
atk-s0513a1:978_15: pubbe pana maṃ nissāya bhogesupi bhogamahantataṃ pāpuṇī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:978_17: Bhagavā bhavantarena paṭicchannaṃ kāraṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:979_0: Atīte kāsiraṭṭhe bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto seṭṭhikule nibbattitvā vayappatto seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ labhitvā cūḷaseṭṭhi nāma ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:979_2: So ekadivasaṃ rājupaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanto antaravīthiyaṃ matamūsikaṃ disvā taṅkhaṇaññeva nakkhattaṃ samānetvā
atk-s0513a1:979_3: idamāha “sakkā cakkhumatā kulaputtena imaṃ undūraṃ gahetvā puttadārabharaṇañca kātuṃ kammante ca payojetu”nti?
atk-s0513a1:979_4: Aññataro duggatakulaputto taṃ seṭṭhissa vacanaṃ sutvā “nāyaṃ ajānitvā kathessatī”ti taṃ mūsikaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:979_5: ekasmiṃ āpaṇe biḷālassatthāya vikkiṇitvā kākaṇikaṃ labhitvā tāya kākaṇikāya phāṇitaṃ gahetvā ekena ghaṭena
atk-s0513a1:979_7: So araññato āgacchante mālākāre disvā thokaṃ thokaṃ phāṇitakhaṇḍaṃ datvā uḷuṅkena pānīyaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0513a1:979_9: So tena pupphamūlena punadivasepi phāṇitañca pānīyaghaṭañca gahetvā pupphārāmameva gato.
atk-s0513a1:979_10: Tassa taṃ divasaṃ mālākārā aḍḍhocitake pupphagacche datvā agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:979_11: So na cirasseva iminā upāyena aṭṭha kahāpaṇe labhi.
atk-s0513a1:980_0: Puna ekasmiṃ vātavuṭṭhidivase rājuyyāne bahū sukkhadaṇḍakā ca sākhā ca palāsañca vātena pātitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0513a1:980_2: So tattha gantvā “sace imāni dārupaṇṇāni mayhaṃ dassasi,
atk-s0513a1:980_3: ahaṃ te imāni sabbāni nīharissāmī”ti uyyānapālaṃ āha,
atk-s0513a1:980_5: Cūḷantevāsiko dārakānaṃ kīḷanamaṇḍalaṃ gantvā phāṇitaṃ datvā muhuttena sabbāni dārupaṇṇāni nīharāpetvā uyyānadvāre rāsiṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a1:980_6: Tadā rājakumbhakāro rājakule bhājanānaṃ pacanatthāya dārūni pariyesamāno uyyānadvāre tāni disvā tassa hatthato kiṇitvā gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a1:980_7: Taṃ divasaṃ cūḷantevāsiko dāruvikkayena soḷasa kahāpaṇe cāṭiādīni ca pañca bhājanāni labhi.
atk-s0513a1:981_0: So catuvīsatiyā kahāpaṇesu jātesu “atthi ayaṃ upāyo mayha”nti nagaradvārato avidūre ṭhāne ekaṃ pānīyacāṭiṃ
atk-s0513a1:981_5: So “mayhaṃ kicce uppanne karissathā”ti vatvā ito cito ca vicaranto thalapathakammikena ca jalapathakammikena ca saddhiṃ mittasanthavaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:981_6: Tassa thalapathakammiko “sve imaṃ nagaraṃ assavāṇijako pañca assasatāni gahetvā āgamissatī”ti ācikkhi.
atk-s0513a1:981_7: So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā tiṇahārake āha “ajja mayhaṃ ekekaṃ tiṇakalāpaṃ detha,
atk-s0513a1:981_8: mayā ca tiṇe avikkiṇite attano tiṇaṃ mā vikkiṇathā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:981_9: Te “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā pañca tiṇakalāpasatāni āharitvā tassa ghare pāpayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:981_10: Assavāṇijo sakalanagare assānaṃ gocaraṃ alabhitvā tassa sahassaṃ datvā taṃ tiṇaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a1:982_0: Tato katipāhaccayenassa jalapathakammiko sahāyako ārocesi “paṭṭanamhi mahānāvā āgatā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:982_1: So “atthi ayaṃ upāyo”ti aṭṭhahi kahāpaṇehi sabbaparivārasampannaṃ tāvakālikaṃ rathaṃ gahetvā mahantena
atk-s0513a1:982_2: yasena nāvāpaṭṭanaṃ gantvā ekaṃ aṅgulimuddikaṃ nāvikassa saccakāraṃ datvā avidūre ṭhāne sāṇiyā parikkhipāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:982_3: nisinno purise āṇāpesi “bāhirato vāṇijesu āgatesu tatiyena paṭihārena maṃ ārocethā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:982_4: “Nāvā āgatā”ti sutvā bārāṇasito satamattā vāṇijā “bhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhāmā”ti āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:982_7: Te taṃ sutvā tassa santikaṃ āgatā.
atk-s0513a1:982_8: Pādamūlikapurisā purimasaññāvasena tatiyena paṭihārena tesaṃ āgatabhāvaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:982_9: Te satamattā vāṇijā ekekaṃ sahassaṃ datvā tena saddhiṃ nāvāya pattikā hutvā puna ekekaṃ sahassaṃ datvā
atk-s0513a1:983_0: Cūḷantevāsiko dve satasahassāni gaṇhitvā bārāṇasiṃ āgantvā “kataññunā me bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ekaṃ satasahassaṃ gāhāpetvā cūḷaseṭṭhissa samīpaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:983_3: So “tumhehi kathitaupāye ṭhatvā catumāsambhantareyeva laddha”nti matamūsikaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbaṃ vatthuṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:983_4: Cūḷaseṭṭhi tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “idāni evarūpaṃ dārakaṃ mama santakaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vayappattaṃ attano
atk-s0513a1:983_6: So seṭṭhino accayena tasmiṃ nagare seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ labhi.
atk-s0513a1:984_0: Sammāsambuddhopi imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ kathetvā abhisambuddhova imaṃ gāthaṃ kathesi –
atk-s0513a1:988_4: Samuṭṭhāpeti attānanti mahantaṃ dhanañca yasañca uppādetvā tattha attānaṃ saṇṭhāpeti patiṭṭhāpeti.
atk-s0513a1:988_7: yathā paṇḍitapuriso parittaṃ aggiṃ anukkamena gomayacuṇṇādīni pakkhipitvā mukhavātena dhamanto samuṭṭhāpeti vaḍḍheti mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ karoti,
atk-s0513a1:988_8: evameva paṇḍito thokampi pābhataṃ labhitvā nānāupāyehi payojetvā dhanañca yasañca vaḍḍheti,
atk-s0513a1:988_9: vaḍḍhetvā ca pana tattha attānaṃ patiṭṭhāpeti,
atk-s0513a1:988_10: tāya eva vā pana dhanayasamahantatāya attānaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
atk-s0513a1:989_1: cūḷapanthako maṃ nissāya idāni dhammesu dhammamahantataṃ patto,
atk-s0513a1:989_2: pubbe pana bhogesupi bhogamahantataṃ pāpuṇī”ti evaṃ imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ dassetvā dve vatthūni kathetvā
atk-s0513a1:989_3: anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā cūḷantevāsiko cūḷapanthako ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:989_4: cūḷakaseṭṭhi pana ahameva ahosi”nti desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:993_0: Kimagghati taṇḍulanāḷikāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto lāludāyittheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:993_1: Tasmiṃ samaye āyasmā dabbo mallaputto saṅghassa bhattuddesako hoti.
atk-s0513a1:993_2: Tasmiṃ pātova salākabhattāni uddisamāne lāludāyittherassa kadāci varabhattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0513a1:993_4: So lāmakabhattassa pattadivase salākaggaṃ ākulaṃ karoti,
atk-s0513a1:993_7: Tasmiṃ salākaggaṃ ākulaṃ karonte “handa dāni tvameva salākaṃ dehī”ti salākapacchiṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:993_8: Tato paṭṭhāya so saṅghassa salākaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:993_9: Dento ca pana “idaṃ varabhatta”nti vā “lāmakabhatta”nti vā “asukavassagge varabhatta”nti vā “asukavassagge lāmakabhatta”nti vā na jānāti,
atk-s0513a1:993_11: Bhikkhūnaṃ ṭhitavelāya “imasmiṃ ṭhāne ayaṃ ṭhitikā ṭhitā,
atk-s0513a1:993_12: imasmiṃ ṭhāne aya”nti bhūmiyaṃ vā bhittiyaṃ vā lekhaṃ kaḍḍhati.
atk-s0513a1:993_13: Punadivase salākagge bhikkhū mandatarā vā honti bahutarā vā,
atk-s0513a1:993_16: So ṭhitikaṃ ajānanto lekhāsaññāya salākaṃ deti.
atk-s0513a1:994_1: lekhā nāma heṭṭhā vā hoti upari vā,
atk-s0513a1:994_4: So bhikkhū paṭippharanto “yadi evaṃ ayaṃ lekhā kasmā evaṃ ṭhitā,
atk-s0513a1:994_7: Atha naṃ daharā ca sāmaṇerā ca “āvuso lāludāyi tayi salākaṃ dente bhikkhū lābhena parihāyanti,
atk-s0513a1:994_10: Tasmiṃ khaṇe salākagge mahantaṃ kolāhalaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:994_15: na idāneva lāludāyi attano bālatāya paresaṃ lābhahāniṃ karoti,
atk-s0513a1:994_18: Bhagavā bhavantarena paṭicchannaṃ kāraṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:995_0: Atīte kāsiraṭṭhe bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatto rājā ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:995_1: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto tassa agghāpaniko ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:995_5: so lobhapakatitāya evaṃ cintesi “ayaṃ agghāpaniko evaṃ agghāpento na cirasseva mama gehe dhanaṃ parikkhayaṃ gamessati,
atk-s0513a1:995_7: So sīhapañjaraṃ ugghāṭetvā rājaṅgaṇaṃ olokento ekaṃ gāmikamanussaṃ lolabālaṃ rājaṅgaṇena gacchantaṃ disvā
atk-s0513a1:995_8: “esa mayhaṃ agghāpanikakammaṃ kātuṃ sakkhissatī”ti taṃ pakkosāpetvā “sakkhissasi, bhaṇe,
atk-s0513a1:995_11: Rājā attano dhanarakkhaṇatthāya taṃ bālaṃ agghāpanikakamme ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:995_12: Tato paṭṭhāya so bālo hatthiassādīni agghāpento agghaṃ hāpetvā yathāruciyā katheti.
atk-s0513a1:995_13: Tassa ṭhānantare ṭhitattā yaṃ so katheti,
atk-s0513a1:996_0: Tasmiṃ kāle uttarāpathato eko assavāṇijo pañca assasatāni ānesi.
atk-s0513a1:996_1: Rājā taṃ purisaṃ pakkosāpetvā asse agghāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:996_2: So pañcannaṃ assasatānaṃ ekaṃ taṇḍulanāḷikaṃ agghamakāsi.
atk-s0513a1:996_3: Katvā ca pana “assavāṇijassa ekaṃ taṇḍulanāḷikaṃ dethā”ti vatvā asse assasālāyaṃ saṇṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:996_4: Assavāṇijo porāṇaagghāpanikassa santikaṃ gantvā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā “idāni kiṃ kattabba”nti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:996_5: So āha “tassa purisassa lañjaṃ datvā evaṃ pucchatha ‘amhākaṃ tāva assā ekaṃ taṇḍulanāḷikaṃ agghantīti ñātametaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:996_6: tumhe pana nissāya taṇḍulanāḷiyā agghaṃ jānitukāmamhā,
atk-s0513a1:996_7: sakkhissatha no rañño santike ṭhatvā sā taṇḍulanāḷikā idaṃ nāma agghatīti vattu’nti,
atk-s0513a1:997_0: Assavāṇijo “sādhū”ti bodhisattassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā agghāpanikassa lañjaṃ datvā tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:997_2: “Tena hi gacchāma rājakula”nti taṃ ādāya rañño santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:997_5: pañcannaṃ assasatānaṃ ekaṃ taṇḍulanāḷiṃ agghanakabhāvaṃ jānāma,
atk-s0513a1:997_6: sā pana taṇḍulanāḷi kiṃ agghatīti agghāpanikaṃ pucchatha devā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:997_11: Sā pana kiṃ agghati taṇḍulanāḷikā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:997_12: So bālapuriso “bārāṇasiṃ santarabāhiraṃ agghati taṇḍulanāḷikā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:997_13: So kira pubbe rājānaṃ anuvattanto ekaṃ taṇḍulanāḷiṃ assānaṃ agghamakāsi.
atk-s0513a1:997_14: Puna vāṇijassa hatthato lañjaṃ labhitvā tassā taṇḍulanāḷikāya bārāṇasiṃ santarabāhiraṃ agghamakāsi.
atk-s0513a1:997_15: Tadā pana bārāṇasiyā pākāraparikkhepo dvādasayojaniko hoti.
atk-s0513a1:997_18: Iti so bālo evaṃ mahantaṃ bārāṇasiṃ santarabāhiraṃ taṇḍulanāḷikāya agghamakāsi.
atk-s0513a1:998_0: Taṃ sutvā amaccā pāṇiṃ paharitvā hasamānā “mayaṃ pubbe pathaviñca rajjañca anagghanti saññino ahumha,
atk-s0513a1:998_1: evaṃ mahantaṃ kira sarājakaṃ bārāṇasirajjaṃ taṇḍulanāḷimattaṃ agghati,
atk-s0513a1:998_3: Kahaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ ayaṃ agghāpaniko vihāsi,
atk-s0513a1:998_4: amhākaṃ rañño eva anucchaviko”ti parihāsaṃ akaṃsu –
atk-s0513a1:1002_0: Tasmiṃ kāle rājā lajjito taṃ bālaṃ nikkaḍḍhāpetvā bodhisattasseva agghāpanikaṭṭhānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1003_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā dve vatthūni kathetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā gāmikabālaagghāpaniko lāludāyī ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:1003_1: paṇḍitaagghāpaniko pana ahameva ahosi”nti desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:1007_0: Hiriottappasampannāti idaṃ bhagavā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ bahubhaṇḍikaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1007_1: Sāvatthivāsī kireko kuṭumbiko bhariyāya kālakatāya pabbaji.
atk-s0513a1:1007_2: So pabbajanto attano pariveṇañca aggisālañca bhaṇḍagabbhañca kāretvā bhaṇḍagabbhaṃ sappitaṇḍulādīhi pūretvā pabbaji.
atk-s0513a1:1007_3: Pabbajitvā ca pana attano dāse pakkosāpetvā yathārucitaṃ āhāraṃ pacāpetvā bhuñjati,
atk-s0513a1:1007_8: Tassekadivasaṃ cīvarapaccattharaṇādīni nīharitvā pariveṇe pattharitvā sukkhāpentassa sambahulā jānapadā
atk-s0513a1:1007_9: bhikkhū senāsanacārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā pariveṇaṃ gantvā cīvarādīni disvā “kassimānī”ti pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1007_18: tvaṃ evaṃ appicchassa buddhassa sāsane pabbajitvā evaṃ bahuparikkhāro jāto,
atk-s0513a1:1007_19: ehi taṃ dasabalassa santikaṃ nessāmā”ti taṃ ādāya satthu santikaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1008_7: “Nanu ahaṃ appicchatāya santuṭṭhitāya pavivekassa vīriyārambhassa vaṇṇaṃ vadāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1008_8: So satthu vacanaṃ sutvā kupito “iminā dāni nīhārena carissāmī”ti pārupanaṃ chaḍḍetvā parisamajjhe ekacīvaro aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1009_0: Atha naṃ satthā upatthambhayamāno “nanu tvaṃ bhikkhu pubbe hirottappagavesako dakarakkhasakālepi hirottappaṃ gavesamāno dvādasa saṃvaccharāni vihāsi,
atk-s0513a1:1009_1: atha kasmā idāni evaṃ garuke buddhasāsane pabbajitvā catuparisamajjhe pārupanaṃ chaḍḍetvā hirottappaṃ pahāya ṭhitosī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:1009_2: So satthu vacanaṃ sutvā hirottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā taṃ cīvaraṃ pārupitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:1009_4: bhagavā bhavantarena paṭicchannaṃ kāraṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1010_0: Atīte kāsiraṭṭhe bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1010_1: Tadā bodhisatto tassa aggamahesiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a1:1010_3: Tassa ādhāvitvā paridhāvitvā vicaraṇakāle rañño aññopi putto jāto,
atk-s0513a1:1010_5: Tassa pana ādhāvitvā paridhāvitvā vicaraṇakāle bodhisattassa mātā kālamakāsi,
atk-s0513a1:1010_11: puttassa te varaṃ dammī”ti āha. Devī,
atk-s0513a1:1010_16: Rājā “mayhaṃ dve puttā aggikkhandhā viya jalamānā vicaranti,
atk-s0513a1:1010_17: na sakkā tava puttassa rajjaṃ dātu”nti paṭikkhipitvāpi taṃ punappunaṃ yācamānameva disvā “ayaṃ mayhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1010_18: puttānaṃ pāpakampi cinteyyā”ti putte pakkosāpetvā āha – “tātā,
atk-s0513a1:1010_24: tumhe araññaṃ pavisitvā mama accayena kulasantake nagare rajjaṃ kareyyāthā”ti roditvā kanditvā sīse cumbitvā uyyojesi.
atk-s0513a1:1010_25: Te pitaraṃ vanditvā pāsādā otarante rājaṅgaṇe kīḷamāno sūriyakumāro disvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā “ahampi bhātikehi
atk-s0513a1:1011_0: Bodhisatto maggā okkamma rukkhamūle nisīditvā sūriyakumāraṃ āmantesi “tāta sūriyakumāra,
atk-s0513a1:1011_1: etaṃ saraṃ gantvā nhatvā ca pivitvā ca paduminipaṇṇehi amhākampi pānīyaṃ ānehī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1011_2: Taṃ pana saraṃ vessavaṇassa santikā ekena dakarakkhasena laddhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0513a1:1011_4: “ṭhapetvā devadhammajānanake ye aññe imaṃ saraṃ otaranti,
atk-s0513a1:1011_7: Tato paṭṭhāya so rakkhaso ye taṃ saraṃ otaranti,
atk-s0513a1:1011_8: te devadhamme pucchitvā ye na jānanti,
atk-s0513a1:1011_10: Atha kho sūriyakumāro taṃ saraṃ gantvā avīmaṃsitvāva otari.
atk-s0513a1:1011_11: Atha naṃ so rakkhaso gahetvā “devadhamme jānāsī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:1011_13: Atha naṃ “tvaṃ devadhamme na jānāsī”ti vatvā udakaṃ pavesetvā attano vasanaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:1011_14: Bodhisattopi taṃ aticirāyantaṃ disvā candakumāraṃ pesesi.
atk-s0513a1:1011_18: Rakkhaso “na tvaṃ devadhamme jānāsī”ti tampi gahetvā tattheva ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:1012_0: Bodhisatto tasmimpi cirāyante “ekena antarāyena bhavitabba”nti sayaṃ tattha gantvā dvinnampi otaraṇapadavaḷañjaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1012_1: disvā “rakkhasapariggahitena iminā sarena bhavitabba”nti khaggaṃ sannayhitvā dhanuṃ gahetvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1012_2: Dakarakkhaso bodhisattaṃ udakaṃ anotarantaṃ disvā vanakammikapuriso viya hutvā bodhisattaṃ āha – “bho, purisa,
atk-s0513a1:1012_3: tvaṃ maggakilanto kasmā imaṃ saraṃ otaritvā nhatvā pivitvā bhisamuḷālaṃ khāditvā pupphāni piḷandhitvā yathāsukhaṃ na gacchasī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:1012_4: Bodhisatto taṃ disvā “eso yakkho bhavissatī”ti ñatvā “tayā me bhātikā gahitā”ti āha. “Āma,
atk-s0513a1:1012_17: Yakkho bodhisattaṃ nhāpetvā bhojanaṃ bhojetvā pānīyaṃ pāyetvā pupphāni piḷandhāpetvā gandhehi vilimpāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:1013_0: Bodhisatto āsane nisīditvā yakkhaṃ pādamūle nisīdāpetvā “tena hi ohitasoto sakkaccaṃ devadhamme suṇāhī”ti imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1017_0: Tattha hiriottappasampannāti hiriyā ca ottappena ca samannāgatā.
atk-s0513a1:1018_0: Tattha ajjhattasamuṭṭhānaṃ hiriṃ catūhi kāraṇehi samuṭṭhāpeti –
atk-s0513a1:1018_1: jātiṃ paccavekkhitvā vayaṃ paccavekkhitvā sūrabhāvaṃ paccavekkhitvā bāhusaccaṃ paccavekkhitvā. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0513a1:1018_4: mādisassa jātisampannassa idaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ na yutta”nti evaṃ tāva jātiṃ paccavekkhitvā pāṇātipātādipāpaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-s0513a1:1018_6: mādisassa vaye ṭhitassa idaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ na yutta”nti evaṃ vayaṃ paccavekkhitvā pāṇātipātādipāpaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-s0513a1:1018_8: mādisassa sūrabhāvasampannassa idaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ na yutta”nti evaṃ sūrabhāvaṃ paccavekkhitvā pāṇātipātādipāpaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-s0513a1:1018_11: mādisassa paṇḍitassa bahussutassa idaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ na yutta”nti evaṃ bāhusaccaṃ paccavekkhitvā pāṇātipātādipāpaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-s0513a1:1018_12: Evaṃ ajjhattasamuṭṭhānaṃ hiriṃ catūhi kāraṇehi samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-s0513a1:1018_13: Samuṭṭhāpetvā ca pana attano citte hiriṃ pavesetvā pāpakammaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0513a1:1022_0: Evaṃ paccavekkhanto hi bahiddhāsamuṭṭhitena ottappena pāpakammaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0513a1:1023_1: Idhekacco kulaputto attānaṃ adhipatiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā “mādisassa saddhāpabbajitassa bahussutassa dhutaṅgadharassa
atk-s0513a1:1023_2: na yuttaṃ pāpakammaṃ kātu”nti pāpaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0513a1:1025_1: Idhekacco kulaputto lokaṃ adhipatiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā pāpakammaṃ na karoti. Yathāha –
atk-s0513a1:1026_1: Mahantasmiṃ kho pana lokasannivāse santi samaṇabrāhmaṇā iddhimanto dibbacakkhukā paracittaviduno,
atk-s0513a1:1026_7: saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito samāno vokiṇṇo viharati pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehī’ti.
atk-s0513a1:1027_6: saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito samāno vokiṇṇo viharati pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehī’ti.
atk-s0513a1:1027_7: So lokaṃyeva adhipatiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ karitvā akusalaṃ pajahati,
atk-s0513a1:1029_1: bhayasabhāvasaṇṭhitaṃ ottappa”nti ettha pana lajjāti lajjanākāro,
atk-s0513a1:1029_6: Ekacco hi yathā nāmeko kulaputto uccārapassāvādīni karonto lajjitabbayuttakaṃ ekaṃ disvā lajjanākārappatto bhaveyya hīḷito,
atk-s0513a1:1029_7: evamevaṃ ajjhattaṃ lajjidhammaṃ okkamitvā pāpakammaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0513a1:1029_8: Ekacco apāyabhayabhīto hutvā pāpakammaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0513a1:1029_10: yathā hi dvīsu ayoguḷesu eko sītalo bhaveyya gūthamakkhito,
atk-s0513a1:1029_12: Tattha paṇḍito sītalaṃ gūthamakkhitattā jigucchanto na gaṇhāti,
atk-s0513a1:1029_14: Tattha sītalassa gūthamakkhitassa jigucchāya agaṇhanaṃ viya ajjhattaṃ lajjidhammaṃ okkamitvā pāpassa akaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1029_15: uṇhassa ḍāhabhayena agaṇhanaṃ viya apāyabhayena pāpassa akaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1030_1: vajjabhīrukabhayadassāvilakkhaṇaṃ ottappa”nti idampi dvayaṃ pāpaparivajjaneyeva pākaṭaṃ hoti.
atk-s0513a1:1030_5: sabrahmacārimahattapaccavekkhaṇāti catūhi kāraṇehi sappatissavalakkhaṇaṃ hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā pāpaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0513a1:1030_9: duggatibhayanti catūhi kāraṇehi vajjabhīrukabhayadassāvilakkhaṇaṃ ottappaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā pāpaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0513a1:1030_10: Tattha jātimahattapaccavekkhaṇādīni ceva attānuvādabhayādīni ca vitthāretvā kathetabbāni.
atk-s0513a1:1031_0: Sukkadhammasamāhitāti idameva hirottappaṃ ādiṃ katvā kattabbā kusalā dhammā sukkadhammā nāma,
atk-s0513a1:1031_3: Santo sappurisā loketi kāyakammādīnaṃ santatāya santo,
atk-s0513a1:1031_12: aṭṭhārasa lokā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo”ti ettha saṅkhāraloko vutto.
atk-s0513a1:1033_0: Tāva sahassadhā loko, ettha te vattate vaso”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:1035_3: Tesu mahāsammatakālato paṭṭhāya lokena “devā”ti sammatattā rājarājakumārādayo sammutidevā nāma.
atk-s0513a1:1037_2: Hirottappamūlakā hi kusalā dhammā kulasampadāya ceva devaloke nibbattiyā ca visuddhibhāvassa ca kāraṇattā
atk-s0513a1:1037_3: kāraṇaṭṭhena tividhānampi tesaṃ devānaṃ dhammāti devadhammā,
atk-s0513a1:1037_5: Tasmā puggalādhiṭṭhānadesanāya te dhamme dassento “santo sappurisā loke,
atk-s0513a1:1038_0: Yakkho imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannacitto bodhisattaṃ āha – “paṇḍita,
atk-s0513a1:1038_8: “Yaṃkāraṇā jeṭṭhakaṃ ṭhapetvā kaniṭṭhaṃ āṇāpento jeṭṭhāpacāyikakammaṃ na karosī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1038_11: Mayañhi imaṃ araññaṃ etaṃ nissāya paviṭṭhā.
atk-s0513a1:1038_12: Etassa hi atthāya amhākaṃ pitaraṃ etassa mātā rajjaṃ yāci,
atk-s0513a1:1038_13: amhākaṃ pana pitā taṃ varaṃ adatvā amhākaṃ anurakkhaṇatthāya araññavāsaṃ anujāni.
atk-s0513a1:1038_14: So kumāro anuvattitvā amhehi saddhiṃ āgato.
atk-s0513a1:1038_15: “Taṃ araññe eko yakkho khādī”ti vuttepi na koci saddahissati,
atk-s0513a1:1038_19: tesu ca vattasī”ti pasanno yakkho bodhisattassa sādhukāraṃ datvā dvepi bhātaro ānetvā adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1039_1: tvaṃ pubbe attanā katena pāpakammena paresaṃ maṃsalohitakhādako yakkho hutvā nibbatto,
atk-s0513a1:1039_3: idaṃ te pāpakammaṃ nirayādīhi muccituṃ okāsaṃ na dassati,
atk-s0513a1:1039_4: tasmā ito paṭṭhāya pāpaṃ pahāya kusalaṃ karohī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1039_6: So taṃ yakkhaṃ dametvā tena saṃvihitārakkho tattheva vasanto ekadivasaṃ nakkhattaṃ oloketvā pitu kālakatabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1039_7: ñatvā yakkhaṃ ādāya bārāṇasiṃ gantvā rajjaṃ gahetvā candakumārassa oparajjaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1039_9: datvā yakkhassa ramaṇīye ṭhāne āyatanaṃ kāretvā,
atk-s0513a1:1039_10: yathā so aggamālaṃ aggapupphaṃ aggabhattañca labhati,
atk-s0513a1:1039_12: So dhammena rajjaṃ kāretvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1040_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā dassetvā saccāni pakāsesi,
atk-s0513a1:1040_2: Sammāsambuddhopi dve vatthūni kathetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1044_0: Putto tyāhaṃ mahārājāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto vāsabhakhattiyaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1044_2: Sā kira mahānāmassa sakkassa dhītā nāgamuṇḍāya nāma dāsiyā kucchismiṃ jātā kosalarājassa aggamahesī ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1044_4: Rājā panassā pacchā dāsibhāvaṃ ñatvā ṭhānaṃ parihāpesi,
atk-s0513a1:1044_7: Satthā taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā pubbaṇhasamaye pañcasatabhikkhuparivuto rañño nivesanaṃ gantvā paññattāsane nisīditvā “mahārāja,
atk-s0513a1:1044_17: so putto kiṃkāraṇā pitu santakassa rajjassa sāmiko na hoti,
atk-s0513a1:1044_18: pubbe rājāno muhuttikāya kaṭṭhahārikāya kucchismimpi puttaṃ labhitvā puttassa rajjaṃ adaṃsūti.
atk-s0513a1:1044_20: bhagavā bhavantarena paṭicchannaṃ kāraṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1045_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatto rājā mahantena yasena uyyānaṃ gantvā tattha pupphaphalalobhena vicaranto
atk-s0513a1:1045_1: uyyānavanasaṇḍe gāyitvā dārūni uddharamānaṃ ekaṃ itthiṃ disvā paṭibaddhacitto saṃvāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a1:1045_2: Taṅkhaṇaññeva bodhisatto tassā kucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0513a1:1045_3: tāvadeva tassā vajirapūritā viya garukā kucchi ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1045_4: Sā gabbhassa patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ ñatvā “gabbho me, deva,
atk-s0513a1:1045_9: aṅgulimuddikāya saddhiṃ mama santikaṃ āneyyāsī”ti vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:1046_1: Tassa ādhāvitvā paridhāvitvā vicaraṇakāle kīḷāmaṇḍale kīḷantassa evaṃ vattāro honti “nippitikenamhā pahaṭā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1046_2: Taṃ sutvā bodhisatto mātu santikaṃ gantvā “amma,
atk-s0513a1:1046_6: Tāta rājā imaṃ muddikaṃ datvā “sace dhītā hoti,
atk-s0513a1:1046_9: imāya aṅgulimuddikāya saddhiṃ āneyyāsī”ti vatvā gatoti. “Amma,
atk-s0513a1:1046_10: evaṃ sante kasmā maṃ pitu santikaṃ na nesī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1046_11: Sā puttassa ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā rājadvāraṃ gantvā rañño ārocāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:1046_12: Raññā ca pakkosāpitā pavisitvā rājānaṃ vanditvā “ayaṃ te, deva,
atk-s0513a1:1046_14: Rājā jānantopi parisamajjhe lajjāya “na mayhaṃ putto”ti āha. “Ayaṃ te, deva, muddikā,
atk-s0513a1:1046_17: idāni ṭhapetvā saccakiriyaṃ añño mama sakkhi natthi,
atk-s0513a1:1046_20: bhūmiyaṃ patitvā maratū”ti bodhisattassa pāde gahetvā ākāse khipi.
atk-s0513a1:1046_21: Bodhisatto ākāse pallaṅkamābhujitvā nisinno madhurassarena pitu dhammaṃ kathento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1048_0: “Putto tyāhaṃ mahārāja, tvaṃ maṃ posa janādhipa;
atk-s0513a1:1049_0: Aññepi devo poseti, kiñca devo sakaṃ paja”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1050_0: Tattha putto tyāhanti putto te ahaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1050_4: Tattha attānaṃ paṭicca jāto atrajo nāma.
atk-s0513a1:1050_5: Sayanapiṭṭhe pallaṅke uretievamādīsu nibbatto khettajo nāma.
atk-s0513a1:1050_12: Tvaṃ maṃ posa janādhipāti janādhipa mahājanajeṭṭhaka tvaṃ maṃ posa bharassu vaḍḍhehi.
atk-s0513a1:1050_13: Aññepi devo posetīti aññepi hatthibandhādayo manusse,
atk-s0513a1:1050_14: hatthiassādayo tiracchānagate ca bahujane devo poseti.
atk-s0513a1:1050_15: Kiñca devo sakaṃ pajanti ettha pana kiñcāti garahatthe ca anuggahaṇatthe ca nipāto.
atk-s0513a1:1050_16: “Sakaṃ pajaṃ attano puttaṃ maṃ devo na posetī”ti vadanto garahati nāma,
atk-s0513a1:1050_18: Iti bodhisatto garahantopi anuggaṇhantopi “kiñca devo sakaṃ paja”nti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1051_0: Rājā bodhisattassa ākāse nisīditvā evaṃ dhammaṃ desentassa sutvā “ehi,
atk-s0513a1:1051_4: Bodhisatto aññassa hatthe anotaritvā raññova hatthe otaritvā aṅke nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:1051_5: Rājā tassa oparajjaṃ datvā mātaraṃ aggamahesiṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1051_6: So pitu accayena kaṭṭhavāhanarājā nāma hutvā dhammena rajjaṃ kāretvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1052_0: Satthā kosalarañño imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā dve vatthūni dassetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1056_0: Api ataramānānanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ossaṭṭhavīriyaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1056_1: Imasmiṃ pana jātake paccuppannavatthu ca atītavatthu ca ekādasakanipāte saṃvarajātake āvibhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:1056_4: Gāmaṇikumāro bodhisattassa ovāde ṭhatvā bhātikasatassa kaniṭṭhopi hutvā bhātikasataparivārito setacchattassaheṭṭhā
atk-s0513a1:1056_5: varapallaṅke nisinno attano yasasampattiṃ oloketvā “ayaṃ mayhaṃ yasasampatti amhākaṃ ācariyassa santakā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1060_1: Ataramānānanti paṇḍitānaṃ ovāde ṭhatvā ataritvā avegāyitvā upāyena kammaṃ karontānaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1060_2: Phalāsāva samijjhatīti yathāpatthike phale āsā tassa phalassa nipphattiyā samijjhatiyeva.
atk-s0513a1:1060_5: Vipakkabrahmacariyosmīti ettha cattāri saṅgahavatthūni seṭṭhacariyattā brahmacariyaṃ nāma,
atk-s0513a1:1060_6: tañca tammūlikāya yasasampattiyā paṭiladdhattā vipakkaṃ nāma.
atk-s0513a1:1060_10: Evaṃ jānāhi gāmaṇīti katthaci gāmikapurisopi gāmajeṭṭhakopi gāmaṇī.
atk-s0513a1:1060_14: ācariyaṃ nissāya bhātikasataṃ atikkamitvā idaṃ mahārajjaṃ pattosmīti udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0513a1:1061_0: Tasmiṃ pana rajjaṃ patte sattaṭṭhadivasaccayena sabbepi bhātaro attano attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gatā.
atk-s0513a1:1061_1: Gāmaṇirājā dhammena rajjaṃ kāretvā yathākammaṃ gato,
atk-s0513a1:1062_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā dassetvā saccāni pakāsesi,
atk-s0513a1:1062_2: Satthā dve vatthūni kathetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1066_0: Uttamaṅgaruhā mayhanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mahābhinikkhamanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1066_2: Tasmiṃ pana kāle bhikkhū dasabalassa nekkhammaṃ vaṇṇayantā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1066_3: Atha satthā dhammasabhaṃ āgantvā buddhāsane nisinno bhikkhū āmantesi “kāya nuttha,
atk-s0513a1:1066_7: tumhākaṃyeva pana nekkhammaṃ vaṇṇayamānā nisinnāmhā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:1066_12: bhagavā bhavantarena paṭicchannaṃ kāraṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1067_0: Atīte videharaṭṭhe mithilāyaṃ maghadevo nāma rājā ahosi dhammiko dhammarājā.
atk-s0513a1:1067_3: tathā mahārajjaṃ katvā dīghamaddhānaṃ khepetvā ekadivasaṃ kappakaṃ āmantesi “yadā me,
atk-s0513a1:1067_7: Kappakopi dīghamaddhānaṃ khepetvā ekadivasaṃ rañño añjanavaṇṇānaṃ kesānaṃ antare ekameva palitaṃ disvā “deva,
atk-s0513a1:1067_10: taṃ palitaṃ uddharitvā pāṇimhi ṭhapehī”ti ca vutte suvaṇṇasaṇḍāsena uddharitvā rañño pāṇimhi patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:1067_11: Tadā rañño caturāsīti vassasahassāni āyu avasiṭṭhaṃ hoti.
atk-s0513a1:1067_12: Evaṃ santepi palitaṃ disvāva maccurājānaṃ āgantvā samīpe ṭhitaṃ viya attānaṃ ādittapaṇṇasālaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1067_13: viya ca maññamāno saṃvegaṃ āpajjitvā “bāla maghadeva,
atk-s0513a1:1067_14: yāva palitassuppādāva ime kilese jahituṃ nāsakkhī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0513a1:1068_3: So “ajjeva mayā nikkhamitvā pabbajituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti kappakassa satasahassuṭṭhānakaṃ gāmavaraṃ datvā jeṭṭhaputtaṃ pakkosāpetvā “tāta,
atk-s0513a1:1068_6: bhuttā kho pana me mānusakā kāmā,
atk-s0513a1:1068_10: ahaṃ pana pabbajitvā maghadevaambavanuyyāne vasanto samaṇadhammaṃ karissāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1068_13: Rājā palitaṃ hatthena gahetvā amaccānaṃ imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1072_1: Kesā hi sabbesaṃ hatthapādādīnaṃ aṅgānaṃ uttame sirasmiṃ ruhattā “uttamaṅgaruhā”ti vuccanti.
atk-s0513a1:1072_3: palitapātubhāvena tiṇṇaṃ vayānaṃ haraṇato ime jātā vayoharā.
atk-s0513a1:1072_7: Sirasmiñhi palitesu pātubhūtesu maccurājassa santike ṭhito viya hoti,
atk-s0513a1:1072_10: Yathā hi alaṅkatapaṭiyattāya devatāya ākāse ṭhatvā “asukadivase tvaṃ marissasī”ti vutte taṃ tatheva hoti,
atk-s0513a1:1072_11: evaṃ sirasmiṃ palitesu pātubhūtesu devatāya byākaraṇasadisameva hoti,
atk-s0513a1:1072_14: Sabbabodhisattā hi jiṇṇabyādhimatapabbajite disvāva saṃvegamāpajjitvā nikkhamma pabbajanti. Yathāha –
atk-s0513a1:1073_0: “Jiṇṇañca disvā dukhitañca byādhitaṃ, matañca disvā gatamāyusaṅkhayaṃ;
atk-s0513a1:1074_0: Kāsāyavatthaṃ pabbajitañca disvā, tasmā ahaṃ pabbajitomhi rājā”ti. ;
atk-s0513a1:1075_0: Iminā pariyāyena palitāni visuddhidevānaṃ dūtattā “devadūtā”ti vuccanti.
atk-s0513a1:1075_1: Pabbajjāsamayo mamāti gihibhāvato nikkhantaṭṭhena “pabbajjā”ti laddhanāmassa samaṇaliṅgagahaṇassa kālo mayhanti dasseti.
atk-s0513a1:1076_0: So evaṃ vatvā taṃ divasameva rajjaṃ pahāya isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā tasmiṃyeva maghadevaambavane viharanto
atk-s0513a1:1076_1: caturāsīti vassasahassāni cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā aparihīnajjhāne ṭhito kālaṃ katvā brahmaloke
atk-s0513a1:1076_2: nibbattitvā puna tato cuto mithilāyaṃyeva nimi nāma rājā hutvā osakkamānaṃ attano vaṃsaṃ ghaṭetvā tattheva
atk-s0513a1:1076_3: ambavane pabbajitvā brahmavihāre bhāvetvā puna brahmalokūpagova ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1077_3: pubbepi nikkhantoyevā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā dassetvā cattāri saccāni pakāsesi,
atk-s0513a1:1077_7: Iti bhagavā imāni dve vatthūni kathetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā kappako ānando ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:1081_0: Yañca aññe na rakkhantīti idaṃ satthā anupiyanagaraṃ nissāya anupiyaambavane viharanto sukhavihāriṃ bhaddiyattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1081_9: Channaṃ pana khattiyānaṃ vatthu yāva anupiyanagarā khaṇḍahālajātake āvibhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:1081_10: Āyasmā pana bhaddiyo rājakāle attano rakkhasaṃvidhānañceva tāva bahūhi rakkhāhi rakkhiyamānassa uparipāsādavaratale
atk-s0513a1:1081_11: mahāsayane samparivattamānassāpi attano bhayuppattiñca idāni arahattaṃ patvā araññādīsu yattha katthaci
atk-s0513a1:1081_14: Taṃ sutvā bhikkhū “āyasmā bhaddiyo aññaṃ byākarotī”ti bhagavato ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1081_20: Bhagavā bhavantarena paṭicchannaṃ kāraṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1082_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārayamāne bodhisatto udiccabrāhmaṇamahāsālo hutvā kāmesu ādīnavaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1082_1: nekkhamme cānisaṃsaṃ disvā kāme pahāya himavantaṃ pavisitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattesi,
atk-s0513a1:1082_3: So vassakāle himavantato nikkhamitvā tāpasagaṇaparivuto gāmanigamādīsu cārikaṃ caranto bārāṇasiṃ patvā rājānaṃ nissāya rājuyyāne vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a1:1082_4: Tattha vassike cattāro māse vasitvā rājānaṃ āpucchi.
atk-s0513a1:1082_8: antevāsike himavantaṃ pesetvā idheva vasathā”ti yāci.
atk-s0513a1:1082_11: ahaṃ pana idheva vasissāmī”ti te uyyojetvā sayaṃ tattheva vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a1:1083_0: So panassa jeṭṭhantevāsiko rājapabbajito mahantaṃ rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1083_1: So tāpasehi saddhiṃ himavante vasamāno ekadivasaṃ ācariyaṃ daṭṭhukāmo hutvā te tāpase āmantetvā “tumhe anukkaṇṭhamānā idheva vasatha,
atk-s0513a1:1083_2: ahaṃ ācariyaṃ vanditvā āgamissāmī”ti ācariyassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā ekaṃ kaṭṭhattharikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1083_4: Tasmiñca samaye rājā “tāpasaṃ passissāmī”ti uyyānaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:1083_8: Rājā “ayaṃ tāpaso maṃ disvāpi na uṭṭhito”ti anattamano bodhisattaṃ āha – “bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1083_11: ayaṃ tāpaso pubbe tumhādiso eko rājā ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:1083_12: svāyaṃ “ahaṃ pubbe gihikāle rajjasiriṃ anubhavanto āvudhahatthehi bahūhi rakkhiyamānopi evarūpaṃ sukhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1083_13: nāma nālattha”nti attano pabbajjāsukhaṃ jhānasukhañca ārabbha imaṃ udānaṃ udānetīti.
atk-s0513a1:1083_14: Evañca pana vatvā bodhisatto rañño dhammakathaṃ kathetuṃ imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1085_0: “Yañca aññe na rakkhanti, yo ca aññe na rakkhati;
atk-s0513a1:1086_0: Sa ve rāja sukhaṃ seti, kāmesu anapekkhavā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1087_0: Tattha yañca aññe na rakkhantīti yaṃ puggalaṃ aññe bahū puggalā na rakkhanti.
atk-s0513a1:1087_1: Yo ca aññe na rakkhatīti yo ca “ekako ahaṃ rajjaṃ kāremī”ti aññe bahū jane na rakkhati.
atk-s0513a1:1087_2: Sa ve rāja sukhaṃ setīti mahārāja so puggalo eko adutiyo pavivitto kāyikacetasikasukhasamaṅgī hutvā sukhaṃ seti.
atk-s0513a1:1087_5: evarūpo pana puggalo sukhaṃ gacchati tiṭṭhati nisīdati sayatīti sabbiriyāpathesu sukhappattova hoti.
atk-s0513a1:1087_6: Kāmesu anapekkhavāti vatthu kāmakilesakāmesu apekkhārahito vigatacchandarāgo nittaṇho evarūpo puggalo sabbiriyāpathesu sukhaṃ viharati mahārājāti.
atk-s0513a1:1088_0: Rājā dhammadesanaṃ sutvā tuṭṭhamānaso vanditvā nivesanameva gato,
atk-s0513a1:1088_2: Bodhisatto pana tattheva viharanto aparihīnajjhāno kālaṃ katvā brahmaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:1089_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā dassetvā dve vatthūni kathetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1099_0: Hoti sīlavataṃ atthoti idaṃ satthā rājagahaṃ upanissāya veḷuvane viharanto devadattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1099_1: Devadattassa vatthu yāva abhimārappayojanā khaṇḍahālajātake āvibhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:1100_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye devadatto pañca vatthūni yācitvā alabhanto saṅghaṃ bhinditvā pañca bhikkhusatāni ādāya gayāsīse viharati.
atk-s0513a1:1100_1: Atha tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ñāṇaṃ paripākaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1100_2: Taṃ ñatvā satthā dve aggasāvake āmantesi “sāriputtā,
atk-s0513a1:1100_3: tumhākaṃ nissitakā pañcasatā bhikkhū devadattassa laddhiṃ rocetvā tena saddhiṃ gatā,
atk-s0513a1:1100_4: idāni pana tesaṃ ñāṇaṃ paripākaṃ gataṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1100_5: tumhe bahūhi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ tattha gantvā tesaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā te bhikkhū maggaphalehi pabodhetvā gahetvā āgacchathā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1100_6: Te tatheva gantvā tesaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā maggaphalehi pabodhetvā punadivase aruṇuggamanavelāya te bhikkhū ādāya veḷuvanameva āgamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1100_7: Āgantvā ca pana sāriputtattherassa bhagavantaṃ vanditvā ṭhitakāle bhikkhū theraṃ pasaṃsitvā bhagavantaṃ āhaṃsu – “bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1100_8: amhākaṃ jeṭṭhabhātiko dhammasenāpati pañcahi bhikkhusatehi parivuto āgacchanto ativiya sobhati,
atk-s0513a1:1100_16: bhagavā bhavantarena paṭicchannaṃ kāraṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1101_0: Atīte magadharaṭṭhe rājagahanagare eko magadharājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a1:1101_1: Tadā bodhisatto migayoniyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā vuddhippatto migasahassaparivāro araññe vasati.
atk-s0513a1:1101_2: Tassa lakkhaṇo ca kāḷo cāti dve puttā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1101_5: tumhe imaṃ gaṇaṃ pariharathā”ti pañca pañca migasatāni ekekaṃ puttaṃ paṭicchāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:1101_6: Tato paṭṭhāya te dve janā migagaṇaṃ pariharanti.
atk-s0513a1:1101_7: Magadharaṭṭhasmiñca sassapākasamaye kiṭṭhasambādhe araññe migānaṃ paripantho hoti.
atk-s0513a1:1101_8: Manussā sassakhādakānaṃ migānaṃ māraṇatthāya tattha tattha opātaṃ khaṇanti,
atk-s0513a1:1101_13: Bodhisatto kiṭṭhasambādhasamayaṃ ñatvā dve putte pakkosāpetvā āha – “tātā,
atk-s0513a1:1101_16: mayaṃ mahallakā yena kenaci upāyena ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vītināmessāma,
atk-s0513a1:1101_17: tumhe tumhākaṃ migagaṇe gahetvā araññe pabbatapādaṃ pavisitvā sassānaṃ uddhaṭakāle āgaccheyyāthā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1101_18: Te “sādhū”ti pitu vacanaṃ sutvā saparivārā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1101_19: Tesaṃ pana gamanamaggaṃ manussā jānanti “imasmiṃ kāle migā pabbatamārohanti,
atk-s0513a1:1101_21: Te tattha tattha paṭicchannaṭṭhāne nilīnā bahū mige vijjhitvā mārenti.
atk-s0513a1:1102_0: Kāḷamigo attano dandhatāya “imāya nāma velāya gantabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1102_1: imāya velāya na gantabba”nti ajānanto migagaṇaṃ ādāya pubbaṇhepi sāyanhepi padosepi paccūsepi gāmadvārena gacchati.
atk-s0513a1:1102_2: Manussā tattha tattha pakatiyā ṭhitā ca nilīnā ca bahū mige vināsaṃ pāpenti.
atk-s0513a1:1102_3: Evaṃ so attano dandhatāya bahū mige vināsaṃ pāpetvā appakeheva migehi araññaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:1102_4: Lakkhaṇamigo pana paṇḍito byatto upāyakusalo “imāya velāya gantabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1102_11: Tasmā ekampi migaṃ avināsetvā araññaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:1102_12: Te tattha cattāro māse vasitvā sassesu uddhaṭesu pabbatā otariṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1103_0: Kāḷo paccāgacchantopi purimanayeneva avasesamige vināsaṃ pāpento ekakova āgami.
atk-s0513a1:1103_1: Lakkhaṇo pana ekamigampi avināsetvā pañcahi migasatehi parivuto mātāpitūnaṃ santikaṃ āgami.
atk-s0513a1:1103_2: Bodhisatto dvepi putte āgacchante disvā migagaṇena saddhiṃ mantento imaṃ gāthaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi –
atk-s0513a1:1108_2: Paṭisanthāravuttinanti dhammapaṭisanthāro ca āmisapaṭisanthāro ca etesaṃ vuttīti paṭisanthāravuttino,
atk-s0513a1:1108_7: imesu dvīsu paṭisanthāresu ṭhitānaṃ ācārasampannānaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ vuḍḍhi nāma hotīti.
atk-s0513a1:1108_8: Idāni taṃ vuḍḍhiṃ dassetuṃ puttamātaraṃ ālapanto viya “lakkhaṇaṃ passā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0513a1:1108_10: ācārapaṭisanthārasampannaṃ attano puttaṃ ekamigampi avināsetvā ñātisaṅghena purakkhataṃ parivāritaṃ āgacchantaṃ passa.
atk-s0513a1:1108_11: Tāya pana ācārapaṭisanthārasampadāya vihīnaṃ dandhapaññaṃ atha passasimaṃ kāḷaṃ ekampi ñātiṃ anavasesetvā suvihīnameva ñātīhi ekakaṃ āgacchantanti.
atk-s0513a1:1108_12: Evaṃ puttaṃ abhinanditvā pana bodhisatto yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1109_4: Na ca devadatto etarahiyeva gaṇamhā parihīno,
atk-s0513a1:1109_5: pubbepi parihīnoyevā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ dassetvā dve vatthūni kathetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1113_0: Nigrodhameva seveyyāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kumārakassapattherassa mātaraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1113_1: Sā kira rājagahanagare mahāvibhavassa seṭṭhino dhītā ahosi ussannakusalamūlā parimadditasaṅkhārā pacchimabhavikā,
atk-s0513a1:1113_2: antoghaṭe padīpo viya tassā hadaye arahattūpanissayo jalati.
atk-s0513a1:1113_3: Sā attānaṃ jānanakālato paṭṭhāya gehe anabhiratā pabbajitukāmā hutvā mātāpitaro āha –
atk-s0513a1:1113_12: Sā punappunaṃ yācitvāpi mātāpitūnaṃ santikā pabbajjaṃ alabhamānā cintesi “hotu,
atk-s0513a1:1113_14: Sā vayappattā patikulaṃ gantvā patidevatā hutvā sīlavatī kalyāṇadhammā agāraṃ ajjhāvasi.
atk-s0513a1:1114_5: Sā pana tāva uḷārāyapi nakkhattakīḷāya vattamānāya attano sarīraṃ na vilimpati nālaṅkaroti,
atk-s0513a1:1117_0: Chaviyā kāyo paṭicchanno, yathābhūtaṃ na dissati.
atk-s0513a1:1121_0: Lohitassa lasikāya, pittassa ca vasāya ca.
atk-s0513a1:1127_0: Subhato naṃ maññati bālo, avijjāya purakkhato. ;
atk-s0513a1:1131_0: Daṇḍaṃ nūna gahetvāna, kāke soṇe ca vāraye.
atk-s0513a1:1136_2: Nanu imassa alaṅkatakaraṇaṃ gūthapuṇṇaghaṭassa bahi cittakammakaraṇaṃ viya hotīti?
atk-s0513a1:1136_4: tvaṃ imassa sarīrassa ime dose passamānā kasmā na pabbajasī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:1136_8: ahaṃ taṃ pabbājessāmī”ti vatvā mahādānaṃ pavattetvā mahāsakkāraṃ katvā mahantena parivārena bhikkhunupassayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1136_9: netvā taṃ pabbājento devadattapakkhiyānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ santike pabbājesi.
atk-s0513a1:1136_10: Sā pabbajjaṃ labhitvā paripuṇṇasaṅkappā attamanā ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1137_0: Athassā gabbhe paripākaṃ gacchante indriyānaṃ aññathattaṃ hatthapādapiṭṭhīnaṃ bahalattaṃ udarapaṭalassa
atk-s0513a1:1137_1: ca mahantataṃ disvā bhikkhuniyo taṃ pucchiṃsu “ayye,
atk-s0513a1:1137_6: Atha naṃ tā bhikkhuniyo devadattassa santikaṃ netvā devadattaṃ pucchiṃsu “ayya,
atk-s0513a1:1137_7: ayaṃ kuladhītā kicchena sāmikaṃ ārādhetvā pabbajjaṃ labhi,
atk-s0513a1:1137_9: mayaṃ imassa gabbhassa gihikāle vā pabbajitakāle vā laddhabhāvaṃ na jānāma,
atk-s0513a1:1137_11: Devadatto attano abuddhabhāvena ca khantimettānuddayānañca natthitāya evaṃ cintesi “devadattapakkhikā bhikkhunī kucchinā gabbhaṃ pariharati,
atk-s0513a1:1137_12: devadatto ca taṃ ajjhupekkhatiyevāti mayhaṃ garahā uppajjissati,
atk-s0513a1:1137_14: So avīmaṃsitvāva selaguḷaṃ pavaṭṭayamāno viya pakkhanditvā “gacchatha,
atk-s0513a1:1137_16: Tā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā uṭṭhāya vanditvā upassayaṃ gatā.
atk-s0513a1:1138_0: Atha sā daharā tā bhikkhuniyo āha – “ayye,
atk-s0513a1:1138_3: loke pana aggapuggalassa sammāsambuddhassa santike mayhaṃ pabbajjā,
atk-s0513a1:1138_4: sā ca pana me dukkhena laddhā,
atk-s0513a1:1138_6: etha maṃ gahetvā satthu santikaṃ jetavanaṃ gacchathā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1138_7: Tā taṃ ādāya rājagahā pañcacattālīsayojanikaṃ maggaṃ atikkamma anupubbena jetavanaṃ patvā satthāraṃ vanditvā tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1138_10: evaṃ santepi ‘samaṇo gotamo devadattena jahitaṃ ādāya caratī’ti titthiyānaṃ okāso bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:1138_11: Tasmā imaṃ kathaṃ pacchindituṃ sarājikāya parisāya majjhe imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vinicchituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1138_12: Punadivase rājānaṃ pasenadikosalaṃ mahāanāthapiṇḍikaṃ cūḷaanāthapiṇḍikaṃ visākhaṃ mahāupāsikaṃ aññāni
atk-s0513a1:1138_13: ca abhiññātāni mahākulāni pakkosāpetvā sāyanhasamaye catūsu parisāsu sannipatitāsu upālittheraṃ āmantesi “gaccha,
atk-s0513a1:1138_14: tvaṃ catuparisamajjhe imissā daharabhikkhuniyā kammaṃ sodhehī”ti. “Sādhu,
atk-s0513a1:1138_15: bhante”ti thero parisamajjhaṃ gantvā attano paññattāsane nisīditvā rañño purato visākhaṃ upāsikaṃ pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:1138_17: ‘ayaṃ daharā asukamāse asukadivase pabbajitā’ti tathato ñatvā imassa gabbhassa pure vā pacchā vā laddhabhāvaṃ jānāhī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1138_18: Upāsikā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā sāṇiṃ parikkhipāpetvā antosāṇiyaṃ daharabhikkhuniyā hatthapādanābhiudarapariyosānādīni
atk-s0513a1:1138_19: oloketvā māsadivase samānetvā gihibhāve gabbhassa laddhabhāvaṃ tathato ñatvā therassa santikaṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a1:1138_21: Thero catuparisamajjhe taṃ bhikkhuniṃ suddhaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1138_22: Sā suddhā hutvā bhikkhusaṅghañca satthārañca vanditvā bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ upassayameva gatā.
atk-s0513a1:1138_23: Sā gabbhaparipākamanvāya padumuttarapādamūle patthitapatthanaṃ mahānubhāvaṃ puttaṃ vijāyi.
atk-s0513a1:1139_0: Athekadivasaṃ rājā bhikkhunupassayasamīpena gacchanto dārakasaddaṃ sutvā amacce pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:1139_6: mayaṃ naṃ paṭijaggissāmā”ti rājā taṃ dārakaṃ nāṭakitthīnaṃ dāpetvā kumāraparihārena vaḍḍhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:1139_9: So sattavassikakāle satthu santike pabbajitvā paripuṇṇavasso upasampadaṃ labhitvā gacchante gacchante kāle dhammakathikesu citrakathī ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1139_12: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cittakathikānaṃ yadidaṃ kumārakassapo”ti etadagge ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:1139_14: Mātāpissa bhikkhunī vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā aggaphalaṃ pattā.
atk-s0513a1:1139_15: Kumārakassapatthero buddhasāsane gaganamajjhe puṇṇacando viya pākaṭo jāto.
atk-s0513a1:1140_0: Athekadivasaṃ tathāgato pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ datvā gandhakuṭiṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:1140_1: Bhikkhū ovādaṃ gahetvā attano attano rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānesu divasabhāgaṃ khepetvā sāyanhasamaye dhammasabhāyaṃ sannipatitvā “āvuso,
atk-s0513a1:1140_2: devadattena attano abuddhabhāvena ceva khantimettādīnañca abhāvena kumārakassapatthero ca therī ca ubho nāsitā,
atk-s0513a1:1140_3: sammāsambuddho pana attano dhammarājatāya ceva khantimettānuddayasampattiyā ca ubhinnampi tesaṃ paccayo jāto”ti buddhaguṇe vaṇṇayamānā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1140_4: Satthā buddhalīlāya dhammasabhaṃ āgantvā paññattāsane nisīditvā “kāya nuttha,
atk-s0513a1:1140_9: tathāgato idāneva imesaṃ ubhinnaṃ paccayo ca patiṭṭhā ca jāto,
atk-s0513a1:1140_12: Bhagavā bhavantarena paṭicchannaṃ kāraṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1141_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārayamāne bodhisatto migayoniyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a1:1141_8: So pañcasatamigaparivāro araññe vāsaṃ kappesi nāmena nigrodhamigarājā nāma.
atk-s0513a1:1141_9: Avidūre panassa aññopi pañcasatamigaparivāro sākhamigo nāma vasati,
atk-s0513a1:1142_2: manussānaṃ kammacchedaṃ katvā sabbe negamajānapade sannipātetvā devasikaṃ migavaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0513a1:1142_5: yaṃnūna mayaṃ uyyāne migānaṃ nivāpaṃ vapitvā pānīyaṃ sampādetvā bahū mige uyyānaṃ pavesetvā dvāraṃ bandhitvā rañño niyyādeyyāmā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1142_6: Te sabbe uyyāne migānaṃ nivāpatiṇāni ropetvā udakaṃ sampādetvā dvāraṃ yojetvā vāgurāni ādāya muggarādinānāvudhahatthā
atk-s0513a1:1142_7: araññaṃ pavisitvā mige pariyesamānā “majjhe ṭhite mige gaṇhissāmā”ti yojanamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ parikkhipitvā
atk-s0513a1:1142_8: saṅkhipamānā nigrodhamigasākhamigānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ majjhe katvā parikkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1142_9: Atha naṃ migagaṇaṃ disvā rukkhagumbādayo ca bhūmiñca muggarehi paharantā migagaṇaṃ gahanaṭṭhānato nīharitvā
atk-s0513a1:1142_10: asisattidhanuādīni āvudhāni uggiritvā mahānādaṃ nadantā taṃ migagaṇaṃ uyyānaṃ pavesetvā dvāraṃ pidhāya
atk-s0513a1:1142_12: nibaddhaṃ migavaṃ gacchantā amhākaṃ kammaṃ nāsetha,
atk-s0513a1:1142_13: amhehi araññato mige ānetvā tumhākaṃ uyyānaṃ pūritaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1142_14: ito paṭṭhāya tesaṃ maṃsāni khādathā”ti rājānaṃ āpucchitvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1143_0: Rājā tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā uyyānaṃ gantvā mige olokento dve suvaṇṇamige disvā tesaṃ abhayaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1143_1: Tato paṭṭhāya pana kadāci sayaṃ gantvā ekaṃ migaṃ vijjhitvā āneti,
atk-s0513a1:1143_3: Migā dhanuṃ disvāva maraṇabhayena tajjitā palāyanti,
atk-s0513a1:1143_10: ekaṃsena maritabbe sati ito paṭṭhāya mā kaṇḍena mige vijjhantu,
atk-s0513a1:1143_14: vārappatto migo gantvā dhammagaṇḍikāya gīvaṃ ṭhapetvā nipajjatu,
atk-s0513a1:1143_15: evaṃ sante migā kilantā na bhavissantī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1143_17: Tato paṭṭhāya vārappattova migo gantvā dhammagaṇḍikāya gīvaṃ ṭhapetvā nipajjati,
atk-s0513a1:1143_18: bhattakārako āgantvā tattha nipannakameva gahetvā gacchati.
atk-s0513a1:1144_0: Athekadivasaṃ sākhamigassa parisāya ekissā gabbhinimigiyā vāro pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a1:1144_3: puttaṃ vijāyitvā dve janā vāraṃ gamissāma,
atk-s0513a1:1144_5: So “na sakkā tava vāraṃ aññesaṃ pāpetuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1144_8: Sā tassa santikā anuggahaṃ alabhamānā bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:1144_9: So tassā vacanaṃ sutvā “hotu gaccha tvaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1144_10: ahaṃ te vāraṃ atikkāmessāmī”ti sayaṃ gantvā dhammagaṇḍikāya sīsaṃ katvā nipajji.
atk-s0513a1:1144_11: Bhattakārako taṃ disvā “laddhābhayo migarājā dhammagaṇḍikāya nipanno,
atk-s0513a1:1144_12: kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti vegena gantvā rañño ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:1145_0: Rājā tāvadeva rathaṃ āruyha mahantena parivārena āgantvā bodhisattaṃ disvā āha “samma migarāja,
atk-s0513a1:1145_3: gabbhinī migī āgantvā “mama vāraṃ aññassa pāpehī”ti āha,
atk-s0513a1:1145_4: na sakkā kho pana mayā ekassa maraṇadukkhaṃ aññassa upari nikkhipituṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1145_5: svāhaṃ attano jīvitaṃ tassā datvā tassā santakaṃ maraṇaṃ gahetvā idha nipanno,
atk-s0513a1:1145_10: mayā na tādiso khantimettānuddayasampanno manussesupi diṭṭhapubbo,
atk-s0513a1:1145_32: Evaṃ mahāsatto rājānaṃ sabbasattānaṃ abhayaṃ yācitvā uṭṭhāya rājānaṃ pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā “dhammaṃ cara, mahārāja,
atk-s0513a1:1145_33: mātāpitūsu puttadhītāsu brāhmaṇagahapatikesu negamajānapadesu dhammaṃ caranto samaṃ caranto kāyassa bhedā
atk-s0513a1:1145_34: paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ gamissasī”ti rañño buddhalīlāya dhammaṃ desetvā katipāhaṃ uyyāne vasitvā
atk-s0513a1:1145_35: rañño ovādaṃ datvā migagaṇaparivuto araññaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:1145_36: Sāpi kho migadhenu pupphakaṇṇikasadisaṃ puttaṃ vijāyi.
atk-s0513a1:1145_38: Atha naṃ mātā tassa santikaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā “putta,
atk-s0513a1:1145_39: ito paṭṭhāya mā etassa santikaṃ gaccha,
atk-s0513a1:1145_40: nigrodhasseva santikaṃ gaccheyyāsī”ti ovadantī imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1148_0: Nigrodhasmiṃ mataṃ seyyo, yañce sākhasmi jīvita”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1149_0: Tattha nigrodhameva seveyyāti tāta tvaṃ vā añño vā attano hitakāmo nigrodhameva seveyya bhajeyya upasaṅkameyya,
atk-s0513a1:1149_1: na sākhamupasaṃvaseti sākhamigaṃ pana na upasaṃvase upagamma na saṃvaseyya,
atk-s0513a1:1149_3: Nigrodhasmiṃ mataṃ seyyoti nigrodharañño pādamūle maraṇampi seyyo varaṃ uttamaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1149_4: Yañce sākhasmi jīvitanti yaṃ pana sākhassa santike jīvitaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1149_5: taṃ neva seyyo na varaṃ na uttamanti attho.
atk-s0513a1:1150_0: Tato paṭṭhāya ca pana abhayaladdhakā migā manussānaṃ sassāni khādanti,
atk-s0513a1:1150_1: manussā “laddhābhayā ime migā”ti mige paharituṃ vā palāpetuṃ vā na visahanti,
atk-s0513a1:1150_2: te rājaṅgaṇe sannipatitvā rañño tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1150_6: gacchatha na koci mama vijite mige paharituṃ labhatī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1150_7: Nigrodhamigo taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā migagaṇaṃ sannipātāpetvā “ito paṭṭhāya paresaṃ sassaṃ khādituṃ na labhissathā”ti
atk-s0513a1:1150_8: mige ovaditvā manussānaṃ ārocāpesi “ito paṭṭhāya sassakārakā manussā sassarakkhaṇatthaṃ vatiṃ mā karontu,
atk-s0513a1:1150_10: Tato paṭṭhāya kira khettesu paṇṇabandhanasaññā udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:1150_11: Tato paṭṭhāya paṇṇasaññaṃ atikkamanamigo nāma natthi.
atk-s0513a1:1150_13: Evaṃ migagaṇaṃ ovaditvā bodhisatto yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā saddhiṃ migehi yathākammaṃ gato,
atk-s0513a1:1150_14: rājāpi bodhisattassa ovāde ṭhatvā puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1151_2: idānevāhaṃ theriyā ca kumārakassapassa ca avassayo,
atk-s0513a1:1151_3: pubbepi avassayo evā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā catusaccadhammadesanaṃ vinivaṭṭetvā dve vatthūni
atk-s0513a1:1151_4: kathetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā sākhamigo devadatto ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:1155_0: Dhiratthu kaṇḍinaṃ sallanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto purāṇadutiyikāpalobhanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1155_3: pubbepi tvaṃ etaṃ mātugāmaṃ nissāya jīvitakkhayaṃ patvā vītaccitesu aṅgāresu pakko”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1155_6: Ito paraṃ pana bhikkhūnaṃ yācanaṃ bhavantarapaṭicchannatañca avatvā “atītaṃ āharī”ti ettakameva vakkhāma,
atk-s0513a1:1155_7: ettake vuttepi yācanañca valāhakagabbhato candanīharaṇūpamāya bhavantarapaṭicchannakāraṇabhāvo cāti sabbametaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1156_0: Atīte magadharaṭṭhe rājagahe magadharājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a1:1156_3: Tattha eko araññavāsī pabbateyyamigo ekāya gāmantavāsiniyā migapotikāya saddhiṃ santhavaṃ katvā tesaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1156_4: migānaṃ pabbatapādato oruyha puna gāmantaṃ otaraṇakāle migapotikāya paṭibaddhacittattā tehi saddhiṃyeva otari.
atk-s0513a1:1156_10: So tassā paṭibaddhacittattā anivattitvā saddhiṃyeva agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1156_11: Magadhavāsino “idāni migānaṃ pabbatapādā otaraṇakālo”ti ñatvā magge paṭicchannakoṭṭhakesu tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0513a1:1156_12: Tesampi dvinnaṃ āgamanamagge eko luddako paṭicchannakoṭṭhake ṭhito hoti.
atk-s0513a1:1156_13: Migapotikā manussagandhaṃ ghāyitvā “eko luddako ṭhito bhavissatī”ti taṃ bālamigaṃ purato katvā sayaṃ pacchato ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1156_14: Luddako ekeneva sarappahārena migaṃ tattheva pāteti.
atk-s0513a1:1156_15: Migapotikā tassa viddhabhāvaṃ ñatvā uppatitvā vātagatiyāva palāyi.
atk-s0513a1:1156_16: Luddako koṭṭhakato nikkhamitvā migaṃ okkantitvā aggiṃ katvā vītaccitesu aṅgāresu madhuramaṃsaṃ pacitvā
atk-s0513a1:1156_17: khāditvā pānīyaṃ pivitvā avasesaṃ lohitabindūhi paggharantehi kājenādāya dārake tosento gharaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1157_0: Tadā bodhisatto tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe rukkhadevatā hutvā nibbatto hoti.
atk-s0513a1:1157_1: So taṃ kāraṇaṃ disvā “imassa bālamigassa maraṇaṃ neva mātaraṃ nissāya,
atk-s0513a1:1157_6: paresaṃ maraṇadukkhuppādanampi nāma imasmiṃ loke garahitameva.
atk-s0513a1:1157_10: tepi garahitāyevā”ti ekāya gāthāya tīṇi garahavatthūni dassetvā vanadevatāsu sādhukāraṃ datvā gandhapupphādīhi
atk-s0513a1:1157_11: pūjayamānāsu madhurena sarena taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ unnādento imāya gāthāya dhammaṃ desesi –
atk-s0513a1:1161_0: Te cāpi dhikkitā sattā, ye itthīnaṃ vasaṃ gatā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1162_6: tasmā kaṇḍinaṃ sallanti ettha sallakaṇḍinanti attho.
atk-s0513a1:1162_9: Mahantaṃ vaṇamukhaṃ katvā balavappahāraṃ dento gāḷhaṃ vijjhatīti gāḷhavedhī,
atk-s0513a1:1162_12: kumudapattasaṇṭhānathalena ujukagamaneneva sallena ca samannāgataṃ gāḷhavedhinaṃ purisaṃ dhiratthūti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0513a1:1162_16: Ito paraṃ pana ettakampi avatvā yaṃ yaṃ anuttānaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1162_18: Evaṃ ekāya gāthāya tīṇi garahavatthūni dassetvā bodhisatto vanaṃ unnādetvā buddhalīlāya dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0513a1:1163_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsesi,
atk-s0513a1:1163_2: Satthā dve vatthūni kathetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi.
atk-s0513a1:1163_3: Ito paraṃ pana “dve vatthūni kathetvā”ti idaṃ avatvā “anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā”ti ettakameva vakkhāma,
atk-s0513a1:1163_4: avuttampi pana heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva yojetvā gahetabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1164_2: kāmesu dosaṃ dassetvā dhammadesakadevatā pana ahameva ahosinti.
atk-s0513a1:1168_0: Na kiratthi rasehi pāpiyoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto cūḷapiṇḍapātikatissattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1168_1: Satthari kira rājagahaṃ upanissāya veḷuvane viharante tissakumāro nāma mahāvibhavassa seṭṭhikulassa putto
atk-s0513a1:1168_2: ekadivasaṃ veḷuvanaṃ gantvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pabbajitukāmo pabbajjaṃ yācitvā mātāpitūhi ananuññātattā
atk-s0513a1:1168_3: paṭikkhitto sattāhaṃ bhattacchedaṃ katvā raṭṭhapālatthero viya mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā satthu santike pabbaji.
atk-s0513a1:1168_4: Satthā taṃ pabbājetvā aḍḍhamāsamattaṃ veḷuvane viharitvā jetavanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1168_5: Tatrāyaṃ kulaputto terasa dhutaṅgāni samādāya sāvatthiyaṃ sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya caramāno kālaṃ vītināmeti,
atk-s0513a1:1168_6: “cūḷapiṇḍapātikatissatthero nāmā”ti vutte gaganatale puṇṇacando viya buddhasāsane pākaṭo paññāto ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1169_0: Tasmiṃ kāle rājagahe nakkhattakīḷāya vattamānāya therassa mātāpitaro yaṃ tassa gihikāle ahosi ābharaṇabhaṇḍakaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1169_1: taṃ ratanacaṅkoṭake nikkhipitvā ure ṭhapetvā “aññāsu nakkhattakīḷāsu amhākaṃ putto iminā alaṅkārena alaṅkato nakkhattaṃ kīḷati,
atk-s0513a1:1169_2: taṃ no ekaputtaṃ gahetvā samaṇo gotamo sāvatthinagaraṃ gato,
atk-s0513a1:1169_3: kahaṃ nu kho so etarahi nisinno,
atk-s0513a1:1170_0: Athekā vaṇṇadāsī taṃ kulaṃ gantvā seṭṭhibhariyaṃ rodantiṃ disvā pucchi “kiṃ pana, ayye,
atk-s0513a1:1170_6: “Sace tumhe imasmiṃ gehe sabbaṃ issariyaṃ mayhaṃ detha,
atk-s0513a1:1170_8: Seṭṭhibhariyā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā paribbayaṃ datvā mahantena parivārena taṃ uyyojesi “gaccha,
atk-s0513a1:1170_10: Sā paṭicchannayāne nisinnā sāvatthiṃ gantvā therassa bhikkhācāravīthiyaṃ nivāsaṃ gahetvā seṭṭhikulā āgate
atk-s0513a1:1170_11: manusse therassa adassetvā attano parivāreneva parivutā therassa piṇḍāya paviṭṭhassa āditova uḷuṅkayāguñca
atk-s0513a1:1170_12: rasakabhikkhañca datvā rasataṇhāya bandhitvā anukkamena gehe nisīdāpetvā bhikkhaṃ dadamānā ca attano
atk-s0513a1:1170_13: vasaṃ upagatabhāvaṃ ñatvā gilānālayaṃ dassetvā antogabbhe nipajji.
atk-s0513a1:1170_14: Theropi bhikkhācāravelāya sapadānaṃ caranto gehadvāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1170_15: Parijano therassa pattaṃ gahetvā theraṃ ghare nisīdāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:1170_18: So rasataṇhāya baddho attano vatasamādānaṃ bhinditvā tassā nipannaṭṭhānaṃ pāvisi.
