atk-s0513a1:1170_19: Sā attano āgatakāraṇaṃ kathetvā taṃ palobhetvā rasataṇhāya bandhitvā uppabbājetvā attano vase ṭhapetvā
atk-s0513a1:1170_20: yāne nisīdāpetvā mahantena parivārena rājagahameva agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1171_0: Bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ sannisinnā “cūḷapiṇḍapātikatissattheraṃ kira ekā vaṇṇadāsī rasataṇhāya bandhitvā ādāya gatā”ti kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1171_1: Satthā dhammasabhaṃ upagantvā alaṅkatadhammāsane nisīditvā “kāya nuttha,
atk-s0513a1:1171_6: idāneva eso bhikkhu rasataṇhāya bajjhitvā tassā vasaṃ gato,
atk-s0513a1:1171_7: pubbepi tassā vasaṃ gatoyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1172_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ rañño brahmadattassa sañjayo nāma uyyānapālo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1172_1: Atheko vātamigo taṃ uyyānaṃ āgantvā sañjayaṃ disvā palāyati,
atk-s0513a1:1172_4: Uyyānapālo uyyāne nānappakārāni pupphaphalāni gahetvā divase divase rañño abhiharati.
atk-s0513a1:1172_5: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ rājā pucchi “samma uyyānapāla,
atk-s0513a1:1172_8: eko pana vātamigo āgantvā uyyāne carati,
atk-s0513a1:1172_11: “Thokaṃ madhuṃ labhanto anto rājanivesanampi naṃ ānetuṃ sakkhissāmi, devā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1172_13: So taṃ gahetvā uyyānaṃ gantvā vātamigassa caraṇaṭṭhāne tiṇāni madhunā makkhetvā nilīyi.
atk-s0513a1:1172_14: Migo āgantvā madhumakkhitāni tiṇāni khāditvā rasataṇhāya baddho aññatra agantvā uyyānameva āgacchati.
atk-s0513a1:1172_15: Uyyānapālo tassa madhumakkhitatiṇesu paluddhabhāvaṃ ñatvā anukkamena attānaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0513a1:1172_16: So taṃ disvā katipāhaṃ palāyitvā punappunaṃ passanto vissāsaṃ āpajjitvā anukkamena uyyānapālassa hatthe ṭhitatiṇāni khādituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a1:1173_0: So tassa vissāsaṃ āpannabhāvaṃ ñatvā yāva rājanivesanā vīthiṃ kilañjehi parikkhipitvā tahiṃ tahiṃ sākhābhaṅgaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1173_1: pātetvā madhulābukaṃ aṃse laggetvā tiṇakalāpaṃ upakacchake ṭhapetvā madhumakkhitāni tiṇāni migassa purato
atk-s0513a1:1173_4: Migo manusse disvā kampamāno maraṇabhayatajjito antonivesanaṅgaṇe ādhāvati paridhāvati.
atk-s0513a1:1173_5: Rājā pāsādā oruyha taṃ kampamānaṃ disvā “vātamigo nāma manussānaṃ diṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ sattāhaṃ na gacchati,
atk-s0513a1:1173_7: so evarūpo gahananissito vātamigo rasataṇhāya baddho idāni evarūpaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgato,
atk-s0513a1:1173_8: natthi vata bho loke rasataṇhāya pāpataraṃ nāmā”ti imāya gāthāya dhammadesanaṃ paṭṭhapesi –
atk-s0513a1:1175_0: “Na kiratthi rasehi pāpiyo, āvāsehiva santhavehi vā;
atk-s0513a1:1177_3: Āvāsehiva santhavehi vāti nibaddhavasanaṭṭhānasaṅkhātesu hi āvāsesupi mittasanthavesupi chandarāgo pāpakova,
atk-s0513a1:1177_4: tehi pana sacchandarāgaparibhogehi āvāsehi vā mittasanthavehi vā sataguṇena ca sahassaguṇena ca satasahassaguṇena
atk-s0513a1:1177_5: ca dhuvapaṭisevanaṭṭhena āhāraṃ vinā jīvitindriyapālanāya abhāvena ca sacchandarāgaparibhogarasāva pāpatarāti.
atk-s0513a1:1177_6: Bodhisatto pana anussavāgataṃ viya imamatthaṃ katvā “na kiratthi rasehi pāpiyo,
atk-s0513a1:1177_12: idaṃ nāma araññāyatane gahananissitaṃ vātamigaṃ sañjayo uyyānapālo madhurasehi attano vasaṃ ānesi,
atk-s0513a1:1177_13: sabbathāpi sacchandarāgaparibhogehi rasehi nāma aññaṃ pāpataraṃ lāmakataraṃ natthīti rasataṇhāya ādīnavaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1177_14: Kathetvā ca pana taṃ migaṃ araññameva pesesi.
atk-s0513a1:1178_2: sā vaṇṇadāsī idāneva etaṃ rasataṇhāya bandhitvā attano vase karoti,
atk-s0513a1:1178_3: pubbepi akāsiyevā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi.
atk-s0513a1:1182_0: Aṭṭhakkhuraṃ kharādiyeti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ dubbacabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1182_1: So kira bhikkhu dubbaco ovādaṃ na gaṇhāti.
atk-s0513a1:1182_2: Atha naṃ satthā pucchi “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu dubbaco ovādaṃ na gaṇhāsī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:1182_4: Satthā “pubbepi tvaṃ dubbacatāya paṇḍitānaṃ ovādaṃ aggahetvā pāsena baddho jīvitakkhayaṃ patto”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1183_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto migo hutvā migagaṇaparivuto araññe vasati.
atk-s0513a1:1183_4: So taṃ bhāgineyyaṃ “asukavelāya nāma āgantvā uggaṇhāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1183_7: evaṃ satta divase sattovāde atikkanto so migamāyaṃ anuggaṇhitvāva vicaranto pāse bajjhi.
atk-s0513a1:1183_11: na te puttena migamāyā uggahitā”ti vatvā idānipi taṃ anovaditukāmova hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1187_0: Tattha aṭṭhakkhuranti ekekasmiṃ pāde dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ vasena aṭṭhakkhuraṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1187_7: Sattahi kālātikkantanti sattahi ovādakālehi ovādaṃ atikkantaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1187_8: Na naṃ ovaditussaheti etaṃ dubbacamigaṃ ahaṃ ovadituṃ na ussahāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1187_9: etassa me ovādatthāya cittampi na uppajjatīti dasseti.
atk-s0513a1:1187_10: Atha naṃ dubbacamigaṃ pāse baddhaṃ luddo māretvā maṃsaṃ ādāya pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:1188_1: pubbepi dubbacoyevā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi.
atk-s0513a1:1192_0: Migaṃ tipallatthanti idaṃ satthā kosambiyaṃ badarikārāme viharanto sikkhākāmaṃ rāhulattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1192_1: Ekasmiñhi kāle satthari āḷavinagaraṃ upanissāya aggāḷave cetiye viharante bahū upāsakā upāsikā bhikkhū
atk-s0513a1:1192_4: Gacchante pana kāle upāsikāyo bhikkhuniyo ca na gacchiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1192_7: Dhammassavanapariyosāne therā bhikkhū attano attano vasanaṭṭhānāni gacchanti.
atk-s0513a1:1192_8: Daharā sāmaṇerā ca upāsakehi saddhiṃ upaṭṭhānasālāyaṃ sayanti.
atk-s0513a1:1192_9: Tesu niddaṃ upagatesu ekacce ghurughurupassāsā kākacchamānā dante khādantā nipajjiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1192_11: Te taṃ vippakāraṃ disvā bhagavato ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1192_12: Bhagavā “yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannena sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya pācittiya”nti sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetvā kosambiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1193_4: Pubbe pana te bhikkhū bhagavati ca gāravaṃ tassa cāyasmato sikkhākāmataṃ paṭicca taṃ attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ āgataṃ ativiya saṅgaṇhanti,
atk-s0513a1:1193_6: Taṃ divasaṃ pana sikkhāpadabhayena vasanaṭṭhānampi na adaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1193_10: “cūḷapitā me”ti ānandattherassa vā santikaṃ agantvā dasabalassa vaḷañjanavaccakuṭiṃ brahmavimānaṃ pavisanto viya pavisitvā vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a1:1193_15: Rāhulabhaddo pana na tassā kuṭiyā imaṃ sampattiṃ paṭicca tattha vāsaṃ upagato,
atk-s0513a1:1193_16: bhikkhūhi pana “vasanaṭṭhānaṃ jānāhī”ti vuttattā ovādagāravena sikkhākāmatāya tattha vāsaṃ upagato.
atk-s0513a1:1193_17: Antarantarā hi bhikkhū taṃ āyasmantaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā tassa vīmaṃsanatthāya muṭṭhisammajjaniṃ
atk-s0513a1:1193_18: vā kacavarachaḍḍanakaṃ vā bahi khipitvā tasmiṃ āgate “āvuso,
atk-s0513a1:1193_20: Tattha kehici “rāhulo iminā maggena gato”ti vutte so āyasmā “nāhaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1193_21: etaṃ jānāmī”ti avatvāva taṃ paṭisāmetvā “khamatha me,
atk-s0513a1:1194_0: So taṃ sikkhākāmataṃyeva paṭicca tattha vāsaṃ upagato.
atk-s0513a1:1194_1: Atha satthā purearuṇaṃyeva vaccakuṭidvāre ṭhatvā ukkāsi,
atk-s0513a1:1194_9: idāni attano āpattibhayena vasanaṭṭhānaṃ na denti,
atk-s0513a1:1194_10: svāhaṃ ‘idaṃ aññesaṃ asaṅghaṭṭanaṭṭhāna’nti iminā kāraṇena idha nipannosmīti.
atk-s0513a1:1194_11: Atha bhagavato “rāhulaṃ tāva bhikkhū evaṃ pariccajanti,
atk-s0513a1:1194_12: aññe kuladārake pabbājetvā kiṃ karissantī”ti dhammasaṃvego udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:1195_0: Atha bhagavā pātova bhikkhū sannipātāpetvā dhammasenāpatiṃ pucchi “jānāsi pana tvaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1195_8: tumhe rāhulaṃ evaṃ pariccajantā aññe kuladārake pabbājetvā kiṃ karissatha?
atk-s0513a1:1195_9: Evañhi sante imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitā na patiṭṭhā bhavissanti,
atk-s0513a1:1195_10: ito dāni paṭṭhāya anupasampannena ekaṃ dve divase attano santike vasāpetvā tatiyadivase tesaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1195_11: ñatvā bahi vāsethā”ti imaṃ anupaññattiṃ katvā puna sikkhāpadaṃ paññapesi.
atk-s0513a1:1196_0: Tasmiṃ samaye dhammasabhāyaṃ sannisinnā bhikkhū rāhulassa guṇakathaṃ kathenti “passathāvuso,
atk-s0513a1:1196_2: ‘tava vasanaṭṭhānaṃ jānāhī’ti vutto nāma ‘ahaṃ dasabalassa putto,
atk-s0513a1:1196_3: tumhākaṃ senāsanasmā tumheyeva nikkhamathā’ti ekaṃ bhikkhumpi appaṭippharitvā vaccakuṭiyaṃ vāsaṃ kappesī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1196_4: Evaṃ tesu kathayamānesu satthā dhammasabhaṃ gantvā alaṅkatāsane nisīditvā “kāya nuttha,
atk-s0513a1:1196_12: pubbe tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattopi sikkhākāmoyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1197_0: Atīte rājagahe eko magadharājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a1:1197_1: Tadā bodhisatto migayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā migagaṇaparivuto araññe vasati.
atk-s0513a1:1197_3: imaṃ te bhāgineyyaṃ migamāyaṃ sikkhāpehī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1197_6: So mātulena vuttavelaṃ anatikkamitvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā migamāyaṃ sikkhi.
atk-s0513a1:1197_7: So ekadivasaṃ vane vicaranto pāsena baddho baddharavaṃ ravi,
atk-s0513a1:1197_8: migagaṇo palāyitvā “putto te pāsena baddho”ti tassa mātuyā ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:1197_11: Bodhisatto “mā tvaṃ puttassa kiñci pāpakaṃ āsaṅki,
atk-s0513a1:1197_13: idāni taṃ hāsayamāno āgacchissatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1200_0: Ekena sotena chamāssasanto, chahi kalāhitibhoti bhāgineyyo”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1201_2: ubhohi passehi ujukameva ca nipannakavasenāti tīhākārehi pallatthaṃ assa,
atk-s0513a1:1201_6: Aṭṭhakkhuranti ekekasmiṃ pāde dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ vasena aṭṭhahi khurehi samannāgataṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1201_7: Aḍḍharattāpapāyinti purimayāmaṃ atikkamitvā majjhimayāme araññato āgamma pānīyassa pivanato aḍḍharatte āpaṃ pivatīti aḍḍharattāpapāyī.
atk-s0513a1:1201_9: Mama bhāgineyyaṃ migaṃ ahaṃ sādhukaṃ migamāyaṃ uggaṇhāpesiṃ. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0513a1:1201_14: yathā ekasmiṃ uparimanāsikāsote vātaṃ sannirumbhitvā pathaviyā allīnena ekena heṭṭhimasotena tattheva
atk-s0513a1:1201_15: chamāyaṃ assasanto chahi kalāhi luddakaṃ atibhoti,
atk-s0513a1:1201_18: Cattāro pāde pasāretvā ekena passena seyyāya,
atk-s0513a1:1202_5: adho avakkhipanenāti imāhi chahi kalāhi yathā atibhoti,
atk-s0513a1:1203_2: yathā ekena sotena chamāssasanto chahi kalāhiti dvīsupi nayesu dassitehi chahi kāraṇehi kalāhiti kalāyissati,
atk-s0513a1:1203_5: Bhāgineyyoti evaṃ chahi kāraṇehi vañcanakaṃ bhāgineyyaṃ niddisati.
atk-s0513a1:1203_6: Evaṃ bodhisatto bhāgineyyassa migamāyāya sādhukaṃ uggahitabhāvaṃ dassento bhaginiṃ samassāseti.
atk-s0513a1:1204_0: Sopi migapotako pāse baddho avipphanditvāyeva bhūmiyaṃ mahāphāsukapassena pāde pasāretvā nipanno pādānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1204_1: āsannaṭṭhāne khureheva paharitvā paṃsuñca tiṇāni ca uppāṭetvā uccārapassāvaṃ vissajjetvā sīsaṃ pātetvā
atk-s0513a1:1204_2: jivhaṃ ninnāmetvā sarīraṃ kheḷakilinnaṃ katvā vātaggahaṇena udaraṃ uddhumātakaṃ katvā akkhīni parivattetvā
atk-s0513a1:1204_3: heṭṭhā nāsikāsotena vātaṃ sañcarāpento uparimanāsikāsotena vātaṃ sannirumbhitvā sakalasarīraṃ thaddhabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1204_7: Luddo āgantvā udaraṃ hatthena paharitvā “atipātova baddho bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:1204_8: pūtiko jāto”ti tassa bandhanarajjukaṃ mocetvā “etthevadāni naṃ ukkantitvā maṃsaṃ ādāya gamissāmī”ti nirāsaṅko hutvā sākhāpalāsaṃ gahetuṃ āraddho.
atk-s0513a1:1204_9: Migapotakopi uṭṭhāya catūhi pādehi ṭhatvā kāyaṃ vidhunitvā gīvaṃ pasāretvā mahāvātena chinnavalāhako viya vegena mātu santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1205_3: pubbepi sikkhākāmoyevā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1209_0: Kāḷe vā yadi vā juṇheti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto dve vuḍḍhapabbajite ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1209_1: Te kira kosalajanapade ekasmiṃ araññāvāse vasanti.
atk-s0513a1:1209_11: Te ubhopi attano kaṅkhaṃ chindituṃ asakkontā satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā “bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1209_12: sītaṃ nāma kasmiṃ kāle hotī”ti pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1209_16: bhavasaṅkhepagatattā pana na sallakkhayitthā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1210_0: Atīte ekasmiṃ pabbatapāde sīho ca byaggho ca dve sahāyā ekissāyeva guhāya vasanti.
atk-s0513a1:1210_1: Tadā bodhisattopi isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā tasmiṃyeva pabbatapāde vasati.
atk-s0513a1:1210_2: Athekadivasaṃ tesaṃ sahāyakānaṃ sītaṃ nissāya vivādo udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:1210_5: Te ubhopi attano kaṅkhaṃ chindituṃ asakkontā bodhisattaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1212_0: “Kāḷe vā yadi vā juṇhe, yadā vāyati māluto;
atk-s0513a1:1214_0: Tattha kāḷe vā yadi vā juṇheti kāḷapakkhe vā juṇhapakkhe vā.
atk-s0513a1:1214_1: Yadā vāyati mālutoti yasmiṃ samaye puratthimādibhedo vāto vāyati,
atk-s0513a1:1214_6: kāḷapakkho vā juṇhapakkho vā ettha apamāṇanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0513a1:1214_7: Ubhotthamaparājitāti ubhopi tumhe imasmiṃ pañhe aparājitāti.
atk-s0513a1:1215_1: pubbepi mayā tumhākaṃ ayaṃ pañho kathito”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsesi,
atk-s0513a1:1215_3: Satthā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā byaggho kāḷo ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:1219_0: Evaṃ ce sattā jāneyyunti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto matakabhattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1219_1: Tasmiñhi kāle manussā bahū ajeḷakādayo māretvā kālakate ñātake uddissa matakabhattaṃ nāma denti.
atk-s0513a1:1219_2: Bhikkhū te manusse tathā karonte disvā satthāraṃ pucchiṃsu “etarahi, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1219_3: manussā bahū pāṇe jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā matakabhattaṃ nāma denti.
atk-s0513a1:1219_8: ‘matakabhattaṃ dassāmā’ti katepi pāṇātipāte kāci vuḍḍhi nāma atthi,
atk-s0513a1:1219_9: pubbe paṇḍitā ākāse nisajja dhammaṃ desetvā ettha ādīnavaṃ kathetvā sakalajambudīpavāsike etaṃ kammaṃ jahāpesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1219_10: Idāni pana bhavasaṅkhepagatattā puna pātubhūta”nti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1220_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente eko tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū disāpāmokkho ācariyabrāhmaṇo “matakabhattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1220_1: dassāmī”ti ekaṃ eḷakaṃ gāhāpetvā antevāsike āha – “tātā,
atk-s0513a1:1220_2: imaṃ eḷakaṃ nadiṃ netvā nhāpetvā kaṇṭhe mālaṃ parikkhipitvā pañcaṅgulikaṃ datvā maṇḍetvā ānethā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1220_3: Te “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā taṃ ādāya nadiṃ gantvā nhāpetvā maṇḍetvā nadītīre ṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1220_4: So eḷako attano pubbakammaṃ disvā “evarūpā nāma dukkhā ajja muccissāmī”ti somanassajāto mattikāghaṭaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1220_5: bhindanto viya mahāhasitaṃ hasitvā puna “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo maṃ ghātetvā mayā laddhadukkhaṃ labhissatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1220_6: brāhmaṇe kāruññaṃ uppādetvā mahantena saddena parodi.
atk-s0513a1:1221_0: Atha naṃ te māṇavā pucchiṃsu “samma eḷaka,
atk-s0513a1:1221_1: tvaṃ mahāsaddena hasi ceva rodi ca,
atk-s0513a1:1221_4: “Tumhe maṃ imaṃ kāraṇaṃ attano ācariyassa santike puccheyyāthā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1221_5: Te taṃ ādāya gantvā idaṃ kāraṇaṃ ācariyassa ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1221_6: Ācariyo tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā eḷakaṃ pucchi “kasmā tvaṃ eḷaka, hasi,
atk-s0513a1:1221_8: Eḷako attanā katakammaṃ jātissarañāṇena anussaritvā brāhmaṇassa kathesi “ahaṃ, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0513a1:1221_9: pubbe tādisova mantajjhāyakabrāhmaṇo hutvā ‘matakabhattaṃ dassāmī’ti ekaṃ eḷakaṃ māretvā matakabhattaṃ adāsiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1221_10: svāhaṃ ekassa eḷakassa ghātitattā ekenūnesu pañcasu attabhāvasatesu sīsacchedaṃ pāpuṇiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1221_11: ayaṃ me koṭiyaṃ ṭhito pañcasatimo attabhāvo,
atk-s0513a1:1221_12: svāhaṃ ‘ajja evarūpā dukkhā muccissāmī’ti somanassajāto iminā kāraṇena hasiṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1221_13: Rodanto pana ‘ahaṃ tāva ekaṃ eḷakaṃ māretvā pañca jātisatāni sīsacchedadukkhaṃ patvā ajja tamhā dukkhā muccissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1221_14: ayaṃ pana brāhmaṇo maṃ māretvā ahaṃ viya pañca jātisatāni sīsacchedadukkhaṃ labhissatī’ti tayi kāruññena rodi”nti. “Eḷaka, mā bhāyi,
atk-s0513a1:1221_18: tayi mārentepi amārentepi na sakkā ajja mayā maraṇā muccitu”nti. “Eḷaka, mā bhāyi,
atk-s0513a1:1221_19: ahaṃ te ārakkhaṃ gahetvā tayā saddhiṃyeva vicarissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1222_0: Brāhmaṇo eḷakaṃ muñcitvā “imaṃ eḷakaṃ kassacipi māretuṃ na dassāmī”ti antevāsike ādāya eḷakeneva saddhiṃ vicari.
atk-s0513a1:1222_1: Eḷako vissaṭṭhamattova ekaṃ pāsāṇapiṭṭhiṃ nissāya jātagumbe gīvaṃ ukkhipitvā paṇṇāni khādituṃ āraddho.
atk-s0513a1:1222_3: tato ekā pāsāṇasakalikā chijjitvā eḷakassa pasāritagīvāya patitvā sīsaṃ chindi,
atk-s0513a1:1222_5: Tadā bodhisatto tasmiṃ ṭhāne rukkhadevatā hutvā nibbatto.
atk-s0513a1:1222_6: So passantasseva tassa mahājanassa devatānubhāvena ākāse pallaṅkena nisīditvā “ime sattā evaṃ pāpassa
atk-s0513a1:1222_7: phalaṃ jānamānā appevanāma pāṇātipātaṃ na kareyyu”nti madhurassarena dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1225_0: Na pāṇo pāṇinaṃ haññe, pāṇaghātī hi socatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1226_0: Tattha evaṃ ce sattā jāneyyunti ime sattā evaṃ ce jāneyyuṃ. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0513a1:1226_1: Dukkhāyaṃ jātisambhavoti ayaṃ tattha tattha jāti ca jātassa anukkamena vaḍḍhisaṅkhāto sambhavo ca jarābyādhimaraṇaappiyasampayogapiyavippayogahatthapādacchedādīnaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1226_3: Na pāṇo pāṇinaṃ haññeti “paraṃ vadhanto jātisambhave vadhaṃ labhati,
atk-s0513a1:1226_4: pīḷento pīḷaṃ labhatī”ti jātisambhavassa dukkhavatthutāya dukkhabhāvaṃ jānanto koci pāṇo aññaṃ pāṇinaṃ na haññe,
atk-s0513a1:1226_8: yasmā sāhatthikādīsu chasu payogesu yena kenaci payogena parassa jīvitindriyupacchedanena pāṇaghātī puggalo
atk-s0513a1:1226_9: aṭṭhasu mahānirayesu soḷasasu ussadanirayesu nānappakārāya tiracchānayoniyā pettivisaye asurakāyeti imesu
atk-s0513a1:1226_10: catūsu apāyesu mahādukkhaṃ anubhavamāno dīgharattaṃ antonijjhāyanalakkhaṇena sokena socati.
atk-s0513a1:1226_12: evaṃ dīgharattaṃ socatītipi ñatvā na pāṇo pāṇinaṃ haññe,
atk-s0513a1:1226_14: Mohena pana mūḷhā avijjāya andhīkatā imaṃ ādīnavaṃ apassantā pāṇātipātaṃ karontīti.
atk-s0513a1:1227_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto nirayabhayena tajjetvā dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0513a1:1227_1: Manussā taṃ dhammadesanaṃ sutvā nirayabhayabhītā pāṇātipātā viramiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1227_2: Bodhisattopi dhammaṃ desetvā mahājanaṃ sīle patiṭṭhāpetvā yathākammaṃ gato,
atk-s0513a1:1227_3: mahājanopi bodhisattassa ovāde ṭhatvā dānādīni puññāni katvā devanagaraṃ pūresi.
atk-s0513a1:1227_4: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “ahaṃ tena samayena rukkhadevatā ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1231_0: Sace mucce pecca mucceti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto devatānaṃ āyācanabalikammaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1231_1: Tadā kira manussā vaṇijjāya gacchantā pāṇe vadhitvā devatānaṃ balikammaṃ katvā “mayaṃ anantarāyena atthasiddhiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1231_2: patvā āgantvā puna tumhākaṃ balikammaṃ karissāmā”ti āyācitvā gacchanti.
atk-s0513a1:1231_3: Tatthānantarāyena atthasiddhiṃ patvā āgatā “devatānubhāvena idaṃ jāta”nti maññamānā bahū pāṇe vadhitvā āyācanato muccituṃ balikammaṃ karonti,
atk-s0513a1:1231_4: taṃ disvā bhikkhū “atthi nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1232_0: Atīte kāsiraṭṭhe ekasmiṃ gāmake kuṭumbiko gāmadvāre ṭhitanigrodharukkhe devatāya balikammaṃ paṭijānitvā
atk-s0513a1:1232_1: anantarāyena āgantvā bahū pāṇe vadhitvā “āyācanato muccissāmī”ti rukkhamūlaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1234_0: “Sace mucce pecca mucce, muccamāno hi bajjhati;
atk-s0513a1:1235_0: Na hevaṃ dhīrā muccanti, mutti bālassa bandhana”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1236_0: Tattha sace mucce pecca mucceti bho purisa,
atk-s0513a1:1236_2: Pecca mucceti yathā paraloke na bajjhasi,
atk-s0513a1:1236_4: Muccamāno hi bajjhatīti yathā pana tvaṃ pāṇaṃ vadhitvā muccituṃ icchasi,
atk-s0513a1:1236_6: Tasmā na hevaṃ dhīrā muccantīti ye paṇḍitapurisā,
atk-s0513a1:1236_10: esā pāṇātipātaṃ katvā mutti nāma bālassa bandhanameva hotīti dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0513a1:1236_11: Tato paṭṭhāya manussā evarūpā pāṇātipātakammā viratā dhammaṃ caritvā devanagaraṃ pūrayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1237_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “ahaṃ tena samayena rukkhadevatā ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1241_0: Disvā padamanuttiṇṇanti idaṃ satthā kosalesu cārikaṃ caramāno naḷakapānagāmaṃ patvā naḷakapānapokkharaṇiyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1241_2: Tadā kira bhikkhū naḷakapānapokkharaṇiyaṃ nhatvā sūcigharatthāya sāmaṇerehi naḷadaṇḍake gāhāpetvā te
atk-s0513a1:1241_5: te mūlato yāva aggā sabbatthakameva chiddā,
atk-s0513a1:1242_0: Pubbe kira so vanasaṇḍo arañño ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1242_1: Tassāpi pokkharaṇiyā eko dakarakkhaso otiṇṇotiṇṇe khādati.
atk-s0513a1:1242_2: Tadā bodhisatto rohitamigapotakappamāṇo kapirājā hutvā asītisahassamattavānaraparivuto yūthaṃ pariharanto tasmiṃ araññe vasati.
atk-s0513a1:1242_5: tumhe akhāditapubbaṃ phalāphalaṃ khādantā vā apītapubbaṃ pānīyaṃ pivantā vā maṃ paṭipuccheyyāthā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1242_6: Te “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā ekadivasaṃ agatapubbaṭṭhānaṃ gatā tattha bahudeva divasaṃ caritvā pānīyaṃ gavesamānā
atk-s0513a1:1242_7: ekaṃ pokkharaṇiṃ disvā pānīyaṃ apivitvāva bodhisattassāgamanaṃ olokayamānā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1242_11: tātā”ti bodhisatto pokkharaṇiṃ āvijjhitvā padaṃ paricchindanto otiṇṇameva passi,
atk-s0513a1:1242_13: So “nissaṃsayaṃ esā amanussapariggahitā”ti ñatvā “suṭṭhu vo kataṃ, tātā,
atk-s0513a1:1243_0: Dakarakkhasopi tesaṃ anotaraṇabhāvaṃ ñatvā nīlodaro paṇḍaramukho surattahatthapādo bībhacchadassano hutvā
atk-s0513a1:1243_3: Atha naṃ bodhisatto pucchi “tvaṃ idha nibbattadakarakkhasosī”ti? “Āma, aha”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1243_5: ahaṃ idhotiṇṇaṃ antamaso sakuṇikaṃ upādāya na kiñci muñcāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1243_13: “Mayañhi anotaritvā asītisahassānipi ekamekaṃ naḷadaṇḍakaṃ gahetvā uppalanāḷena udakaṃ pivantā viya tava pokkharaṇiyā pānīyaṃ pivissāma,
atk-s0513a1:1243_14: evaṃ no tvaṃ khādituṃ na sakkhissasī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1243_15: Etamatthaṃ viditvā satthā abhisambuddho hutvā imissā gāthāya purimapadadvayaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0513a1:1246_2: so kapirājā tassā pokkharaṇiyā ekampi uttiṇṇapadaṃ nāddasa,
atk-s0513a1:1246_4: Evaṃ disvā padaṃ anuttiṇṇaṃ disvāna otaritaṃ padaṃ “addhāyaṃ pokkharaṇī amanussapariggahitā”ti ñatvā tena saddhiṃ sallapanto sapariso āha –
atk-s0513a1:1248_0: Tassattho – mayaṃ tava pokkharaṇiyaṃ naḷena pānīyaṃ pivissāmāti. Puna mahāsatto āha –
atk-s0513a1:1250_0: Evaṃ naḷena pānīyaṃ pivantaṃ saparisampi maṃ tvaṃ neva vadhissasīti attho.
atk-s0513a1:1251_0: Evañca pana vatvā bodhisatto ekaṃ naḷadaṇḍakaṃ āharāpetvā pāramiyo āvajjetvā saccakiriyaṃ katvā mukhena dhami,
atk-s0513a1:1251_1: naḷo anto kiñci gaṇṭhiṃ asesetvā sabbatthakameva susiro ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1251_2: Iminā niyāmena aparampi aparampi āharāpetvā mukhena dhamitvā adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1251_5: Bodhisatto pana “imaṃ pokkharaṇiṃ parivāretvā jātā sabbepi naḷā ekacchiddā hontū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1251_7: Tato paṭṭhāya sabbepi taṃ pokkharaṇiṃ parivāretvā uṭṭhitanaḷā ekacchiddā jātā.
atk-s0513a1:1251_10: Cande sasalakkhaṇaṃ sakalampi imaṃ kappaṃ ṭhassati,
atk-s0513a1:1251_11: vaṭṭakajātake aggino nibbutaṭṭhānaṃ sakalampi imaṃ kappaṃ aggi na jhāyissati,
atk-s0513a1:1251_12: ghaṭīkāranivesanaṭṭhānaṃ sakalampi imaṃ kappaṃ anovassakaṃ ṭhassati,
atk-s0513a1:1251_13: imaṃ pokkharaṇiṃ parivāretvā uṭṭhitanaḷā sakalampi imaṃ kappaṃ ekacchiddā bhavissantīti imāni cattāri kappaṭṭhiyapāṭihāriyāni nāma.
atk-s0513a1:1252_0: Bodhisatto evaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā ekaṃ naḷaṃ ādāya nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:1252_1: Tepi asītisahassavānarā ekekaṃ ādāya pokkharaṇiṃ parivāretvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1252_2: Tepi bodhisattassa naḷena ākaḍḍhitvā pānīyaṃ pivanakāle sabbe tīre nisinnāva piviṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1252_3: Evaṃ tehi pānīye pivite dakarakkhaso kiñci alabhitvā anattamano sakanivesanameva gato.
atk-s0513a1:1253_2: naḷānaṃ ekacchiddabhāvo nāma mayhamevetaṃ porāṇakaadhiṭṭhāna”nti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1263_0: Ñātametaṃ kuruṅgassāti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1263_1: Ekasmiñhi samaye dhammasabhāyaṃ sannipatitā bhikkhū “āvuso devadatto tathāgatassa ghātanatthāya dhanuggahe payojesi,
atk-s0513a1:1263_4: sabbathāpi dasabalassa vadhāya parisakkatī”ti devadattassa avaṇṇaṃ kathentā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1263_8: devadatto tumhākaṃ vadhāya parisakkatīti tassa aguṇakathāya sannisinnāmhāti.
atk-s0513a1:1263_13: na ca pana maṃ vadhituṃ asakkhī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1264_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto kuruṅgamigo hutvā ekasmiṃ araññāyatane phalāni khādanto vasati.
atk-s0513a1:1264_1: So ekasmiṃ kāle phalasampanne sepaṇṇirukkhe sepaṇṇiphalāni khādati.
atk-s0513a1:1264_2: Atheko gāmavāsī aṭṭakaluddako phalarukkhamūlesu migānaṃ padāni upadhāretvā uparirukkhe aṭṭakaṃ bandhitvā
atk-s0513a1:1264_3: tattha nisīditvā phalāni khādituṃ āgatāgate mige sattiyā vijjhitvā tesaṃ maṃsaṃ vikkiṇanto jīvikaṃ kappeti.
atk-s0513a1:1264_4: So ekadivasaṃ tasmiṃ rukkhamūle bodhisattassa padavaḷañjaṃ disvā tasmiṃ sepaṇṇirukkhe aṭṭakaṃ bandhitvā
atk-s0513a1:1264_5: pātova bhuñjitvā sattiṃ ādāya vanaṃ pavisitvā taṃ rukkhaṃ āruhitvā aṭṭake nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:1264_6: Bodhisattopi pātova vasanaṭṭhānā nikkhamitvā “sepaṇṇiphalāni khādissāmī”ti āgamma taṃ rukkhamūlaṃ sahasāva
atk-s0513a1:1264_8: atthi nu kho evarūpo upaddavo”ti pariggaṇhanto bāhiratova aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1265_0: Luddakopi bodhisattassa anāgamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā aṭṭake nisinnova sepaṇṇiphalāni khipitvā khipitvā tassa purato pātesi.
atk-s0513a1:1265_1: Bodhisatto “imāni phalāni āgantvā mayhaṃ purato patanti,
atk-s0513a1:1265_2: atthi nu kho upari luddako”ti punappunaṃ ullokento luddakaṃ disvā apassanto viya hutvā “ambho, rukkha-
atk-s0513a1:1265_3: pubbe tvaṃ olambakaṃ cārento viya ujukameva phalāni pātesi,
atk-s0513a1:1265_5: evaṃ tayā rukkhadhamme pariccatte ahampi aññaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ upasaṅkamitvā mayhaṃ āhāraṃ pariyesissāmī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1268_0: Aññaṃ sepaṇṇi gacchāmi, na me te ruccate phala”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1269_3: Yaṃ tvaṃ sepaṇṇi seyyasīti yaṃ tvaṃ ambho sepaṇṇirukkha purato phalāni pātayamāno seyyasi viseyyasi visiṇṇaphalo hosi,
atk-s0513a1:1269_5: Na me te ruccate phalanti evaṃ phalaṃ dadamānāya na me tava phalaṃ ruccati,
atk-s0513a1:1270_0: Athassa luddako aṭṭake nisinnova sattiṃ khipitvā “gaccha,
atk-s0513a1:1270_4: aṭṭha pana mahāniraye soḷasaussadaniraye pañcavidhabandhanādīni ca kammakāraṇāni aviraddhoyevāsī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1270_5: Evañca pana vatvā palāyitvā yathāruciṃ gato,
atk-s0513a1:1271_4: na ca pana maṃ vadhituṃ asakkhī”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1275_0: Ye kukkurāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ñātatthacariyaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1275_2: Idaṃ pana vatthuṃ patiṭṭhapetvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1276_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tathārūpaṃ kammaṃ paṭicca kukkurayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a1:1276_2: Athekadivasaṃ rājā setasindhavayuttaṃ sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ rathaṃ āruyha uyyānaṃ gantvā tattha divasabhāgaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1276_4: Tassa taṃ rathavarattaṃ yathānaddhameva rājaṅgaṇe ṭhapayiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1276_6: Uparipāsādato koleyyakasunakhā otaritvā tassa cammañca naddhiñca khādiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1276_8: niddhamanamukhena sunakhā pavisitvā rathassa cammañca naddhiñca khādiṃsū”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1276_9: Rājā sunakhānaṃ kujjhitvā “diṭṭhadiṭṭhaṭṭhāne sunakhe ghātethā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1276_11: Te diṭṭhidiṭṭhaṭṭhāne ghātiyamānā palāyitvā susānaṃ gantvā bodhisattassa santikaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1277_2: Te “antepure kira rathassa cammañca naddhi ca sunakhehi khāditā’ti kuddho rājā sunakhavadhaṃ āṇāpesi,
atk-s0513a1:1277_5: Bodhisatto cintesi “ārakkhaṭṭhāne bahi sunakhānaṃ okāso natthi,
atk-s0513a1:1277_7: Idāni pana corānaṃ kiñci bhayaṃ natthi,
atk-s0513a1:1277_9: yaṃnūnāhaṃ core rañño dassetvā ñātisaṅghassa jīvitadānaṃ dadeyya”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1277_13: tāva idheva hothā”ti pāramiyo āvajjetvā mettābhāvanaṃ purecārikaṃ katvā “mayhaṃ upari leḍḍuṃ vā muggaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1277_14: vā mā koci khipituṃ ussahī”ti adhiṭṭhāya ekakova antonagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:1277_15: Atha naṃ disvā ekasattopi kujjhitvā olokento nāma nāhosi.
atk-s0513a1:1277_16: Rājāpi sunakhavadhaṃ āṇāpetvā sayaṃ vinicchaye nisinno hoti.
atk-s0513a1:1277_17: Bodhisatto tattheva gantvā pakkhanditvā rañño āsanassa heṭṭhā pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:1278_0: So thokaṃ vissamitvā heṭṭhāsanā nikkhamitvā rājānaṃ vanditvā “deva,
atk-s0513a1:1278_8: “‘Ime nāma cammakhādakacorā’ti tathato ajānitvā diṭṭhadiṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva mārāpanaṃ na yuttaṃ, devā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1278_9: “Rathacammassa kukkurehi khāditattā ‘diṭṭhadiṭṭhe sabbeva mārethā’ti sunakhavadhaṃ āṇāpesi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1278_10: “Kiṃ pana vo manussā sabbeva kukkure mārenti,
atk-s0513a1:1278_12: amhākaṃ ghare koleyyakā maraṇaṃ na labhantī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1278_13: Mahārāja idāneva tumhe “rathacammassa kukkurehi khāditattā ‘diṭṭhadiṭṭhe sabbeva mārethā’ti sunakhavadhaṃ āṇāpesi”nti avocuttha,
atk-s0513a1:1278_14: idāni pana “amhākaṃ ghare koleyyakā maraṇaṃ na labhantī”ti vadetha.
atk-s0513a1:1278_15: “Nanu evaṃ sante tumhe chandādivasena agatigamanaṃ gacchatha,
atk-s0513a1:1278_18: raññā nāma kāraṇagavesakena tulāsadisena bhavituṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0513a1:1278_19: idāni ca koleyyakā maraṇaṃ na labhanti,
atk-s0513a1:1278_23: Evañca pana vatvā mahāsatto madhurassaraṃ nicchāretvā “mahārāja,
atk-s0513a1:1278_25: nāyaṃ dhammo”ti rañño dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1281_0: Teme na vajjhā mayamasma vajjhā, nāyaṃ saghaccā dubbalaghātikāya”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1282_9: Vaṇṇabalūpapannāti sarīravaṇṇena ceva kāyabalena ca sampannā.
atk-s0513a1:1282_10: Teme na vajjhāti te ime sassāmikā sārakkhā na vajjhā.
atk-s0513a1:1282_11: Mayamasma vajjhāti assāmikā anārakkhā mayaṃ vajjhā nāma jātā.
atk-s0513a1:1282_12: Nāyaṃ saghaccāti evaṃ sante ayaṃ avisesena saghaccā nāma na hoti.
atk-s0513a1:1282_13: Dubbalaghātikāyanti ayaṃ pana dubbalānaṃyeva ghātanato dubbalaghātikā nāma hoti.
atk-s0513a1:1282_14: Rājūhi nāma corā niggaṇhitabbā, no acorā.
atk-s0513a1:1282_15: Idha pana corānaṃ kiñci bhayaṃ natthi,
atk-s0513a1:1283_9: “Tumhākaṃ ghare koleyyakasunakhe āharāpetvā thokaṃ takkañca dabbatiṇāni ca āharāpethā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1283_11: Atha naṃ mahāsatto “imāni tiṇāni takkena maddāpetvā ete sunakhe pāyethā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1283_13: pītā pītā sunakhā saddhiṃ cammehi vamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1283_14: Rājā “sabbaññubuddhassa byākaraṇaṃ viyā”ti tuṭṭho bodhisattassa setacchattena pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1283_16: mātāpitūsu khattiyā”tiādīhi tesakuṇajātake āgatāhi dasahi dhammacariyagāthāhi rañño dhammaṃ desetvā “mahārāja,
atk-s0513a1:1283_17: ito paṭṭhāya appamatto hohī”ti rājānaṃ pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā setacchattaṃ raññova paṭiadāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1284_0: Rājā mahāsattassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā sabbasattānaṃ abhayaṃ datvā bodhisattaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbasunakhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1284_1: attano bhojanasadisameva niccabhattaṃ paṭṭhapetvā bodhisattassa ovāde ṭhito yāvatāyukaṃ dānādīni puññāni
atk-s0513a1:1285_3: pubbepi cariyevā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1289_0: Api passena semānoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ ossaṭṭhavīriyaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1289_1: Tasmiñhi samaye satthā taṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantetvā “bhikkhu,
atk-s0513a1:1289_3: pahāraṃ laddhāpi neva ossajiṃsū”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1290_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto bhojājānīyasindhavakule nibbatto sabbālaṅkārasampanno bārāṇasirañño maṅgalasso ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1290_1: So satasahassagghanikāya suvaṇṇapātiyaṃyeva nānaggarasasampannaṃ tivassikagandhasālibhojanaṃ bhuñjati,
atk-s0513a1:1290_3: taṃ ṭhānaṃ rattakambalasāṇiparikkhittaṃ upari suvaṇṇatārakakhacitacelavitānaṃ samosaritagandhadāmamālādāmaṃ avijahitagandhatelapadīpaṃ hoti.
atk-s0513a1:1290_4: Bārāṇasirajjaṃ pana apatthentā rājāno nāma natthi.
atk-s0513a1:1290_5: Ekaṃ samayaṃ satta rājāno bārāṇasiṃ parikkhipitvā “amhākaṃ rajjaṃ vā detu,
atk-s0513a1:1290_7: Rājā amacce sannipātetvā taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhitvā “idāni kiṃ karoma,
atk-s0513a1:1290_9: tumhehi tāva āditova yuddhāya na gantabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1290_10: asukaṃ nāma assārohaṃ pesetvā yuddhaṃ kāretha,
atk-s0513a1:1290_13: sattahi rājūhi saddhiṃ yuddhaṃ kātu”nti āha. “Deva,
atk-s0513a1:1291_1: devā”ti rājānaṃ vanditvā pāsādā oruyha bhojājānīyasindhavaṃ āharāpetvā suvammitaṃ katvā attanāpi sabbasannāhasannaddho
atk-s0513a1:1291_2: khaggaṃ bandhitvā sindhavapiṭṭhivaragato nagarā nikkhamma vijjulatā viya caramāno paṭhamaṃ balakoṭṭhakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1291_3: bhinditvā ekaṃ rājānaṃ jīvaggāhameva gahetvā āgantvā nagare balassa niyyādetvā puna gantvā dutiyaṃ balakoṭṭhakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1291_4: bhinditvā tathā tatiyanti evaṃ pañca rājāno jīvaggāhaṃ gahetvā chaṭṭhaṃ balakoṭṭhakaṃ bhinditvā chaṭṭhassa
atk-s0513a1:1291_8: Assāroho tassa pahaṭabhāvaṃ ñatvā bhojājānīyasindhavaṃ rājadvāre nipajjāpetvā sannāhaṃ sithilaṃ katvā aññaṃ assaṃ sannayhituṃ āraddho.
atk-s0513a1:1291_9: Bodhisatto mahāphāsukapassena nipannova akkhīni ummiletvā assārohaṃ disvā “ayaṃ aññaṃ assaṃ sannayhati,
atk-s0513a1:1291_10: ayañca asso sattamaṃ balakoṭṭhakaṃ bhinditvā sattamaṃ rājānaṃ gaṇhituṃ na sakkhissati,
atk-s0513a1:1291_14: ṭhapetvā maṃ añño asso sattamaṃ balakoṭṭhakaṃ bhinditvā sattamaṃ rājānaṃ gahetuṃ samattho nāma natthī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1291_16: sattamaṃ balakoṭṭhakaṃ bhinditvā sattamaṃ rājānaṃ gahetuṃ samattho ṭhapetvā maṃ añño asso nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:1291_18: mamaññeva uṭṭhāpetvā sannayhāhī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1294_0: Seyyova vaḷavā bhojjho, yuñja maññeva sārathī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1295_0: Tattha api passena semānoti ekena passena sayamānakopi.
atk-s0513a1:1295_2: Seyyova vaḷavā bhojjhoti vaḷavāti sindhavakulesu ajāto khaluṅkasso.
atk-s0513a1:1295_4: Iti etasmā vaḷavā sallehi viddhopi bhojājānīyasindhavova seyyo varo uttamo.
atk-s0513a1:1295_5: Yuñja maññeva sārathīti yasmā eva gatopi ahameva seyyo,
atk-s0513a1:1296_0: Assāroho bodhisattaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā vaṇaṃ bandhitvā susannaddhaṃ sannayhitvā tassa piṭṭhiyaṃ nisīditvā sattamaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1296_1: balakoṭṭhakaṃ bhinditvā sattamaṃ rājānaṃ jīvaggāhaṃ gahetvā rājabalassa niyyādesi,
atk-s0513a1:1296_8: mayhañca assārohassa ca dātabbaṃ yasaṃ assārohasseva detha,
atk-s0513a1:1296_9: satta rājāno gahetvā dinnayodhaṃ nāma nāsetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0513a1:1296_13: Evaṃ bodhisattena rañño ovāde dinne bodhisattassa sannāhaṃ mocayiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1296_15: Rājā tassa sarīrakiccaṃ kāretvā assārohassa mahantaṃ yasaṃ datvā satta rājāno puna attanno adubbhāya
atk-s0513a1:1296_16: sapathaṃ kāretvā sakasakaṭṭhānāni pesetvā dhammena samena rajjaṃ kāretvā jīvitapariyosāne yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1297_0: Satthā “evaṃ bhikkhu pubbe paṇḍitā anāyatanepi vīriyaṃ akaṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1297_2: tvaṃ pana evarūpe niyyānikasāsane pabbajitvā kasmā vīriyaṃ ossajasī”ti vatvā cattāri saccāni pakāsesi,
atk-s0513a1:1298_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1302_0: Yadā yadāti idampi satthā jetavane viharanto ossaṭṭhavīriyameva bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1302_1: Taṃ pana bhikkhuṃ satthā āmantetvā “bhikkhu pubbe paṇḍitā anāyatanepi laddhappahārāpi hutvā vīriyaṃ akaṃsū”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1303_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente purimanayeneva satta rājāno nagaraṃ parivārayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1303_1: Atheko rathikayodho dve bhātikasindhave rathe yojetvā nagarā nikkhamma cha balakoṭṭhake bhinditvā cha rājāno aggahesi.
atk-s0513a1:1303_3: Rathiko rathaṃ pesento rājadvāraṃ āgantvā jeṭṭhabhātikaṃ rathā mocetvā sannāhaṃ sithilaṃ katvā ekeneva
atk-s0513a1:1303_4: passena nipajjāpetvā aññaṃ assaṃ sannayhituṃ āraddho.
atk-s0513a1:1303_5: Bodhisatto taṃ disvā purimanayeneva cintetvā rathikaṃ pakkosāpetvā nipannakova imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1305_0: “Yadā yadā yattha yadā, yattha yattha yadā yadā;
atk-s0513a1:1306_0: Ājañño kurute vegaṃ, hāyanti tattha vāḷavā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1307_0: Tattha yadā yadāti pubbaṇhādīsu yasmiṃ yasmiṃ kāle.
atk-s0513a1:1307_1: Yatthāti yasmiṃ ṭhāne magge vā saṅgāmasīse vā.
atk-s0513a1:1307_3: Yattha yatthāti sattannaṃ balakoṭṭhakānaṃ vasena bahūsu yuddhamaṇḍalesu.
atk-s0513a1:1307_4: Yadā yadāti yasmiṃ yasmiṃ kāle pahāraṃ laddhakāle vā aladdhakāle vā.
atk-s0513a1:1307_5: Ājañño kurute veganti sārathissa cittarucitaṃ kāraṇaṃ ājānanasabhāvo ājañño varasindhavo vegaṃ karoti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati.
atk-s0513a1:1307_6: Hāyanti tattha vāḷavāti tasmiṃ vege kariyamāne itare vaḷavasaṅkhātā khaḷuṅkassā hāyanti parihāyanti,
atk-s0513a1:1307_7: tasmā imasmiṃ rathe maṃyeva yojehīti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1308_0: Sārathi bodhisattaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā rathe yojetvā sattamaṃ balakoṭṭhakaṃ bhinditvā sattamaṃ rājānaṃ ādāya
atk-s0513a1:1308_1: rathaṃ pesento rājadvāraṃ āgantvā sindhavaṃ mocesi.
atk-s0513a1:1308_2: Bodhisatto ekena passena nipanno purimanayeneva rañño ovādaṃ datvā nirujjhi.
atk-s0513a1:1308_3: Rājā tassa sarīrakiccaṃ kāretvā sārathissa sammānaṃ katvā dhammena rajjaṃ kāretvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1309_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsesi,
atk-s0513a1:1309_2: Satthā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā rājā ānandatthero ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:1313_0: Aññamaññehi titthehīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto dhammasenāpatissa saddhivihārikaṃ ekaṃ suvaṇṇakārapubbakaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1313_3: Tasmā dhammasenāpati attano āsayānusayañāṇassa natthitāya saddhivihārikassa āsayānusayaṃ ajānanto asubhakammaṭṭhānameva kathesi,
atk-s0513a1:1313_5: So kira paṭipāṭiyā pañca jātisatāni suvaṇṇakārageheyeva paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0513a1:1313_6: athassa dīgharattaṃ parisuddhasuvaṇṇadassanavasena paricitattā asubhaṃ na sappāyamahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1313_7: So tattha nimittamattampi uppādetuṃ asakkonto cattāro māse khepesi.
atk-s0513a1:1314_0: Dhammasenāpati attano saddhivihārikassa arahattaṃ dātuṃ asakkonto “addhā ayaṃ buddhaveneyyo bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:1314_1: tathāgatassa santikaṃ nessāmī”ti cintetvā pātova taṃ ādāya satthu santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1314_4: ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ ādāya āgatosī”ti pucchi. “Ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1314_6: ayaṃ pana catūhi māsehi nimittamattampi na uppādesi,
atk-s0513a1:1314_7: svāhaṃ ‘buddhaveneyyo eso bhavissatī’ti cintetvā tumhākaṃ santikaṃ ādāya āgato”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1314_9: kataraṃ pana te kammaṭṭhānaṃ saddhivihārikassa dinna”nti?
atk-s0513a1:1314_13: tvaṃ sāyanhasamaye āgantvā tava saddhivihārikaṃ ādāya gaccheyyāsī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1314_14: Evaṃ satthā theraṃ uyyojetvā tassa bhikkhussa manāpaṃ cīvarañca nivāsanañca dāpetvā taṃ ādāya gāmaṃ piṇḍāya
atk-s0513a1:1314_15: pavisitvā paṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ dāpetvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivāro puna vihāraṃ āgantvā gandhakuṭiyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1314_16: divasabhāgaṃ khepetvā sāyanhasamaye taṃ bhikkhuṃ gahetvā vihāracārikaṃ caramāno ambavane ekaṃ pokkharaṇiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1314_18: tatrāpi ca mahantaṃ ekaṃ padumapupphaṃ māpetvā “bhikkhu imaṃ pupphaṃ olokento nisīdā”ti nisīdāpetvā gandhakuṭiṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:1315_0: So bhikkhu taṃ pupphaṃ punappunaṃ oloketi.
atk-s0513a1:1315_2: taṃ tassa passantasseva jaraṃ patvā vivaṇṇaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1315_3: Athassa pariyantato paṭṭhāya pattāni patantāni muhuttena sabbāni patiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1315_6: So bhikkhu taṃ passanto cintesi “idaṃ padumapupphaṃ idāneva abhirūpaṃ ahosi dassanīyaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1315_13: Satthā “tassa cittaṃ vipassanaṃ āruḷha”nti ñatvā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova obhāsaṃ pharitvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1318_0: So bhikkhu gāthāpariyosāne arahattaṃ patvā “mutto vatamhi sabbabhavehī”ti cintetvā –
atk-s0513a1:1320_0: Visuddhasīlo susamāhitindriyo, cando yathā rāhumukhā pamutto.
atk-s0513a1:1322_0: Ālokapajjotakaro pabhaṅkaro, sahassaraṃsī viya bhāṇumā nabhe”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:1323_1: Udānetvā ca pana gantvā bhagavantaṃ vandi.
atk-s0513a1:1323_2: Theropi āgantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā attano saddhivihārikaṃ gahetvā agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1323_3: Ayaṃ pavatti bhikkhūnaṃ antare pākaṭā jātā.
atk-s0513a1:1323_4: Bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ dasabalassa guṇe vaṇṇayamānā nisīdiṃsu – “āvuso,
atk-s0513a1:1323_5: sāriputtatthero āsayānusayañāṇassa abhāvena attano saddhivihārikassa āsayaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0513a1:1323_6: satthā pana ñatvā ekadivaseneva tassa saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0513a1:1324_8: svāhaṃ etarahi buddho hutvā tassa āsayaṃ jānāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1324_9: pubbepāhaṃ tassa āsayaṃ jānāmiyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1325_1: Tadā bodhisatto taṃ rājānaṃ atthe ca dhamme ca anusāsati.
atk-s0513a1:1325_2: Tadā rañño maṅgalaassanhānatitthe aññataraṃ vaḷavaṃ khaḷuṅkassaṃ nhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1325_3: Maṅgalasso vaḷavena nhānatitthaṃ otāriyamāno jigucchitvā otarituṃ na icchi.
atk-s0513a1:1325_7: jānāhi kena kāraṇena asso titthaṃ otāriyamāno na otaratī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1325_9: devā”ti nadītīraṃ gantvā assaṃ oloketvā nirogabhāvamassa ñatvā “kena nu kho kāraṇena ayaṃ imaṃ titthaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1325_10: na otaratī”ti upadhārento “paṭhamataraṃ ettha añño nhāpito bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:1325_11: tenesa jigucchamāno titthaṃ na otarati maññe”ti cintetvā assagopake pucchi “ambho,
atk-s0513a1:1326_0: Bodhisatto “esa attano sindhavatāya jigucchanto ettha nhāyituṃ na icchati,
atk-s0513a1:1326_1: imaṃ aññatitthe nhāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti tassa āsayaṃ ñatvā “bho assagopaka,
atk-s0513a1:1326_2: sappimadhuphāṇitādibhisaṅkhatapāyāsampi tāva punappunaṃ bhuñjantassa titti hoti.
atk-s0513a1:1326_3: Ayaṃ asso bahū vāre idha titthe nhāto,
atk-s0513a1:1326_4: aññampi tāva naṃ titthaṃ otāretvā nhāpetha ca pāyetha cā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1330_5: Pāyāsassapi tappatīti sappiādīhi abhisaṅkhatena madhurapāyāsena tappati titto hoti,
atk-s0513a1:1330_6: dhāto suhito na puna bhuñjitukāmataṃ āpajjati.
atk-s0513a1:1330_7: Tasmā ayampi asso imasmiṃ titthe nibaddhaṃ nhānena pariyattiṃ āpanno bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:1331_0: Te tassa vacanaṃ sutvā assaṃ aññatitthaṃ otāretvā pāyiṃsu ceva nhāpayiṃsu ca.
atk-s0513a1:1331_1: Bodhisatto assassa pānīyaṃ pivitvā nhānakāle rañño santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1331_3: asso nhāto ca pīto cā”ti pucchi. “Āma, devā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1331_7: aho paṇḍito”ti bodhisattassa mahantaṃ yasaṃ datvā jīvitapariyosāne yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1332_3: pubbepi jānāmiyevā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1336_0: Purāṇacorāna vaco nisammāti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1336_2: Ajātasattukumāro devadattassa gayāsīse vihāraṃ kāretvā nānaggarasehi tivassikagandhasālibhojanassa divase divase pañca thālipākasatāni abhihari.
atk-s0513a1:1336_3: Lābhasakkāraṃ nissāya devadattassa parivāro mahanto jāto,
atk-s0513a1:1336_8: Te aññamaññaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhānepi passanti,
atk-s0513a1:1337_1: kiṃ tvaṃ devasikaṃ sedehi muccamānehi piṇḍāya carasi,
atk-s0513a1:1337_2: devadatto gayāsīsavihāre nisīditvāva nānaggarasehi subhojanaṃ bhuñjati,
atk-s0513a1:1337_5: kiṃ te pātova gayāsīsaṃ āgantvā sauttaribhaṅgaṃ yāguṃ pivitvā aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ khajjakaṃ khāditvā nānaggarasehi subhojanaṃ bhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:1337_6: So punappunaṃ vuccamāno gantukāmo hutvā tato paṭṭhāya gayāsīsaṃ gantvā bhuñjitvā kālasseva veḷuvanaṃ āgacchati.
atk-s0513a1:1337_8: “gayāsīsaṃ gantvā devadattassa paṭṭhapitaṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjatī”ti na cirasseva pākaṭo jāto.
atk-s0513a1:1337_15: na pana me devadatto bhattaṃ deti,
atk-s0513a1:1337_17: devadatto buddhānaṃ paṭikaṇṭako dussīlo ajātasattuṃ pasādetvā adhammena attano lābhasakkāraṃ uppādesi,
atk-s0513a1:1337_18: tvaṃ evarūpe niyyānike buddhasāsane pabbajitvā devadattassa adhammena uppannaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjasi,
atk-s0513a1:1337_19: ehi taṃ satthu santikaṃ nessāmā”ti taṃ bhikkhuṃ ādāya dhammasabhaṃ āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1338_4: ayaṃ bhikkhu tumhākaṃ santike pabbajitvā devadattassa adhammena uppannaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1338_5: “Saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu devadattassa adhammena uppannaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjasī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:1338_12: kathañhi nāma tvaṃ idha pabbajitvā mama sāsanaṃ bhajantoyeva devadattassa bhattaṃ bhuñjasi,
atk-s0513a1:1338_13: niccakālampi bhajanasīlakova tvaṃ diṭṭhadiṭṭheyeva bhajasī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1339_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa amacco ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1339_1: Tadā rañño mahiḷāmukho nāma maṅgalahatthī ahosi sīlavā ācārasampanno,
atk-s0513a1:1339_3: Athekadivasaṃ tassa sālāya samīpe rattibhāgasamanantare corā āgantvā tassa avidūre nisinnā coramantaṃ mantayiṃsu “evaṃ ummaṅgo bhinditabbo,
atk-s0513a1:1339_5: ummaṅgañca sandhicchedañca maggasadisaṃ titthasadisaṃ nijjaṭaṃ niggumbaṃ katvā bhaṇḍaṃ harituṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0513a1:1339_7: evaṃ uṭṭhātuṃ samattho nāma na bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:1339_8: corena ca nāma sīlācārayuttena na bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1339_11: Eteneva upāyena punadivasepi punadivasepīti bahū divase tattha āgantvā mantayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1339_12: So tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā “te maṃ sikkhāpentī”ti saññāya “idāni mayā kakkhaḷena pharusena sāhasikena bhavitabba”nti tathārūpova ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1339_13: Pātova āgataṃ hatthigopakaṃ soṇḍāya gahetvā bhūmiyaṃ pothetvā māresi.
atk-s0513a1:1339_14: Aparampi tathā aparampi tathāti āgatāgataṃ māretiyeva.
atk-s0513a1:1340_0: “Mahiḷāmukho ummattako jāto diṭṭhadiṭṭhe māretī”ti rañño ārocayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1340_2: jānāhi kena kāraṇena so duṭṭho jāto”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1340_3: Bodhisatto gantvā tassa sarīre arogabhāvaṃ ñatvā “kena nu kho kāraṇena esa duṭṭho jāto”ti upadhārento
atk-s0513a1:1340_4: “addhā avidūre kesañci vacanaṃ sutvā ‘maṃ ete sikkhāpentī’ti saññāya duṭṭho jāto”ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā
atk-s0513a1:1340_5: hatthigopake pucchi “atthi nu kho hatthisālāya samīpe rattibhāge kehici kiñci kathitapubba”nti? “Āma, sāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1340_11: “Sīlavante samaṇabrāhmaṇe hatthisālāyaṃ nisīdāpetvā sīlācārakathaṃ kathāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1341_0: Bodhisatto gantvā sīlavante samaṇabrāhmaṇe hatthisālāyaṃ nisīdāpetvā “sīlakathaṃ kathetha,
atk-s0513a1:1341_2: Te hatthissa avidūre nisinnā “na koci parāmasitabbo na māretabbo,
atk-s0513a1:1341_3: sīlācārasampannena khantimettānuddayayuttena bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti sīlakathaṃ kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1341_5: ito dāni paṭṭhāya sīlavantena bhavitabba”nti sīlavā ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1341_9: “Evarūpo duṭṭhahatthī paṇḍite nissāya porāṇakadhammeyeva patiṭṭhito”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1344_0: Susaññatānañhi vaco nisamma, gajuttamo sabbaguṇesu aṭṭhā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1345_13: Rājā “tiracchānagatassāpi āsayaṃ jānātī”ti bodhisattassa mahantaṃ yasaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1345_14: So yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā saddhiṃ bodhisattena yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1346_2: dhammikānaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā dhammike bhajī”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1350_0: Nālaṃ kabaḷaṃ padātaveti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ upāsakañca mahallakattherañca ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1350_2: Tesu eko pabbajitvā devasikaṃ itarassa gharaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0513a1:1350_3: So tassa bhikkhaṃ datvā sayampi bhuñjitvā teneva saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā yāva sūriyatthaṅgamanā ālāpasallāpena nisīditvā nagaraṃ pavisati,
atk-s0513a1:1350_4: itaropi naṃ yāva nagaradvārā anugantvā nivattati.
atk-s0513a1:1350_5: So tesaṃ vissāso bhikkhūnaṃ antare pākaṭo jāto.
atk-s0513a1:1350_6: Athekadivasaṃ bhikkhū tesaṃ vissāsakathaṃ kathentā dhammasabhāyaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1350_15: pubbepi vissāsikāyeva ahesu”nti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1351_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa amacco ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1351_1: Tadā eko kukkuro maṅgalahatthisālaṃ gantvā maṅgalahatthissa bhuñjanaṭṭhāne patitāni bhattasitthāni khādati.
atk-s0513a1:1351_2: So teneva bhojanena saṃvaddhamāno maṅgalahatthissa vissāsiko jāto hatthisseva santike bhuñjati,
atk-s0513a1:1351_4: So hatthī naṃ soṇḍāya gahetvā aparāparaṃ karonto kīḷati,
atk-s0513a1:1351_6: Athekadivasaṃ eko gāmikamanusso hatthigopakassa mūlaṃ datvā taṃ kukkuraṃ ādāya attano gāmaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1351_7: Tato paṭṭhāya so hatthī kukkuraṃ apassanto neva khādati na pivati na nhāyati.
atk-s0513a1:1352_0: Bodhisatto hatthisālaṃ gantvā hatthissa dummanabhāvaṃ ñatvā “imassa sarīre rogo na paññāyati,
atk-s0513a1:1352_2: taṃ apassanto esa maññe sokābhibhūto”ti hatthigopake pucchi “atthi nu kho imassa kenaci saddhiṃ vissāso”ti? “Āma,
atk-s0513a1:1352_3: atthi sāmi ekena sunakhena saddhiṃ balavā mettī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1352_11: taṃ apassanto na bhuñjati maññe”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1354_0: “Nālaṃ kabaḷaṃ padātave, na ca piṇḍaṃ na kuse na ghaṃsituṃ;
atk-s0513a1:1356_5: Na ca piṇḍanti vaḍḍhetvā dīyamānaṃ bhattapiṇḍampi nālaṃ gahetuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1356_6: Na kuseti khādanatthāya dinnāni tiṇānipi nālaṃ gahetuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1356_7: Na ghaṃsitunti nhāpiyamāno sarīrampi ghaṃsituṃ nālaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1356_8: Evaṃ yaṃ yaṃ so hatthī kātuṃ na samattho,
atk-s0513a1:1356_9: taṃ taṃ sabbaṃ rañño ārocetvā tassa asamatthabhāve attanā sallakkhitakāraṇaṃ ārocento “maññāmī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0513a1:1357_0: Rājā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “idāni kiṃ kātabbaṃ paṇḍitā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:1357_1: “‘Amhākaṃ kira maṅgalahatthissa sahāyaṃ sunakhaṃ eko manusso gahetvā gato,
atk-s0513a1:1357_3: tassa ayaṃ nāma daṇḍo’ti bheriṃ carāpetha devā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1357_5: Taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā so puriso sunakhaṃ vissajjesi,
atk-s0513a1:1357_7: Hatthī taṃ soṇḍāya gahetvā kumbhe ṭhapetvā roditvā paridevitvā kumbhā otāretvā tena bhutte pacchā attanāpi bhuñji.
atk-s0513a1:1357_8: “Tiracchānagatassa āsayaṃ jānātī”ti rājā bodhisattassa mahantaṃ yasaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1358_3: pubbepi vissāsikāyevā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā catusaccakathāya vinivaṭṭetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi.
atk-s0513a1:1358_4: Idaṃ catusaccakathāya vinivaṭṭanaṃ nāma sabbajātakesupi atthiyeva.
atk-s0513a1:1363_0: Manuññameva bhāseyyāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto chabbaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ omasavādaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1363_1: Tasmiñhi samaye chabbaggiyā kalahaṃ karontā pesale bhikkhū khuṃsenti vambhenti ovijjhanti,
atk-s0513a1:1363_4: Bhagavā chabbaggiye pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira bhikkhavo”ti pucchitvā “sacca”nti vutte vigarahitvā “bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a1:1363_6: pubbepi eko tiracchānagato attānaṃ pharusena samudācarantaṃ sahassaṃ parājesī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1364_0: Atīte gandhāraraṭṭhe takkasilāyaṃ gandhārarājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a1:1364_2: Atha naṃ taruṇavacchakakāleyeva eko brāhmaṇo godakkhiṇādāyakānaṃ santikā labhitvā “nandivisālo”ti nāmaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1364_3: katvā puttaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā sampiyāyamāno yāgubhattādīni datvā posesi.
atk-s0513a1:1364_4: Bodhisatto vayappatto cintesi “ahaṃ iminā brāhmaṇena kicchena paṭijaggito,
atk-s0513a1:1364_5: mayā ca saddhiṃ sakalajambudīpe añño samadhuro goṇo nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:1364_6: yaṃnūnāhaṃ attano balaṃ dassetvā brāhmaṇassa posāvaniyaṃ dadeyya”nti so ekadivasaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ āha “gaccha, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0513a1:1364_7: ekaṃ govittakaseṭṭhiṃ upasaṅkamitvā ‘mayhaṃ balibaddo atibaddhaṃ sakaṭasataṃ pavaṭṭetī’ti vatvā sahassena abbhutaṃ karohī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1364_8: So brāhmaṇo seṭṭhissa santikaṃ gantvā kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi “imasmiṃ nagare kassa goṇo thāmasampanno”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1364_9: Atha naṃ seṭṭhi “asukassa ca asukassa cā”ti vatvā “sakalanagare pana amhākaṃ goṇehi sadiso nāma natthī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1364_10: Brāhmaṇo “mayhaṃ eko goṇo atibaddhaṃ sakaṭasataṃ pavaṭṭetuṃ samattho atthī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1365_0: So sakaṭasataṃ vālukāsakkharapāsāṇānaṃyeva pūretvā paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapetvā sabbāni akkhabandhanayottena ekato
atk-s0513a1:1365_1: bandhitvā nandivisālaṃ nhāpetvā gandhapañcaṅgulikaṃ katvā kaṇṭhe mālaṃ piḷandhitvā purimasakaṭadhure
atk-s0513a1:1365_2: ekakameva yojetvā sayaṃ dhure nisīditvā patodaṃ ukkhipitvā “gaccha kūṭa,
atk-s0513a1:1365_4: Bodhisatto “ayaṃ maṃ akūṭaṃ kūṭavādena samudācaratī”ti cattāro pāde thambhe viya niccale katvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1365_6: Brāhmaṇo sahassaparājito goṇaṃ muñcitvā gharaṃ gantvā sokābhibhūto nipajji.
atk-s0513a1:1365_7: Nandivisālo caritvā āgato brāhmaṇaṃ sokābhibhūtaṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā “kiṃ, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0513a1:1365_10: mayā ettakaṃ kālaṃ tava gehe vasantena atthi kiñci bhājanaṃ vā bhinditapubbaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1365_14: Atha tvaṃ maṃ kasmā kūṭavādena samudācarasi,
atk-s0513a1:1365_17: tena saddhiṃ dvīhi sahassehi abbhutaṃ karohi,
atk-s0513a1:1365_18: kevalaṃ maṃ akūṭaṃ kūṭavādena mā samudācarasīti.
atk-s0513a1:1366_0: Brāhmaṇo tassa vacanaṃ sutvā gantvā dvīhi sahassehi abbhutaṃ katvā purimanayeneva sakaṭasataṃ atibandhitvā
atk-s0513a1:1366_3: Yugaṃ dhure niccalaṃ bandhitvā ekāya koṭiyā nandivisālaṃ yojetvā ekaṃ koṭiṃ dhurayottena paliveṭhetvā
atk-s0513a1:1366_4: yugakoṭiñca akkhapādañca nissāya muṇḍarukkhadaṇḍakaṃ datvā tena yottena niccalaṃ bandhitvā ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:1366_5: Evañhi kate yugaṃ etto vā ito vā na gacchati,
atk-s0513a1:1366_7: Athassa brāhmaṇo dhure nisīditvā nandivisālassa piṭṭhiṃ parimajjitvā “gaccha bhadra, vahassu,
atk-s0513a1:1366_9: Bodhisatto atibaddhaṃ sakaṭasataṃ ekavegeneva ākaḍḍhitvā pacchā ṭhitaṃ sakaṭaṃ purato ṭhitassa sakaṭassa ṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:1366_10: Govittakaseṭṭhi parājito brāhmaṇassa dve sahassāni adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1366_11: Aññepi manussā bodhisattassa bahuṃ dhanaṃ adaṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1366_13: Evaṃ so bodhisattaṃ nissāya bahuṃ dhanaṃ labhi.
atk-s0513a1:1367_2: pharusavacanaṃ nāma kassaci manāpa”nti chabbaggiye bhikkhū garahitvā sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetvā abhisambuddho hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1371_0: Dhanañca naṃ alābhesi, tena cattamano ahū”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1372_0: Tattha manuññameva bhāseyyāti parena saddhiṃ bhāsamāno catudosavirahitaṃ madhuraṃ manāpaṃ saṇhaṃ mudukaṃ piyavacanameva bhāseyya.
atk-s0513a1:1372_1: Garuṃ bhāraṃ udaddharīti nandivisālo balibaddo amanāpaṃ bhāsamānassa bhāraṃ anuddharitvā pacchā manāpaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1372_2: piyavacanaṃ bhāsamānassa brāhmaṇassa garuṃ bhāraṃ uddhari,
atk-s0513a1:1373_0: Iti satthā “manuññameva bhāseyyā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1377_0: Yato yato garu dhuranti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1377_1: Taṃ saddhiṃ devorohaṇena terasakanipāte sarabhamigajātake āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:1377_2: Sammāsambuddhe pana yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā devaloke temāsaṃ vasitvā mahāpavāraṇāya saṅkassanagaradvāre
atk-s0513a1:1377_3: oruyha mahantena parivārena jetavanaṃ paviṭṭhe bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ sannipatitvā “āvuso,
atk-s0513a1:1377_5: tathāgatena vuḷhadhuraṃ añño vahituṃ samattho nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:1377_7: mayameva pāṭihāriyaṃ karissāmā’ti vatvā ekampi pāṭihāriyaṃ na akaṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1377_8: aho satthā asamadhuro”ti satthu guṇakathaṃ kathentā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1377_16: pubbe tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattopi ahaṃ attanā samadhuraṃ kañci nālattha”nti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1378_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto goyoniyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a1:1378_1: Atha naṃ sāmikā taruṇavacchakakāleyeva ekissā mahallikāya ghare vasitvā tassā nivāsavetanato paricchinditvā adaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1378_2: Sā taṃ yāgubhattādīhi paṭijaggamānā puttaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā vaḍḍhesi.
atk-s0513a1:1378_4: Vayappatto ca añjanavaṇṇo hutvā gāmagoṇehi saddhiṃ carati,
atk-s0513a1:1378_6: Gāmadārakā siṅgesupi kaṇṇesupi galepi gahetvā olambanti,
atk-s0513a1:1378_11: yaṃnūnāhaṃ bhatiṃ katvā imaṃ duggatabhāvato moceyya”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1378_12: So tato paṭṭhāya bhatiṃ upadhārento carati.
atk-s0513a1:1379_0: Athekadivasaṃ eko satthavāhaputto pañcahi sakaṭasatehi visamatitthaṃ sampatto,
atk-s0513a1:1379_1: tassa goṇā sakaṭāni uttāretuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0513a1:1379_2: pañcasu sakaṭasatesu goṇā yugaparamparāya yojitā ekampi sakaṭaṃ uttāretuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1379_3: Bodhisattopi gāmagoṇehi saddhiṃ tattha samīpe carati.
atk-s0513a1:1379_5: so “atthi nu kho etesaṃ gunnaṃ antare imāni sakaṭāni uttāretuṃ samattho usabhājānīyo”ti upadhārayamāno
atk-s0513a1:1379_6: bodhisattaṃ disvā “ayaṃ ājānīyo sakkhissati mayhaṃ sakaṭāni uttāretuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1379_7: ko nu kho assa sāmiko”ti gopālake pucchi “ko nu kho bho imassa sāmiko,
atk-s0513a1:1379_8: ahaṃ imaṃ sakaṭe yojetvā sakaṭesu uttāritesu vetanaṃ dassāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1379_11: So naṃ nāsāya rajjukena bandhitvā ākaḍḍhento cāletumpi nāsakkhi.
atk-s0513a1:1379_12: Bodhisatto kira “bhatiyā kathitāya gamissāmī”ti na agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1379_14: tayā pañcasu sakaṭasatesu uttāritesu ekekassa sakaṭassa dve dve kahāpaṇe bhatiṃ katvā sahassaṃ dassāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1379_17: Atha naṃ ekavegeneva ukkhipitvā thale patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:1380_0: Satthavāhaputto ekekassa sakaṭassa ekekaṃ katvā pañcasatāni bhaṇḍikaṃ katvā tassa gale bandhi.
atk-s0513a1:1380_1: So “ayaṃ mayhaṃ yathāparicchinnaṃ bhatiṃ na deti,
atk-s0513a1:1380_2: na dānissa gantuṃ dassāmī”ti gantvā sabbapurimasakaṭassa purato maggaṃ nivāretvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1380_4: Satthavāhaputto “jānāti maññe esa attano bhatiyā ūnabhāva”nti ekekasmiṃ sakaṭe dve dve katvā sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1380_6: So sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ ādāya mātu santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1380_7: Gāmadārakā “kiṃ nāmetaṃ ayyikākāḷakassa gale”ti bodhisattassa santikaṃ āgacchanti.
atk-s0513a1:1380_8: So te anubandhitvā dūratova palāpento mātu santikaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1380_9: Pañcannaṃ pana sakaṭasatānaṃ uttāritattā rattehi akkhīhi kilantarūpo paññāyittha.
atk-s0513a1:1380_11: ayaṃ te kahaṃ laddhā”ti gopālakadārake pucchitvā tamatthaṃ sutvā “tāta,
atk-s0513a1:1380_13: kiṃkāraṇā evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhosī”ti vatvā bodhisattaṃ uṇhodakena nhāpetvā sakalasarīraṃ telena makkhetvā
atk-s0513a1:1380_14: pānīyaṃ pāyetvā sappāyaṃ bhojanaṃ bhojetvā jīvitapariyosāne saddhiṃ bodhisattena yathākammaṃ gatā.
atk-s0513a1:1381_3: pubbepi asamadhuroyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā abhisambuddho hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1384_0: Tadāssu kaṇhaṃ yuñjanti, svāssu taṃ vahate dhura”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1385_0: Tattha yato yato garu dhuranti yasmiṃ yasmiṃ ṭhāne dhuraṃ garu bhāriyaṃ hoti,
atk-s0513a1:1385_4: yasmiṃ ṭhāne udakacikkhallamahantatāya vā visamacchinnataṭabhāvena vā maggo gambhīro hotīti attho.
atk-s0513a1:1385_5: Tadāssu kaṇhaṃ yuñjantīti ettha assūti nipātamattaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1385_7: Yadā dhurañca garu hoti maggo ca gambhīro,
atk-s0513a1:1385_8: tadā aññe balibadde apanetvā kaṇhameva yojentīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0513a1:1385_9: Svāssu taṃ vahate dhuranti etthāpi assūti nipātamattameva,
atk-s0513a1:1386_2: kaṇhova taṃ dhuraṃ vahatī”ti dassetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1390_0: Mā munikassa pihayīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto thullakumārikāpalobhanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1390_2: Satthā pana taṃ bhikkhuṃ “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti pucchi. “Āma,
atk-s0513a1:1390_7: pubbepi tvaṃ imissā vivāhadivase jīvitakkhayaṃ patvā mahājanassa uttaribhaṅgabhāvaṃ patto”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1391_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto ekasmiṃ gāmake ekassa kuṭumbikassa gehe goyoniyaṃ nibbatti “mahālohito”ti nāmena,
atk-s0513a1:1391_2: Teyeva dve bhātike nissāya tasmiṃ kule kammadhuraṃ vattati.
atk-s0513a1:1391_3: Tasmiṃ pana kule ekā kumārikā atthi,
atk-s0513a1:1391_4: taṃ eko nagaravāsī kulaputto attano puttassa vāresi.
atk-s0513a1:1391_5: Tassā mātāpitaro “kumārikāya vivāhakāle āgatānaṃ pāhunakānaṃ uttaribhaṅgo bhavissatī”ti yāgubhattaṃ datvā munikaṃ nāma sūkaraṃ posesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1391_6: Taṃ disvā cūḷalohito bhātaraṃ pucchi “imasmiṃ kule kammadhuraṃ vattamānaṃ amhe dve bhātike nissāya vattati,
atk-s0513a1:1391_9: kena nu kho kāraṇena esa etaṃ labhatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1391_13: Etissā hi kumārikāya vivāhakāle āgatānaṃ pāhunakānaṃ uttaribhaṅgo bhavissatīti ime etaṃ sūkaraṃ posenti,
atk-s0513a1:1391_15: atha naṃ sūkaraṃ pādesu gahetvā kaḍḍhentā heṭṭhāmañcato nīharitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā pāhunakānaṃ sūpabyañjanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1395_0: Tattha mā munikassa pihayīti munikassa bhojane pihaṃ mā uppādayi,
atk-s0513a1:1395_1: “esa muniko subhojanaṃ bhuñjatī”ti mā munikassa pihayi,
atk-s0513a1:1395_2: “kadā nu kho ahampi evaṃ sukhito bhaveyya”nti mā munikabhāvaṃ patthayi.
atk-s0513a1:1395_5: Appossukko bhusaṃ khādāti tassa bhojane nirussukko hutvā attanā laddhaṃ bhusaṃ khāda.
atk-s0513a1:1395_7: Tato na cirasseva te manussā āgamiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1395_13: etassa bhojanato sataguṇena sahassaguṇena amhākaṃ tiṇapalālabhusamattameva uttamañca anavajjañca dīghāyulakkhaṇañcāti.
atk-s0513a1:1396_0: Satthā “evaṃ kho tvaṃ bhikkhu pubbepi imaṃ kumārikaṃ nissāya jīvitakkhayaṃ patvā mahājanassa uttaribhaṅgabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1396_1: gato”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsesi,
atk-s0513a1:1405_0: Kulāvakāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aparissāvetvā pānīyaṃ pītaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1405_1: Sāvatthito kira dve sahāyakā daharabhikkhū janapadaṃ gantvā ekasmiṃ phāsukaṭṭhāne yathājjhāsayaṃ vasitvā
atk-s0513a1:1405_2: “sammāsambuddhaṃ passissāmā”ti puna tato nikkhamitvā jetavanābhimukhā pāyiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1405_7: Parissāvanasāmiko itarassa parissāvanaṃ adatvā sayameva pānīyaṃ parissāvetvā pivi,
atk-s0513a1:1405_8: itaro pana parissāvanaṃ alabhitvā pipāsaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkonto aparissāvetvā pānīyaṃ pivi.
atk-s0513a1:1405_9: Te ubhopi anupubbena jetavanaṃ patvā satthāraṃ vanditvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1405_10: Satthā sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ kathetvā “kuto āgatatthā”ti pucchi. “Bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1405_11: mayaṃ kosalajanapade ekasmiṃ gāmake vasitvā tato nikkhamitvā tumhākaṃ dassanatthāya āgatā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1405_14: antarāmagge mayā saddhiṃ vivādaṃ katvā parissāvanaṃ nādāsī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1405_17: “Saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu jānaṃ sapāṇakaṃ udakaṃ pivī”ti? “Āma, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1405_19: Satthā “bhikkhu pubbe paṇḍitā devanagare rajjaṃ kārentā yuddhaparājitā samuddapiṭṭhena palāyantā ‘issariyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1405_20: nissāya pāṇavadhaṃ na karissāmā’ti tāva mahantaṃ yasaṃ pariccajitvā supaṇṇapotakānaṃ jīvitaṃ datvā rathaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1406_0: Atīte magadharaṭṭhe rājagahe eko māgadharājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a1:1406_1: Tadā bodhisatto yathā etarahi sakko purimattabhāve magadharaṭṭhe macalagāmake nibbatti,
atk-s0513a1:1406_2: evaṃ tasmiṃyeva macalagāmake mahākulassa putto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:1406_9: tepi tettiṃsa kulā manussā ekadivasaṃ gāmamajjhe ṭhatvā gāmakammaṃ karonti.
atk-s0513a1:1406_10: Bodhisatto ṭhitaṭṭhāne pādehi paṃsuṃ viyūhitvā taṃ padesaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ katvā aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0513a1:1406_11: athañño eko āgantvā tasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhito.
atk-s0513a1:1406_12: Bodhisatto aparaṃ ṭhānaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ katvā aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0513a1:1406_14: Bodhisatto aparampi aparampīti sabbesampi ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ katvā aparena samayena tasmiṃ ṭhāne maṇḍapaṃ kāresi,
atk-s0513a1:1407_0: Aparena samayena tepi tettiṃsajanā bodhisattena samānacchandā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1407_1: Te bodhisatto pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā tato paṭṭhāya tehi saddhiṃ puññāni karonto vicarati.
atk-s0513a1:1407_2: Tepi teneva saddhiṃ puññāni karontā kālasseva vuṭṭhāya vāsipharasumusalahatthā catumahāpathādīsu musalena pāsāṇe ubbattetvā pavaṭṭenti,
atk-s0513a1:1407_10: Evaṃ yebhuyyena sakalagāmavāsino bodhisattassa ovāde ṭhatvā sīlāni rakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1408_0: Atha nesaṃ gāmabhojako cintesi “ahaṃ pubbe etesu suraṃ pivantesu pāṇātipātādīni karontesu cāṭikahāpaṇādivasena
atk-s0513a1:1408_2: idāni pana magho māṇavo sīlaṃ rakkhāpeti,
atk-s0513a1:1408_4: idāni pana te pañca sīlāni na rakkhāpessāmī”ti kuddho rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “deva,
atk-s0513a1:1408_5: bahū corā gāmaghātādīni karontā vicarantī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1408_8: So gantvā sabbepi te bandhitvā ānetvā “ānītā, deva,
atk-s0513a1:1408_10: Rājā tesaṃ kammaṃ asodhetvāva “hatthinā ne maddāpethā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1408_11: Tato sabbepi te rājaṅgaṇe nipajjāpetvā hatthiṃ ānayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1408_12: Bodhisatto tesaṃ ovādaṃ adāsi “tumhe sīlāni āvajjetha,
atk-s0513a1:1408_13: pesuññakārake ca raññe ca hatthimhi ca attano sarīre ca ekasadisameva mettaṃ bhāvethā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1409_0: Rājā “etesaṃ hatthe kiñci osadhaṃ bhavissatī”ti cintetvā “vicinathā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1409_9: rājā sabbepi te pakkosāpetvā “tumhākaṃ jānanamantaṃ kathethā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1409_12: amhe pana tettiṃsamattā janā pāṇaṃ na hanāma,
atk-s0513a1:1409_22: ayaṃ amhākaṃ manto ca parittañca vuḍḍhi cā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1409_23: Rājā tesaṃ pasanno pesuññakārakassa sabbaṃ gehavibhavaṃ tañca tesaṃyeva dāsaṃ katvā adāsi,
atk-s0513a1:1410_0: Te tato paṭṭhāya yathāruciyā puññāni karontā “catumahāpathe mahantaṃ sālaṃ kāressāmā”ti vaḍḍhakiṃ pakkosāpetvā sālaṃ paṭṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1410_1: Mātugāmesu pana vigatacchandatāya tassā sālāya mātugāmānaṃ pattiṃ nādaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1410_2: Tena ca samayena bodhisattassa gehe sudhammā, cittā, nandā,
atk-s0513a1:1410_4: Tāsu sudhammā vaḍḍhakinā saddhiṃ ekato hutvā “bhātika,
atk-s0513a1:1410_5: imissā sālāya maṃ jeṭṭhikaṃ karohī”ti vatvā lañjaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1410_6: So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā paṭhamameva kaṇṇikārukkhaṃ sukkhāpetvā tacchetvā vijjhitvā kaṇṇikaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā vatthena paliveṭhetvā ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:1410_13: pubbeyeva chinditvā tacchetvā vijjhitvā ṭhapitakaṇṇikā laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1410_15: “Sace kassaci gehe niṭṭhāpetvā ṭhapitā vikkāyikakaṇṇikā atthi,
atk-s0513a1:1410_17: Te pariyesantā sudhammāya gehe disvā mūlena na labhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1410_19: dassāmī”ti vutte “na mayaṃ mātugāmānaṃ pattiṃ damhā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1411_2: ṭhapetvā brahmalokaṃ aññaṃ mātugāmarahitaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:1411_4: evaṃ sante amhākaṃ kammaṃ niṭṭhaṃ gamissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1411_5: Te “sādhū”ti kaṇṇikaṃ gahetvā sālaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā āsanaphalakāni santharitvā pānīyacāṭiyo ṭhapetvā yāgubhattaṃ nibandhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1411_6: Sālaṃ pākārena parikkhipitvā dvāraṃ yojetvā antopākāre vālukaṃ ākiritvā bahipākāre tālapantiyo ropesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1411_9: Nandāpi tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne pokkharaṇiṃ kāresi pañcavaṇṇehi padumehi sañchannaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1412_0: Bodhisatto mātu upaṭṭhānaṃ pitu upaṭṭhānaṃ kule jeṭṭhāpacāyikakammaṃ saccavācaṃ apharusavācaṃ apisuṇavācaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1416_0: Taṃ ve devā tāvatiṃsā, āhu sappuriso itī”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:1417_0: Evaṃ pasaṃsiyabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā jīvitapariyosāne tāvatiṃsabhavane sakko devarājā hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0513a1:1417_3: Sakko devarājā “kiṃ no sādhāraṇena rajjenā”ti asure dibbapānaṃ pāyetvā matte samāne pādesu gāhāpetvā sinerupabbatapāde khipāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:1418_1: tattha devānaṃ pāricchattako viya cittapāṭali nāma kappaṭṭhiyarukkho hoti.
atk-s0513a1:1418_2: Te cittapāṭaliyā pupphitāya jānanti “nāyaṃ amhākaṃ devaloko,
atk-s0513a1:1418_4: Atha te “jarasakko amhe matte katvā mahāsamuddapiṭṭhe khipitvā amhākaṃ devanagaraṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0513a1:1418_5: te mayaṃ tena saddhiṃ yujjhitvā amhākaṃ devanagarameva gaṇhissāmā”ti kipillikā viya thambhaṃ sineruṃ anusañcaramānā uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1418_6: Sakko “asurā kira uṭṭhitā”ti sutvā samuddapiṭṭheyeva abbhuggantvā yujjhamāno tehi parājito diyaḍḍhayojanasatikena
atk-s0513a1:1418_8: Athassa ratho samuddapiṭṭhena vegena gacchanto simbalivanaṃ pakkhanto,
atk-s0513a1:1418_9: tassa gamanamagge simbalivanaṃ naḷavanaṃ viya chijjitvā chijjitvā samuddapiṭṭhe patati.
atk-s0513a1:1418_14: tumhākaṃ rathavegena vicuṇṇite simbalivane patante supaṇṇapotakā maraṇabhayatajjitā ekaviravaṃ viravantī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1419_2: na mayaṃ issariyaṃ nissāya pāṇavadhakammaṃ karoma,
atk-s0513a1:1419_3: etesaṃ pana atthāya mayaṃ jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā asurānaṃ dassāma,
atk-s0513a1:1422_0: Kāmaṃ cajāma asuresu pāṇaṃ, māme dijā vikulāvā ahesu”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1423_2: Simbalisminti passa ete simbalirukkhe olambantā ṭhitāti dasseti.
atk-s0513a1:1423_3: Īsāmukhena parivajjayassūti ete etassa rathassa īsāmukhena yathā na haññanti,
atk-s0513a1:1423_5: Kāmaṃ cajāma asuresu pāṇanti yadi amhesu asurānaṃ pāṇaṃ cajantesu etesaṃ sotthi hoti,
atk-s0513a1:1423_6: kāmaṃ cajāma ekaṃseneva mayaṃ asuresu amhākaṃ pāṇaṃ cajāma.
atk-s0513a1:1423_7: Māme dijā vikulāvā ahesunti ime pana dijā ime garuḷapotakā viddhastavicuṇṇitakulāvakatāya vikulāvā mā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1423_8: mā amhākaṃ dukkhaṃ etesaṃ upari khipa,
atk-s0513a1:1423_10: Mātalisaṅgāhako tassa vacanaṃ sutvā rathaṃ nivattetvā aññena maggena devalokābhimukhaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1423_11: Asurā pana taṃ nivattayamānameva disvā “addhā aññehipi cakkavāḷehi sakkā āgacchanti,
atk-s0513a1:1423_12: balaṃ labhitvā ratho nivatto bhavissatī”ti maraṇabhayabhītā palāyitvā asurabhavanameva pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1424_0: Sakkopi devanagaraṃ pavisitvā dvīsu devalokesu devagaṇena parivuto nagaramajjhe aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1424_1: Tasmiṃ khaṇe pathaviṃ bhinditvā yojanasahassubbedho vejayantapāsādo uṭṭhahi.
atk-s0513a1:1424_3: Atha sakko puna asurānaṃ anāgamanatthāya pañcasu ṭhānesu ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:1426_0: Uragakaroṭipayassa ca hārī, madanayutā caturo ca mahantā”ti. ;
atk-s0513a1:1427_0: Dve nagarānipi yuddhena gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya ayujjhapurāni nāma jātāni devanagarañca asuranagarañca.
atk-s0513a1:1427_2: atha devehi palāyitvā devanagaraṃ pavisitvā dvāre pihite asurānaṃ satasahassampi kiñci kātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0513a1:1427_4: atha asurehi palāyitvā asuranagaraṃ pavisitvā dvāre pihite sakkānaṃ satasahassampi kiñci kātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0513a1:1427_5: Iti imāni dve nagarāni ayujjhapurāni nāma.
atk-s0513a1:1427_6: Tesaṃ antarā etesu uragādīsu pañcasu ṭhānesu sakkena ārakkhā ṭhapitā.
atk-s0513a1:1427_10: tasmā sinerussa paṭhamālinde tesaṃ ārakkhā. Karoṭi-
atk-s0513a1:1427_23: Caturo ca mahantāti cattāro mahārājāno vuttā,
atk-s0513a1:1427_25: Tasmā yadi asurā kupitā āvilacittā devapuraṃ upayanti,
atk-s0513a1:1428_0: Imesu pana pañcasu ṭhānesu ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā sakke devānaminde dibbasampattiṃ anubhavamāne sudhammā cavitvā tasseva pādaparicārikā hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0513a1:1428_1: kaṇṇikāya dinnanissandena cassā pañcayojanasatikā sudhammā nāma devasabhā udapādi,
atk-s0513a1:1428_2: yattha dibbasetacchattassa heṭṭhā yojanappamāṇe kañcanapallaṅke nisinno sakko devānamindo devamanussānaṃ kattabbakiccāni karoti.
atk-s0513a1:1428_3: Cittāpi cavitvā tasseva pādaparicārikā hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0513a1:1428_4: uyyānassa karaṇanissandena cassā cittalatāvanaṃ nāma uyyānaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:1428_5: Nandāpi cavitvā tasseva pādaparicārikā hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0513a1:1428_6: pokkharaṇiyā nissandena cassā nandā nāma pokkharaṇī udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:1429_0: Sujā pana kusalakammassa akatattā ekasmiṃ araññe kandarāya bakasakuṇikā hutvā nibbattā.
atk-s0513a1:1429_2: kattha nu kho nibbattā”ti āvajjento taṃ disvā tattha gantvā taṃ ādāya devalokaṃ āgantvā tassā ramaṇīyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1429_3: devanagaraṃ sudhammaṃ devasabhaṃ cittalatāvanaṃ nandāpokkharaṇiñca dassetvā “etā kusalaṃ katvā mayhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1429_5: tvaṃ pana kusalaṃ akatvā tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattā,
atk-s0513a1:1429_6: ito paṭṭhāya sīlaṃ rakkhāhī”ti taṃ ovaditvā pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā tattheva netvā vissajjesi.
atk-s0513a1:1429_8: Sakko katipāhaccayena “sakkā nu kho sīlaṃ rakkhitu”nti gantvā maccharūpena uttāno hutvā purato nipajji,
atk-s0513a1:1429_14: Sā tato cutā bārāṇasiyaṃ kumbhakāragehe nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:1430_0: Sakko “kahaṃ nu kho nibbattā”ti tattha nibbattabhāvaṃ ñatvā suvaṇṇaeḷālukānaṃ yānakaṃ pūretvā majjhe
atk-s0513a1:1430_12: Sujā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “mayhaṃ ānītaṃ bhavissatī”ti cintetvā gantvā taṃ “dehi,
atk-s0513a1:1430_16: “Idaṃ mayā tuyhameva atthāya ābhata”nti saddhiṃ yānakena gehadvāre ṭhapetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:1431_0: Sāpi yāvajīvaṃ sīlaṃ rakkhitvā tato cutā vepacittissa asurindassa dhītā hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0513a1:1431_2: So tassā vayappattakāle “mayhaṃ dhītā attano cittarucitaṃ sāmikaṃ gaṇhatū”ti asure sannipātesi.
atk-s0513a1:1431_3: Sakko “kahaṃ nu kho sā nibbattā”ti olokento tattha nibbattabhāvaṃ ñatvā “sujā cittarucitaṃ sāmikaṃ gaṇhantī
atk-s0513a1:1431_4: maṃ gaṇhissatī”ti asuravaṇṇaṃ māpetvā tattha agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1431_5: Sujaṃ alaṅkaritvā sannipātaṭṭhānaṃ ānetvā “cittarucitaṃ sāmikaṃ gaṇhā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1431_6: Sā olokentī sakkaṃ disvā pubbepi sinehavasena uppannapemena mahoghena viya ajjhotthaṭahadayā hutvā “ayaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1431_7: me sāmiko”ti vatvā tassa upari pupphadāmaṃ khipitvā aggahesi.
atk-s0513a1:1431_8: Asurā “amhākaṃ rājā ettakaṃ kālaṃ dhītu anucchavikaṃ alabhitvā idāni labhati,
atk-s0513a1:1431_9: ayamevassā dhītu pitāmahato mahallako anucchaviko”ti lajjamānā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1431_10: So taṃ devanagaraṃ ānetvā aḍḍhateyyānaṃ nāṭikākoṭīnaṃ jeṭṭhikaṃ katvā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1432_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “evaṃ bhikkhu pubbe paṇḍitā devanagare rajjaṃ kārayamānā attano jīvitaṃ pariccajantāpi pāṇātipātaṃ na kariṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1432_1: tvaṃ nāma evarūpe niyyānike sāsane pabbajitvā aparissāvitaṃ sapāṇakaṃ udakaṃ pivissasī”ti taṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0513a1:1436_0: Rudaṃ manuññanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ bahubhaṇḍikaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1436_2: Satthā taṃ bhikkhuṃ “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu bahubhaṇḍo”ti pucchi. “Āma,
atk-s0513a1:1436_5: So ettakaṃ sutvāva kuddho nivāsanapārupanaṃ chaḍḍetvā “iminā dāni nīhārena vicarāmī”ti satthu purato naggo aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1436_8: Bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ sannisinnā “satthu nāma purato evarūpaṃ karissatī”ti tassa aguṇakathaṃ kathesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1436_11: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti bhikkhū pucchi. Bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1436_12: “so hi nāma bhikkhu tumhākaṃ purato catuparisamajjhe hirottappaṃ pahāya gāmadārako viya naggo ṭhatvā
atk-s0513a1:1436_13: manussehi jigucchiyamāno hīnāyāvattitvā sāsanā parihīno”ti tassa aguṇakathāya nisinnāmhāti.
atk-s0513a1:1436_16: idāneva so bhikkhu hirottappābhāvena ratanasāsanā parihīno,
atk-s0513a1:1436_17: pubbe itthiratanapaṭilābhatopi parihīnoyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1437_0: Atīte paṭhamakappe catuppadā sīhaṃ rājānaṃ akaṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1437_3: Tassa pana suvaṇṇahaṃsarājassa dhītā haṃsapotikā abhirūpā ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1437_6: Haṃsarājā tassā varaṃ datvā himavante sabbe sakuṇe sannipātāpesi,
atk-s0513a1:1437_7: nānappakārā haṃsamorādayo sakuṇagaṇā samāgantvā ekasmiṃ mahante pāsāṇatale sannipatiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1437_8: Haṃsarājā “attano cittarucitaṃ sāmikaṃ āgantvā gaṇhātū”ti dhītaraṃ pakkosāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:1437_9: Sā sakuṇasaṅghaṃ olokentī maṇivaṇṇagīvaṃ citrapekhuṇaṃ moraṃ disvā “ayaṃ me sāmiko hotū”ti ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:1437_11: ayaṃ rājadhītā ettakānaṃ sakuṇānaṃ majjhe sāmikaṃ rocentī tayi ruciṃ uppādesī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1437_12: Moro “ajjāpi tāva me balaṃ na passatī”ti atituṭṭhiyā hirottappaṃ bhinditvā tāva mahato sakuṇasaṅghassa majjhe pakkhe pasāretvā naccituṃ ārabhi,
atk-s0513a1:1438_0: Suvaṇṇahaṃsarājā lajjito “imassa neva ajjhattasamuṭṭhānā hirī atthi,
atk-s0513a1:1438_2: nāssa bhinnahirottappassa mama dhītaraṃ dassāmī”ti sakuṇasaṅghamajjhe imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1440_0: “Rudaṃ manuññaṃ rucirā ca piṭṭhi, veḷuriyavaṇṇūpanibhā ca gīvā;
atk-s0513a1:1441_0: Byāmamattāni ca pekhuṇāni, naccena te dhītaraṃ no dadāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1442_5: Rucirā ca piṭṭhīti piṭṭhipi te citrā ceva sobhanā ca.
atk-s0513a1:1442_9: Naccena te dhītaraṃ no dadāmīti hirottappaṃ bhinditvā naccitabhāveneva te evarūpassa nillajjassa dhītaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:1442_10: no dadāmīti vatvā haṃsarājā tasmiṃyeva parisamajjhe attano bhāgineyyassa haṃsapotakassa dhītaraṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1442_11: Moro haṃsapotikaṃ alabhitvā lajjitvā tatova uppatitvā palāyi.
atk-s0513a1:1443_2: idāneva esa hirottappaṃ bhinditvā ratanasāsanā parihīno,
atk-s0513a1:1443_3: pubbepi itthiratanapaṭilābhato parihīnoyevā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1447_0: Sammodamānāti idaṃ satthā kapilavatthuṃ upanissāya nigrodhārāme viharanto cumbaṭakakalahaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1447_2: Tadā pana satthā ñātake āmantetvā “mahārājā ñātakānaṃ aññamaññaṃ viggaho nāma na yutto,
atk-s0513a1:1447_3: tiracchānagatāpi hi pubbe samaggakāle paccāmitte abhibhavitvā sotthiṃ pattā yadā vivādamāpannā,
atk-s0513a1:1447_4: tadā mahāvināsaṃ pattā”ti vatvā ñātirājakulehi āyācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1448_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto vaṭṭakayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā anekavaṭṭakasahassaparivāro araññe paṭivasati.
atk-s0513a1:1448_1: Tadā eko vaṭṭakaluddako tesaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā vaṭṭakavassitaṃ katvā tesaṃ sannipatitabhāvaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0513a1:1448_2: tesaṃ upari jālaṃ khipitvā pariyantesu maddanto sabbe ekato katvā pacchiṃ pūretvā gharaṃ gantvā te vikkiṇitvā
atk-s0513a1:1448_8: ito dāni paṭṭhāya etena tumhākaṃ upari jāle khittamatte ekeko ekekasmiṃ jālakkhike sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā jālaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1448_9: ukkhipitvā icchitaṭṭhānaṃ haritvā ekasmiṃ kaṇṭakagumbe pakkhipatha,
atk-s0513a1:1448_10: evaṃ sante heṭṭhā tena tena ṭhānena palāyissāmā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1448_12: Dutiyadivase upari jāle khitte te bodhisattena vuttanayeneva jālaṃ ukkhipitvā ekasmiṃ kaṇṭakagumbe khipitvā sayaṃ heṭṭhābhāgena tato tato palāyiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1448_13: Sākuṇikassa gumbato jālaṃ mocentasseva vikālo jāto,
atk-s0513a1:1449_1: Sopi yāva sūriyatthaṅgamanā jālameva mocento kiñci alabhitvā tucchahatthova gehaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0513a1:1449_2: Athassa bhariyā kujjhitvā “tvaṃ divase divase tucchahattho āgacchasi,
atk-s0513a1:1449_3: aññampi te bahi positabbaṭṭhānaṃ atthi maññe”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1449_6: apica kho pana te vaṭṭakā samaggā hutvā caranti,
atk-s0513a1:1449_7: mayā khittamatte jālaṃ ādāya kaṇṭakagumbe khipitvā gacchanti,
atk-s0513a1:1449_8: na kho panete sabbakālameva sammodamānā viharissanti,
atk-s0513a1:1449_11: tadā te sabbeva ādāya tava mukhaṃ hāsayamāno āgacchissāmī”ti vatvā bhariyāya imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1452_0: Yadā te vivadissanti, tadā ehinti me vasa”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1453_0: Tattha yadā te vivadissantīti yasmiṃ kāle te vaṭṭakā nānāladdhikā nānāgāhā hutvā vivadissanti,
atk-s0513a1:1453_2: Tadā ehinti me vasanti tasmiṃ kāle sabbepi te mama vasaṃ āgacchissanti.
atk-s0513a1:1453_3: Athāhaṃ te gahetvā tava mukhaṃ hāsento āgacchissāmīti bhariyaṃ samassāsesi.
atk-s0513a1:1454_0: Katipāhasseva pana accayena eko vaṭṭako gocarabhūmiṃ otaranto asallakkhetvā aññassa sīsaṃ akkami,
atk-s0513a1:1454_4: Te punappunaṃ kathentā “tvameva maññe jālaṃ ukkhipasī”ti aññamaññaṃ vivādaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1454_5: Tesu vivadantesu bodhisatto cintesi “vivādake sotthibhāvo nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:1454_9: mayā imasmiṃ ṭhāne na sakkā vasitu”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1454_10: So attano parisaṃ ādāya aññattha gato.
atk-s0513a1:1454_11: Sākuṇikopi kho katipāhaccayena āgantvā vaṭṭakavassitaṃ vassitvā tesaṃ sannipatitānaṃ upari jālaṃ khipi.
atk-s0513a1:1454_12: Atheko vaṭṭako “tuyhaṃ kira jālaṃ ukkhipantasseva matthake lomāni patitāni,
atk-s0513a1:1454_14: Aparo “tuyhaṃ kira jālaṃ ukkhipantasseva dvīsu pakkhesu pattāni patitāni,
atk-s0513a1:1454_17: tvaṃ ukkhipā”ti vadantānaññeva sākuṇiko jālaṃ ukkhipitvā sabbeva te ekato katvā pacchiṃ pūretvā bhariyaṃ hāsayamāno gehaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1455_0: Satthā “evaṃ mahārājā ñātakānaṃ kalaho nāma na yutto,
atk-s0513a1:1455_1: kalaho vināsamūlameva hotī”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1459_0: Na maṃ sītaṃ na maṃ uṇhanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto purāṇadutiyikāpalobhanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1459_1: Tadā hi satthā taṃ bhikkhuṃ “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti pucchi. “Saccaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1459_7: Atha naṃ satthā “bhikkhu esā itthī tava anatthakārikā,
atk-s0513a1:1459_8: pubbepi tvaṃ etaṃ nissāya maraṇaṃ pāpuṇanto maṃ āgamma maraṇā mutto”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1460_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa purohito ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1460_2: Atheko mahāmaccho rativasena attano macchiyā saddhiṃ kīḷamāno āgacchati.
atk-s0513a1:1460_3: Tassa sā macchī purato gacchamānā jālagandhaṃ ghāyitvā jālaṃ pariharamānā gatā.
atk-s0513a1:1460_4: So pana kāmagiddho lolamaccho jālakucchimeva paviṭṭho.
atk-s0513a1:1460_5: Kevaṭṭā tassa jālaṃ paviṭṭhabhāvaṃ ñatvā jālaṃ ukkhipitvā macchaṃ gahetvā amāretvāva vālikāpiṭṭhe khipitvā
atk-s0513a1:1460_8: Maccho “etaṃ aṅgāratāpanaṃ vā sūlavijjhanaṃ vā aññaṃ vā pana dukkhaṃ na maṃ kilameti,
atk-s0513a1:1460_9: yaṃ panesā macchī ‘aññaṃ so nūna ratiyā gato’ti mayi domanassaṃ āpajjati,
atk-s0513a1:1460_10: tameva maṃ bādhatī”ti paridevamāno imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1462_0: “Na maṃ sītaṃ na maṃ uṇhaṃ, na maṃ jālasmi bādhanaṃ;
atk-s0513a1:1463_0: Yañca maṃ maññate macchī, aññaṃ so ratiyā gato”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1464_0: Tattha na maṃ sītaṃ na maṃ uṇhanti macchānaṃ udakā nīhaṭakāle sītaṃ hoti,
atk-s0513a1:1464_2: tadubhayampi sandhāya “na maṃ sītaṃ na maṃ uṇhaṃ bādhatī”ti paridevati.
atk-s0513a1:1464_5: Na maṃ jālasmi bādhananti yampi me jālasmiṃ bādhanaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:1464_8: sā macchī mama jāle patitassa imehi kevaṭṭehi gahitabhāvaṃ ajānantī maṃ apassamānā “so maccho idāni aññaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1464_10: taṃ tassā domanassappattāya cintanaṃ maṃ bādhatīti vālikāpiṭṭhe nipanno paridevati.
atk-s0513a1:1465_0: Tasmiṃ samaye purohito dāsaparivuto nhānatthāya nadītīraṃ āgato.
atk-s0513a1:1465_2: Tenassa macchaparidevanaṃ sutvā etadahosi “ayaṃ maccho kilesavasena paridevati,
atk-s0513a1:1465_3: evaṃ āturacitto kho panesa mīyamāno nirayeyeva nibbattissati,
atk-s0513a1:1465_4: ahamassa avassayo bhavissāmī”ti kevaṭṭānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā “ambho tumhe amhākaṃ ekadivasampi byañjanatthāya macchaṃ na dethā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1465_10: Bodhisatto taṃ ubhohi hatthehi gahetvā nadītīre nisīditvā “ambho maccha,
atk-s0513a1:1465_13: idāni ito paṭṭhāya mā kilesavasiko ahosī”ti ovaditvā udake vissajjetvā nhatvā nagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:1466_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsesi,
atk-s0513a1:1466_4: maccho ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhu purohito pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
