atk-s0513a1:1470_0: Santi pakkhā apatanāti idaṃ satthā magadhesu cārikaṃ caramāno dāvagginibbānaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1470_1: Ekasmiñhi samaye satthā magadhesu cārikaṃ caramāno aññatarasmiṃ magadhagāmake piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1470_4: purato ca pacchato ca bahū bhikkhū dissanti,
atk-s0513a1:1470_5: sopi kho aggi ekadhūmo ekajālo hutvā avattharamāno āgacchateva.
atk-s0513a1:1470_7: tena daḍḍhaṭṭhānaṃ itaro aggi na ottharissatī”ti araṇisahitaṃ nīharitvā aggiṃ karonti.
atk-s0513a1:1470_13: sineruṃ nissāya ṭhitā sineruṃ apassantā viya sadevake loke aggapuggalaṃ attanā saddhiṃ gacchantameva
atk-s0513a1:1470_17: Te purato ca pacchato ca gacchantā sabbepi ekato hutvā dasabalassa santikaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1470_20: Āgantvā tathāgatassa ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ patvā tassa padesassa samantā soḷasakarīsamattaṭṭhānaṃ patto udake opilāpitatiṇukkā viya nibbāyi,
atk-s0513a1:1471_2: ayañhi nāma acetano aggi buddhānaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ avattharituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0513a1:1471_8: yaṃ imaṃ bhūmippadesaṃ patvā esa aggi nibbāyati.
atk-s0513a1:1471_10: Imasmiñhi padese sakalampi imaṃ kappaṃ aggi na jalissati,
atk-s0513a1:1471_12: Athāyasmā ānando satthu nisīdanatthāya catugguṇaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paññapesi,
atk-s0513a1:1471_18: taṃ no pākaṭaṃ karothā”ti bhikkhūhi āyācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1472_0: Atīte magadharaṭṭhe tasmiṃyeva padese bodhisatto vaṭṭakayoniyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā mātukucchito jāto
atk-s0513a1:1472_1: aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā nikkhantakāle mahāgeṇḍukappamāṇo vaṭṭakapotako ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1472_2: Atha naṃ mātāpitaro kulāvake nipajjāpetvā mukhatuṇḍakena gocaraṃ āharitvā posenti.
atk-s0513a1:1472_3: Tassa pakkhe pasāretvā ākāse gamanabalaṃ vā pāde ukkhipitvā thale gamanabalaṃ vā natthi.
atk-s0513a1:1472_4: Tañca padesaṃ saṃvacchare saṃvacchare dāvaggi gaṇhāti,
atk-s0513a1:1472_5: so tasmimpi samaye mahāravaṃ ravanto taṃ padesaṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0513a1:1472_6: sakuṇasaṅghā attano attano kulāvakehi nikkhamitvā maraṇabhayabhītā viravantā palāyanti,
atk-s0513a1:1472_7: bodhisattassapi mātāpitaro maraṇabhayabhītā bodhisattaṃ chaḍḍetvā palāyiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1472_8: Bodhisatto kulāvake nipannakova gīvaṃ ukkhipitvā avattharitvā āgacchantaṃ aggiṃ disvā cintesi “sace mayhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1472_13: Mātāpitaropi kho me maraṇabhayabhītā maṃ ekakaṃ pahāya attānaṃ parittāyantā palātā.
atk-s0513a1:1472_16: kiṃ nu kho ajja mayā kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1473_0: Athassa etadahosi “imasmiṃ loke sīlaguṇo nāma atthi,
atk-s0513a1:1473_2: atīte pāramiyo pūretvā bodhimūle nisīditvā abhisambuddhā sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttivimuttiñāṇadassanasampannā
atk-s0513a1:1473_3: saccānuddayakāruññakhantisamannāgatā sabbasattesu samappavattamettābhāvanā sabbaññubuddhā nāma atthi,
atk-s0513a1:1473_4: tehi ca paṭividdhā dhammaguṇā nāma atthi,
atk-s0513a1:1473_7: tasmā atīte buddhe ceva tehi paṭividdhaguṇe ca āvajjetvā mayi vijjamānaṃ saccasabhāvadhammaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:1473_8: saccakiriyaṃ katvā aggiṃ paṭikkamāpetvā ajja mayā attano ceva sesasakuṇānañca sotthibhāvaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1478_0: Atha bodhisatto atīte parinibbutānaṃ buddhānaṃ guṇe āvajjetvā attani vijjamānaṃ saccasabhāvaṃ ārabbha saccakiriyaṃ karonto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1482_0: Tattha santi pakkhā apatanāti mayhaṃ pakkhā nāma atthi upalabbhanti,
atk-s0513a1:1482_1: no ca kho sakkā etehi uppatituṃ ākāsena gantunti apatanā.
atk-s0513a1:1482_2: Santi pādā avañcanāti pādāpi me atthi,
atk-s0513a1:1482_3: tehi pana vañcituṃ padavāragamanena gantuṃ na sakkāti avañcanā.
atk-s0513a1:1482_4: Mātāpitā ca nikkhantāti ye ca maṃ aññattha neyyuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1483_4: mātāpitūnaṃ maṃ kulāvakeyeva chaḍḍetvā palātabhāvo ca sacco sabhāvabhūtoyeva, jātaveda,
atk-s0513a1:1483_5: etena saccena tvaṃ ito paṭikkamā”ti kulāvake nipannakova saccakiriyaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1483_6: Tassa saha saccakiriyāya soḷasakarīsamatte ṭhāne jātavedo paṭikkami.
atk-s0513a1:1483_7: Paṭikkamanto ca na jhāyamānova aññaṃ gato,
atk-s0513a1:1483_8: udake pana opilāpitā ukkā viya tattheva nibbāyi.
atk-s0513a1:1485_0: Vajjesi soḷasa karīsāni, udakaṃ patvā yathā sikhī”ti. ;
atk-s0513a1:1486_0: Taṃ pana ṭhānaṃ sakalepi imasmiṃ kappe agginā anabhibhavanīyattā kappaṭṭhiyapāṭihāriyaṃ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1486_1: Evaṃ bodhisatto saccakiriyaṃ katvā jīvitapariyosāne yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1487_2: imassa vanassa agginā anajjhottharaṇaṃ etarahi mayhaṃ balaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1487_3: porāṇaṃ panetaṃ vaṭṭapotakakāle mayhameva saccabala”nti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsesi.
atk-s0513a1:1491_0: Yaṃ nissitāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto daḍḍhapaṇṇasālaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1491_1: Eko kira bhikkhu satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā jetavanato nikkhamma kosalesu ekaṃ paccantagāmaṃ nissāya ekasmiṃ araññasenāsane vasati.
atk-s0513a1:1491_10: madditvā”ti evaṃ taṃ taṃ kammaṃ apadisantāyeva temāsaṃ vītināmesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1491_11: So bhikkhu temāsaṃ ajjhokāse dukkhaṃ vasanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ vaḍḍhetvā visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0513a1:1491_12: Pavāretvā pana satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:1491_13: Satthā tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā “kiṃ bhikkhu sukhena vassaṃvutthosi,
atk-s0513a1:1491_15: So taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhitvā “senāsanasappāyassa me abhāvena kammaṭṭhānaṃ matthakaṃ na patta”nti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1491_16: Satthā “pubbe bhikkhu tiracchānagatāpi attano sappāyāsappāyaṃ jāniṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1491_17: tvaṃ kasmā na aññāsī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1492_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto sakuṇayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā sakuṇasaṅghaparivuto
atk-s0513a1:1492_2: Athekadivasaṃ tassa rukkhassa sākhāsu aññamaññaṃ ghaṃsantīsu cuṇṇaṃ patati,
atk-s0513a1:1492_4: Taṃ disvā bodhisatto cintesi “imā dve sākhā evaṃ ghaṃsamānā aggiṃ vissajjessanti,
atk-s0513a1:1494_0: “Yaṃ nissitā jagatiruhaṃ vihaṅgamā, svāyaṃ aggiṃ pamuñcati;
atk-s0513a1:1495_0: Disā bhajatha vakkaṅgā, jātaṃ saraṇato bhaya”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1496_4: Disā bhajathāti imaṃ rukkhaṃ muñcitvā ito palāyantā catasso disā bhajatha.
atk-s0513a1:1496_6: Te hi uttamaṅgaṃ galaṃ kadāci kadāci vaṅkaṃ karonti,
atk-s0513a1:1496_8: Vaṅkā vā tesaṃ ubhosu passesu pakkhā jātāti vakkaṅgā.
atk-s0513a1:1496_9: Jātaṃ saraṇato bhayanti amhākaṃ avassayarukkhatoyeva bhayaṃ nibbattaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1497_0: Bodhisattassa vacanakarā paṇḍitasakuṇā tena saddhiṃ ekappahāreneva uppatitvā aññattha gatā.
atk-s0513a1:1497_2: te “evameva esa bindumatte udake kumbhīle passatī”ti tassa vacanaṃ aggahetvā tattheva vasiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1497_3: Tato na cirasseva bodhisattena cintitākāreneva aggi nibbattitvā taṃ rukkhaṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0513a1:1497_4: Dhūmesu ca jālāsu ca uṭṭhitāsu dhūmandhā sakuṇā aññattha gantuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1498_0: Satthā “evaṃ bhikkhu pubbe tiracchānagatāpi rukkhagge vasantā attano sappāyāsappāyaṃ jānanti,
atk-s0513a1:1498_1: tvaṃ kasmā na aññāsī”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsesi.
atk-s0513a1:1502_0: Ye vuḍḍhamapacāyantīti idaṃ satthā sāvatthiṃ gacchanto sāriputtattherassa senāsanapaṭibāhanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1502_1: Anāthapiṇḍikena hi vihāraṃ kāretvā dūte pesite satthā rājagahā nikkhamma vesāliṃ patvā tattha yathābhirantaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1502_3: Tena ca samayena chabbaggiyānaṃ antevāsikā purato purato gantvā therānaṃ senāsanesu aggahitesveva “idaṃ senāsanaṃ amhākaṃ upajjhāyassa,
atk-s0513a1:1502_6: Pacchā āgatā therā senāsanāni na labhanti.
atk-s0513a1:1502_7: Sāriputtattherassāpi antevāsikā therassa senāsanaṃ pariyesantā na labhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1502_8: Thero senāsanaṃ alabhanto satthu senāsanassa avidūre ekasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisajjāya ca caṅkamena ca rattiṃ vītināmesi.
atk-s0513a1:1502_16: Satthā therassa vacanaṃ sutvā “idāni tāva mayi jīvanteyeva bhikkhū aññamaññaṃ agāravā apatissā viharanti,
atk-s0513a1:1502_17: parinibbute kiṃ nu kho karissantī”ti āvajjentassa dhammasaṃvego udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:1503_0: So pabhātāya rattiyā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā bhikkhū pucchi “saccaṃ kira,
atk-s0513a1:1503_2: chabbaggiyā bhikkhū purato purato gantvā therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ senāsanaṃ paṭibāhantī”ti. “Saccaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1503_4: Tato chabbaggiye garahitvā dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi “ko nu kho,
atk-s0513a1:1503_19: Evaṃ tehi bhikkhūhi attano attano rucivasena aggāsanādirahānaṃ kathitakāle satthā āha – “na,
atk-s0513a1:1503_21: mayhaṃ sāsane aggāsanādīni patvā khattiyakulā pabbajito pamāṇaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1503_30: imasmiṃ sāsane yathāvuḍḍhaṃ abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ kātabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1503_36: sāriputto mayhaṃ aggasāvako anudhammacakkappavattako mamānantaraṃ senāsanaṃ laddhuṃ arahati,
atk-s0513a1:1503_37: so imaṃ rattiṃ senāsanaṃ alabhanto rukkhamūle vītināmesi,
atk-s0513a1:1503_39: gacchante gacchante kāle kinti katvā viharissathā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1503_43: yaṃ mayaṃ aññamaññaṃ agāravā apatissā asabhāgavuttino vihareyyāma,
atk-s0513a1:1503_44: amhesu mahallakataraṃ jānitvā tassa abhivādanādīni karissāmā’ti sādhukaṃ vīmaṃsitvā ‘ayaṃ no mahallako’ti
atk-s0513a1:1503_45: ñatvā tassa abhivādanādīni katvā devapathaṃ pūrayamānā gatā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1504_0: Atīte himavantappadese ekaṃ mahānigrodhaṃ upanissāya tayo sahāyā vihariṃsu – tittiro, makkaṭo, hatthīti.
atk-s0513a1:1504_1: Te aññamaññaṃ agāravā apatissā asabhāgavuttino ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1504_2: Atha nesaṃ etadahosi “na yuttaṃ amhākaṃ evaṃ viharituṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1504_5: “Ko pana no mahallakataro”ti cintentā ekadivasaṃ “attheso upāyo”ti tayopi janā nigrodhamūle nisīditvā
atk-s0513a1:1504_6: tittiro ca makkaṭo ca hatthiṃ pucchiṃsu “samma hatthi,
atk-s0513a1:1504_7: tvaṃ imaṃ nigrodharukkhaṃ kīvappamāṇakālato paṭṭhāya jānāsī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:1504_9: ahaṃ taruṇapotakakāle imaṃ nigrodhagacchaṃ antarasatthīsu katvā gacchāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1504_10: avattharitvā ṭhitakāle ca pana me etassa aggasākhā nābhiṃ ghaṭṭeti,
atk-s0513a1:1504_11: evāhaṃ imaṃ gacchakālato paṭṭhāya jānāmī”ti puna ubhopi janā purimanayeneva makkaṭaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1504_12: So āha “ahaṃ sammā makkaṭacchāpako samāno bhūmiyaṃ nisīditvā gīvaṃ anukkhipitvāva imassa nigrodhapotakassa aggaṅkure khādāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1504_14: Atha itare ubhopi purimanayeneva tittiraṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1504_16: pubbe asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne mahānigrodharukkho ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:1504_17: ahaṃ tassa phalāni khāditvā imasmiṃ ṭhāne vaccaṃ pātesiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1505_0: Evaṃ vutte makkaṭo ca hatthī ca tittirapaṇḍitaṃ āhaṃsu “samma,
atk-s0513a1:1505_2: ito paṭṭhāya mayaṃ tava sakkāragarukāramānanavandanapūjanāni ceva abhivādanapaccuṭṭhānaañjalikammasāmīcikammāni ca karissāma,
atk-s0513a1:1505_4: tvaṃ pana ito paṭṭhāya amhākaṃ ovādānusāsaniṃ dadeyyāsī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1505_5: Tato paṭṭhāya tittiro tesaṃ ovādaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0513a1:1505_8: Te tayopi janā pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāya aññamaññaṃ sagāravā sappatissā sabhāgavuttino hutvā jīvitapariyosāne devalokaparāyaṇā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1505_9: Tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ samādānaṃ tittiriyaṃ brahmacariyaṃ nāma ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1506_3: tumhe evaṃ svākhāte dhammavinaye pabbajitvā kasmā aññamaññaṃ agāravā apatissā viharatha.
atk-s0513a1:1506_6: ito paṭṭhāya tumhākaṃ yathāvuḍḍhaṃ abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1506_8: na ito paṭṭhāya ca navakatarena vuḍḍhataro senāsanena paṭibāhitabbo,
atk-s0513a1:1506_10: āpattidukkaṭassāti evaṃ satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā abhisambuddho hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1509_0: Diṭṭheva dhamme pāsaṃsā, samparāye ca suggatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1510_6: Tesu guṇasampanno vayovuḍḍho imasmiṃ ṭhāne “vuḍḍho”ti adhippeto.
atk-s0513a1:1510_11: Samparāye ca suggatīti samparetabbe imaṃ lokaṃ hitvā gantabbe paralokepi tesaṃ sugatiyeva hotīti.
atk-s0513a1:1510_14: khattiyā vā hontu brāhmaṇā vā vessā vā suddā vā gahaṭṭhā vā pabbajitā vā tiracchānagatā vā,
atk-s0513a1:1510_15: ye keci sattā jeṭṭhāpacitikamme chekā kusalā guṇasampannānaṃ vayovuḍḍhānaṃ apacitiṃ karonti,
atk-s0513a1:1510_16: te imasmiñca attabhāve jeṭṭhāpacitikārakāti pasaṃsaṃ vaṇṇanaṃ thomanaṃ labhanti,
atk-s0513a1:1511_0: Evaṃ satthā jeṭṭhāpacitikammassa guṇaṃ kathetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1515_0: Nāccantaṃ nikatippaññoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto cīvaravaḍḍhakaṃ bhikkhu ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1515_1: Eko kira jetavanavāsiko bhikkhu yaṃkiñci cīvare kattabbaṃ chedanaghaṭṭanavicāraṇasibbanādikaṃ kammaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1515_6: Jiṇṇapilotikāsu hatthakammaṃ dassetvā suphassikaṃ manāpaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā rajanapariyosāne piṭṭhodakena
atk-s0513a1:1515_7: rajitvā saṅkhena ghaṃsitvā ujjalaṃ manuññaṃ katvā nikkhipati.
atk-s0513a1:1515_8: Cīvarakammaṃ kātuṃ ajānantā bhikkhū ahate sāṭake gahetvā tassa santikaṃ āgantvā “mayaṃ cīvaraṃ kātuṃ na jānāma,
atk-s0513a1:1515_12: ime sāṭake ṭhapetvā taṃ gaṇhitvā gacchathā”ti nīharitvā dasseti.
atk-s0513a1:1515_13: Te tassa vaṇṇasampattimeva disvā antaraṃ ajānantā “thira”nti saññāya ahatasāṭake cīvaravaḍḍhakassa datvā taṃ gaṇhitvā gacchanti.
atk-s0513a1:1515_14: Taṃ tehi thokaṃ kiliṭṭhakāle uṇhodakena dhoviyamānaṃ attano pakatiṃ dasseti,
atk-s0513a1:1515_17: Evaṃ āgatāgate pilotikāhi vañcento so bhikkhu sabbattha pākaṭo jāto.
atk-s0513a1:1516_1: tathā aññatarasmiṃ gāmakepi eko cīvaravaḍḍhako lokaṃ vañceti.
atk-s0513a1:1516_3: jetavane kira eko cīvaravaḍḍhako evaṃ lokaṃ vañcetī”ti ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1516_5: taṃ nagaravāsikaṃ vañcemī”ti pilotikacīvaraṃ atimanāpaṃ katvā surattaṃ rajitvā taṃ pārupitvā jetavanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1516_12: imāhaṃ tuyhaṃ datvā attanā kiṃ pārupissāmī”ti? “Bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1516_16: tayi pana evaṃ vadante kiṃ sakkā kātuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1516_17: gaṇhāhi na”nti tassa pilotikacīvaraṃ datvā ahatasāṭake ādāya taṃ vañcetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:1516_18: Jetavanavāsikopi taṃ cīvaraṃ pārupitvā katipāhaccayena uṇhodakena dhovanto jiṇṇapilotikabhāvaṃ disvā
atk-s0513a1:1516_19: lajjito “gāmavāsicīvaravaḍḍhakena kira jetavanavāsiko vañcito”ti tassa vañcitabhāvo saṅghamajjhe pākaṭo jāto.
atk-s0513a1:1517_0: Athekadivasaṃ bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ taṃ kathaṃ kathentā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1517_9: Na gāmavāsikenāpi idāneva esa jetavanavāsī cīvaravaḍḍhako vañcito,
atk-s0513a1:1518_0: Atīte ekasmiṃ araññāyatane bodhisatto aññataraṃ padumasaraṃ nissāya ṭhite varaṇarukkhe rukkhadevatā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:1518_1: Tadā aññatarasmiṃ nātimahante sare nidāghasamaye udakaṃ mandaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:1518_3: Atheko bako te macche disvā “ekena upāyena ime macche vañcetvā khādissāmī”ti gantvā udakapariyante cintento nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:1518_11: idānime macchā kiṃ nāma karissantī’ti tumhākaṃ cintento nisinnomhī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1518_14: ahaṃ vo ekekaṃ mukhatuṇḍakena gahetvā ekaṃ pañcavaṇṇapadumasañchannaṃ mahāsaraṃ netvā vissajjeyya”nti. “Ayya,
atk-s0513a1:1518_15: paṭhamakappikato paṭṭhāya macchānaṃ cintanakabako nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:1518_18: “Sace pana sarassa atthibhāvaṃ mayhaṃ na saddahatha,
atk-s0513a1:1518_19: ekaṃ macchaṃ mayā saddhiṃ saraṃ passituṃ pesethā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1518_20: Macchā tassa saddahitvā “ayaṃ jalepi thalepi samattho”ti ekaṃ kāḷamahāmacchaṃ adaṃsu “imaṃ gahetvā gacchathā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1518_21: So taṃ gahetvā netvā sare vissajjetvā sabbaṃ saraṃ dassetvā puna ānetvā tesaṃ macchānaṃ santike vissajjesi.
atk-s0513a1:1518_22: So tesaṃ macchānaṃ sarassa sampattiṃ vaṇṇesi.
atk-s0513a1:1518_23: Te tassa kathaṃ sutvā gantukāmā hutvā “sādhu, ayya,
atk-s0513a1:1519_0: Bako paṭhamaṃ taṃ kāḷamahāmacchameva gahetvā saratīraṃ netvā saraṃ dassetvā saratīre jāte varaṇarukkhe
atk-s0513a1:1519_1: nilīyitvā taṃ viṭapantare pakkhipitvā tuṇḍena vijjhanto jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā maṃsaṃ khāditvā kaṇṭake
atk-s0513a1:1519_4: añño āgacchatū”ti etenupāyena ekekaṃ gahetvā sabbe macche khāditvā puna āgato ekaṃ macchampi nāddasa.
atk-s0513a1:1519_8: mayā sabbete macchā netvā padumasañchanne mahāsare vissajjitā,
atk-s0513a1:1519_16: Kakkaṭako cintesi “imassa macche netvā sare vissajjanaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0513a1:1520_1: na kho tvaṃ suggahitaṃ gahetuṃ sakkhissasi,
atk-s0513a1:1520_3: sacāhaṃ aḷehi tava gīvaṃ gahetuṃ labhissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1520_4: tava gīvaṃ suggahitaṃ katvā tayā saddhiṃ gamissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1520_5: So taṃ “vañcetukāmo esa ma”nti ajānanto “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchi.
atk-s0513a1:1520_6: Kakkaṭako attano aḷehi kammārasaṇḍāsena viya tassa gīvaṃ suggahitaṃ katvā “idāni gacchā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1520_7: So taṃ netvā saraṃ dassetvā varaṇarukkhābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1520_12: na bhaginiputtosi vata me tva”nti vatvā “tvaṃ ‘esa maṃ ukkhipitvā vicaranto mayhaṃ dāso’ti saññaṃ karosi maññe,
atk-s0513a1:1520_14: yathā me te sabbe macchā khāditā,
atk-s0513a1:1520_16: Kakkaṭako “ete macchā attano bālatāya tayā khāditā,
atk-s0513a1:1520_17: ahaṃ pana te maṃ khādituṃ na dassāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1520_19: Tvañhi bālatāya mayā vañcitabhāvaṃ na jānāsi,
atk-s0513a1:1520_21: ahaṃ te sīsaṃ chinditvā bhūmiyaṃ khipissāmī”ti vatvā kammārasaṇḍāsena viya aḷehi tassa gīvaṃ nippīḷesi.
atk-s0513a1:1520_22: So vivaṭena mukhena akkhīhi assunā paggharantena maraṇabhayatajjito “sāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1520_26: So nivattitvā sarameva otaritvā kakkaṭakaṃ sarapariyante paṅkapiṭṭhe ṭhapesi,
atk-s0513a1:1520_27: kakkaṭako kattarikāya kumudanāḷaṃ kappento viya tassa gīvaṃ kappetvā udakaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:1521_0: Taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā varaṇarukkhe adhivatthā devatā sādhukāraṃ dadamānā vanaṃ unnādayamānā madhurassarena imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1525_2: nikatippañño vañcanapañño puggalo tāya nikatyā nikatiyā vañcanāya na accantaṃ sukhamedhati,
atk-s0513a1:1525_6: Nikatippaññoti kerāṭikabhāvaṃ sikkhitapañño pāpapuggalo attanā katassa pāpassa phalaṃ ārādheti paṭilabhati vindatīti attho. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0513a1:1525_9: evaṃ pāpapuggalo attanā katapāpato diṭṭhadhamme vā samparāye vā bhayaṃ ārādheti paṭilabhatīti imamatthaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1525_10: pakāsento mahāsatto vanaṃ unnādento dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0513a1:1526_3: atītepi vañcitoyevā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1530_0: Maññe sovaṇṇayo rāsīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sāriputtattherassa saddhivihārikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1530_1: So kira bhikkhu subbaco ahosi vacanakkhamo,
atk-s0513a1:1530_3: Athekaṃ samayaṃ thero satthāraṃ āpucchitvā cārikaṃ caranto dakkhiṇāgirijanapadaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1530_4: So bhikkhu tattha gatakāle mānatthaddho hutvā therassa vacanaṃ na karoti “āvuso,
atk-s0513a1:1530_5: idaṃ nāma karohī”ti vutte pana therassa paṭipakkho hoti.
atk-s0513a1:1530_7: So tattha cārikaṃ caritvā puna jetavanaṃ āgato.
atk-s0513a1:1530_8: So bhikkhu therassa jetavanavihāraṃ āgatakālato paṭṭhāya puna tādisova jāto.
atk-s0513a1:1530_10: mayhaṃ eko saddhivihāriko ekasmiṃ ṭhāne satena kītadāso viya hoti,
atk-s0513a1:1530_11: ekasmiṃ ṭhāne mānatthaddho hutvā ‘idaṃ nāma karohī’ti vutte paṭipakkho hotī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1530_15: pubbepesa ekaṃ ṭhānaṃ gato satena kītadāso viya hoti.
atk-s0513a1:1530_16: Ekaṃ ṭhānaṃ gato paṭipakkho paṭisattu hotī”ti vatvā therena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1531_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto ekasmiṃ kuṭumbiyakule paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a1:1531_4: So cintesi “ayaṃ itthī taruṇattā mamaccayena kañcideva purisaṃ gahetvā imaṃ dhanaṃ vināseyya,
atk-s0513a1:1531_6: yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ dhanaṃ pathavigataṃ kareyya”nti ghare nandaṃ nāma dāsaṃ gahetvā araññaṃ gantvā ekasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:1531_7: ṭhāne taṃ dhanaṃ nidahitvā tassa ācikkhitvā “tāta, nanda,
atk-s0513a1:1531_8: imaṃ dhanaṃ mamaccayena mayhaṃ puttassa ācikkheyyāsi,
atk-s0513a1:1531_9: mā ca naṃ pariccajasī”ti ovaditvā kālamakāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1532_2: tava pitā nandaṃ dāsaṃ gahetvā dhanaṃ nidhesi,
atk-s0513a1:1532_5: atthi kiñci mayhaṃ pitarā dhanaṃ nidahita”nti. “Āma, sāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1532_7: “Tena hi gacchāmā”ti kuddālapiṭakaṃ ādāya nidhiṭṭhānaṃ gantvā “kahaṃ mātula,
atk-s0513a1:1532_9: Nando āruyha dhanamatthake ṭhatvā dhanaṃ nissāya mānaṃ uppādetvā “are dāsiputta ceṭaka,
atk-s0513a1:1532_10: kuto te imasmiṃ ṭhāne dhana”nti kumāraṃ akkosati.
atk-s0513a1:1532_11: Kumāro tassa pharusavacanaṃ sutvā asuṇanto viya “tena hi gacchāmā”ti taṃ gahetvā paṭinivattitvā puna dve tayo divase atikkamitvā agamāsi,
atk-s0513a1:1532_13: Kumāro tena saddhiṃ pharusavacanaṃ avatvāva nivattitvā “ayaṃ dāso ito paṭṭhāya ‘dhanaṃ ācikkhissāmī’ti gacchati,
atk-s0513a1:1532_16: atthi kho pana me pitu sahāyo kuṭumbiko,
atk-s0513a1:1532_17: taṃ paṭipucchitvā jānissāmī”ti bodhisattassa santikaṃ gantvā sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā “kiṃ nu kho, tāta,
atk-s0513a1:1533_5: kiṃ akkosasī’ti ākaḍḍhitvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ bhinditvā kulasantakaṃ dhanaṃ nīharitvā dāsaṃ ukkhipāpetvā dhanaṃ āharā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1536_0: Yattha dāso āmajāto, ṭhito thullāni gajjatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1537_6: Sovaṇṇamālā cāti tuyhaṃ pitusantakā suvaṇṇamālā ca etthevāti maññāmi.
atk-s0513a1:1537_7: Nandako yattha dāsoti yasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhito nandako dāso.
atk-s0513a1:1537_9: ahaṃ vo dāsī”ti evaṃ dāsabyaṃ upagatāya āmadāsisaṅkhātāya dāsiyā putto.
atk-s0513a1:1537_10: Ṭhito thullāni gajjatīti “so yasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhito thullāni pharusavacanāni vadati,
atk-s0513a1:1537_12: evaṃ ahaṃ taṃ maññāmī”ti bodhisatto kumārassa dhanaggahaṇūpāyaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0513a1:1538_0: Kumāro bodhisattaṃ vanditvā gharaṃ gantvā nandaṃ ādāya nidhiṭṭhānaṃ gantvā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjitvā
atk-s0513a1:1538_1: taṃ dhanaṃ āharitvā kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapetvā bodhisattassa ovāde ṭhito dānādīni puññāni katvā jīvitapariyosāne
atk-s0513a1:1539_0: Satthā “pubbepesa evaṃsīloyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1543_0: Kāmaṃ patāmi nirayanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto anāthapiṇḍikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1543_1: Anāthapiṇḍiko hi vihārameva ārabbha catupaññāsakoṭidhanaṃ buddhasāsane pariccajitvā vikiritvā ṭhapetvā
atk-s0513a1:1543_2: tīṇi ratanāni aññattha ratanasaññameva anuppādetvā satthari jetavane viharante devasikaṃ tīṇi mahāupaṭṭhānāni gacchati.
atk-s0513a1:1543_7: Gacchanto ca “kiṃ nu kho ādāya āgatoti sāmaṇerā vā daharā vā hatthampi me olokeyyu”nti tucchahattho nāma na gatapubbo.
atk-s0513a1:1543_11: Evaṃ divase divase pariccajantassa panassa pariccāge pamāṇaṃ natthi.
atk-s0513a1:1544_0: Bahū vohārūpajīvinopissa hatthato paṇṇe āropetvā aṭṭhārasakoṭisaṅkhyaṃ dhanaṃ iṇaṃ gaṇhiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1544_2: Aññā panassa kulasantakā aṭṭhārasa koṭiyo nadītīre nidahitvā ṭhapitā aciravatodakena nadīkūle bhinne mahāsamuddaṃ paviṭṭhā,
atk-s0513a1:1544_3: tā yathāpihitalañchi tāva lohacāṭiyo aṇḍavakucchiyaṃ pavaṭṭantā vicaranti.
atk-s0513a1:1544_4: Gehe panassa pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ niccabhattaṃ nibaddhameva hoti.
atk-s0513a1:1544_5: Seṭṭhino hi gehaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa catumahāpathe khatapokkharaṇisadisaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1544_9: Sesabhikkhūnaṃ pana gacchantānañca āgacchantānañca pamāṇaṃ natthi.
atk-s0513a1:1544_11: tassa catutthe dvārakoṭṭhake ekā micchādiṭṭhikā devatā vasati,
atk-s0513a1:1544_12: sā sammāsambuddhe gehaṃ pavisante attano vimāne ṭhātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0513a1:1544_14: Asītimahātheresupi avasesattheresupi pavisantesu ca nikkhamantesu ca tatheva karoti.
atk-s0513a1:1544_15: Sā cintesi “samaṇe gotame ca sāvakesu cassa imaṃ gehaṃ pavisantesu mayhaṃ sukhaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:1544_16: niccakālaṃ otaritvā otaritvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhātuṃ na sakkhissāmi.
atk-s0513a1:1544_17: Yathā ime etaṃ gharaṃ na pavisanti,
atk-s0513a1:1544_19: Athekadivasaṃ sayanūpagatasseva mahākammantikassa santikaṃ gantvā obhāsaṃ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1544_20: “Ko etthā”ti ca vutte “ahaṃ catutthadvārakoṭṭhake nibbattadevatā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1544_23: attano pacchimakālaṃ anoloketvā dhanaṃ nīharitvā samaṇaṃ gotamaṃyeva pūjeti,
atk-s0513a1:1544_28: Yathā ca samaṇo gotamo sasāvako imaṃ gharaṃ na pavisati,
atk-s0513a1:1544_31: seṭṭhi dhanaṃ vissajjento niyyānike buddhasāsane vissajjeti,
atk-s0513a1:1544_32: so sace maṃ cūḷāyaṃ gahetvā vikkiṇissati,
atk-s0513a1:1544_35: Sā punekadivasaṃ seṭṭhino jeṭṭhaputtaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tatheva ovadi,
atk-s0513a1:1544_37: Seṭṭhinā pana saddhiṃ kathetuṃyeva na sakkoti.
atk-s0513a1:1545_0: Seṭṭhinopi nirantaraṃ dānaṃ dentassa vohāre akarontassa āye mandībhūte dhanaṃ parikkhayaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1545_1: Athassa anukkamena dāliddiyappattassa paribhogasāṭakasayanabhojanānipi purāṇasadisāni na bhaviṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1545_3: paṇītaṃ pana katvā dātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0513a1:1545_4: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ vanditvā nisinnaṃ satthā “dīyati pana te, gahapati,
atk-s0513a1:1545_10: Cittasmiñhi paṇīte buddhapaccekabuddhabuddhasāvakānaṃ dinnadānaṃ lūkhaṃ nāma na hoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0513a1:1545_12: Cittañhi paṇītaṃ kātuṃ sakkontassa dānaṃ lūkhaṃ nāma natthīti cetaṃ evaṃ veditabbaṃ –
atk-s0513a1:1547_0: Tathāgate vā sambuddhe, atha vā tassa sāvake. ;
atk-s0513a1:1549_0: Sukkhāya aloṇikāya ca, passa phalaṃ kummāsapiṇḍiyā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1550_1: tvaṃ tāva lūkhaṃ dānaṃ dadamāno aṭṭhannaṃ ariyapuggalānaṃ desi,
atk-s0513a1:1550_2: ahaṃ velāmakāle sakalajambudīpaṃ unnaṅgalaṃ katvā satta ratanāni dadamāno pañca mahānadiyo ekoghapuṇṇaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1550_3: katvā viya ca mahādānaṃ pavattayamāno tisaraṇagataṃ vā pañcasīlarakkhanakaṃ vā kañci nālatthaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1550_5: Tasmā ‘lūkhaṃ me dāna’nti mā cittaṃ saṅkocayitthā”ti evañca pana vatvā velāmasuttaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1551_0: Atha kho sā devatā issarakāle seṭṭhinā saddhiṃ kathetumpi asakkontī “idānāyaṃ duggatattā mama vacanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1551_1: gaṇhissatī”ti maññamānā aḍḍharattasamaye sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā obhāsaṃ pharitvā ākāse aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1551_10: samaṇassa te gotamassa sāsane bahuṃ dhanaṃ vippakiṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1551_11: so tvaṃ ativelaṃ dhanavissajjanena vā vaṇijjādikammānaṃ akaraṇena vā samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ nissāya duggato jāto,
atk-s0513a1:1551_17: ito paṭṭhāya pana sayañca samaṇassa gotamassa santikaṃ mā gamittha,
atk-s0513a1:1551_18: sāvakānañcassa imaṃ gharaṃ pavisituṃ mā adāsi,
atk-s0513a1:1551_19: samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ nivattitvāpi anolokento attano vohāre ca vaṇijjañca katvā kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapehī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1551_20: Atha naṃ so evamāha “ayaṃ tayā mayhaṃ dātabbaovādo”ti. “Āma, ayyā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1551_21: Tādisānaṃ devatānaṃ satenapi sahassenapi satasahassenapi akampanīyo ahaṃ dasabalena kato.
atk-s0513a1:1551_22: Mama hi saddhā sineru viya acalā suppatiṭṭhitā,
atk-s0513a1:1551_26: evarūpāya anācārāya dussīlāya kāḷakaṇṇiyā saddhiṃ tayā mama ekagehe vasanakiccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0513a1:1551_27: sīghaṃ mama gehā nikkhamitvā aññattha gacchāti.
atk-s0513a1:1552_0: Sā sotāpannassa ariyasāvakassa vacanaṃ sutvā ṭhātuṃ asakkontī attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā dārake hatthena gahetvā nikkhami.
atk-s0513a1:1552_1: Nikkhamitvā ca pana aññattha vasanaṭṭhānaṃ alabhamānā “seṭṭhiṃ khamāpetvā tattheva vasissāmī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0513a1:1552_2: nagarapariggāhakadevaputtassa santikaṃ gantvā taṃ vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1552_4: attano bālatāya anupadhāretvā anāthapiṇḍikena seṭṭhinā saddhiṃ kathesiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1552_6: maṃ seṭṭhissa santikaṃ netvā khamāpetvā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ me dethā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1552_7: “Kiṃ pana tayā seṭṭhi vutto”ti “ito paṭṭhāya buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ saṅghupaṭṭhānaṃ mā kari,
atk-s0513a1:1552_8: samaṇassa gotamassa gharappavesanaṃ mā adāsī”ti “evaṃ me vutto, sāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1552_11: “ahaṃ taṃ ādāya seṭṭhino santikaṃ gantuṃ na ussahāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1552_12: Sā tassa santikā saṅgahaṃ alabhitvā catunnaṃ mahārājānaṃ santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1553_0: Tehipi tatheva paṭikkhittā sakkaṃ devarājaṃ upasaṅkamitvā taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhitvā “ahaṃ, deva,
atk-s0513a1:1553_1: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ alabhamānā dārake hatthena gahetvā anāthā vicarāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1553_2: tumhākaṃ siriyā mayhaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ dāpethā”ti suṭṭhutaraṃ yāci.
atk-s0513a1:1553_5: ahampi taṃ nissāya seṭṭhinā saddhiṃ kathetuṃ na sakkomi,
atk-s0513a1:1553_6: ekaṃ pana te seṭṭhissa khamanūpāyaṃ kathessāmī”ti. “Sādhu, deva,
atk-s0513a1:1553_8: Mahāseṭṭhissa hatthato manussehi paṇṇe āropetvā aṭṭhārasakoṭisaṅkhyaṃ dhanaṃ gahitaṃ atthi,
atk-s0513a1:1553_9: tvaṃ tassa āyuttakavesaṃ gahetvā kañci ajānāpetvā tāni paṇṇāni ādāya katipayehi yakkhataruṇehi parivāritā ekena hatthena paṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1553_10: ekena lekhaniṃ gahetvā tesaṃ gehaṃ gantvā gehamajjhe ṭhitā attano yakkhānubhāvena te uttāsetvā “idaṃ tumhākaṃ iṇapaṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1553_11: amhākaṃ seṭṭhi attano issarakāle tumhe na kiñci āha,
atk-s0513a1:1553_13: tumhehi gahitakahāpaṇāni dethā”ti attano yakkhānubhāvaṃ dassetvā sabbāpi tā aṭṭhārasa hiraññakoṭiyo sādhetvā
atk-s0513a1:1553_14: seṭṭhissa tucchakoṭṭhake pūretvā aññaṃ aciravatinadītīre nidahitaṃ dhanaṃ nadīkūle bhinne samuddaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ atthi,
atk-s0513a1:1553_15: tampi attano ānubhāvena āharitvā tucchakoṭṭhake pūretvā,
atk-s0513a1:1553_16: aññampi asukaṭṭhāne nāma assāmikaṃ aṭṭhārasakoṭimattameva dhanaṃ atthi,
atk-s0513a1:1553_18: imāhi catupaññāsakoṭīhi imaṃ tucchakoṭṭhakapūrakaṃ daṇḍakammaṃ katvā mahāseṭṭhiṃ khamāpehīti.
atk-s0513a1:1554_1: devā”ti tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā vuttanayeneva sabbaṃ dhanaṃ āharitvā koṭṭhake pūretvā aḍḍharattasamaye
atk-s0513a1:1554_2: seṭṭhissa sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā obhāsaṃ pharitvā ākāse aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1554_3: “Ko eso”ti vutte “ahaṃ te mahāseṭṭhi catutthadvārakoṭṭhake adhivatthā andhabāladevatā,
atk-s0513a1:1554_4: mayā mahāmohamūḷhāya buddhaguṇe ajānitvā purimesu divasesu tumhehi saddhiṃ kiñci kathitaṃ atthi,
atk-s0513a1:1554_6: Sakkassa hi me devarājassa vacanena tumhākaṃ iṇaṃ sodhetvā aṭṭhārasa koṭiyo,
atk-s0513a1:1554_8: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne assāmikadhanassa aṭṭhārasa koṭiyoti catupaṇṇāsa koṭiyo āharitvā tucchakoṭṭhakapūraṇena daṇḍakammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1554_9: jetavanavihāraṃ ārabbha parikkhayaṃ gatadhanaṃ sabbaṃ sampiṇḍitaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1554_11: mayā aññāṇatāya kathitaṃ manasi akatvā khamatha mahāseṭṭhī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1555_0: Anāthapiṇḍiko tassā vacanaṃ sutvā cintesi “ayaṃ devatā ‘daṇḍakammañca me kata’nti vadati,
atk-s0513a1:1555_2: satthā imaṃ vinetvā attano guṇe jānāpessati,
atk-s0513a1:1555_9: So “sādhū”ti vatvā vibhātāya rattiyā pātova taṃ gahetvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā tāya katakammaṃ sabbaṃ tathāgatassa ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:1555_18: tadā bhadrameva passatī”ti vatvā imā dhammapade dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0513a1:1556_0: “Pāpopi passatī bhadraṃ, yāva pāpaṃ na paccati;
atk-s0513a1:1557_0: Yadā ca paccatī pāpaṃ, atha pāpo pāpāni passati.
atk-s0513a1:1558_0: “Bhadropi passatī pāpaṃ, yāva bhadraṃ na paccati;
atk-s0513a1:1559_0: Yadā ca paccatī bhadraṃ, atha bhadro bhadrāni passatī”ti. ;
atk-s0513a1:1560_0: Imāsañca pana gāthānaṃ pariyosāne sā devatā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1560_1: Sā cakkaṅkitesu satthu pādesu nipatitvā “mayā, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1560_2: rāgarattāya dosapaduṭṭhāya mohamūḷhāya avijjandhāya tumhākaṃ guṇe ajānantiyā pāpakaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1560_3: taṃ me khamathā”ti satthāraṃ khamāpetvā mahāseṭṭhimpi khamāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:1561_0: Tasmiṃ samaye anāthapiṇḍiko satthu purato attano guṇaṃ kathesi “bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1561_1: ayaṃ devatā ‘buddhupaṭṭhānādīni mā karohī’ti vārayamānāpi maṃ vāretuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0513a1:1561_2: ‘dānaṃ na dātabba’nti imāya vāriyamānopahaṃ dānaṃ adāsimeva, nūna esa, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1561_4: Satthā “tvaṃ khosi gahapati sotāpanno ariyasāvako acalasaddho visuddhadassano,
atk-s0513a1:1561_5: tuyhaṃ imāya appesakkhadevatāya vārentiyā avāritabhāvo na acchariyo.
atk-s0513a1:1561_6: Yaṃ pana pubbe paṇḍitā anuppanne buddhe aparipakkañāṇe ṭhitā kāmāvacarissarena mārena ākāse ṭhatvā ‘sace dānaṃ dassasi,
atk-s0513a1:1561_7: imasmiṃ niraye paccissasī’ti asītihatthagambhīraṃ aṅgārakāsuṃ dassetvā ‘mā dānaṃ adāsī’ti vāritāpi padumakaṇṇikāmajjhe ṭhatvā dānaṃ adaṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1561_8: idaṃ acchariya”nti vatvā anāthapiṇḍikena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1562_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto bārāṇasiseṭṭhissa kule nibbattitvā nānappakārehi
atk-s0513a1:1562_1: sukhūpakaraṇehi devakumāro viya saṃvaḍḍhiyamāno anukkamena viññutaṃ patvā soḷasavassakāleyeva sabbasippesu
atk-s0513a1:1562_3: So pitu accayena seṭṭhiṭṭhāne ṭhatvā catūsu nagaradvāresu catasso dānasālāyo,
atk-s0513a1:1562_5: attano nivesanadvāre ekanti cha dānasālāyo kāretvā mahādānaṃ deti,
atk-s0513a1:1563_0: Athekadivasaṃ pātarāsavelāya bodhisattassa nānaggarase manuññabhojane upanīyamāne eko paccekabuddho sattāhaccayena
atk-s0513a1:1563_1: nirodhā vuṭṭhāya bhikkhācāravelaṃ sallakkhetvā “ajja mayā bārāṇasiseṭṭhissa gehadvāraṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1563_2: nāgalatādantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā anotattadahe mukhadhovanaṃ katvā manosilātale ṭhito nivāsetvā vijjulatāsadisaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1563_3: kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā iddhimayamattikāpattaṃ ādāya ākāsenāgantvā bodhisattassa bhatte
atk-s0513a1:1563_5: Bodhisatto taṃ disvāva āsanā vuṭṭhāya nipaccakāraṃ dassetvā parikammakārakaṃ olokesi.
atk-s0513a1:1563_7: sāmī”ti ca vutte “ayyassa pattaṃ āharathā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:1563_8: Taṅkhaṇaññeva māro pāpimā vikampamāno uṭṭhāya “ayaṃ paccekabuddho ito sattame divase āhāraṃ labhi,
atk-s0513a1:1563_11: seṭṭhino ca dānantarāyaṃ karissāmī”ti taṅkhaṇaññeva āgantvā antaravatthumhi asītihatthamattaṃ aṅgārakāsuṃ nimmini.
atk-s0513a1:1563_12: Sā khadiraṅgārapuṇṇā sampajjalitā sajotibhūtā avīcimahānirayo viya khāyittha.
atk-s0513a1:1563_13: Taṃ pana māpetvā sayaṃ ākāse aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1563_14: Pattāharaṇatthāya gacchamāno puriso taṃ disvā mahābhayappatto nivatti.
atk-s0513a1:1563_17: Ayaṃ sāmi antaravatthumhi mahatī aṅgārakāsu sampajjalitā sajotibhūtāti.
atk-s0513a1:1563_18: Athañño athaññoti evaṃ āgatāgatā sabbepi bhayappattā vegena palāyiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1564_0: Bodhisatto cintesi “ajja mayhaṃ dānantarāyaṃ kātukāmo vasavattī māro uyyutto bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:1564_1: na kho pana jānāti mārasatena mārasahassenapi mayhaṃ akampiyabhāvaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1564_2: ajja dāni mayhaṃ vā mārassa vā balamahantataṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1564_3: ānubhāvamahantataṃ jānissāmī”ti taṃ yathāsajjitameva bhattapātiṃ sayaṃ ādāya gehā nikkhamma aṅgārakāsutaṭe
atk-s0513a1:1564_4: ṭhatvā ākāsaṃ ulloketvā māraṃ disvā “kosi tva”nti āha. “Ahaṃ, māro”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1564_7: “Tava dānassa antarāyakaraṇatthāya ca paccekabuddhassa ca jīvitanāsanatthāyā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1564_8: Bodhisatto “neva te ahaṃ attano dānassa antarāyaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1564_10: ajja dāni mayhaṃ vā tuyhaṃ vā balamahantataṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1564_12: paccekabuddha ahaṃ imissā aṅgārakāsuyā adhosīso patamānopi na nivattissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1564_13: kevalaṃ tumhe mayā dinnaṃ bhojanaṃ paṭiggaṇhathā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1568_1: paccekavarabuddha sacepahaṃ tumhākaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dento ekaṃseneva imaṃ nirayaṃ uddhaṃpādo avaṃsiro hutvā patāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1568_2: tathāpi yadidaṃ adānañca asīlañca ariyehi akattabbattā anariyehi ca kattabbattā “anariya”nti vuccati,
atk-s0513a1:1568_4: handa imaṃ mayā dīyamānaṃ piṇḍaṃ paṭiggaha paṭiggaṇhāhī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1569_0: Evaṃ vatvā bodhisatto daḷhasamādānena bhattapātiṃ gahetvā aṅgārakāsumatthakena pakkhanto,
atk-s0513a1:1569_1: tāvadeva asītihatthagambhīrāya aṅgārakāsuyā talato uparūparijātaṃ satapattapupphitaṃ ekaṃ mahāpadumaṃ uggantvā bodhisattassa pāde sampaṭicchi.
atk-s0513a1:1569_2: Tato mahātumbamattā reṇu uggantvā mahāsattassa muddhani ṭhatvā sakalasarīraṃ suvaṇṇacuṇṇasamokiṇṇamiva akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1569_3: So padumakaṇṇikāya ṭhatvā nānaggarasabhojanaṃ paccekabuddhassa patte patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:1569_4: So taṃ paṭiggahetvā anumodanaṃ katvā pattaṃ ākāse khipitvā passantasseva mahājanassa sayampi vehāsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1569_5: abbhuggantvā nānappakāraṃ valāhakapantiṃ maddamāno viya himavantameva gato.
atk-s0513a1:1569_6: Māropi parājito domanassaṃ patvā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva gato.
atk-s0513a1:1569_7: Bodhisatto pana padumakaṇṇikāya ṭhitakova mahājanassa dānasīlasaṃvaṇṇanena dhammaṃ desetvā mahājanena
atk-s0513a1:1569_8: parivuto attano nivesanameva pavisitvā yāvajīvaṃ dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1570_2: yaṃ tvaṃ evaṃ dassanasampanno etarahi devatāya na kampito,
atk-s0513a1:1570_3: pubbe paṇḍitehi katameva acchariya”nti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā paccekabuddho tattheva parinibbāyi,
atk-s0513a1:1570_4: māraṃ parājetvā padumakaṇṇikāya ṭhatvā paccekabuddhassa piṇḍapātadāyako bārāṇasiseṭṭhi pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1579_0: Yo atthakāmassāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto losakatissattheraṃ nāma ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1579_2: Kosalaraṭṭhe eko attano kulanāsako kevaṭṭaputtako alābhī bhikkhu.
atk-s0513a1:1579_3: So kira nibbattaṭṭhānetā cavitvā kosalaraṭṭhe ekasmiṃ kulasahassavāse kevaṭṭagāme ekissā kevaṭṭiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a1:1579_4: Tassa paṭisandhiggahaṇadivase taṃ kulasahassaṃ jālahatthaṃ nadiyañca taḷākādīsu ca macche pariyesantaṃ ekaṃ khuddakamacchampi nālattha.
atk-s0513a1:1579_5: Tato paṭṭhāya ca te kevaṭṭā parihāyantiyeva.
atk-s0513a1:1579_6: Tasmiñhi kucchigateyeva nesaṃ gāmo satta vāre agginā daḍḍho,
atk-s0513a1:1579_12: dve bhāgā homā”ti pañca pañca kulasatāni ekato ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1579_17: tampi dvidhāti evaṃ yāva tameva kulaṃ ekaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:1579_18: tāva vibhajitvā tesaṃ kāḷakaṇṇibhāvaṃ ñatvā pothetvā nikkaḍḍhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1580_0: Athassa mātā kicchena jīvamānā paripakke gabbhe ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vijāyi.
atk-s0513a1:1580_2: antoghaṭe padīpo viya tassa hadaye arahattassa upanissayo jalati.
atk-s0513a1:1580_3: Sā taṃ dārakaṃ paṭijaggitvā ādhāvitvā paridhāvitvā vicaraṇakāle ekamassa kapālakaṃ hatthe datvā “putta,
atk-s0513a1:1580_5: So tato paṭṭhāya ekakova hutvā tattha tattha bhikkhaṃ pariyesitvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne sayati,
atk-s0513a1:1580_9: So anukkamena sattavassiko hutvā ekasmiṃ gehadvāre ukkhalidhovanassa chaḍḍitaṭṭhāne kāko viya ekekaṃ bhattasitthaṃ uccinitvā khādati.
atk-s0513a1:1581_0: Atha naṃ dhammasenāpati sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya caramāno disvā “ayaṃ satto atikāruññappatto,
atk-s0513a1:1581_1: kataragāmavāsiko nu kho”ti tasmiṃ mettacittaṃ vaḍḍhetvā “ehi,
atk-s0513a1:1581_5: kahaṃ vā te mātāpitaro”ti pucchi. “Ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1581_7: mayhaṃ mātāpitaro maṃ nissāya ‘kilantamhā’ti maṃ chaḍḍetvā palātā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1581_13: Thero tassa khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ datvā taṃ vihāraṃ netvā sahattheneva nhāpetvā pabbājetvā paripuṇṇavassaṃ upasampādesi.
atk-s0513a1:1581_15: Tena kira asadisadānepi kucchipūro na laddhapubbo,
atk-s0513a1:1581_17: Tassa hi patte ekasmiṃyeva yāguuḷuṅke dinne patto samatittiko viya hutvā paññāyati.
atk-s0513a1:1581_18: Atha manussā “imassa patto pūro”ti heṭṭhā yāguṃ denti.
atk-s0513a1:1581_19: Tassa patte yāguṃ dānakāle manussānaṃ bhājane yāgu antaradhāyatītipi vadanti.
atk-s0513a1:1582_0: So aparena samayena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā aggaphale arahatte patiṭṭhitopi appalābhova ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1582_1: Athassa anupubbena āyusaṅkhāresu parihīnesu parinibbānadivaso sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a1:1582_2: Dhammasenāpati āvajjento tassa parinibbānabhāvaṃ ñatvā “ayaṃ losakatissatthero ajja parinibbāyissati,
atk-s0513a1:1582_3: ajja mayā etassa yāvadatthaṃ āhāraṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti taṃ ādāya sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:1582_4: Thero taṃ nissāya tāva bahumanussāya sāvatthiyā hatthaṃ pasāretvā vandanamattampi nālattha.
atk-s0513a1:1582_10: Taṃ gahetvā gatā losakatissattheraṃ asaritvā sayameva bhuñjiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1582_11: Atha therassa uṭṭhāya vihāraṃ gamanakāle losakatissatthero āgantvā theraṃ vandi,
atk-s0513a1:1582_18: idheva nisīdā”ti losakattheraṃ āsanasālāyaṃ nisīdāpetvā kosalarañño nivesanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1582_19: Rājā therassa pattaṃ gāhāpetvā “bhattassa akālo”ti pattapūraṃ catumadhuraṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:1582_21: tissa imaṃ catumadhuraṃ bhuñjā”ti vatvā pattaṃ gahetvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1582_22: So there gāravena lajjanto na paribhuñjati.
atk-s0513a1:1582_28: Athāyasmā losakatissatthero aggasāvake dhammasenāpatimhi pattaṃ gahetvā ṭhite catumadhuraṃ paribhuñji.
atk-s0513a1:1582_29: Taṃ therassa ariyiddhibalena parikkhayaṃ na agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1582_30: Tadā losakatissatthero yāvadatthaṃ udarapūraṃ katvā paribhuñji,
atk-s0513a1:1582_31: taṃ divasaṃyeva ca anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0513a1:1583_2: evarūpena nāma appapuññena appalābhinā kathaṃ ariyadhammo laddho”ti kathentā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1583_9: eso bhikkhu attano alābhibhāvañca ariyadhammalābhibhāvañca attanāva akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1583_10: Ayañhi pubbe paresaṃ lābhantarāyaṃ katvā appalābhī jāto, “aniccaṃ, dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1583_11: anattā”ti vipassanāya yuttabhāvassa balena ariyadhammalābhī jāto”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1584_0: Atīte kira kassapasammāsambuddhakāle aññataro bhikkhu ekaṃ kuṭumbikaṃ nissāya gāmakāvāse vasati pakatatto sīlavā vipassanāya yuttappayutto.
atk-s0513a1:1584_1: Atheko khīṇāsavatthero samavattavāsaṃ vasamāno anupubbena tassa bhikkhuno upaṭṭhākakuṭumbikassa vasanagāmaṃ sampatto.
atk-s0513a1:1584_2: Kuṭumbiko therassa iriyāpatheyeva pasīditvā pattaṃ ādāya gharaṃ pavesetvā sakkaccaṃ bhojetvā thokaṃ dhammakathaṃ sutvā theraṃ vanditvā “bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1584_5: Thero vihāraṃ gantvā nevāsikattheraṃ vanditvā āpucchitvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:1584_6: Sopi tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā “laddho te, āvuso,
atk-s0513a1:1584_11: Evañca pana vatvā attano senāsanaṃ pucchitvā paṭijaggitvā pattacīvaraṃ paṭisāmetvā jhānasukhena phalasukhena ca vītināmento nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:1585_0: Sopi kuṭumbiko sāyanhe gandhamālañceva padīpeyyañca gāhāpetvā vihāraṃ gantvā nevāsikattheraṃ vanditvā “bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1585_5: So tassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno dhammakathaṃ sutvā sītalavelāya cetiyañca bodhiñca
atk-s0513a1:1585_6: pūjetvā dīpe jāletvā ubhopi jane nimantetvā gato.
atk-s0513a1:1585_9: na maṃ esa kismiñci gaṇayissatī”ti there anattamanataṃ āpajjitvā “imasmiṃ vihāre etassa avasanākāro mayā
atk-s0513a1:1585_10: kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti tena upaṭṭhānavelāya āgatena saddhiṃ kiñci na kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1585_11: Khīṇāsavatthero tassa ajjhāsayaṃ jānitvā “ayaṃ thero mama kule vā gaṇe vā apalibuddhabhāvaṃ na jānātī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1585_12: attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā jhānasukhena phalasukhena vītināmesi.
atk-s0513a1:1586_0: Nevāsikopi punadivase nakhapiṭṭhena gaṇḍiṃ paharitvā nakhena dvāraṃ ākoṭetvā kuṭumbikassa gehaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1586_1: So tassa pattaṃ gahetvā paññattāsane nisīdāpetvā “āgantukatthero kahaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1586_4: gaṇḍiṃ paharantopi dvāraṃ ākoṭentopi pabodhetuṃ nāsakkhiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1586_5: hiyyo tava gehe paṇītabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā jīrāpetuṃ asakkonto idāni niddaṃ okkantoyeva bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:1586_6: tvaṃ pasīdamāno evarūpesuyeva ṭhānesu pasīdasī”ti āha –
atk-s0513a1:1586_7: “khīṇāsavattheropi attano bhikkhācāravelaṃ sallakkhetvā sarīraṃ paṭijaggitvā pattacīvaramādāya ākāse uppatitvā aññattha agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1586_8: So kuṭumbiko nevāsikattheraṃ sappimadhusakkharābhisaṅkhataṃ pāyāsaṃ pāyetvā pattaṃ gandhacuṇṇehi ubbaṭṭetvā puna pūretvā “bhante,
atk-s0513a1:1586_11: Itaro apaṭikkhipitvāva gahetvā gacchanto “sace so bhikkhu imaṃ pāyāsaṃ pivissati,
atk-s0513a1:1586_13: Sace panāhaṃ imaṃ pāyāsaṃ manussānaṃ dassāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1586_19: Kattha nu kho imaṃ chaḍḍeyya”nti upadhārento ekaṃ jhāmakkhettaṃ disvā aṅgāre viyūhitvā tattha pakkhipitvā
atk-s0513a1:1586_20: upari aṅgārehi paṭicchādetvā vihāraṃ gato taṃ bhikkhuṃ adisvā cintesi “addhā so bhikkhu khīṇāsavo mama
atk-s0513a1:1586_22: aho mayā udarahetu ayuttaṃ kata”nti tāvadevassa mahantaṃ domanassaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0513a1:1586_23: Tato paṭṭhāyeva ca manussapeto hutvā na cirasseva kālaṃ katvā niraye nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:1587_0: So bahūni vassasatasahassāni niraye paccitvā pakkāvasesena paṭipāṭiyā pañcajātisatesu yakkho hutvā ekadivasampi udarapūraṃ āhāraṃ na labhi.
atk-s0513a1:1587_4: sesakāle pana tena udarapūro āhāro nāma na laddhapubbo.
atk-s0513a1:1587_5: Sunakhayonito pana cavitvā kāsiraṭṭhe ekasmiṃ gāme duggatakule nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:1587_6: Tassa nibbattito paṭṭhāya taṃ kulaṃ paramaduggatameva jātaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:1587_9: Mātāpitaro chātakadukkhaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkontā “gaccha kāḷakaṇṇī”ti taṃ pothetvā nīhariṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1587_11: Tadā bodhisatto bārāṇasiyaṃ disāpāmokkho ācariyo hutvā pañca māṇavakasatāni sippaṃ vāceti.
atk-s0513a1:1587_12: Tadā bārāṇasivāsino duggatānaṃ paribbayaṃ datvā sippaṃ sikkhāpenti.
atk-s0513a1:1587_13: Ayampi mittavindako bodhisattassa santike sippaṃ sikkhati.
atk-s0513a1:1587_14: So pharuso anovādakkhamo taṃ taṃ paharanto vicarati,
atk-s0513a1:1588_0: Atha so māṇavakehi saddhiṃ bhaṇḍitvā ovādaṃ aggaṇhanto tato palāyitvā āhiṇḍanto ekaṃ paccantagāmaṃ patvā bhatiṃ katvā jīvati.
atk-s0513a1:1588_1: So tattha ekāya duggatitthiyā saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a1:1588_2: Sā taṃ nissāya dve dārake vijāyi.
atk-s0513a1:1588_3: Gāmavāsino “amhākaṃ susāsanaṃ dussāsanaṃ āroceyyāsī”ti mittavindakassa bhatiṃ datvā taṃ gāmadvāre kuṭikāya vasāpesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1588_4: Taṃ pana mittavindakaṃ nissāya te paccantagāmavāsino sattakkhattuṃ rājadaṇḍaṃ agamaṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1588_7: Te cintayiṃsu “amhākaṃ pubbe imassa mittavindakassa anāgamanakāle evarūpaṃ natthi,
atk-s0513a1:1588_8: idāni panassa āgatakālato paṭṭhāya parihāyāmā”ti taṃ pothetvā nīhariṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1589_0: So attano dārake gahetvā aññattha gacchanto ekaṃ amanussapariggahaṃ aṭaviṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:1589_1: Tatthassa amanussā dārake ca bhariyañca māretvā maṃsaṃ khādiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1589_2: So tato palāyitvā tato tato āhiṇḍanto ekaṃ gambhīraṃ nāma paṭṭanagāmaṃ nāvāvissajjanadivaseyeva patvā kammakārako hutvā nāvaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0513a1:1589_3: Nāvā samuddapiṭṭhe sattāhaṃ gantvā sattame divase samuddamajjhe ākoṭetvā ṭhapitā viya aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1589_6: Manussā tassekaṃ veḷukalāpaṃ datvā hatthe gahetvā samuddapiṭṭhe khipiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1589_8: Mittavindako veḷukalāpe nipajjitvā samuddapiṭṭhe gacchanto kassapasammāsambuddhakāle rakkhitasīlassa
atk-s0513a1:1589_9: phalena samuddapiṭṭhe ekasmiṃ phalikavimāne catasso devadhītaro paṭilabhitvā tāsaṃ santike sukhaṃ anubhavamāno
atk-s0513a1:1589_11: Tā pana vimānapetiyo sattāhaṃ sukhaṃ anubhavanti,
atk-s0513a1:1589_13: Sattāhaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavituṃ gacchamānā “yāva mayaṃ āgacchāma,
atk-s0513a1:1590_0: Mittavindako tāsaṃ gatakāle veḷukalāpe nipajjitvā purato gacchanto rajatavimāne aṭṭha devadhītaro labhi.
atk-s0513a1:1590_3: Tāsampi vacanaṃ akatvā parato gacchanto antaradīpake ekaṃ yakkhanagaraṃ addasa.
atk-s0513a1:1590_5: Mittavindako tassā yakkhinibhāvaṃ ajānanto “ajamaṃsaṃ khādissāmī”ti taṃ pāde aggahesi,
atk-s0513a1:1590_7: So tāya khitto samuddamatthakena gantvā bārāṇasiyaṃ parikhāpiṭṭhe ekasmiṃ kaṇṭakagumbamatthake patitvā pavaṭṭamāno bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1590_8: Tasmiñca samaye tasmiṃ parikhāpiṭṭhe rañño ajikā caramānā corā haranti.
atk-s0513a1:1590_10: Mittavindako pavaṭṭitvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhito tā ajikā disvā cintesi “ahaṃ samudde ekasmiṃ dīpake ajikaṃ pāde gahetvā tāya khitto idha patito.
atk-s0513a1:1590_11: Sace idāni ekaṃ ajikaṃ pāde gahessāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1590_12: sā maṃ parato samuddapiṭṭhe vimānadevatānaṃ santike khipissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1590_13: So evaṃ ayoniso manasikaritvā ajikaṃ pāde gaṇhi,
atk-s0513a1:1590_15: Ajikagopakā ito cito ca āgantvā taṃ gahetvā “ettakaṃ kālaṃ rājakule ajikakhādako esa coro”ti taṃ koṭṭetvā bandhitvā rañño santikaṃ nenti.
atk-s0513a1:1591_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe bodhisatto pañcasatamāṇavakaparivuto nagarā nikkhamma nhāyituṃ gacchanto mittavindakaṃ disvā sañjānitvā te manusse āha – “tātā,
atk-s0513a1:1591_10: tvaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ kahaṃ vasī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:1591_12: Bodhisatto “atthakāmānaṃ vacanaṃ akaronto evaṃ dukkhaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1593_0: “Yo atthakāmassa hitānukampino, ovajjamāno na karoti sāsanaṃ;
atk-s0513a1:1595_3: Na karoti sāsananti anusiṭṭhaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0513a1:1595_5: Mittako viya socatīti yathāyaṃ mittavindako ajikāya pādaṃ gahetvā socati kilamati,
atk-s0513a1:1595_6: evaṃ niccakālaṃ socatīti imāya gāthāya bodhisatto dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0513a1:1596_0: Evaṃ tena therena ettake addhāne tīsuyeva attabhāvesu kucchipūro laddhapubbo.
atk-s0513a1:1596_4: Evaṃ parassa lābhantarāyakaraṇaṃ nāma mahādosanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:1596_5: Tasmiṃ pana kāle sopi ācariyo mittavindakopi yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1597_2: attano appalābhibhāvañca ariyadhammalābhibhāvañca sayameva esa akāsī”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1601_0: Yo atthakāmassāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ lolabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1601_1: Tassa lolabhāvo navakanipāte kākajātake āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:1601_4: Atha naṃ satthā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu lolosī”ti pucchi. “Āma,
atk-s0513a1:1601_6: Satthā “pubbepi tvaṃ bhikkhu lolo lolakāraṇā jīvitakkhayaṃ patto,
atk-s0513a1:1601_7: paṇḍitāpi taṃ nissāya attano vasanaṭṭhānā parihīnā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1602_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto pārāvatayoniyaṃ nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:1602_1: Tadā bārāṇasivāsino puññakāmatāya tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne sakuṇānaṃ sukhavasanatthāya thusapacchiyo olambenti.
atk-s0513a1:1602_2: Bārāṇasiseṭṭhinopi bhattakārako attano mahānase ekaṃ thusapacchiṃ olambetvā ṭhapesi,
atk-s0513a1:1602_4: So pātova nikkhamitvā gocare caritvā sāyaṃ āgantvā tattha vasanto kālaṃ khepesi.
atk-s0513a1:1602_5: Athekadivasaṃ eko kāko mahānasamatthakena gacchanto ambilānambilamacchamaṃsānaṃ dhūpanavāsaṃ ghāyitvā
atk-s0513a1:1602_6: lobhaṃ uppādetvā “kaṃ nu kho nissāya imaṃ macchamaṃsaṃ labhissāmī”ti avidūre nisīditvā pariggaṇhanto
atk-s0513a1:1602_7: sāyaṃ bodhisattaṃ āgantvā mahānasaṃ pavisantaṃ disvā “imaṃ pārāvataṃ nissāya macchamaṃsaṃ labhissāmī”ti
atk-s0513a1:1602_8: punadivase pātova āgantvā bodhisattassa nikkhamitvā gocaratthāya gamanakāle piṭṭhito piṭṭhito agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1602_16: tumhākaṃ gocaraggahaṇakāle ahampi gocaraṃ gahetvā tumhehi saddhiṃyeva gamissāmī”ti. “Sādhu,
atk-s0513a1:1602_17: kevalaṃ te appamattena bhavitabba”nti evaṃ bodhisatto kākaṃ ovaditvā gocaraṃ caranto tiṇabījādīni khādati.
atk-s0513a1:1602_18: Bodhisattassa pana gocaraggahaṇakāle kāko gantvā gomayapiṇḍaṃ apanetvā pāṇake khāditvā udaraṃ pūretvā bodhisattassa santikaṃ āgantvā “sāmi,
atk-s0513a1:1602_20: atibahubhakkhena nāma bhavituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā bodhisattena gocaraṃ gahetvā sāyaṃ āgacchantena saddhiṃyeva mahānasaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:1602_21: Bhattakārako “amhākaṃ kapoto aññampi gahetvā āgato”ti kākassapi pacchiṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:1603_1: Taṃ ādāya bhattakārako mahānase tattha tattha olambesi.
atk-s0513a1:1603_2: Kāko taṃ disvā lobhaṃ uppādetvā “sve gocarabhūmiṃ agantvā mayā idameva khāditabba”nti rattiṃ nitthunanto nipajji.
atk-s0513a1:1603_7: kākānaṃ kucchirogo nāma na kadāci bhūtapubbo,
atk-s0513a1:1603_8: rattiṃ tīsu yāmesu ekekasmiṃ yāme mucchitā honti,
atk-s0513a1:1603_9: dīpavaṭṭiṃ gilitakāle pana nesaṃ muhuttaṃ titti hoti,
atk-s0513a1:1603_16: lobhavasaṃ agantvā appamatto hohī”ti taṃ ovaditvā bodhisatto gocarāya gato.
atk-s0513a1:1604_0: Bhattakārako nānappakāraṃ macchamaṃsavikatiṃ sampādetvā usumanikkhamanatthaṃ bhājanāni thokaṃ vivaritvā

atk-s0513a1:1604_2: Tasmiṃ khaṇe kāko pacchito sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā bhattagehaṃ olokento tassa nikkhantabhāvaṃ ñatvā “ayaṃdāni
atk-s0513a1:1604_3: mayhaṃ manorathaṃ pūretvā maṃsaṃ khādituṃ kālo,
atk-s0513a1:1604_5: udāhu cuṇṇikamaṃsa”nti cintetvā “cuṇṇikamaṃsena nāma khippaṃ kucchiṃ pūretuṃ na sakkā,

atk-s0513a1:1604_8: Bhattakārako taṃ saddaṃ sutvā “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti paviṭṭho kākaṃ disvā “ayaṃ duṭṭhakāko mahāseṭṭhino pakkamaṃsaṃ khāditukāmo,

atk-s0513a1:1607_0: “Yo atthakāmassa hitānukampino, ovajjamāno na karoti sāsanaṃ;
atk-s0513a1:1609_0: Tattha kapotakassa vacanaṃ akatvāti pārāvatassa hitānusāsanavacanaṃ akatvā.
atk-s0513a1:1609_1: Amittahatthatthagatova setīti amittānaṃ anatthakārakānaṃ dukkhuppādakapuggalānaṃ hatthatthaṃ hatthapathaṃ

atk-s0513a1:1610_0: Bodhisatto imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā “idāni mayā ca imasmiṃ ṭhāne na sakkā vasitu”nti aññattha gato.
atk-s0513a1:1610_2: Atha naṃ bhattakārako saddhiṃ pacchiyā gahetvā saṅkāraṭṭhāne chaḍḍesi.
atk-s0513a1:1611_2: tañca pana te lolyaṃ nissāya paṇḍitāpi sakāvāsā parihīnā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsesi,
atk-s0513a1:1615_0: Yo atthakāmassāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ dubbacabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.

atk-s0513a1:1616_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto kāsiraṭṭhe mahābhogakule nibbatto viññutaṃ patvā
atk-s0513a1:1616_1: kāmesu ādīnavaṃ nekkhamme cānisaṃsaṃ disvā kāme pahāya himavantaṃ pavisitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1616_2: katvā pañcābhiññā aṭṭha samāpattiyo ca uppādetvā jhānasukhena vītināmento aparabhāge mahāparivāro pañcahi
atk-s0513a1:1616_3: tāpasasatehi parivuto gaṇassa satthā hutvā vihāsi.
atk-s0513a1:1616_4: Atheko āsivisapotako attano dhammatāya caranto aññatarassa tāpasassa assamapadaṃ patto.
atk-s0513a1:1616_5: Tāpaso tasmiṃ puttasinehaṃ uppādetvā taṃ ekasmiṃ veḷupabbe sayāpetvā paṭijaggati.
atk-s0513a1:1616_7: Taṃ puttasinehena paṭijagganato tāpasassa “veḷukapitā”tveva nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1617_0: Tadā bodhisatto “eko kira tāpaso āsivisaṃ paṭijaggatī”ti sutvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ āsivisaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1617_1: paṭijaggasī”ti pucchitvā “sacca”nti vutte “āsivisena saddhiṃ vissāso nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:1617_8: Tato katipāhaccayeneva sabbe tāpasā phalāphalatthāya gantvā gataṭṭhāne phalāphalassa sulabhabhāvaṃ disvā dve tayo divase tattheva vasiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:1617_9: veḷukapitāpi tehi saddhiṃ gacchanto āsivisaṃ veḷupabbeyeva sayāpetvā pidahitvā gato.
atk-s0513a1:1617_10: So puna tāpasehi saddhiṃ dvīhatīhaccayena āgantvā “veḷukassa gocaraṃ dassāmī”ti veḷupabbaṃ ugghāṭetvā “ehi, puttaka,
atk-s0513a1:1617_12: Āsiviso dvīhatīhaṃ nirāhāratāya kujjhitvā pasāritahatthaṃ ḍaṃsitvā tāpasaṃ tattheva jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā araññaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:1617_14: Bodhisatto tassa sarīrakiccaṃ kāretvā isigaṇassa majjhe nisīditvā isīnaṃ ovādavasena imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1619_0: “Yo atthakāmassa hitānukampino, ovajjamāno na karoti sāsanaṃ;
atk-s0513a1:1620_0: Evaṃ so nihato seti, veḷukassa yathā pitā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1621_0: Tattha evaṃ so nihato setīti yo hi isīnaṃ ovādaṃ na gaṇhāti,
atk-s0513a1:1621_1: so yathā esa tāpaso āsivisamukhe pūtibhāvaṃ patvā nihato seti,

atk-s0513a1:1621_3: Evaṃ bodhisatto isigaṇaṃ ovaditvā cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā āyupariyosāne brahmaloke uppajji.
atk-s0513a1:1622_2: dubbacabhāveneva ca āsivisamukhe pūtibhāvaṃ patto”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1626_0: Seyyo amittoti idaṃ satthā magadhesu cārikaṃ caramāno aññatarasmiṃ gāmake bālagāmikamanusse ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1626_1: Tathāgato kira ekasmiṃ samaye sāvatthito magadharaṭṭhaṃ gantvā tattha cārikaṃ caramāno aññataraṃ gāmakaṃ sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a1:1626_2: So ca gāmako yebhuyyena andhabālamanussehiyeva ussanno.
atk-s0513a1:1626_4: amhe araññaṃ pavisitvā kammaṃ karonte makasā khādanti,
atk-s0513a1:1626_6: sabbeva dhanūni ceva āvudhāni ca ādāya gantvā makasehi saddhiṃ yujjhitvā sabbamakase vijjhitvā chinditvā
atk-s0513a1:1626_7: ca māressāmā”ti mantayitvā araññaṃ gantvā “makase vijjhissāmā”ti aññamaññaṃ vijjhitvā ca paharitvā ca
atk-s0513a1:1626_8: dukkhappattā āgantvā antogāme ca gāmamajjhe ca gāmadvāre ca nipajjiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1627_0: Satthā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto taṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:1627_1: Avasesā paṇḍitamanussā bhagavantaṃ disvā gāmadvāre maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā satthāraṃ vanditvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:1627_2: Satthā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne patitamanusse disvā te upāsake pucchi “bahū ime gilānā manussā,
atk-s0513a1:1627_4: ete manussā ‘makasayuddhaṃ karissāmā’ti gantvā aññamaññaṃ vijjhitvā sayaṃ gilānā jātā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1627_5: Satthā “na idāneva andhabālamanussā ‘makase paharissāmā’ti attānaṃ paharanti,
atk-s0513a1:1627_6: pubbepi ‘makasaṃ paharissāmā’ti paraṃ paharaṇakamanussā ahesuṃyevā”ti vatvā tehi manussehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1628_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto vaṇijjāya jīvikaṃ kappeti.
atk-s0513a1:1628_1: Tadā kāsiraṭṭhe ekasmiṃ paccantagāme bahū vaḍḍhakī vasanti.
atk-s0513a1:1628_3: athassa eko makaso tambalohathālakapiṭṭhisadise sīse nisīditvā sattiyā paharanto viya sīsaṃ mukhatuṇḍakena vijjhi.
atk-s0513a1:1628_4: So attano santike nisinnaṃ puttaṃ āha – “tāta,
atk-s0513a1:1628_5: mayhaṃ sīsaṃ makaso sattiyā paharanto viya vijjhati,
atk-s0513a1:1628_9: Tasmiṃ samaye bodhisattopi attano bhaṇḍaṃ pariyesamāno taṃ gāmaṃ patvā tassā vaḍḍhakisālāya nisinno hoti.
atk-s0513a1:1628_13: tātā”ti tikhiṇaṃ mahāpharasuṃ ukkhipitvā pitu piṭṭhipasse ṭhatvā “makasaṃ paharissāmī”ti pitu matthakaṃ dvidhā bhindi,
atk-s0513a1:1629_0: Bodhisatto tassa taṃ kammaṃ disvā “paccāmittopi paṇḍitova seyyo.
atk-s0513a1:1629_1: So hi daṇḍabhayenapi manusse na māressatī”ti cintetvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1631_0: “Seyyo amitto matiyā upeto, na tveva mitto mativippahīno;
atk-s0513a1:1632_0: ‘Makasaṃ vadhissa’nti hi eḷamūgo, putto pitu abbhidā uttamaṅga”nti.
atk-s0513a1:1633_3: Putto pitu abbhidā uttamaṅganti attano bālatāya puttopi hutvā pitu uttamaṅgaṃ matthakaṃ “makasaṃ paharissāmī”ti dvidhā bhindi.
atk-s0513a1:1633_4: Tasmā bālamittato paṇḍitaamittova seyyoti imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā bodhisatto uṭṭhāya yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:1634_0: Satthā “evaṃ upāsakā pubbepi ‘makasaṃ paharissāmā’ti paraṃ paharaṇakamanussā ahesuṃyevā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:1634_1: āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā gāthaṃ vatvā pakkanto paṇḍitavāṇijo pana ahameva
atk-s0513a1:1638_0: Seyyo amittotiidaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ anāthapiṇḍikaseṭṭhino dāsiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:1638_1: Anāthapiṇḍikassa kira ekā rohiṇī nāma dāsī ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:1638_2: Tassā vīhipaharaṇaṭṭhāne āgantvā mahallikā mātā nipajji,
atk-s0513a1:1638_3: taṃ makkhikā parivāretvā sūciyāvijjhamānā viya khādanti.
atk-s0513a1:1638_8: ammā”ti musalaṃ ukkhipitvā “mātu sarīre makkhikā māretvā vināsaṃ pāpessāmī”ti mātaraṃ musalena paharitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:1638_9: Taṃ disvā “mātā me matā”ti rodituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a1:1638_11: Seṭṭhi tassā sarīrakiccaṃ kāretvā vihāraṃ gantvā sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ satthu ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:1638_13: esā ‘mātu sarīre makkhikā māressāmī’ti idāneva musalena paharitvā mātaraṃ māresi,
atk-s0513a1:1638_14: pubbepi māresiyevā”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:1639_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto seṭṭhikule nibbattitvā pituaccayena seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a1:1639_2: Sāpi attano vīhipaharaṇaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā nipannaṃ mātaraṃ “makkhikā me, amma,
atk-s0513a1:1639_3: vārehī”ti vuttā evameva musalena paharitvā mātaraṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā rodituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a1:1639_4: Bodhisatto taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “amittopi hi imasmiṃ loke paṇḍitova seyyo”ti cintetvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:1642_0: Passa rohiṇikaṃ jammiṃ, mātaraṃ hantvāna socatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:1643_1: Yañce bālānukampakoti ettha yanti liṅgavipallāso kato,
atk-s0513a1:1643_4: tato sataguṇena sahassaguṇena paṇḍito amitto hontopi seyyoyevāti attho.
atk-s0513a1:1643_8: Mātaraṃ hantvāna socatīti “makkhikā māressāmī”ti mātaraṃ hantvā idāni ayaṃ bālā sayameva rodati paridevati.
atk-s0513a1:1643_9: Iminā kāraṇena imasmiṃ loke amittopi paṇḍito seyyoti bodhisatto paṇḍitaṃ pasaṃsanto imāya gāthāya dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0513a1:1644_2: pubbepi ghātesiyevā”ti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:1648_0: Na ve anatthakusalenāti idaṃ satthā aññatarasmiṃ kosalagāmake viharanto uyyānadūsakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
