atk-s0513a1:2102_5: imassāpi vipāko lokassa parihāyanakāle manussānaṃ parittāyukakāle bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:2102_7: asampattavayāva kumāriyo purisantaraṃ gantvā utuniyo ceva gabbhiniyo ca hutvā puttadhītāhi vaḍḍhissanti.
atk-s0513a1:2102_8: Khuddakarukkhānaṃ pupphaṃ viya hi tāsaṃ utunibhāvo,
atk-s0513a1:2103_4: Imassāpi vipāko anāgate eva manussānaṃ jeṭṭhāpacāyikakammassa naṭṭhakāle bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:2103_5: Anāgatasmiñhi sattā mātāpitūsu vā sassusasuresu vā lajjaṃ anupaṭṭhāpetvā sayameva kuṭumbaṃ saṃvidahantāva
atk-s0513a1:2103_8: Mahallakā anāthā asayaṃvasī dārake ārādhetvā jīvissanti tadahujātānaṃ vacchakānaṃ khīraṃ pivantiyo mahāgāviyo viya.
atk-s0513a1:2104_1: ārohapariṇāhasampanne mahāgoṇeyugaparamparāya ayojetvā taruṇe godamme dhure yojente addasaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2104_2: Te dhuraṃ vahituṃ asakkontā chaḍḍetvā aṭṭhaṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:2104_6: Imassāpi vipāko anāgate eva adhammikarājūnaṃ kāle bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:2104_7: Anāgatasmiñhi adhammikakapaṇarājāno paṇḍitānaṃ paveṇikusalānaṃ kammaṃ nittharaṇasamatthānaṃ mahāmattānaṃ yasaṃ na dassanti.
atk-s0513a1:2104_8: Dhammasabhāyaṃ vinicchayaṭṭhānepi paṇḍite vohārakusale mahallake amacce na ṭhapessanti,
atk-s0513a1:2104_11: te rājakammāni ceva yuttāyuttañca ajānantā neva taṃ yasaṃ ukkhipituṃ sakkhissanti,
atk-s0513a1:2104_14: mahallakāpi paṇḍitāmaccā yasaṃ alabhantā kiccāni nittharituṃ samatthāpi “kiṃ amhākaṃ etehi,
atk-s0513a1:2104_16: abbhantarikā taruṇadārakā jānissantī”ti uppannāni kammāni na karissanti,
atk-s0513a1:2104_17: evaṃ sabbathāpi tesaṃ rājūnaṃ hāniyeva bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:2104_18: dhuraṃ vahituṃ asamatthānaṃ vacchadammānaṃ dhure yojitakālo viya,
atk-s0513a1:2104_19: dhuravāhānañca mahāgoṇānaṃ yugaparamparāya ayojitakālo viya bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:2105_7: Anāgatasmiñhi adhammikā bālarājāno adhammike lolamanusse vinicchaye ṭhapessanti,
atk-s0513a1:2105_8: te pāpapuññesu anādarā bālā sabhāyaṃ nisīditvā vinicchayaṃ dentā ubhinnampi atthapaccatthikānaṃ hatthato
atk-s0513a1:2105_9: lañjaṃ gahetvā khādissanti asso viya dvīhi mukhehi yavasaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2106_1: mahājano satasahassagghanikaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ sammajjitvā “idha passāvaṃ karohī”ti ekassa jarasiṅgālassa upanāmesi,
atk-s0513a1:2106_6: Anāgatasmiñhi adhammikā vijātirājāno jātisampannānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ āsaṅkāya yasaṃ na dassanti,
atk-s0513a1:2106_10: Te ca kulīnapurisā jīvituṃ asakkontā “ime nissāya jīvissāmā”ti akulīnānaṃ dhītaro dassanti,
atk-s0513a1:2106_11: iti tāsaṃ kuladhītānaṃ akulīnehi saddhiṃ saṃvāso jarasiṅgālassa suvaṇṇapātiyaṃ passāvakaraṇasadiso bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:2107_1: eko puriso rajjuṃ vaṭṭetvā vaṭṭetvā pādamūle nikkhipati,
atk-s0513a1:2107_2: tena nisinnapīṭhassa heṭṭhā sayitā ekā chātasiṅgālī tassa ajānantasseva taṃ khādati,
atk-s0513a1:2107_7: Anāgatasmiñhi itthiyo purisalolā surālolā alaṅkāralolā visikhālolā āmisalolā bhavissanti dussīlā durācārā,
atk-s0513a1:2107_8: tā sāmikehi kasigorakkhādīni kammāni katvā kicchena kasirena sambhataṃ dhanaṃ jārehi saddhiṃ suraṃ pivantiyo
atk-s0513a1:2107_9: mālāgandhavilepanaṃ dhārayamānā antogehe accāyikampi kiccaṃ anoloketvā gehe parikkhepassa uparibhāgenapi
atk-s0513a1:2107_10: chiddaṭṭhānehipi jāre upadhārayamānā sve vapitabbayuttakaṃ bījampi koṭṭetvā yāgubhattakhajjakādīni sampādetvā
atk-s0513a1:2107_11: khādamānā vilumpissanti heṭṭhāpīṭhake nipannachātasiṅgālī viya vaṭṭetvā vaṭṭetvā pādamūle nikkhittarajjuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2108_1: rājadvāre bahūhi tucchakumbhehi parivāretvā ṭhapitaṃ ekaṃ mahantaṃ pūritakumbhaṃ addasaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2108_2: Cattāropi pana vaṇṇā catūhi disāhi catūhi anudisāhi ca ghaṭehi udakaṃ āharitvā āharitvā pūritakumbhameva pūrenti,
atk-s0513a1:2108_14: te evaṃ duggatā sabbe jānapade attanova kamme kāressanti,
atk-s0513a1:2108_15: upaddutā manussā sake kammante chaḍḍetvā rājūnaññeva atthāya pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇāni vapantā rakkhantā lāyantā
atk-s0513a1:2108_16: maddantā pavesentā ucchukhettāni karontā yantāni karontā yantāni vāhentā phāṇitādīni pacantā pupphārāme
atk-s0513a1:2108_17: ca phalārāme ca karontā tattha tattha nipphannāni pubbaṇṇādīni āharitvā rañño koṭṭhāgārameva pūressanti,
atk-s0513a1:2108_18: attano gehesu tucchakoṭṭhe olokentāpi na bhavissanti,
atk-s0513a1:2109_1: ekaṃ pañcavaṇṇapadumasañchannaṃ gambhīraṃ sabbato titthaṃ pokkharaṇiṃ addasaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2109_2: Samantato dvipadacatuppadā otaritvā tattha pānīyaṃ pivanti.
atk-s0513a1:2109_4: tīrappadesesu dvipadacatuppadānaṃ akkamaṭṭhāne acchaṃ vippasannaṃ anāvilaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2109_13: raṭṭhavāsikesu nesaṃ khantimettānuddayā nāma na bhavissanti,
atk-s0513a1:2109_14: kakkhaḷā pharusā ucchuyante ucchugaṇṭhikā viya manusse pīḷentā nānappakārena baliṃ uppādentā dhanaṃ gaṇhissanti.
atk-s0513a1:2109_15: Manussā balipīḷitā kiñci dātuṃ asakkontā gāmanigamādayo chaḍḍetvā paccantaṃ gantvā vāsaṃ kappessanti,
atk-s0513a1:2109_17: paccanto ghanavāso seyyathāpi pokkharaṇiyā majjhe udakaṃ āvilaṃ pariyante vippasannaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2110_1: ekissāyeva kumbhiyā paccamānaṃ odanaṃ apākaṃ addasaṃ “apāka”nti vicāretvā vibhajitvā ṭhapitaṃ viya tīhākārehi paccamānaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2110_9: tesu adhammikesu rājayuttāpi brāhmaṇagahapatikāpi negamajānapadāpīti samaṇabrāhmaṇe upādāya sabbe manussā adhammikā bhavissanti,
atk-s0513a1:2110_14: Adhammikarājūnañca rajje vātā visamā kharā vāyissanti,
atk-s0513a1:2110_16: tesu kampitesu devatā kupitā devaṃ vassituṃ na dassanti,
atk-s0513a1:2110_18: vassamānopi sabbattha kasikammassa vā vappakammassa vā upakārako hutvā na vassissati.
atk-s0513a1:2110_20: evaṃ janapadepi gāmepi ekataḷākepi ekasarepi ekappahāreneva na vassissati,
atk-s0513a1:2110_21: taḷākassa uparibhāge vassanto heṭṭhābhāge na vassissati,
atk-s0513a1:2110_26: Evaṃ ekassa rañño rajje vuttasassā tippakārā bhavissanti ekakumbhiyā odano viya.
atk-s0513a1:2111_4: Imassāpi anāgateyeva mayhaṃ sāsane parihāyante vipāko bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:2111_5: Anāgatasmiñhi paccayalolā alajjī bhikkhū bahū bhavissanti,
atk-s0513a1:2111_6: te mayā paccayaloluppaṃ nimmathetvā kathitadhammadesanaṃ cīvarādicatupaccayahetu paresaṃ desessanti,
atk-s0513a1:2111_7: paccayehi mucchitā nissaraṇapakkhe ṭhitā nibbānābhimukhaṃ katvā desetuṃ na sakkhissanti,
atk-s0513a1:2111_8: kevalaṃ “padabyañjanasampattiñceva madhurasaddañca sutvā mahagghāni cīvarādīni dassanti” iccevaṃ desessanti.
atk-s0513a1:2111_9: Apare antaravīthicatukkarājadvārādīsu nisīditvā kahāpaṇaaḍḍhakahāpaṇapādamāsakarūpādīnipi nissāya desessanti.
atk-s0513a1:2111_10: Iti mayā nibbānagghanakaṃ katvā desitaṃ dhammaṃ catupaccayatthāya ceva kahāpaṇaḍḍhakahāpaṇādīnaṃ atthāya
atk-s0513a1:2111_11: ca vikkiṇitvā desentā satasahassagghanakaṃ candanasāraṃ pūtitakkena vikkiṇantā viya bhavissanti.
atk-s0513a1:2112_3: Imassapi anāgate adhammikarājakāle loke viparivattanteyeva vipāko bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:2112_4: Tadā hi rājāno jātisampannānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ yasaṃ na dassanti,
atk-s0513a1:2112_8: Rājasammukhepi rājadvārepi amaccasammukhepi vinicchayaṭṭhānepi tucchalābusadisānaṃ akulīnānaṃyeva kathā
atk-s0513a1:2112_9: osīditvā ṭhitā viya niccalā suppatiṭṭhitā bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:2112_10: Saṅghasannipātesupi saṅghakammagaṇakammaṭṭhānesu ceva pattacīvarapariveṇādivinicchayaṭṭhānesu ca dussīlānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2112_12: na lajjibhikkhūnanti evaṃ sabbathāpi tucchalābusīdanakālo viya bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:2113_1: mahantamahantā kūṭāgārappamāṇā ghanasilā nāvā viya udake plavamānā addasaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2113_4: Tadā hi adhammikarājāno akulīnānaṃ yasaṃ dassanti,
atk-s0513a1:2113_9: Rājasammukhe vā amaccasammukhe vā vinicchayaṭṭhāne vā vinicchayakusalānaṃ ghanasilāsadisānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ kathā na ogāhitvā patiṭṭhahissati.
atk-s0513a1:2113_10: Tesu kathentesu “kiṃ ime kathentī”ti itare parihāsameva karissanti.
atk-s0513a1:2113_11: Bhikkhusannipātesupi vuttappakāresu ṭhānesu neva pesale bhikkhū garukātabbe maññissanti,
atk-s0513a1:2114_1: khuddakamadhukapupphappamāṇā maṇḍūkiyo mahantamahante kaṇhasappe vegena anubandhitvā uppalanāḷe viya
atk-s0513a1:2114_2: chinditvā chinditvā maṃsaṃ khāditvā gilantiyo addasaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2114_4: Imassapi loke parihāyante anāgate eva vipāko bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:2114_5: Tadā hi manussā tibbarāgajātikā kilesānuvattakā hutvā taruṇataruṇānaṃ attano bhariyānaṃ vase vattissanti,
atk-s0513a1:2114_6: gehe dāsakammakarādayopi gomahiṃsādayopi hiraññasuvaṇṇampi sabbaṃ tāsaññeva āyattaṃ bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:2114_7: “Asukaṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ vā paricchadādijātaṃ vā kaha”nti vutte “yattha vā tattha vā hotu,
atk-s0513a1:2114_9: tvaṃ mayhaṃ ghare santaṃ vā asantaṃ vā jānitukāmo jāto”ti vatvā nānappakārehi akkositvā mukhasattīhi
atk-s0513a1:2114_10: koṭṭetvā dāsaceṭake viya attano vase katvā attano issariyaṃ pavattessanti.
atk-s0513a1:2114_11: Evaṃ madhukapupphappamāṇānaṃ maṇḍūkapotikānaṃ āsīvise kaṇhasappe gilanakālo viya bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:2115_1: dasahi asaddhammehi samannāgataṃ gāmagocaraṃ kākaṃ kañcanavaṇṇatāya “suvaṇṇā”ti laddhanāme suvaṇṇarājahaṃse parivārente addasaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2115_4: Anāgatasmiñhi rājāno hatthisippādīsu akusalā yuddhesu avisāradā bhavissanti,
atk-s0513a1:2115_5: te attano rajjavipattiṃ āsaṅkamānā samānajātikānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ issariyaṃ adatvā attano pādamūlikanhāpakakappakādīnaṃ dassanti,
atk-s0513a1:2115_6: jātigottasampannā kulaputtā rājakule patiṭṭhaṃ alabhamānā jīvikaṃ kappetuṃ asamatthā hutvā issariye ṭhite
atk-s0513a1:2116_2: ahaṃ pana eḷake dīpino anubandhitvā murumurūti khādante addasaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2116_3: Athaññe tasā vakā eḷake dūratova disvā tasitā tāsappattā hutvā eḷakānaṃ bhayāpalāyitvā gumbagahanādīni pavisitvā nilīyiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:2116_7: Tadā hi akulīnā rājavallabhā issarā bhavissanti,
atk-s0513a1:2116_9: Te rājavallabhā rājānaṃ attano kathaṃ gāhāpetvā vinicchayaṭṭhānādīsu balavanto hutvā kulīnānaṃ paveṇiāgatāni
atk-s0513a1:2116_10: khettavatthādīni “amhākaṃ santakāni etānī”ti abhiyuñjitvā tesu “na tumhākaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2116_11: amhāka”nti āgantvā vinicchayaṭṭhānādīsu vivadantesu vettalatādīhi paharāpetvā gīvāyaṃ gahetvā apakaḍḍhāpetvā “attano pamāṇaṃ na jānātha,
atk-s0513a1:2116_13: idāni vo rañño kathetvā hatthapādacchedanādīni kāressāmā”ti santajjessanti.
atk-s0513a1:2116_14: Te tesaṃ bhayena attano santakāni vatthūni “tumhākaṃyevetāni gaṇhathā”ti niyyādetvā attano gehāni pavisitvā bhītā nipajjissanti.
atk-s0513a1:2116_16: te pesalā bhikkhū paṭisaraṇaṃ alabhamānā araññaṃ pavisitvā gahanaṭṭhānesu nilīyissanti.
atk-s0513a1:2116_17: Evaṃ hīnajaccehi ceva pāpabhikkhūhi ca upaddutānaṃ jātimantakulaputtānañceva pesalabhikkhūnañca eḷakānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2116_20: Ayampi hi supino anāgataṃyeva ārabbha diṭṭho.
atk-s0513a1:2116_21: Brāhmaṇā pana na dhammasudhammatāya tayi sinehena kathayiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:2117_0: Evaṃ satthā soḷasannaṃ mahāsupinānaṃ nipphattiṃ kathetvā “na kho, mahārāja,
atk-s0513a1:2117_3: Brāhmaṇāpi nesaṃ evameva ime supine gahetvā yaññamatthake khipiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:2117_4: tato paṇḍitehi dinnanayena gantvā bodhisattaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2117_5: Porāṇakā paṇḍitāpi nesaṃ ime supine kathentā imināva niyāmena kathesu”nti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2118_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto udiccabrāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto isipabbajjaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2118_1: pabbajitvā abhiññā ceva samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā himavantappadese jhānakīḷaṃ kīḷanto viharati.
atk-s0513a1:2118_2: Tadā bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatto imināva niyāmena ime supine disvā brāhmaṇe pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:2118_4: Tesu purohitassa antevāsikamāṇavo paṇḍito byatto ācariyaṃ āha – “ācariya,
atk-s0513a1:2118_6: nanu tesu ekaṃ māretvā ekassa sotthikammassa kāraṇaṃ nāma natthī”ti. Tāta,
atk-s0513a1:2118_8: tvaṃ pana rañño dhanaṃ rakkhitukāmo maññeti.
atk-s0513a1:2118_11: ahaṃ tumhākaṃ santike kiṃ karissāmī”ti vicaranto rañño uyyānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2119_0: Taṃ divasameva bodhisattopi taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā “ajja mayi manussapathaṃ gate mahājanassa bandhanā mokkho
atk-s0513a1:2119_1: bhavissatī”ti ākāsena gantvā uyyāne otaritvā suvaṇṇapaṭimā viya maṅgalasilātale nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:2119_2: Māṇavo bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīditvā paṭisanthāramakāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2119_3: Bodhisattopi tena saddhiṃ madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ katvā “kiṃ nu kho, māṇava,
atk-s0513a1:2119_6: apica kho taṃ brāhmaṇā atitthe pakkhandāpe”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2119_7: Rājā soḷasa supine disvā brāhmaṇānaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:2119_10: “ayaṃ nāma imesaṃ supinānaṃ nipphattī”ti rājānaṃ saññāpetvā tumhākaṃ mahājanaṃ bhayā mocetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti.
atk-s0513a1:2119_18: tumhe mamāgamanaṃ udikkhantā muhuttaṃ nisīdathā”ti bodhisattaṃ paṭijānāpetvā rañño santikaṃ gantvā “mahārāja,
atk-s0513a1:2119_19: eko ākāsacāriko tāpaso tumhākaṃ uyyāne otaritvā ‘tumhehi diṭṭhasupinānaṃ nipphattiṃ kathessāmī’ti tumhe pakkosatī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2120_0: Rājā tassa kathaṃ sutvā tāvadeva mahantena parivārena uyyānaṃ gantvā tāpasaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno pucchi “tumhe kira, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:2125_0: “Lābūni sīdanti silā plavanti, maṇḍūkiyo kaṇhasappe gilanti;
atk-s0513a1:2126_0: Kākaṃ suvaṇṇā parivārayanti, tasā vakā eḷakānaṃ bhayā hī”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:2128_0: Bodhisattopi tesaṃ idāni satthārā kathitaniyāmeneva vitthārato nipphattiṃ kathetvā pariyosāne sayaṃ idaṃ kathesi –
atk-s0513a1:2130_2: Yaṃ panetaṃ tesaṃ paṭighātatthāya yaññakammaṃ vattati,
atk-s0513a1:2130_13: Nayidha matthīti idāni pana tava vā mama vā kāle idha imasmiṃ purisayuge vattamāne etesaṃ nipphatti natthi.
atk-s0513a1:2130_14: Tasmā etesaṃ paṭighātāya vattamānaṃ yaññakammaṃ vipallāsena vattati,
atk-s0513a1:2130_16: Natthi te itonidānaṃ bhayaṃ vā chambhitattaṃ vāti mahāpuriso rājānaṃ samassāsetvā mahājanaṃ bandhanā
atk-s0513a1:2130_17: mocetvā puna ākāse ṭhatvā rañño ovādaṃ datvā pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā “ito paṭṭhāya, mahārāja,
atk-s0513a1:2130_18: brāhmaṇehi saddhiṃ ekato hutvā pasughātayaññaṃ mā yajī”ti dhammaṃ desetvā ākāseneva attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2130_19: Rājāpi tassa ovāde ṭhito dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2131_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “supinapaccayā te bhayaṃ natthi,
atk-s0513a1:2131_1: haretaṃ yañña”nti yaññaṃ hāretvā mahājanassa jīvitadānaṃ datvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2132_0: Parinibbute pana bhagavati saṅgītikārakā “usabhā”tiādīni tīṇi padāni aṭṭhakathaṃ āropetvā “lābūnī”tiādīni
atk-s0513a1:2132_1: cattāri padāni ekaṃ gāthaṃ katvā ekakanipātapāḷiṃ āropesunti.
atk-s0513a1:2136_0: Ubho khañjāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto macchariyakosiyaseṭṭhiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2136_1: Rājagahanagarassa kira avidūre sakkāraṃ nāma nigamo ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:2136_2: tattheko macchariyakosiyo nāma seṭṭhi asītikoṭivibhavo paṭivasati.
atk-s0513a1:2136_3: So tiṇaggena telabindumattampi neva paresaṃ deti,
atk-s0513a1:2136_5: Iti tassa taṃ vibhavajātaṃ neva puttadārādīnaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2137_0: Satthā ekadivasaṃ paccūsasamaye mahākaruṇāsamāpattito vuṭṭhāya sakalalokadhātuyaṃ bodhaneyyabandhave
atk-s0513a1:2137_1: olokento pañcacattālīsayojanamatthake vasantassa tassa seṭṭhino sapajāpatikassa sotāpattiphalassa upanissayaṃ addasa.
atk-s0513a1:2137_2: Tato purimadivase pana rājānaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ rājagehaṃ gantvā rājūpaṭṭhānaṃ katvā āgacchanto ekaṃ chātajjhattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2137_3: janapadamanussaṃ kummāsapūraṃ kapallapūvaṃ khādantaṃ disvā tattha pipāsaṃ uppādetvā attano gharaṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a1:2137_6: evaṃ me bahūni taṇḍulasappimadhuphāṇitādīni parikkhayaṃ gamissanti,
atk-s0513a1:2137_7: na kassaci kathessāmī”ti taṇhaṃ adhivāsento vicarati.
atk-s0513a1:2137_8: So gacchante gacchante kāle uppaṇḍupaṇḍukajāto dhamanisanthatagatto jāto.
atk-s0513a1:2137_9: Tato taṇhaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto gabbhaṃ pavisitvā mañcakaṃ upagūhitvā nipajji.
atk-s0513a1:2137_10: Evaṃgatopi dhanahānibhayena kassaci kiñci na kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2138_0: Atha naṃ bhariyā upasaṅkamitvā piṭṭhiṃ parimajjitvā “kiṃ te sāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2138_5: “Atha kiṃ te puttadhītāhi vā dāsakammakarādīhi vā kiñci amanāpaṃ kataṃ atthī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:2138_8: Evaṃ vuttepi dhanahānibhayena kiñci avatvā nissaddova nipajji.
atk-s0513a1:2138_11: So vacanaṃ parigilanto viya “atthi me ekā taṇhā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2138_21: “Tena hi imasmiṃ gehamatte sabbesaṃ pahonakaṃ katvā pacāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2138_23: “Tena hi te puttadāramattasseva pahonakaṃ katvā pacāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2138_25: “Tena hi tuyhañca mayhañca pahonakaṃ katvā pacāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2138_27: “Tena hi ekasseva te pahonakaṃ katvā pacāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2138_29: sakalataṇḍule ṭhapetvā bhinnataṇḍule ca uddhanakapallādīni ca ādāya thokaṃ khīrasappimadhuphāṇitañca
atk-s0513a1:2138_30: gahetvā sattabhūmikassa pāsādassa uparimatalaṃ āruyha paca,
atk-s0513a1:2138_32: Sā “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā gahetabbaṃ gāhāpetvā pāsādaṃ āruyha dāsiyo vissajjetvā seṭṭhiṃ pakkosāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2138_33: So ādito paṭṭhāya dvārāni pidahanto sabbadvāresu sūcighaṭikāni datvā sattamatalaṃ abhiruhitvā tatthapi dvāraṃ pidahitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:2138_34: Bhariyāpissa uddhane aggiṃ jāletvā kapallakaṃ āropetvā pūve pacituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a1:2139_2: rājagahanagarassa avidūre sakkāranigame macchariyakosiyaseṭṭhi ‘kapallapūve khādissāmī’ti aññesaṃ dassanabhayena
atk-s0513a1:2139_4: Tvaṃ tattha gantvā taṃ seṭṭhiṃ dametvā nibbisevanaṃ katvā ubhopi jayampatike pūve ca khīrasappimadhuphāṇitādīni
atk-s0513a1:2139_5: ca gāhāpetvā attano balena jetavanaṃ ānehi.
atk-s0513a1:2139_6: Ajjāhaṃ pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ vihāreyeva nisīdissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2139_9: bhante”ti satthu vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā tāvadeva iddhibalena taṃ nigamaṃ gantvā tassa pāsādassa sīhapañjaradvāre
atk-s0513a1:2139_10: sunivattho supāruto ākāseyeva maṇirūpakaṃ viya aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2140_1: So “ahaṃ evarūpānaññeva bhayena imaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgato,
atk-s0513a1:2140_2: ayañca āgantvā vātapānadvāre ṭhito”ti gahetabbagahaṇaṃ apassanto aggimhi pakkhittaloṇasakkharā viya dosena taṭataṭāyanto evamāha “samaṇa,
atk-s0513a1:2140_4: ākāse apade padaṃ dassetvā caṅkamantopi neva labhissasī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2140_7: ākāse pallaṅkena nisīdamānopi na labhissasiyevā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2140_10: āgantvā vātapānaummāre ṭhitopi na labhissasī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2140_16: seṭṭhino akkhīnaṃ sūciyā vijjhanakālo viya jāto.
atk-s0513a1:2140_17: Gehajjhāyanabhayena pana naṃ “pajjalantopi na labhissasī”ti avatvā cintesi “ayaṃ samaṇo suṭṭhu laggo,
atk-s0513a1:2140_20: ekaṃ khuddakapūvaṃ pacitvā samaṇassa datvā uyyojehi na”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2140_22: mahāpūvo hutvā sakalapātiṃ pūretvā uddhumāto aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2141_0: Seṭṭhi taṃ disvā “bahu tayā piṭṭhaṃ gahitaṃ bhavissatī”ti sayameva dabbikaṇṇena thokataraṃ piṭṭhaṃ gahetvā pakkhipi,
atk-s0513a1:2141_6: Tassā pacchito ekaṃ pūvaṃ gaṇhantiyā sabbe ekābaddhā allīyiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2141_11: Ubho janā koṭiyaṃ gahetvā kaḍḍhantāpi viyojetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsuyeva.
atk-s0513a1:2141_12: Athassa pūvehi saddhiṃ vāyamantasseva sarīrato sedā mucciṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:2141_17: Sā pacchiṃ ādāya theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā sabbe pūve therassa adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2141_21: atthi yiṭṭha”nti dānādīnaṃ phalaṃ gaganatale puṇṇacandaṃ viya dassesi.
atk-s0513a1:2142_1: āgantvā imasmiṃ pallaṅke nisīditvā pūve paribhuñjathā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2142_3: sammāsambuddho ‘pūve khādissāmī’ti pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ vihāre nisinno,
atk-s0513a1:2142_4: tumhākaṃ ruciyā sati seṭṭhibhariyaṃ pūve ca khīrādīni ca gaṇhāpetha,
atk-s0513a1:2142_9: kālaṃ anatikkamitvā ettakaṃ addhānaṃ kathaṃ gamissāmā”ti?
atk-s0513a1:2142_10: “Mahāseṭṭhi tumhākaṃ ruciyā sati ahaṃ vo attano iddhibalena nessāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2142_11: tumhākaṃ pāsāde sopānasīsaṃ attano ṭhāneyeva bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:2142_13: uparipāsādā heṭṭhāpāsādaṃ otaraṇakālamattena vo jetavanaṃ nessāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2142_16: Thero sopānasīsaṃ tattheva katvā “sopānapādamūlaṃ jetavanadvārakoṭṭhake hotū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2143_0: Iti thero seṭṭhiñca seṭṭhibhariyañca uparipāsādā heṭṭhāotaraṇakālato khippataraṃ jetavanaṃ sampāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2143_1: Te ubhopi satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā kālaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2143_2: Satthā bhattaggaṃ pavisitvā paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīdi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena.
atk-s0513a1:2143_8: Satthā pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ bhattakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2143_11: sakalavihāre bhikkhūnañca vighāsādānañca dinnepi na pariyanto paññāyati. “Bhante,
atk-s0513a1:2143_12: pūvā parikkhayaṃ na gacchantī”ti bhagavato ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2143_14: Atha ne dvārakoṭṭhakassa avidūre pabbhāraṭṭhāne chaḍḍayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2143_16: Mahāseṭṭhi saddhiṃ bhariyāya bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2143_18: Anumodanāpariyosāne ubhopi sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya satthāraṃ vanditvā dvārakoṭṭhake sopānaṃ āruyha attano pāsādeyeva patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2143_19: Tato paṭṭhāya mahāseṭṭhi asītikoṭidhanaṃ buddhasāsaneyeva vikiri.
atk-s0513a1:2144_0: Punadivase sammāsambuddhe sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā jetavanaṃ āgamma bhikkhūnaṃ sugatovādaṃ datvā gandhakuṭiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2144_1: pavisitvā paṭisallīne sāyanhasamaye dhammasabhāyaṃ sannipatitā bhikkhū “passathāvuso,
atk-s0513a1:2144_3: anupahacca saddhaṃ anupahacca bhoge macchariyaseṭṭhiṃ muhutteneva dametvā nibbisevanaṃ katvā pūve gāhāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:2144_4: jetavanaṃ ānetvā satthu sammukhaṃ katvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpesi,
atk-s0513a1:2144_5: aho mahānubhāvo thero”ti therassa guṇakathaṃ kathentā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2144_8: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a1:2144_9: kuladamakena nāma bhikkhunā kule aviheṭhetvā akilametvā pupphato reṇuṃ gaṇhantena bhamarena viya upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0513a1:2146_0: Paleti rasamādāya, evaṃ gāme munī care”ti. –
atk-s0513a1:2147_0: Imaṃ dhammapade gāthaṃ vatvā uttaripi therassa guṇaṃ pakāsetuṃ “na bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a1:2147_2: pubbepi taṃ dametvā kammaphalasambandhaṃ jānāpesiyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2148_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bārāṇasiyaṃ illiso nāma seṭṭhi ahosi asītikoṭivibhavo purisadosasamannāgato
atk-s0513a1:2148_1: khañjo kuṇī visamakkhimaṇḍalo assaddho appasanno maccharī,
atk-s0513a1:2148_5: Mātāpitaro panassa yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā dāyakā dānapatino.
atk-s0513a1:2148_6: So seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ labhitvāyeva kulavaṃsaṃ nāsetvā dānasālaṃ jhāpetvā yācake pothetvā nikkaḍḍhitvā dhanameva saṇṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2149_0: So ekadivasaṃ rājūpaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā attano gharaṃ āgacchanto ekaṃ maggakilantaṃ jānapadamanussaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2149_2: ādāya pīṭhake nisīditvā ambilasurāya kosakaṃ pūretvā pūretvā pūtimacchakena uttaribhaṅgena pivantaṃ disvā
atk-s0513a1:2149_3: suraṃ pātukāmo hutvā cintesi “sacāhaṃ suraṃ pivissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2149_6: So taṇhaṃ adhivāsento vicaritvā gacchante gacchante kāle adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto vihatakappāso viya paṇḍusarīro ahosi dhammanisanthatagatto jāto.
atk-s0513a1:2149_7: Athekadivasaṃ gabbhaṃ pavisitvā mañcakaṃ upagūhitvā nipajji.
atk-s0513a1:2149_8: Tamenaṃ bhariyā upasaṅkamitvā piṭṭhiṃ parimajjitvā “kiṃ te, sāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2149_11: “Tena hi ekasseva te pahonakaṃ suraṃ karomī”ti pana vutte “gehe surāya kāriyamānāya bahū paccāsīsanti,
atk-s0513a1:2149_12: antarāpaṇato āharāpetvāpi na sakkā idha nisinnena pivitu”nti māsakamattaṃ datvā antarāpaṇato surāvārakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2149_13: āharāpetvā ceṭakena gāhāpetvā nagarā nikkhamma nadītīraṃ gantvā mahāmaggasamīpe ekaṃ gumbaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a1:2149_14: surāvārakaṃ ṭhapāpetvā “gaccha tva”nti ceṭakaṃ dūre nisīdāpetvā kosakaṃ pūretvā suraṃ pātuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a1:2150_0: Pitā panassa dānādīnaṃ puññānaṃ katattā devaloke sakko hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:2150_1: So tasmiṃ khaṇe “pavattati nu kho me dānaggaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2150_2: udāhu no”ti āvajjento tassa appavattiṃ ñatvā,
atk-s0513a1:2150_3: puttassa kulavaṃsaṃ nāsetvā dānasālaṃ jhāpetvā yācake nikkaḍḍhitvā macchariyabhāve patiṭṭhāya “aññesaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2150_4: dātabbaṃ bhavissatī”ti bhayena gumbaṃ pavisitvā ekakasseva suraṃ pivanabhāvañca disvā “gacchāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2150_5: naṃ saṅkhobhetvā dametvā kammaphalasambandhaṃ jānāpetvā dānaṃ dāpetvā devaloke nibbattanārahaṃ karomī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2150_6: manussapathaṃ otaritvā illisaseṭṭhinā sadisaṃ khañjaṃ kuṇiṃ visamacakkhumaṇḍalaṃ attabhāvaṃ nimminitvā
atk-s0513a1:2150_7: bārāṇasinagaraṃ pavisitvā rañño nivesanadvāre ṭhatvā attano āgatabhāvaṃ ārocāpetvā “pavisatū”ti vutte
atk-s0513a1:2150_12: deva ghare me asītikoṭimattaṃ dhanaṃ atthi,
atk-s0513a1:2150_13: taṃ devo āharāpetvā attano bhaṇḍāgāraṃ pūrāpetū”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2150_15: tava dhanato amhākaṃ gehe bahutaraṃ dhana”nti. “Sace, deva,
atk-s0513a1:2150_20: devā”ti rājānaṃ vanditvā nikkhamitvā illisaseṭṭhino gehaṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2151_0: So gehaṃ pavisitvā antoummāre ṭhatvā dovārikaṃ pakkosāpetvā “yo añño mayā samānarūpo āgantvā ‘mametaṃ geha’nti pavisituṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0513a1:2151_1: taṃ piṭṭhiyaṃ paharitvā nīhareyyāthā”ti vatvā pāsādaṃ āruyha mahārahe āsane nisīditvā seṭṭhibhariyaṃ pakkosāpetvā sitākāraṃ dassetvā “bhadde,
atk-s0513a1:2151_3: Tassa taṃ vacanaṃ sutvāva seṭṭhibhariyā ca puttadhītaro ca dāsakammakarā ca “ettakaṃ kālaṃ dānaṃ dātuṃ cittameva natthi,
atk-s0513a1:2151_4: ajja pana suraṃ pivitvā muducitto hutvā dātukāmo jāto bhavissatī”ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2151_7: Tena hi bherivādakaṃ pakkosāpetvā “‘suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimuttādīhi atthikā illisaseṭṭhissa gharaṃ gacchantū’nti sakalanagare bheriṃ carāpehī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2151_12: Mahājano dhanaṃ nīharitvā mahātale rāsiṃ katvā ābhatabhājanāni pūretvā gacchati.
atk-s0513a1:2152_0: Aññataro janapadamanusso illisaseṭṭhino goṇe tasseva rathe yojetvā sattahi ratanehi pūretvā nagarā nikkhamma
atk-s0513a1:2152_1: mahāmaggaṃ paṭipajjitvā tassa gumbassa avidūrena rathaṃ pesento “vassasataṃ jīva, sāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2152_3: taṃ nissāya idāni me yāvajīvaṃ kammaṃ akatvā jīvitabbaṃ jātaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2152_11: So taṃ saddaṃ sutvā bhītatasito cintesi “ayaṃ mama nāmaṃ gahetvā idañcidañca vadati,
atk-s0513a1:2152_12: kacci nu kho mama dhanaṃ raññā lokassa dinna”nti gumbā nikkhamitvā goṇe ca rathañca sañjānitvā “are, ceṭaka,
atk-s0513a1:2152_14: mayhaṃ ratho”ti vatvā gantvā goṇe nāsārajjuyaṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0513a1:2152_18: tvaṃ kiṃ ahosī”ti pakkhanditvā asaniṃ pātento viya khandhe paharitvā rathaṃ ādāya agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2152_19: So puna kampamāno uṭṭhāya paṃsuṃ puñchitvā puñchitvā vegena gantvā rathaṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0513a1:2152_20: gahapatiko rathā otaritvā kesesu gahetvā oṇāmetvā kapparapahārehi koṭṭetvā gale gahetvā āgatamaggābhimukhaṃ khipitvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:2152_22: So kampamāno vegena nivesanadvāraṃ gantvā dhanaṃ ādāya gacchante mahājane disvā “ambho kiṃ nāmetaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2152_23: kiṃ rājā mama dhanaṃ vilumpāpetī”ti taṃ taṃ gantvā gaṇhāti,
atk-s0513a1:2152_28: kahaṃ pavisasī”ti vaṃsapesikāhi pothetvā gīvāyaṃ gahetvā nīhariṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2153_0: So “ṭhapetvā idāni rājānaṃ natthi me añño koci paṭisaraṇo”ti rañño santikaṃ gantvā “deva,
atk-s0513a1:2153_3: nanu tvameva āgantvā “sace tumhe na gaṇhatha,
atk-s0513a1:2153_4: ahaṃ mama dhanaṃ dānaṃ dassāmī”ti nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā dānaṃ adāsīti. Nāhaṃ, deva,
atk-s0513a1:2153_6: kiṃ tumhe mayhaṃ macchariyabhāvaṃ na jānātha,
atk-s0513a1:2153_7: ahaṃ tiṇaggena telabindumpi na kassaci demi.
atk-s0513a1:2153_11: dvinnaṃ janānaṃ visesaṃ neva rājā jānāti,
atk-s0513a1:2154_0: Puna seṭṭhi cintesi “mayhaṃ sīse piḷakā atthi,
atk-s0513a1:2154_2: taṃ kho pana kappako eva jānāti,
atk-s0513a1:2154_7: Tasmiṃ pana kāle bodhisatto tassa kappako ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2154_11: Tasmiṃ khaṇe sakko sīse piḷakaṃ māpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2154_12: Bodhisatto dvinnampi sīsaṃ olokento piḷakā disvā “mahārāja,
atk-s0513a1:2154_14: nāhaṃ etesu ekassāpi illisabhāvaṃ sañjānituṃ sakkomī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2157_0: Ubhinnaṃ piḷakā jātā, nāhaṃ passāmi illisa”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2158_4: Piḷakāti dvinnampi ekasmiṃyeva sīsapadese ekasaṇṭhānāva piḷakā jātā.
atk-s0513a1:2158_5: Nāhaṃ passāmīti ahaṃ “imesu ayaṃ nāma illiso”ti na passāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2159_0: Bodhisattassa vacanaṃ sutvā seṭṭhi kampamāno dhanasokena satiṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetuṃ asakkonto tattheva pati.
atk-s0513a1:2159_4: so uṭṭhāya sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2159_6: idaṃ dhanaṃ mama santakaṃ, na tava.
atk-s0513a1:2159_9: Ahaṃ dānādīni puññāni katvā sakkattaṃ patto,
atk-s0513a1:2159_10: tvaṃ pana me vaṃsaṃ upacchinditvā adānasīlo hutvā macchariye patiṭṭhāya dānasālāyo jhāpetvā yācake nikkaḍḍhitvā dhanameva saṇṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2159_14: Sace me dānasālā pākatikā katvā dānaṃ dassasi,
atk-s0513a1:2159_17: sabbaṃ te dhanaṃ antaradhāpetvā iminā indavajirena te sīsaṃ chinditvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpessāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2159_18: Illisaseṭṭhi maraṇabhayena santajjito “ito paṭṭhāya dānaṃ dassāmī”ti paṭiññaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2159_19: Sakko tassa paṭiññaṃ gahetvā ākāse nisinnova dhammaṃ desetvā taṃ sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā sakaṭṭhānameva agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2159_20: Illisopi dānādīni puññāni katvā saggaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2160_3: pubbepesa iminā damitoyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2164_0: Yato viluttā ca hatā ca gāvoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ amaccaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2164_1: Kosalarañño kira eko amacco rājānaṃ ārādhetvā paccantagāme rājabaliṃ labhitvā corehi saddhiṃ ekato hutvā “ahaṃ manusse ādāya araññaṃ pavisissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2164_2: tumhe gāmaṃ vilumpitvā upaḍḍhaṃ mayhaṃ dadeyyāthā”ti vatvā pageva manusse sannipātetvā araññaṃ gantvā
atk-s0513a1:2164_3: coresu āgantvā gāviyo ghātetvā maṃsaṃ khāditvā gāmaṃ vilumpitvā gatesu sāyanhasamaye mahājanaparivuto
atk-s0513a1:2164_5: Tassa na cirasseva taṃ kammaṃ pākaṭaṃ jātaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2164_7: Rājā taṃ pakkosāpetvā dosaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā suniggahitaṃ niggahetvā aññaṃ gāmabhojakaṃ pesetvā jetavanaṃ gantvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:2164_10: pubbepi evaṃsīloyevā”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2165_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente ekassa amaccassa paccantagāmaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2165_2: Tadā pana bodhisatto vaṇijjāya paccante vicaranto tasmiṃ gāmake nivāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a1:2165_3: So tasmiṃ gāmabhojake sāyanhasamaye mahājanaparivārena bheriyā vajjamānāya āgacchante “ayaṃ duṭṭhagāmabhojako
atk-s0513a1:2165_4: corehi saddhiṃ ekato hutvā gāmaṃ vilumpāpetvā coresu palāyitvā aṭaviṃ paviṭṭhesu idāni upasantūpasanto
atk-s0513a1:2165_5: viya bheriyā vajjamānāya āgacchatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2167_0: “Yato viluttā ca hatā ca gāvo, daḍḍhāni gehāni jano ca nīto;
atk-s0513a1:2168_0: Athāgamā puttahatāya putto, kharassaraṃ ḍiṇḍimaṃ vādayanto”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2169_1: Viluttā ca hatā cāti vilumpitvā bandhitvā ca nītā,
atk-s0513a1:2169_5: Jano ca nītoti karamaraggāhaṃ gahetvā nīto.
atk-s0513a1:2169_9: iti so tassā jīvantopi hataputtaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatīti hataputtāya putto nāma hoti.
atk-s0513a1:2170_0: Evaṃ bodhisatto imāya gāthāya taṃ paribhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2170_1: Na cireneva ca tassa taṃ kammaṃ pākaṭaṃ jātaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2171_2: pubbepi evaṃsīloyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2175_0: Yaṃ te pavikatthitaṃ pureti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ vikatthitaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2175_5: gottena vā dhanena vā kulappadesena vā amhehi sadiso nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:2175_10: Mayaṃ pabbajitabhāvena etarahi evarūpāni lūkhāni bhojanāni bhuñjāma,
atk-s0513a1:2175_11: lūkhāni cīvarāni dhāremā”ti theranavamajjhimānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ antare vikatthento jātiādivasena vambhento khuṃsento vicarati.
atk-s0513a1:2175_12: Athassa eko bhikkhu kulappadesaṃ pariggaṇhitvā taṃ vikatthanabhāvaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:2175_14: asuko nāma bhikkhu evarūpe niyyānikasāsane pabbajitvā vikatthento vambhento khuṃsento vicaratī”ti etassa aguṇaṃ kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2175_17: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:2175_19: so bhikkhu idāneva vikatthento vambhento khuṃsento vicarati,
atk-s0513a1:2175_20: pubbepi vikatthento vambhento khuṃsento vicarī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2176_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto ekasmiṃ nigamagāme udiccabrāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a1:2176_1: vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ disāpāmokkhassa ācariyassa santike tayo vede aṭṭhārasa vijjaṭṭhānāni uggahetvā
atk-s0513a1:2176_2: sabbasippesu nipphattiṃ patvā cūḷadhanuggahapaṇḍito nāma ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2176_3: So takkasilāto nikkhamitvā sabbasamayasippāni pariyesamāno mahiṃsakaraṭṭhaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2176_4: Imasmiṃ pana jātake bodhisatto thokaṃ rasso oṇatākāro ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2176_6: so ‘evaṃ rassasarīro tvaṃ kiṃ amhākaṃ kammaṃ karissasī’ti vakkhati,
atk-s0513a1:2176_7: yaṃnūnāhaṃ ārohapariṇāhasampannaṃ abhirūpaṃ ekaṃ purisaṃ phalakaṃ katvā tassa piṭṭhicchāyāya jīvikaṃ kappeyya”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2176_8: So tathārūpaṃ purisaṃ pariyesamāno bhīmasenassa nāmekassa tantavāyassa tantavītaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā “samma,
atk-s0513a1:2176_11: “Kiṃ pana tvaṃ evaṃ abhirūpo upadhisampanno hutvā imaṃ lāmakakammaṃ karosī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:2176_14: sakalajambudīpe mayā sadiso dhanuggaho nāma natthi.
atk-s0513a1:2176_16: so maṃ ‘evaṃrasso ayaṃ kiṃ amhākaṃ kammaṃ karissatī’ti kopeyya,
atk-s0513a1:2176_18: Rājā te paribbayaṃ datvā vuttiṃ nibaddhaṃ dassati.
atk-s0513a1:2176_19: Ahaṃ te uppannakammaṃ karonto tava piṭṭhicchāyāya jīvissāmi.
atk-s0513a1:2177_0: Atha naṃ ādāya bārāṇasiṃ gantvā sayaṃ cūḷūpaṭṭhāko hutvā taṃ purato katvā rājadvāre ṭhatvā rañño ārocāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2177_1: “Āgacchantū”ti vutte ubhopi pavisitvā rājānaṃ vanditvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2178_0: Tena kho pana samayena kāsiraṭṭhe ekasmiṃ araññe bahūnaṃ manussānaṃ sañcaraṇamaggaṃ byaggho chaḍḍāpeti,
atk-s0513a1:2178_14: Tvaṃ byagghassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ sahasā ekakova mā agamāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2178_15: janapadamanusse pana sannipātetvā ekaṃ vā dve vā dhanusahassāni gāhāpetvā tattha gantvā byagghassa uṭṭhitabhāvaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2178_16: ñatvā palāyitvā ekaṃ gumbaṃ pavisitvā urena nipajjeyyāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2178_18: tehi byagghe gahite tvaṃ dantehi ekaṃ valliṃ chinditvā koṭiyaṃ gahetvā matabyagghassa santikaṃ gantvā “bho, kenesa,
atk-s0513a1:2178_20: ahaṃ imaṃ byagghaṃ goṇaṃ viya valliyā bandhitvā rañño santikaṃ nessāmī’ti valliatthāya gumbaṃ paviṭṭho,
atk-s0513a1:2178_21: mayā valliyā anābhatāya eva kenesa mārito”ti katheyyāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2178_23: mā rañño ācikkhī”ti bahuṃ dhanaṃ dassanti,
atk-s0513a1:2178_26: So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā bodhisattena kathitaniyāmeneva byagghaṃ gahetvā araññaṃ khemaṃ katvā mahājanaparivuto
atk-s0513a1:2178_27: bārāṇasiṃ āgantvā rājānaṃ disvā “gahito me, deva, byaggho,
atk-s0513a1:2178_32: Sopi bodhisattena dinnanayena byagghaṃ viya tampi gahetvā āgañchi,
atk-s0513a1:2178_35: So issariyamadamatto bodhisattaṃ avamaññaṃ katvā tassa vacanaṃ na gaṇhāti,
atk-s0513a1:2179_0: Atha katipāhaccayena eko sāmantarājā āgantvā bārāṇasiṃ uparundhitvā “rajjaṃ vā detu,
atk-s0513a1:2179_3: So sabbasannāhasannaddho rājavesaṃ gahetvā susannaddhassa vāraṇassa piṭṭhe nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:2179_4: Bodhisattopi tassa maraṇabhayena sabbasannāhasannaddho bhīmasenasseva pacchimāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:2179_5: Vāraṇo mahājanaparivuto nagaradvārena nikkhamitvā saṅgāmasīsaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a1:2179_7: Bodhisatto “idānesa hatthipiṭṭhito patitvā marissatī”ti hatthikkhandhato apatanatthaṃ bhīmasenaṃ yottena parikkhipitvā gaṇhi,
atk-s0513a1:2179_8: bhīmaseno sampahāraṭṭhānaṃ disvā maraṇabhayatajjito sarīravaḷañjena hatthipiṭṭhiṃ dūsesi.
atk-s0513a1:2179_9: Bodhisatto “na kho te bhīmasena purimena pacchimaṃ sameti,
atk-s0513a1:2179_11: idāni hatthipiṭṭhiṃ dūsesī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2181_0: “Yaṃ te pavikatthitaṃ pure, atha te pūtisarā sajanti pacchā;
atk-s0513a1:2182_0: Ubhayaṃ na sameti bhīmasena, yuddhakathā ca idañca te vihañña”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2183_0: Tattha yaṃ te pavikatthitaṃ pureti yaṃ tayā pubbe “kiṃ tvaṃyeva puriso,
atk-s0513a1:2183_4: Atha te pūtisarā sajanti pacchāti atha te ime pūtibhāvena saraṇabhāvena ca “pūtisarā”ti laddhanāmā sarīravaḷañjadhārā sajanti vaḷañjanti paggharanti.
atk-s0513a1:2183_7: Ubhayaṃ na sameti bhīmasenāti idaṃ bhīmasena ubhayaṃ na sameti. Kataraṃ?
atk-s0513a1:2183_10: yañca te idāni vihaññaṃ kilamatho hatthipiṭṭhidūsanākārappatto vighātoti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2184_0: Evaṃ bodhisatto taṃ garahitvā “mā bhāyi, samma,
atk-s0513a1:2184_1: kasmā mayi ṭhite vihaññasī”ti bhīmasenaṃ hatthipiṭṭhito otāretvā “nhāyitvā gehameva gacchā”ti uyyojetvā
atk-s0513a1:2184_2: “ajja mayā pākaṭena bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti saṅgāmaṃ pavisitvā unnaditvā balakoṭṭhakaṃ bhinditvā sapattarājānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2184_4: Rājā tuṭṭho bodhisattassa mahantaṃ yasaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2184_6: So bhīmasenassa paribbayaṃ datvā sakaṭṭhānameva pesetvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2185_3: pubbepi vikatthiyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2195_0: Apāyimha anaccimhāti idaṃ satthā kosambiṃ upanissāya ghositārāme viharanto sāgatattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2195_1: Bhagavati hi sāvatthiyaṃ vassaṃ vasitvā cārikāgamanena bhaddavatikaṃ nāma nigamaṃ sampatte gopālakā pasupālakā
atk-s0513a1:2195_2: kassakā pathāvino ca satthāraṃ disvā vanditvā “mā, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:2195_4: ambatitthe jaṭilassa assame ambatitthako nāma nāgo āsīviso ghoraviso,
atk-s0513a1:2195_6: Bhagavāpi tesaṃ kathaṃ asuṇanto viya tesu yāvatatiyaṃ vārayamānesupi agamāsiyeva.
atk-s0513a1:2196_0: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā bhaddavatikāya avidūre aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe viharati.
atk-s0513a1:2196_1: Tena kho pana samayena buddhūpaṭṭhāko sāgato nāma thero pothujjanikāya iddhiyā samannāgato taṃ assamaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2196_2: upasaṅkamitvā tassa nāgarājassa vasanaṭṭhāne tiṇasanthārakaṃ paññāpetvā pallaṅkena nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:2196_9: Evaṃ so khaṇena taṃ nāgarājānaṃ dametvā saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpetvā satthu santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2197_0: Satthā bhaddavatikāyaṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā kosambiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2197_2: Kosambinagaravāsino satthu paccuggamanaṃ katvā satthāraṃ vanditvā sāgatattherassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhitā evamāhaṃsu “bhante,
atk-s0513a1:2197_8: pabbajitānaṃ nāma kāpotikā surā dullabhā ceva manāpā ca.
atk-s0513a1:2197_11: Te “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā satthāraṃ svātanāya nimantetvā nagaraṃ pavisitvā attano attano gehe “therassa
atk-s0513a1:2197_12: dassāmā”ti kāpotikaṃ suraṃ pasannaṃ paṭiyādetvā theraṃ nimantetvā ghare ghare pasannaṃ suraṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2197_13: Thero pivitvā surāmadamatto nagarato nikkhamanto dvārantare patitvā vilapamāno nipajji.
atk-s0513a1:2198_0: Satthā katabhattakicco nagarā nikkhamanto theraṃ tenākārena nipannaṃ disvā “gaṇhatha,
atk-s0513a1:2198_3: Bhikkhū therassa sīsaṃ tathāgatassa pādamūle katvā taṃ nipajjāpesuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2198_4: so parivattitvā pāde tathāgatābhimukhe katvā nipajji.
atk-s0513a1:2198_22: Atha kho bhagavā theraṃ garahitvā bhikkhū āmantetvā “surāmerayapāne pācittiya”nti sikkhāpadaṃ paññāpetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā gandhakuṭiṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:2199_0: Dhammasabhāyaṃ sannipatitā bhikkhū surāpānassa avaṇṇaṃ kathayiṃsu “yāva mahādosañcetaṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0513a1:2199_2: tāva paññāsampannaṃ nāma iddhimantaṃ sāgataṃ yathā satthu guṇamattampi na jānāti,
atk-s0513a1:2199_6: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:2199_8: idāneva suraṃ pivitvā pabbajitā visaññino honti,
atk-s0513a1:2200_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto kāsiraṭṭhe udiccabrāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto
atk-s0513a1:2200_1: isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca uppādetvā jhānakīḷaṃ kīḷanto himavantappadese vasati
atk-s0513a1:2200_3: Atha naṃ vassānasamaye sampatte antevāsikā āhaṃsu “ācariya,
atk-s0513a1:2200_6: tumhe pana gantvā sarīraṃ santappetvā vassaṃ vītināmetvā āgacchathā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2200_7: Te “sādhū”ti ācariyaṃ vanditvā bārāṇasiṃ gantvā rājuyyāne vasitvā punadivase bahidvāragāmeyeva bhikkhāya
atk-s0513a1:2200_8: caritvā suhitā hutvā punadivase nagaraṃ pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2200_11: himavantato pañcasatā isayo āgantvā uyyāne vasanti ghoratapā paramadhitindriyā sīlavanto”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2200_12: Rājā tesaṃ guṇe sutvā uyyānaṃ gantvā vanditvā katapaṭisanthāro vassānaṃ catumāsaṃ tattheva vasanatthāya paṭiññaṃ gahetvā nimantesi,
atk-s0513a1:2200_13: te tato paṭṭhāya rājageheyeva bhuñjitvā uyyāne vasanti.
atk-s0513a1:2201_1: Rājā “pabbajitānaṃ surā dullabhā”ti bahuṃ uttamasuraṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2201_2: Tāpasā suraṃ pivitvā uyyānaṃ gantvā surāmadamattā hutvā ekacce uṭṭhāya nacciṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:2201_4: naccitvā gāyitvā khārikādīni avattharitvā niddāyitvā surāmade chinne pabujjhitvā taṃ attano vippakāraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2201_5: disvā “na amhehi pabbajitasāruppaṃ kata”nti roditvā paridevitvā “mayaṃ ācariyena vinābhūtattā evarūpaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2201_6: pāpakammaṃ karimhā”ti taṅkhaṇaññeva uyyānaṃ pahāya himavantaṃ gantvā paṭisāmitaparikkhārā ācariyaṃ vanditvā
atk-s0513a1:2201_11: apica kho pana mayaṃ apātabbayuttakaṃ pivitvā visaññībhūtā satiṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetuṃ asakkontā naccimha
atk-s0513a1:2201_12: ceva gāyimha cā”ti etamatthaṃ ārocentā imaṃ gāthaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā āhaṃsu –
atk-s0513a1:2205_1: Anaccimhāti taṃ pivitvā hatthapāde lāḷentā naccimha.
atk-s0513a1:2205_2: Agāyimhāti mukhaṃ vivaritvā āyatakena sarena gāyimha.
atk-s0513a1:2205_3: Rudimha cāti puna vippaṭisārino “evarūpaṃ nāma amhehi kata”nti rodimha ca.
atk-s0513a1:2205_5: diṭṭhā nāhumha vānarāti evarūpaṃ saññāvināsanato visaññīkaraṇiṃ suraṃ pivitvā “etadeva sādhu,
atk-s0513a1:2206_0: Bodhisatto “garusaṃvāsarahitānaṃ nāma evarūpaṃ hotiyevā”ti te tāpase garahitvā “puna evarūpaṃ mākaritthā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2206_1: tesaṃ ovādaṃ datvā aparihīnajjhāno brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2207_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi.
atk-s0513a1:2207_1: Ito paṭṭhāya hi “anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā”ti idampi na vakkhāma.
atk-s0513a1:2211_0: Atikkamma ramaṇakanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ dubbacabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2214_0: Svāsi pāsāṇamāsīno, yasmā jīvaṃ na mokkhasī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2215_0: Tattha ramaṇakanti tasmiṃ kāle phalikassa nāmaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2215_7: Pāsāṇamāsīnoti khuracakkaṃ nāma pāsāṇamayaṃ vā hoti rajatamayaṃ vā maṇimayaṃ vā,
atk-s0513a1:2215_9: So ca tena āsīno atiniviṭṭho ajjhotthaṭo.
atk-s0513a1:2215_10: Tasmā pāsāṇena āsīnattā “pāsāṇāsīno”ti vattabbe byañjanasandhivasena makāraṃ ādāya “pāsāṇamāsīno”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2215_12: taṃ khuracakkaṃ āsajja pāpuṇitvā ṭhitoti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2215_13: Yasmā jīvaṃ na mokkhasīti yasmā khuracakkā yāva te pāpaṃ na khīyati,
atk-s0513a1:2216_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā bodhisatto attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃyeva gato.
atk-s0513a1:2216_1: Mittavindakopi khuracakkaṃ ukkhipitvā mahādukkhaṃ anubhavamāno pāpakamme parikkhīṇe yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2217_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2221_0: Mitto have sattapadena hotīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ anāthapiṇḍikassa mittaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2221_1: So kira anāthapiṇḍikena saddhiṃ sahapaṃsukīḷiko ekācariyasseva santike uggahitasippo nāmena kāḷakaṇṇī nāma.
atk-s0513a1:2221_2: So gacchante kāle duggato hutvā jīvituṃ asakkonto seṭṭhissa santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2221_3: So taṃ samassāsetvā paribbayaṃ datvā attano kuṭumbaṃ paṭicchāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2221_4: So seṭṭhino upakārako hutvā sabbakiccāni karoti.
atk-s0513a1:2221_9: Athekadivasaṃ seṭṭhino mittāmaccā seṭṭhiṃ upasaṅkamitvā evamāhaṃsu “mahāseṭṭhi,
atk-s0513a1:2221_13: bhuñja kāḷakaṇṇī’ti hi iminā saddena yakkhopi palāyeyya,
atk-s0513a1:2221_20: na sakkā mayā nāmamattaṃ nissāya sahapaṃsukīḷikaṃ sahāyaṃ pariccajitu”nti tesaṃ vacanaṃ anādāya ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2221_21: attano bhogagāmaṃ gacchanto taṃ geharakkhakaṃ katvā agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2222_1: gehamassa vilumpissāmā”ti nānāvudhahatthā rattibhāge āgantvā gehaṃ parivāresuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2222_2: Itaropi corānaññeva āgamanaṃ āsaṅkamāno aniddāyantova nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:2222_3: So corānaṃ āgatabhāvaṃ ñatvā manusse pabodhetuṃ “tvaṃ saṅkhaṃ dhama,
atk-s0513a1:2222_4: tvaṃ mudiṅgaṃ vādehī”ti mahāsamajjaṃ karonto viya sakalanivesanaṃ ekasaddaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a1:2222_6: attheva idha mahāseṭṭhī”ti pāsāṇamuggarādīni tattheva chaḍḍetvā palāyiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2223_0: Punadivase manussā tattha tattha chaḍḍite pāsāṇamuggarādayo disvā saṃvegappattā hutvā “sace ajja evarūpo buddhisampanno gharavicārako nābhavissa,
atk-s0513a1:2223_1: corehi yathāruciyā pavisitvā sabbaṃ gehaṃ viluttaṃ assa,
atk-s0513a1:2223_2: imaṃ daḷhamittaṃ nissāya seṭṭhino vuḍḍhi jātā”ti taṃ pasaṃsitvā seṭṭhissa bhogagāmato āgatakāle sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2223_3: Atha ne seṭṭhi avoca “tumhe evarūpaṃ mama geharakkhakaṃ mittaṃ nikkaḍḍhāpetha,
atk-s0513a1:2223_4: sacāyaṃ tumhākaṃ vacanena mayā nikkaḍḍhito assa,
atk-s0513a1:2223_7: hitacittameva pamāṇa”nti tassa uttaritaraṃ paribbayaṃ datvā “atthi dāni me idaṃ kathāpābhata”nti satthu
atk-s0513a1:2223_8: santikaṃ gantvā ādito paṭṭhāya sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:2223_10: idāneva kāḷakaṇṇimitto attano mittassa ghare kuṭumbaṃ rakkhati,
atk-s0513a1:2223_11: pubbepi rakkhiyevā”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2224_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto mahāyaso seṭṭhi ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2224_1: Tassa kāḷakaṇṇī nāma mittoti sabbaṃ paccuppannavatthusadisameva.
atk-s0513a1:2224_2: Bodhisatto bhogagāmato āgato taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “sace mayā tumhākaṃ vacanena evarūpo mitto nikkaḍḍhito assa,
atk-s0513a1:2224_3: ajja me kuṭumbaṃ kiñci nābhavissā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2226_0: “Mitto have sattapadena hoti, sahāyo pana dvādasakena hoti;
atk-s0513a1:2227_0: Māsaḍḍhamāsena ca ñāti hoti, tatuttariṃ attasamopi hoti;
atk-s0513a1:2228_0: Sohaṃ kathaṃ attasukhassa hetu, cirasanthutaṃ kāḷakaṇṇiṃ jaheyya”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2229_6: Sahāyo pana dvādasakena hotīti sabbakiccāni ekato karaṇavasena sabbiriyāpathesu saha gacchatīti sahāyo.
atk-s0513a1:2229_9: Māsaḍḍhamāsena cāti māsena vā aḍḍhamāsena vā.
atk-s0513a1:2229_11: Tatuttarinti tato uttariṃ ekato vāsena attasamopi hotiyeva.
atk-s0513a1:2229_12: Jaheyyanti “evarūpaṃ sahāyaṃ kathaṃ jaheyya”nti mittassa guṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2229_13: Tato paṭṭhāya puna koci tassa antare vattā nāma nāhosīti.
atk-s0513a1:2230_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2234_0: Ārogyamicche paramañca lābhanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ atthakusalaṃ kulaputtaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2234_1: Sāvatthiyañhi ekassa mahāvibhavassa seṭṭhino putto jātiyā sattavasso paññavā atthakusalo.
atk-s0513a1:2234_2: So ekadivasaṃ pitaraṃ upasaṅkamitvā atthassa dvārapañhaṃ nāma pucchi,
atk-s0513a1:2234_6: heṭṭhā ca avīcinā paricchinne lokasannivāse etaṃ pañhaṃ kathetuṃ samattho nāma natthī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2234_7: So puttamādāya bahuṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ gāhāpetvā jetavanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ pūjetvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “ayaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:2234_8: dārako paññavā atthakusalo maṃ atthassa dvārapañhaṃ nāma pucchi,
atk-s0513a1:2234_9: ahaṃ taṃ pañhaṃ ajānanto tumhākaṃ santikaṃ āgato, sādhu me, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:2234_15: idāni pana bhavasaṅkhepagatattā na sallakkhetī”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2235_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto mahāvibhavo seṭṭhi ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2235_1: Athassa putto sattavassiko jātiyā paññavā atthakusalo.
atk-s0513a1:2235_3: atthassa dvāraṃ nāma ki”nti atthassa dvārapañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:2235_4: Athassa pitā taṃ pañhaṃ kathento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2238_0: Dhammānuvattī ca alīnatā ca, atthassa dvārā pamukhā chaḷete”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2239_2: paṭhamameva ārogyasaṅkhātaṃ paramaṃ lābhaṃ iccheyyāti imamatthaṃ dīpento evamāha.
atk-s0513a1:2239_3: Tattha ārogyaṃ nāma sarīrassa ceva cittassa ca arogabhāvo anāturatā.
atk-s0513a1:2239_4: Sarīre hi rogāture neva aladdhaṃ bhogalābhaṃ uppādetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0513a1:2239_7: Citte ca kilesāture neva aladdhaṃ jhānādibhedaṃ lābhaṃ uppādetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0513a1:2239_9: Etasmiṃ anārogye sati aladdhopi lābho na labbhati,
atk-s0513a1:2239_12: laddhopi sātthako hotīti ārogyaṃ paramo lābho nāma.
atk-s0513a1:2239_20: Iminā imasmiṃ loke atthanissitaṃ bāhusaccaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0513a1:2239_22: Iminā duccaritadhammaṃ vajjetvā sucaritadhammassa anuvattanabhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0513a1:2239_24: Iminā cittassa asaṅkocataṃ paṇītabhāvaṃ uttamabhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0513a1:2239_25: Atthassa dvārā pamukhā chaḷeteti attho nāma vuḍḍhi,
atk-s0513a1:2239_26: tassa vuḍḍhisaṅkhātassa lokiyalokuttarassa atthassa ete pamukhā uttamā cha dvārā upāyā adhigamamukhānīti.
atk-s0513a1:2240_0: Evaṃ bodhisatto puttassa atthassa dvārapañhaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2240_1: So tato paṭṭhāya tesu chasu dhammesu vatti.
atk-s0513a1:2240_2: Bodhisattopi dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2241_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2245_0: Āyatiṃ dosaṃ nāññāyāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2245_1: Aññataro kira kulaputto buddhasāsane uraṃ datvā pabbajito ekadivasaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya caranto ekaṃ alaṅkataitthiṃ disvā ukkaṇṭhi.
atk-s0513a1:2245_2: Atha naṃ ācariyupajjhāyā satthu santikaṃ ānayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2245_3: Satthā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti pucchitvā “sacca”nti vutte “pañca kāmaguṇā nāmete bhikkhu paribhogakāle ramaṇīyā.
atk-s0513a1:2245_4: So pana tesaṃ paribhogo nirayādīsu paṭisandhidāyakattā kiṃpakkaphalaparibhogasadiso hoti.
atk-s0513a1:2245_6: khāditaṃ pana antāni khaṇḍitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpeti.
atk-s0513a1:2245_7: Pubbe bahū bālajanā tassa dosaṃ adisvā vaṇṇagandharasesu bajjhitvā taṃ phalaṃ paribhuñjitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇiṃsū”ti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2246_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto satthavāho hutvā pañcahi sakaṭasatehi pubbantāparantaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2246_1: gacchanto aṭavimukhaṃ patvā manusse sannipātetvā “imissā aṭaviyā visarukkhā nāma atthi,
atk-s0513a1:2246_2: mā kho maṃ anāpucchā pubbe akhāditapubbāni phalāphalāni khāditthā”ti ovadi.
atk-s0513a1:2246_3: Manussā aṭaviṃ atikkamitvā aṭavimukhe ekaṃ kiṃpakkarukkhaṃ phalabhāraoṇamitasākhaṃ addasaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2246_5: Tesu ekacce vaṇṇagandharasesu bajjhitvā ambaphalasaññāya phalāni khādiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:2246_7: Bodhisatto taṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā ye gahetvā ṭhitā,
atk-s0513a1:2246_10: te vamanaṃ kāretvā tesaṃ bhesajjaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2246_12: paṭhamameva khāditvā ṭhitā pana jīvitakkhayaṃ pattā.
atk-s0513a1:2246_13: Bodhisattopi icchitaṭṭhānaṃ sotthinā gantvā lābhaṃ labhitvā puna sakaṭṭhānameva āgantvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2247_0: Satthā taṃ vatthuṃ kathetvā abhisambuddho hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2251_0: Tattha āyatiṃ dosaṃ nāññāyāti anāgate dosaṃ na aññāya,
atk-s0513a1:2251_2: Yo kāme paṭisevatīti yo vatthukāme ca kilesakāme ca paṭisevati.
atk-s0513a1:2251_3: Vipākante hananti nanti te kāmā taṃ purisaṃ attano vipākasaṅkhāte ante nirayādīsu uppannaṃ nānappakārena dukkhena saṃyojayamānā hananti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0513a1:2251_5: yathā paribhogakāle vaṇṇagandharasasampattiyā manāpaṃ kiṃpakkaphalaṃ anāgatadosaṃ adisvā bhakkhitaṃ ante hanati,
atk-s0513a1:2251_7: evaṃ paribhogakāle manāpāpi kāmā vipākakāle hanantīti desanaṃ yathānusandhiṃ pāpetvā saccāni pakāsesi,
atk-s0513a1:2252_0: Satthāpi imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2256_0: Sīlaṃ kireva kalyāṇanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ sīlavīmaṃsakaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2256_1: So kira kosalarājānaṃ nissāya jīvati tisaraṇaṃ gato akhaṇḍapañcasīlo tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū.
atk-s0513a1:2256_3: So cintesi “ayaṃ rājā mayhaṃ aññehi brāhmaṇehi atirekasammānaṃ karoti,
atk-s0513a1:2256_5: kiṃ nu kho esa mama jātigottakulappadesasippasampattiṃ nissāya imaṃ sammānaṃ karoti,
atk-s0513a1:2256_8: So ekadivasaṃ rājūpaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā gharaṃ āgacchanto ekassa heraññikassa phalakato anāpucchitvā ekaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ gahetvā agamāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2256_9: heraññiko brāhmaṇe garubhāvena kiñci avatvā nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:2256_13: atha naṃ heraññiko “ajja te tatiyo divaso rājakuṭumbaṃ vilumpantassā”ti “rājakuṭumbavilumpakacoro me gahito”ti tikkhattuṃ viravi.
atk-s0513a1:2256_14: Atha naṃ manussā ito cito ca āgantvā “ciraṃdāni tvaṃ sīlavā viya vicarī”ti dve tayo pahāre datvā bandhitvā rañño dassesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2257_6: “Etaṃ mayā tayi mama atisammānaṃ karonte ‘kiṃ nu kho rājā mama jātiādīni nissāya atisammānaṃ karoti,
atk-s0513a1:2257_9: Yathā sīlameva nissāya tayā mama sammāno kato,
atk-s0513a1:2257_11: Tathā hi me idāni rājāṇaṃ kāresi,
atk-s0513a1:2257_12: svāhaṃ iminā kāraṇena ‘imasmiṃ loke sīlameva uttamaṃ sīlaṃ pamukha’nti sanniṭṭhānaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2257_13: Imassa panāhaṃ sīlassa anucchavikaṃ karonto gehe ṭhito kilese paribhuñjanto na sakkhissāmi kātuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2257_14: ajjeva jetavanaṃ gantvā satthu santike pabbajissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2257_16: devā”ti vatvā rājānaṃ anujānāpetvā jetavanābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2258_0: Atha naṃ ñātisuhajjabandhavā sannipatitvā nivāretuṃ asakkontā nivattiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2258_1: So satthu santikaṃ gantvā pabbajjaṃ yācitvā pabbajjañca upasampadañca labhitvā avissaṭṭhakammaṭṭhāno
atk-s0513a1:2258_2: vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ patvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā “bhante,
atk-s0513a1:2258_3: mayhaṃ pabbajjā matthakaṃ pattā”ti aññaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2258_4: Tassa taṃ aññabyākaraṇaṃ bhikkhusaṅghe pākaṭaṃ jātaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2258_6: asuko nāma rañño upaṭṭhākabrāhmaṇo attano sīlaṃ vīmaṃsitvā rājānaṃ āpucchitvā pabbajitvā arahatte patiṭṭhito”ti tassa guṇaṃ kathayamānā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2258_9: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:2258_11: idāni ayameva brāhmaṇo attano sīlaṃ vīmaṃsitvā pabbajitvā attano patiṭṭhaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2258_12: pubbepi paṇḍitā attano sīlaṃ vīmaṃsitvā pabbajitvā attano patiṭṭhaṃ kariṃsū”ti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2259_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa purohito ahosi dānādhimutto sīlajjhāsayo akhaṇḍapañcasīlo.
atk-s0513a1:2259_1: Rājā sesabrāhmaṇehi atirekaṃ tassa sammānaṃ karotīti sabbaṃ purimasadisameva.
atk-s0513a1:2259_2: Bodhisatte pana bandhitvā rañño santikaṃ nīyamāne ahituṇḍikā antaravīthiyaṃ sappaṃ kīḷāpentā naṅguṭṭhe gaṇhanti,
atk-s0513a1:2259_9: Ayañhi vo ḍaṃsitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpeyyā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2259_11: sappo sīlavā ācārasampanno tādiso dussīlo na hoti,
atk-s0513a1:2259_12: tvaṃ pana attano dussīlatāya anācārena rājakuṭumbavilumpakacoroti bandhitvā nīyasī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2260_0: So cintesi “sappāpi tāva aḍaṃsantā aviheṭhentā ‘sīlavanto’ti nāmaṃ labhanti,
atk-s0513a1:2260_11: “Atha kasmā kahāpaṇe aggahesī”ti ca vutte purimanayeneva sabbaṃ ārocento “svāhaṃ iminā kāraṇena ‘imasmiṃ loke sīlameva uttamaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2260_12: sīlaṃ pāmokkha’nti sanniṭṭhānaṃ gato”ti vatvā “tiṭṭhatu tāva idaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2260_13: āsīvisopi tāva aḍaṃsanto aviheṭhento ‘sīlavā’ti vattabbataṃ labhati.
atk-s0513a1:2260_15: sīlaṃ pavara”nti sīlaṃ vaṇṇento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2263_0: Passa ghoraviso nāgo, sīlavāti na haññatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2264_0: Tattha sīlaṃ kirevāti kāyavācācittehi avītikkamasaṅkhātaṃ ācārasīlameva.
atk-s0513a1:2264_4: Passāti attanā diṭṭhakāraṇaṃ abhimukhaṃ karonto katheti.
atk-s0513a1:2264_5: Sīlavāti na haññatīti ghoravisopi samāno aḍaṃsanaaviheṭhanamattakena sīlavāti pasaṃsaṃ labhati,
atk-s0513a1:2265_0: Evaṃ bodhisatto imāya gāthāya rañño dhammaṃ desetvā kāme pahāya isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavantaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a1:2265_1: pañcābhiññā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2266_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2270_0: Yassa maṅgalā samūhatāti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto ekaṃ sāṭakalakkhaṇabrāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2270_1: Rājagahavāsiko kireko brāhmaṇo kotuhalamaṅgaliko tīsu ratanesu appasanno micchādiṭṭhiko aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo,
atk-s0513a1:2270_2: tassa samugge ṭhapitaṃ sāṭakayugaṃ mūsikā khādiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2270_3: Athassa sīsaṃ nhāyitvā “sāṭake āharathā”ti vuttakāle mūsikāya khāditabhāvaṃ ārocayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2270_4: So cintesi “sace idaṃ mūsikādaṭṭhaṃ sāṭakayugaṃ imasmiṃ gehe bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:2270_6: Idañhi avamaṅgalaṃ kāḷakaṇṇisadisaṃ puttadhītādīnaṃ vā dāsakammakarādīnaṃ vā na sakkā dātuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2270_10: na kho pana sakkā dāsakammakarādīnaṃ hatthe dātuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2270_11: Te hi ettha lobhaṃ uppādetvā imaṃ gahetvā vināsaṃ pāpuṇeyyuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2270_13: So puttaṃ pakkosāpetvā tamatthaṃ ārocetvā “tvampi naṃ, tāta,
atk-s0513a1:2270_14: hatthena aphusitvā daṇḍakena gahetvā āmakasusāne chaḍḍetvā sīsaṃ nhāyitvā ehī”ti pesesi.
atk-s0513a1:2271_0: Satthāpi kho taṃ divasaṃ paccūsasamaye bodhaneyyabandhave olokento imesaṃ pitāputtānaṃ sotāpattiphalassa
atk-s0513a1:2271_1: upanissayaṃ disvā migavīthiṃ gahetvā migaluddako viya gantvā āmakasusānadvāre nisīdi chabbaṇṇabuddharasmiyo
atk-s0513a1:2271_3: Māṇavopi pitu vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā ajagarasappaṃ viya taṃ yugasāṭakaṃ yaṭṭhikoṭiyā gahetvā āmakasusānadvāraṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a1:2271_4: Atha naṃ satthā “kiṃ karosi māṇavā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2271_7: mama pitā ‘añño etaṃ chaḍḍento lobhaṃ uppādetvā gaṇheyyā’ti bhayena maṃ pahiṇi,
atk-s0513a1:2271_12: satthā “amhākaṃ dāni vaṭṭatī”ti tassa sammukhāva gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a1:2271_16: mā gaṇhi mā gaṇhī”ti tasmiṃ vārayamāneyeva taṃ gahetvā veḷuvanābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2272_1: mayā āmakasusāne chaḍḍitaṃ sāṭakayugaṃ samaṇo gotamo ‘amhākaṃ vaṭṭatī’ti mayā vāriyamānopi gahetvā veḷuvanaṃ gato”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2272_6: samaṇassa gotamassa aññe bahū sāṭake datvā taṃ chaḍḍāpessāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2272_7: So bahū sāṭake gāhāpetvā puttena saddhiṃ veḷuvanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ disvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito evamāha “saccaṃ kira vo,
atk-s0513a1:2272_15: Sace vo nivāsanaṃ vā pārupanaṃ vā nappahoti,
atk-s0513a1:2272_17: Atha naṃ satthā “mayaṃ brāhmaṇa pabbajitā nāma,
atk-s0513a1:2272_18: amhākaṃ āmakasusāne antaravīthiyaṃ saṅkāraṭṭhāne nhānatitthe mahāmaggeti evarūpesu ṭhānesu chaḍḍitā vā patitā vā pilotikā vaṭṭati,
atk-s0513a1:2272_20: pubbepi evaṃladdhikoyevā”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2273_0: Atīte magadharaṭṭhe rājagahanagare dhammiko magadharājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a1:2273_1: Tadā bodhisatto ekasmiṃ udiccabrāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patto isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā abhiññā
atk-s0513a1:2273_2: ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā himavante vasamāno ekasmiṃ kāle himavantato nikkhamitvā rājagahanagare
atk-s0513a1:2273_3: rājuyyānaṃ patvā tattha vasitvā dutiyadivase bhikkhācāratthāya nagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:2273_4: Rājā taṃ disvā pakkosāpetvā pāsāde nisīdāpetvā bhojetvā uyyāneyeva vasanatthāya paṭiññaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a1:2273_5: Bodhisatto rañño nivesane bhuñjitvā uyyāne vasati.
atk-s0513a1:2273_6: Tasmiṃ kāle rājagahanagare dussalakkhaṇabrāhmaṇo nāma ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2273_7: Tassa samugge ṭhapitaṃ sāṭakayuganti sabbaṃ purimasadisameva.
atk-s0513a1:2274_0: Māṇave pana susānaṃ gacchante bodhisatto paṭhamataraṃ gantvā susānadvāre nisīditvā tena chaḍḍitaṃ sāṭakayugaṃ gahetvā uyyānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2274_2: Pitā “rājakulūpako tāpaso nasseyyā”ti bodhisattassa santikaṃ gantvā “tāpasa,
atk-s0513a1:2274_8: tasmā paṇḍitena nāma kotuhalamaṅgalikena na bhavitabba”nti brāhmaṇassa dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0513a1:2274_9: Brāhmaṇo dhammaṃ sutvā diṭṭhiṃ bhinditvā bodhisattaṃ saraṇaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2275_0: Satthāpi imaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā abhisambuddho hutvā brāhmaṇassa dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2277_0: “Yassa maṅgalā samūhatā, uppātā supinā ca lakkhaṇā ca;
atk-s0513a1:2279_0: Tattha yassa maṅgalā samūhatāti yassa arahato khīṇāsavassa diṭṭhamaṅgalaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2279_3: Uppātā supinā ca lakkhaṇā cāti “evarūpo candaggāho bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:2279_7: evarūpo disāḍāho bhavissatī”ti ime pañca mahāuppātā,
atk-s0513a1:2279_20: vatthalakkhaṇanti evamādikāni lakkhaṇāni ime ca diṭṭhiṭṭhānā yassa samūhatā,
atk-s0513a1:2279_21: na etehi uppātādīhi attano maṅgalaṃ vā avamaṅgalaṃ vā pacceti.
atk-s0513a1:2279_22: So maṅgaladosavītivattoti so khīṇāsavo sabbamaṅgaladose vītivatto atikkanto pajahitvā ṭhito.
atk-s0513a1:2279_24: makkho ca paḷāso cā”tiādinā nayena dve dve ekato āgatakilesā yugā nāma. Kāmayogo,
atk-s0513a1:2279_27: avijjāyogoti ime saṃsāre yojanabhāvato cattāro yogā nāma.
atk-s0513a1:2279_28: Te yuge ca yoge cāti yugayoge adhigato abhibhavitvā gato vītivatto samatikkanto khīṇāsavo bhikkhu.
atk-s0513a1:2279_29: Na jātumetīti puna paṭisandhivasena ekaṃseneva imaṃ lokaṃ na eti nāgacchatīti.
atk-s0513a1:2280_0: Evaṃ satthā imāya gāthāya brāhmaṇassa dhammaṃ desetvā saccāni pakāsesi,
atk-s0513a1:2280_1: saccapariyosāne brāhmaṇo saddhiṃ puttena sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0513a1:2284_0: Kalyāṇimeva muñceyyāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto omasavādasikkhāpadaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2284_2: Imasmiṃ pana jātake bodhisatto gandhāraraṭṭhe takkasilāyaṃ aññatarassa brāhmaṇassa sārambho nāma balibaddo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2284_3: Satthā idaṃ atītavatthuṃ kathetvā abhisambuddho hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2287_0: Mokkho kalyāṇiyā sādhu, mutvā tappati pāpika”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2288_0: Tattha kalyāṇimeva muñceyyāti catudosavinimuttaṃ kalyāṇiṃ sundaraṃ anavajjaṃ vācameva muñceyya vissajjeyya katheyya.
atk-s0513a1:2288_1: Na hi muñceyya pāpikanti pāpikaṃ lāmikaṃ paresaṃ appiyaṃ amanāpaṃ na muñceyya na katheyya.
atk-s0513a1:2288_2: Mokkho kalyāṇiyā sādhūti kalyāṇavācāya vissajjanameva imasmiṃ loke sādhu sundaraṃ bhaddakaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2288_3: Mutvā tappati pāpikanti pāpikaṃ pharusavācaṃ muñcitvā vissajjetvā kathetvā so puggalo tappati socati kilamatīti.
atk-s0513a1:2289_0: Evaṃ satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2293_0: Vācāva kira te āsīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ kuhakabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2294_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente ekaṃ gāmakaṃ upanissāya eko kūṭajaṭilo kuhakatāpaso vasati.
atk-s0513a1:2294_1: Eko kuṭumbiko tassa araññe paṇṇasālaṃ kāretvā tattha naṃ vāsento attano gehe paṇītāhārena paṭijaggati.
atk-s0513a1:2294_2: So taṃ kūṭajaṭilaṃ “sīlavā eso”ti saddahitvā corabhayena suvaṇṇanikkhasataṃ tassa paṇṇasālaṃ netvā bhūmigataṃ katvā “idaṃ olokeyyāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2294_7: amhākaṃ pana parasantake lobho nāma natthī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2294_10: Duṭṭhatāpaso “sakkā ettakena jīvitu”nti katipāhaṃ atikkamitvā taṃ suvaṇṇaṃ gahetvā antarāmagge ekasmiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2294_11: ṭhāne ṭhapetvā āgantvā paṇṇasālāyameva vasitvā punadivase tassa gehe bhattakiccaṃ katvā evamāha “āvuso,
atk-s0513a1:2294_13: aticiraṃ ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vasantānaṃ manussehi saddhiṃ saṃsaggo hoti,
atk-s0513a1:2294_15: tasmā gacchāmaha”nti vatvā tena punappunaṃ yāciyamānopi nivattituṃ na icchi.
atk-s0513a1:2294_18: Tāpasopi thokaṃ gantvāva “imaṃ kuṭumbikaṃ mayā vañcetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā jaṭānaṃ antare tiṇaṃ ṭhapetvā paṭinivatti.
atk-s0513a1:2294_21: Āvuso tumhākaṃ gehacchadanato me jaṭāsu ekatiṇaṃ laggaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2294_25: bhante”ti vatvā “tiṇasalākampi nāma parasantakaṃ na gaṇhāti,
atk-s0513a1:2294_26: aho kukkuccako me ayyo”ti pasīditvā vanditvā uyyojesi.
atk-s0513a1:2295_0: Tadā pana bodhisattena bhaṇḍatthāya paccantaṃ gacchantena tasmiṃ nivesane nivāso gahito hoti.
atk-s0513a1:2295_1: So tāpasassa vacanaṃ sutvāva “addhā iminā duṭṭhatāpasena imassa kiñci gahitaṃ bhavissatī”ti kuṭumbikaṃ pucchi “atthi pana te, samma,
atk-s0513a1:2295_2: kiñci etassa tāpasassa santike nikkhitta”nti? “Atthi, samma,
atk-s0513a1:2295_6: So paṇṇasālaṃ gantvā taṃ adisvā vegenāgantvā “natthi,
atk-s0513a1:2295_10: taṃ anubandhitvā gaṇhāmā”ti vegena gantvā kūṭatāpasaṃ gaṇhitvā hatthehi ca pādehi ca pothetvā suvaṇṇaṃ āharāpetvā gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2295_11: Bodhisatto suvaṇṇaṃ disvā “nikkhasataṃ haramāno asajjitvā tiṇamatte sattosī”ti vatvā taṃ garahanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2298_0: Tiṇamatte asajjittho, no ca nikkhasataṃ hara”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2299_1: saṇhā sakhilabhāṇinoti “pabbajitānaṃ tiṇamattampi adinnaṃ ādātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti evaṃ sakhilaṃ muduvacanaṃ vadantassa vācā eva kira te saṇhā āsi,
atk-s0513a1:2299_3: Tiṇamatte asajjitthoti kūṭajaṭila ekissā tiṇasalākāya kukkuccaṃ kurumāno tvaṃ satto āsatto laggo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2299_4: No ca nikkhasataṃ haranti imaṃ pana nikkhasataṃ haranto asatto nillaggova jātosīti.
atk-s0513a1:2300_0: Evaṃ bodhisatto taṃ garahitvā “mā puna, kūṭajaṭila, evarūpamakāsī”ti ovādaṃ datvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2305_0: Yo pubbe katakalyāṇoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto anāthapiṇḍikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2305_1: Tassa kireko paccantavāsiko seṭṭhi adiṭṭhasahāyo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2305_2: So ekadā paccante uṭṭhānakabhaṇḍassa pañca sakaṭasatāni pūretvā kammantikamanusse āha –
atk-s0513a1:2305_4: imaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ sāvatthiṃ netvā amhākaṃ sahāyakassa anāthapiṇḍikamahāseṭṭhissa paccagghena vikkiṇitvā paṭibhaṇḍaṃ āharathā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2305_5: Te “sādhū”ti tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā sāvatthiṃ gantvā mahāseṭṭhiṃ disvā paṇṇākāraṃ datvā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2305_6: Mahāseṭṭhi “svāgataṃ vo”ti tesaṃ āvāsañca paribbayañca dāpetvā sahāyakassa sukhaṃ pucchitvā bhaṇḍaṃ vikkiṇitvā paṭibhaṇḍaṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2305_7: Te paccantaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ attano seṭṭhissa ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2306_0: Aparabhāge anāthapiṇḍikopi tatheva pañca sakaṭasatāni tattha pesesi.
atk-s0513a1:2306_1: Manussā tattha gantvā paṇṇākāraṃ ādāya paccantavāsikaseṭṭhiṃ passiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2306_2: So “kuto āgacchathā”ti pucchitvā “sāvatthito tumhākaṃ sahāyakassa anāthapiṇḍikassa santikā”ti vutte “anāthapiṇḍikoti
atk-s0513a1:2306_3: kassaci purisassa nāmaṃ bhavissatī”ti parihāsaṃ katvā paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā “gacchatha tumhe”ti uyyojesi,
atk-s0513a1:2306_6: Te sayameva bhaṇḍaṃ vikkiṇitvā paṭibhaṇḍaṃ ādāya sāvatthiṃ āgantvā seṭṭhissa taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2307_0: Atha so paccantavāsī punapi ekavāraṃ tatheva pañca sakaṭasatāni sāvatthiṃ pesesi,
atk-s0513a1:2307_2: Te pana disvā anāthapiṇḍikassa manussā “mayaṃ, sāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2307_3: etesaṃ nivāsañca bhattañca paribbayañca jānissāmā”ti vatvā tesaṃ sakaṭāni bahinagare tathārūpe ṭhāne mocāpetvā “tumhe idheva vasatha,
atk-s0513a1:2307_4: amhākaṃ vo ghare yāgubhattañca paribbayo ca bhavissatī”ti gantvā dāsakammakare sannipātetvā majjhimayāmasamanantare
atk-s0513a1:2307_5: pañca sakaṭasatāni vilumpitvā nivāsanapārupanānipi nesaṃ acchinditvā goṇe palāpetvā sakaṭāni vicakkāni
atk-s0513a1:2307_6: katvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā cakkānipi gaṇhitvāva agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2307_7: Paccantavāsino nivāsanamattassapi sāmikā ahutvā bhītā vegena palāyitvā paccantameva gatā.
atk-s0513a1:2307_9: So “atthi dānidaṃ kathāpābhata”nti satthu santikaṃ gantvā ādito paṭṭhāya sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:2307_12: pubbepi evaṃsīloyeva ahosī”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2308_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto bārāṇasiyaṃ mahāvibhavo seṭṭhi ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2308_2: Sabbaṃ atītavatthu paccuppannavatthusadisameva bodhisatto pana attano manussehi “ajja amhehi idaṃ nāma
atk-s0513a1:2308_3: kata”nti ārocite “paṭhamaṃ attano kataṃ upakāraṃ ajānantā pacchā evarūpaṃ labhantiyevā”ti vatvā sampattaparisāya
atk-s0513a1:2312_1: khattiyādīsu yo koci puriso pubbe paṭhamataraṃ aññena katakalyāṇo katūpakāro katattho nipphāditakicco
atk-s0513a1:2312_2: hutvā taṃ parena attani kataṃ kalyāṇañceva atthañca na jānāti,
atk-s0513a1:2312_3: so pacchā attano kicce samuppanne tassa kiccassa kattāraṃ nādhigacchati na labhatīti.
atk-s0513a1:2313_0: Evaṃ bodhisatto imāya gāthāya dhammaṃ desetvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2314_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2324_0: Littaṃ paramena tejasāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto apaccavekkhitaparibhogaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2324_1: Tasmiṃ kira kāle bhikkhū cīvarādīni labhitvā yebhuyyena apaccavekkhitvā paribhuñjanti.
atk-s0513a1:2324_2: Te cattāro paccaye apaccavekkhitvā paribhuñjamānā yebhuyyena nirayatiracchānayonito na muccanti.
atk-s0513a1:2324_3: Satthā taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā bhikkhūnaṃ anekapariyāyena dhammiṃ kathaṃ kathetvā apaccavekkhitaparibhoge ādīnavaṃ dassetvā “bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a1:2324_4: bhikkhunā nāma cattāro paccaye labhitvā apaccavekkhitvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0513a1:2324_5: tasmā ito paṭṭhāya cattāro paccaye paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjeyyāthā”ti paccavekkhanavidhiṃ dassento “idha pana,
atk-s0513a1:2324_7: bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṃ paṭisevati sītassa paṭighātāyā”tiādinā nayena tantiṃ ṭhapetvā “bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a1:2324_8: cattāro paccaye evaṃ paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0513a1:2324_10: Porāṇakā hi apaccavekkhitvā dosaṃ ajānitvā visaṃ paribhuñjitvā vipākante mahādukkhaṃ anubhaviṃsū”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2325_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto aññatarasmiṃ mahābhogakule nibbattitvā vayappatto akkhadhutto ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2325_1: Athāparo kūṭakkhadhutto bodhisattena saddhiṃ kīḷanto attano jaye vattamāne keḷimaṇḍalaṃ na bhindati,
atk-s0513a1:2325_2: parājayakāle pana akkhaṃ mukhe pakkhipitvā “akkho naṭṭho”ti keḷimaṇḍalaṃ bhinditvā pakkamati.
atk-s0513a1:2325_4: jānissāmettha patirūpakāraṇa”nti akkhe ādāya attano ghare halāhalavisena rañjitvā punappunaṃ sukkhāpetvā te ādāya tassa santikaṃ gantvā “ehi, samma,
atk-s0513a1:2325_7: sammā”ti keḷimaṇḍalaṃ sajjetvā tena saddhiṃ kīḷanto attano parājayakāle ekaṃ akkhaṃ mukhe pakkhipi.
atk-s0513a1:2325_8: Atha naṃ bodhisatto tathā karontaṃ disvā “gilāhi tāva,
atk-s0513a1:2325_9: pacchā idaṃ nāmetanti jānissasī”ti codetuṃ imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2327_0: “Littaṃ paramena tejasā, gilamakkhaṃ puriso na bujjhati;
atk-s0513a1:2328_0: Gila re gila pāpadhuttaka, pacchā te kaṭukaṃ bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2329_4: Na bujjhatīti “ayaṃ me gilato idaṃ nāma karissatī”ti na jānāti.
atk-s0513a1:2329_7: Pacchā te kaṭukaṃ bhavissatīti imasmiṃ te akkhe gilite pacchā etaṃ visaṃ tikhiṇaṃ bhavissatīti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2330_0: So bodhisattassa kathentasseva visavegena mucchito akkhīni parivattetvā khandhaṃ nāmetvā pati.
atk-s0513a1:2330_1: Bodhisatto “idānissa jīvitadānaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti osadhaparibhāvitaṃ vamanayogaṃ datvā vametvā sappiphāṇitamadhusakkarādayo
atk-s0513a1:2330_2: khādāpetvā arogaṃ katvā “puna evarūpaṃ mā akāsī”ti ovaditvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2331_1: apaccavekkhitaparibhogo nāma apaccavekkhitvā katavisaparibhogasadiso hotī”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2331_6: Yo pana imasmiṃ kāle na paññāyati,
atk-s0513a1:2335_0: Ukkaṭṭhe sūramicchantīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto āyasmantaṃ ānandattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2335_1: Ekasmiñhi samaye kosalarañño itthiyo cintayiṃsu “buddhuppādo nāma dullabho,
atk-s0513a1:2335_4: Mayañca imaṃ dullabhaṃ khaṇasamavāyaṃ labhitvāpi attano ruciyā vihāraṃ gantvā dhammaṃ vā sotuṃ buddhapūjaṃ vā kātuṃ dānaṃ vā dātuṃ na labhāma,
atk-s0513a1:2335_6: rañño kathetvā amhākaṃ dhammaṃ desetuṃ anucchavikaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ pakkosāpetvā tassa santike dhammaṃ sossāma,
atk-s0513a1:2335_10: Evaṃ no ayaṃ khaṇapaṭilābho saphalo bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2335_11: Tā sabbāpi rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā attanā cintitakāraṇaṃ kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2336_0: Athekadivasaṃ rājā uyyānakīḷaṃ kīḷitukāmo uyyānapālaṃ pakkosāpetvā “uyyānaṃ sodhehī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2336_1: Uyyānapālo uyyānaṃ sodhento satthāraṃ aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisinnaṃ disvā rañño santikaṃ gantvā “suddhaṃ, deva, uyyānaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2336_2: apicettha aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle bhagavā nisinno”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2336_4: satthu santike dhammampi sossāmā”ti alaṅkatarathaṃ abhiruhitvā uyyānaṃ gantvā satthu santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2337_0: Tasmiñca samaye chattapāṇi nāmeko anāgāmī upāsako satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇamāno nisinno hoti.
atk-s0513a1:2337_1: Rājā taṃ disvā āsaṅkamāno muhuttaṃ ṭhatvā puna “sacāyaṃ pāpako bhaveyya,
atk-s0513a1:2337_2: na satthu santike nisīditvā dhammaṃ suṇeyya,
atk-s0513a1:2337_3: apāpakena iminā bhavitabba”nti cintetvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:2337_4: Upāsako buddhagāravena rañño paccuṭṭhānaṃ vā vandanaṃ vā na akāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2337_6: Satthā tassa anattamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā upāsakassa guṇaṃ kathesi “ayaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0513a1:2337_7: upāsako bahussuto āgatāgamo kāmesu vītarāgo”ti rājā “na iminā orakena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2337_11: Rājā satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā satthāraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:2338_0: So ekadivasaṃ uparipāsāde mahāvātapānaṃ vivaritvā ṭhito taṃ upāsakaṃ bhuttapātarāsaṃ chattamādāya jetavanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2338_1: gacchantaṃ disvā pakkosāpetvā evamāha “tvaṃ kira, upāsaka,
atk-s0513a1:2338_3: amhākañca itthiyo dhammaṃ sotukāmā ceva uggahetukāmā ca,
atk-s0513a1:2338_4: sādhu vatassa sace tāsaṃ dhammaṃ vāceyyāsī”ti. “Deva,
atk-s0513a1:2338_5: gihīnaṃ nāma rājantepure dhammaṃ desetuṃ vā vācetuṃ vā nappatirūpaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2338_7: Rājā “saccaṃ esa vadatī”ti uyyojetvā itthiyo pakkosāpetvā “bhadde,
atk-s0513a1:2338_8: ahaṃ tumhākaṃ dhammadesanatthāya ca dhammavācanatthāya ca satthu santikaṃ gantvā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ yācāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2338_10: Tā sabbāpi mantetvā dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ ānandattherameva ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2338_11: Rājā satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno evamāha “bhante,
atk-s0513a1:2338_12: amhākaṃ gehe itthiyo ānandattherassa santike dhammaṃ sotuñca uggaṇhituñca icchanti,
atk-s0513a1:2338_13: sādhu vata sace thero amhākaṃ gehe dhammaṃ deseyya ceva vāceyya cā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2338_15: Tato paṭṭhāya rañño itthiyo therassa santike dhammaṃ suṇanti ceva uggaṇhanti ca.
atk-s0513a1:2339_1: Rājā tassa naṭṭhabhāvaṃ sutvā amacce āṇāpesi “sabbe antovaḷañjanake manusse gahetvā cūḷāmaṇiṃ āharāpethā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2339_2: Amaccā mātugāme ādiṃ katvā cūḷāmaṇiṃ paripucchantā adisvā mahājanaṃ kilamenti.
atk-s0513a1:2339_4: Yathā tā itthiyo pubbe theraṃ disvāva haṭṭhatuṭṭhā dhammaṃ suṇanti ceva uggaṇhanti ca,
atk-s0513a1:2339_6: Tato therena “kasmā tumhe ajja evarūpā jātā”ti pucchitā evamāhaṃsu “bhante,
atk-s0513a1:2339_7: rañño cūḷāmaṇiṃ pariyesāmāti amaccā mātugāme upādāya antovaḷañjanake kilamenti,
atk-s0513a1:2339_10: Thero “mā cintayitthā”ti tā samassāsetvā rañño santikaṃ gantvā paññattāsane nisīditvā “maṇi kira te, mahārāja,
atk-s0513a1:2339_14: sabbaṃ antojanaṃ gahetvā kilamentopi na sakkomi āharāpetu”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2339_24: te gahetvā ekekassa ekekaṃ palālapiṇḍaṃ vā mattikāpiṇḍaṃ vā datvā ‘imaṃ paccūsakāle āharitvā asukaṭṭhāne nāma pātethā’ti vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2339_32: maṇiñca labhissasī”ti evaṃ vatvā thero agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2340_6: mahātalasmiṃyeva paṭicchannaṭṭhāne mahācāṭiṃ ṭhapāpetvā udakassa pūrāpetvā sāṇiṃ parikkhipāpetvā ‘sabbe
atk-s0513a1:2340_7: antovaḷañjanakamanussā ca itthiyo ca uttarāsaṅgaṃ katvā ekekova antosāṇiṃ pavisitvā hatthaṃ dhovitvā
atk-s0513a1:2340_8: āgacchantū’ti vadehī”ti thero imaṃ upāyaṃ ācikkhitvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:2340_10: Maṇicoro cintesi “dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ ādāya maṇiṃ adassetvā osakkissatīti aṭṭhānametaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2340_11: pātetuṃ dāni vaṭṭatī”ti maṇiṃ paṭicchannaṃ katvā ādāya antosāṇiṃ pavisitvā cāṭiyaṃ pātetvā nikkhami.
atk-s0513a1:2340_12: Sabbesaṃ nikkhantakāle udakaṃ chaḍḍetvā maṇiṃ addasaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2340_13: Rājā “theraṃ nissāya mahājanaṃ akilametvāva me maṇi laddho”ti tussi,
atk-s0513a1:2340_15: “Therassānubhāvena rañño cūḷāmaṇi laddho”ti therassānubhāvo sakalanagare ceva bhikkhusaṅghe ca pākaṭo jāto.
atk-s0513a1:2341_0: Dhammasabhāyaṃ sannisinnā bhikkhū therassa guṇaṃ vaṇṇayiṃsu “āvuso,
atk-s0513a1:2341_1: ānandatthero attano bahussutatāya paṇḍiccena upāyakusalatāya mahājanaṃ akilametvā upāyeneva rañño maṇiṃ dassesī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2341_4: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:2341_7: pubbepi paṇḍitā mahājanaṃ akilametvā upāyeneva tiracchānahatthagataṃ bhaṇḍaṃ dassayiṃsū”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2342_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto sabbasippesu nipphattiṃ patto tasseva amacco ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2342_1: Athekadivasaṃ rājā mahantena parivārena uyyānaṃ gantvā vanantarāni vicaritvā udakakīḷaṃ kīḷitukāmo maṅgalapokkharaṇiṃ otaritvā itthāgārampi pakkosi.
atk-s0513a1:2342_2: Itthiyo attano attano sīsūpagagīvūpagādīni ābharaṇāni omuñcitvā uttarāsaṅgesu pakkhipitvā samuggapiṭṭhesu
atk-s0513a1:2342_4: Athekā uyyānamakkaṭī sākhantare nisinnā deviṃ piḷandhanāni omuñcitvā uttarāsaṅge pakkhipitvā samuggapiṭṭhe
atk-s0513a1:2342_5: ṭhapayamānaṃ disvā tassā muttāhāraṃ piḷandhitukāmā hutvā dāsiyā pamādaṃ olokayamānā nisīdi,
atk-s0513a1:2342_6: dāsīpi taṃ rakkhamānā tahaṃ tahaṃ oloketvā nisinnāyeva niddāyituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a1:2342_7: Makkaṭī tassā pamādabhāvaṃ ñatvā vātavegena otaritvā mahāmuttāhāraṃ gīvāya paṭimuñcitvā vātavegena uppatitvā
atk-s0513a1:2342_8: sākhantare nisīditvā aññāsaṃ makkaṭīnaṃ dassanabhayena ekasmiṃ rukkhasusiraṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā upasantūpasantā
atk-s0513a1:2343_0: Sāpi kho dāsī paṭibujjhitvā muttāhāraṃ apassantī kampamānā aññaṃ upāyaṃ adisvā “puriso deviyā muttāhāraṃ gahetvā palāto”ti mahāviravaṃ viravi.
atk-s0513a1:2343_1: Ārakkhamanussā tato tato sannipatitvā tassā vacanaṃ sutvā rañño ārocayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2343_4: coraṃ gaṇhathā”ti ito cito ca olokenti.
atk-s0513a1:2343_5: Atheko jānapado balikārakapuriso taṃ saddaṃ sutvā kampamāno palāyi.
atk-s0513a1:2343_6: Taṃ disvā rājapurisā “ayaṃ coro bhavissatī”ti anubandhitvā taṃ gahetvā pothetvā “are,
atk-s0513a1:2343_8: evaṃ mahāsāraṃ nāma piḷandhanaṃ avaharissasī”ti paribhāsiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2343_14: Atha naṃ bandhitvā rañño santikaṃ ānayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2343_15: Rājāpi naṃ pucchi “gahitaṃ te mahāsārapiḷandhana”nti? “Āma, devā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2343_17: mayā mahāsāraṃ nāma mañcapīṭhampi na diṭṭhapubbaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2344_0: Rājā seṭṭhiṃ pakkosāpetvā “gahitaṃ te imassa hatthato mahāsārapiḷandhana”nti pucchi. “Āma, devā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2344_5: Tampi pakkosāpetvā “purohitassa hatthato te mahāsārapiḷandhanaṃ gahita”nti pucchi. “Āma, devā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2344_10: Te pañca jane pucchantānaññeva sūriyo atthaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2344_12: sve jānissāmā”ti te pañca jane amaccānaṃ datvā nagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:2345_4: tasmā antovaḷañjanakānampi taṃ gahetvā palāyituṃ na sakkā.
atk-s0513a1:2345_7: Iminā duggatamanussena ‘seṭṭhissa me dinna’nti kathentena attano mokkhatthāya kathitaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:2345_8: seṭṭhināpi ‘purohitassa me dinna’nti kathentena ‘ekato hutvā nittharissāmī’ti cintetvā kathitaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:2345_9: purohitenāpi ‘gandhabbassa me dinna’nti kathentena ‘bandhanāgāre gandhabbaṃ nissāya sukhena vasissāmā’ti cintetvā kathitaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:2345_10: gandhabbenāpi ‘vaṇṇadāsiyā me dinna’nti kathentena ‘ekantena anukkaṇṭhitā bhavissāmā’ti cintetvā kathitaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:2345_13: piḷandhanena ekissā makkaṭiyā hatthe āruḷhena bhavitabba”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2346_0: Bodhisatto attano dāsapurise pakkosāpetvā te pañca jane ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne vasāpetvā samantā ārakkhaṃ katvā kaṇṇaṃ datvā “yaṃ te aññamaññaṃ kathenti,
atk-s0513a1:2346_3: Tato manussānaṃ sannisinnavelāya seṭṭhi taṃ gahapatikaṃ āha – “are,
atk-s0513a1:2346_7: kadā te mayhaṃ piḷandhanaṃ dinna”nti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2346_9: ahaṃ mahāsāraṃ nāma rukkhasārapādakaṃ mañcapīṭhampi na jānāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2346_10: ‘taṃ nissāya pana mokkhaṃ labhissāmī’ti evaṃ avacaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2346_14: tvaṃ iminā attano adinnakameva mayhaṃ kathaṃ adāsī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:2346_16: amhākaṃ ekato hutvā ṭhitakāle kammaṃ khippaṃ nipphajjissatī”ti kathesinti.
atk-s0513a1:2346_19: “Ahaṃ taṃ nissāya vasanaṭṭhāne sukhaṃ vasissāmī”ti kathesinti.
atk-s0513a1:2346_27: Bodhisatto payojitamanussānaṃ santikā taṃ kathaṃ sutvā tesaṃ tathato acorabhāvaṃ ñatvā “makkaṭiyā gahitapiḷandhanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2346_28: upāyeneva pātessāmī”ti geṇḍumayāni bahūni piḷandhanāni kāretvā uyyāne makkaṭiyo gāhāpetvā hatthapādagīvāsu
atk-s0513a1:2346_30: Itarā makkaṭī piḷandhanaṃ rakkhamānā uyyāne eva nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:2347_4: Tāpi kho makkaṭiyo “piḷandhanaṃ no laddha”nti tuṭṭhapahaṭṭhā uyyāne vicarantiyo tassā santikaṃ gantvā “passa amhākaṃ piḷandhana”nti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2347_5: Sā makkaṭī asahamānā “kiṃ iminā geṇḍupiḷandhanenā”ti muttāhāraṃ piḷandhitvā nikkhami.
atk-s0513a1:2347_6: Atha naṃ te purisā disvā piḷandhanaṃ chaḍḍāpetvā āharitvā bodhisattassa adaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2347_7: So taṃ ādāya rañño dassetvā “idaṃ te deva piḷandhanaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2347_9: idaṃ pana uyyāne makkaṭiyā ābhata”nti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2347_14: Rājā tuṭṭhamānaso “saṅgāmasīsādīsu nāma sūrādayo icchitabbā hontī”ti bodhisattassa thutiṃ karonto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2350_0: Piyañca annapānamhi, atthe jāte ca paṇḍita”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2351_2: Sūramicchantīti asaniyāpi matthake patamānāya apalāyinaṃ sūraṃ icchanti,
atk-s0513a1:2351_3: tasmiṃ khaṇe evarūpo saṅgāmayodho patthetabbo hoti.
