atk-s0513a1:2351_4: Mantīsu akutūhalanti kattabbākattabbakiccaṃ sammantanakāle uppanne mantīsu yo akutūhalo avikiṇṇavāco mantaṃ na bhindati,
atk-s0513a1:2351_7: Piyañca annapānamhīti madhure annapāne paccupaṭṭhite sahaparibhuñjanatthāya piyapuggalaṃ patthenti,
atk-s0513a1:2351_9: Atthe jāte ca paṇḍitanti atthagambhīre dhammagambhīre kismiñcideva kāraṇe vā pañhe vā uppanne paṇḍitaṃ vicakkhaṇaṃ icchanti.
atk-s0513a1:2351_10: Tathārūpo hi tasmiṃ samaye patthetabbo hotīti.
atk-s0513a1:2352_0: Evaṃ rājā bodhisattaṃ vaṇṇetvā thometvā ghanavassaṃ vassento mahāmegho viya sattāhi ratanehi pūjetvā
atk-s0513a1:2352_1: tassovāde ṭhatvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato,
atk-s0513a1:2353_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā therassa guṇaṃ kathetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2357_0: Na vissase avissattheti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto vissāsabhojanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2357_1: Tasmiṃ kira samaye yebhuyyena bhikkhū “mātarā no dinnaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2357_7: Amhākaṃ gihikālepi bhikkhukālepi ete dātuṃ yuttarūpāvā”ti ñātīhi dinne cattāro paccaye vissatthā hutvā apaccavekkhitvā paribhuñjanti.
atk-s0513a1:2357_8: Satthā taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā “bhikkhūnaṃ mayā dhammadesanaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti bhikkhū sannipātāpetvā “bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a1:2357_9: bhikkhunā nāma ñātīhipi aññātīhipi dinnake cattāro paccaye paccavekkhitvāva paribhogo kātabbo.
atk-s0513a1:2357_10: Apaccavekkhitvā paribhogaṃ katvā hi kālaṃ kurumāno bhikkhu yakkhapetaattabhāvato na muccati,
atk-s0513a1:2357_12: Visañhi vissāsikena dinnakampi avissāsikena dinnakampi māretiyeva.
atk-s0513a1:2357_13: Pubbepi vissāsena dinnaṃ visaṃ paribhuñjitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pattā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2358_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto mahāvibhavo seṭṭhi ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2358_1: Tasseko gopālako kiṭṭhasambādhasamaye gāvo gahetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā tattha gosālaṃ katvā rakkhanto vasati.
atk-s0513a1:2358_2: Seṭṭhino ca kālena kālaṃ gorasaṃ āharati.
atk-s0513a1:2358_3: Athassa gosālāya avidūre sīho nivāsaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a1:2358_4: Gāvīnaṃ sīhasantāsena milātānaṃ khīraṃ mandaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2358_5: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ sappiṃ ādāya āgataṃ seṭṭhi pucchi “kiṃ nu kho,
atk-s0513a1:2358_14: “Tena hi taṃ gahetvā tassā nalāṭato paṭṭhāya sarīre lomāni visena punappunaṃ rajitvā sukkhāpetvā dve
atk-s0513a1:2358_15: tayo divase atikkāmetvā taṃ migamātukaṃ vissajjehi,
atk-s0513a1:2358_16: so tassā sinehena sarīraṃ lehitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇissati.
atk-s0513a1:2358_17: Athassa cammanakhadāṭhā ceva vasañca maṃsañca gahetvā āgaccheyyāsī”ti halāhalavisaṃ datvā uyyojesi.
atk-s0513a1:2359_0: So gopālako jālaṃ khipitvā upāyena taṃ migamātukaṃ gaṇhitvā tathā akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2359_1: Sīho taṃ disvāva balavasinehena tassā sarīraṃ lehitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a1:2359_2: Gopālakopi cammādīni gahetvā bodhisattassa santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2359_3: Bodhisatto taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā “paresu sineho nāma na kātabbo,
atk-s0513a1:2359_4: evaṃ balasampannopi sīho migarājā kilesavasena saṃsaggaṃ nissāya migamātukāya sarīraṃ lehanto visaparibhogaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2359_5: katvā jīvitakkhayaṃ patto”ti vatvā sampattaparisāya dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2363_1: yo pubbe sabhayo attani avissattho ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:2363_11: yathā mittasanthavavasena katavissāsāya migamātukāya santikā sīhassa bhayaṃ anveti,
atk-s0513a1:2363_13: Yathā vā vissāsavasena sīhaṃ migamātukā anvetā upagatātipi attho.
atk-s0513a1:2364_0: Evaṃ bodhisatto sampattaparisāya dhammaṃ desetvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2365_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā mahāseṭṭhi ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2369_0: Sotatto sosinno cevāti idaṃ satthā vesāliṃ upanissāya pāṭikārāme viharanto sunakkhattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2369_1: Ekasmiñhi samaye sunakkhatto satthu upaṭṭhāko hutvā pattacīvaramādāya vicaramāno korakkhattiyassa dhammaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2369_2: rocento dasabalassa pattacīvaraṃ niyyādetvā korakkhattiyaṃ nissāya vasati.
atk-s0513a1:2369_3: Tassa kālakañjikaasurayoniyaṃ nibbattakāle gihi hutvā “natthi samaṇassa gotamassa uttari manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso,
atk-s0513a1:2369_4: takkapariyāhataṃ samaṇo gotamo dhammaṃ deseti vīmaṃsānucaritaṃ sayaṃpaṭibhānaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2369_5: Yassa ca khvāssa atthāya dhammo desito,
atk-s0513a1:2369_6: na so niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāyā”ti vesāliyaṃ tiṇṇaṃ pākārānaṃ antare vicaranto satthu avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0513a1:2370_0: Athāyasmā sāriputto piṇḍāya caranto tassevaṃ avaṇṇaṃ bhāsantassa sutvā piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto tamatthaṃ bhagavato ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:2370_5: kodhavasenāpi pana ‘na so niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāyā’ti vadanto ajānitvāpi mayhaṃ guṇameva bhāsati.
atk-s0513a1:2370_6: Na kho pana so moghapuriso mayhaṃ guṇaṃ jānāti. Mayhañhi,
atk-s0513a1:2370_15: Evaṃ uttarimanussadhammasamannāgataṃ pana maṃ yo evaṃ vadeyya ‘natthi samaṇassa gotamassa uttarimanussadhammo’ti,
atk-s0513a1:2370_16: so taṃ vācaṃ appahāya taṃ cittaṃ appahāya taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissajjitvā yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye”ti
atk-s0513a1:2370_17: evaṃ attano vijjamānaṃ uttarimanussadhammassa guṇaṃ kathetvā “sunakkhatto kira,
atk-s0513a1:2370_20: micchātape pasīdantena pana mayi eva pasīdituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0513a1:2370_21: Ahañhi ito ekanavutikappamatthake ‘atthi nu kho ettha sāro’ti bāhirakaṃ micchātapaṃ vīmaṃsanto caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ brahmacariyavāsaṃ vasiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2370_25: pavivitto sudaṃ homi paramapavivitto”ti vatvā therena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2371_0: Atīte ekanavutikappamatthake bodhisatto “bāhirakatapaṃ vīmaṃsissāmī”ti ājīvakapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā acelako ahosi rajojalliko,
atk-s0513a1:2371_5: appamādavihāratthāya araññe ekasmiṃ bhiṃsanake vanasaṇḍe vihāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2371_6: Tasmimpi viharanto himapātasamaye antaraṭṭhake rattiṃ vanasaṇḍā nikkhamitvā abbhokāse viharitvā sūriye uggate vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisati.
atk-s0513a1:2371_7: So yathā rattiṃ abbhokāse himodakena tinto,
atk-s0513a1:2371_8: tatheva divā vanasaṇḍato paggharantehi udakabindūhi temayi.
atk-s0513a1:2371_10: Gimhānaṃ pana pacchime māse divā abbhokāse viharitvā rattiṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisati.
atk-s0513a1:2371_11: So yathā divā abbhokāse ātapena pariḷāhappatto,
atk-s0513a1:2371_12: tatheva rattiṃ nivāte vanasaṇḍe pariḷāhaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0513a1:2371_14: Athassa pubbe assutapubbā ayaṃ gāthā paṭibhāsi –
atk-s0513a1:2375_2: Eko bhiṃsanake vaneti yattha paviṭṭhānaṃ yebhuyyena lomāni haṃsanti,
atk-s0513a1:2375_3: tathārūpe bhiṃsanakevanasaṇḍe eko adutiyova ahosinti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a1:2375_4: Naggo na caggimāsīnoti naggo ca na ca aggimāsīno.
atk-s0513a1:2375_5: Tathā sītena pīḷiyamānopi neva nivāsanapārupanaṃ vā ādiyiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2375_6: na ca aggiṃ āgamma nisīdinti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a1:2375_7: Esanāpasutoti abrahmacariyepi tasmiṃ brahmacariyasaññī hutvā “brahmacariyamevetaṃ esanā gavesanā upāyo
atk-s0513a1:2375_8: brahmalokassā”ti evaṃ tāya brahmacariyesanāya pasuto anuyutto ussukkaṃ āpanno ahosinti dasseti.
atk-s0513a1:2375_9: Munīti “muni kho esa monatthāya paṭipanno”ti evaṃ lokena sambhāvito ahosinti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a1:2376_0: Evaṃ caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ brahmacariyaṃ caritvā bodhisatto maraṇakāle upaṭṭhitaṃ nirayanimittaṃ disvā
atk-s0513a1:2376_1: “idaṃ vatasamādānaṃ niratthaka”nti ñatvā taṅkhaṇaññeva taṃ laddhiṃ bhinditvā sammādiṭṭhiṃ gahetvā devaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:2377_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “ahaṃ tena samayena so ājīvako ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2381_0: Aniccā vata saṅkhārāti idaṃ satthā parinibbānamañce nipanno ānandattherassa “mā, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:2381_2: Tathāgate hi jetavane viharante sāriputtatthero kattikapuṇṇamāyaṃ nāḷakagāmake jātovarake parinibbāyi,
atk-s0513a1:2381_4: Evaṃ parinibbute aggasāvakayuge “ahampi kusinārāyaṃ parinibbāyissāmī”ti anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno tattha
atk-s0513a1:2381_5: gantvā yamakasālānamantare uttarasīsake mañcake anuṭṭhānaseyyāya nipajji.
atk-s0513a1:2381_9: aññesaṃ campārājagahādīnaṃ mahānagarānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ bhagavā parinibbāyatū”ti yāci.
atk-s0513a1:2381_13: ahañhi pubbe sudassanacakkavattirājakāle imasmiṃ nagare vasiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2381_14: tadā idaṃ dvādasayojanikena ratanapākārena parikkhittaṃ mahānagaraṃ ahosī”ti vatvā therena yācito atītaṃ āharanto mahāsudassanasuttaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2382_0: Tadā pana mahāsudassanaṃ sudhammapāsādā otaritvā avidūre sattaratanamaye tālavane paññattasmiṃ kappiyamañcake
atk-s0513a1:2382_1: dakkhiṇena passena anuṭṭhānaseyyāya nipannaṃ disvā “imāni te, deva,
atk-s0513a1:2382_3: ettha chandaṃ karohī”ti subhaddāya deviyā vutte mahāsudassano “mā devi evaṃ avaca,
atk-s0513a1:2382_5: mā apekkhaṃ akāsī’ti evaṃ maṃ ovadā”ti vatvā “kiṃkāraṇā,
atk-s0513a1:2382_7: Atha naṃ devī rodamānā akkhīni puñchitvā kicchena kasirena tathā vatvā rodi paridevi.
atk-s0513a1:2382_12: mā saddamakatthā”ti sabbe nivāretvā deviṃ āmantetvā “mā tvaṃ devi rodi,
atk-s0513a1:2382_14: Tilaphalamattopi hi saṅkhāro nicco nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:2382_15: sabbepi aniccā bhedanadhammā evā”ti vatvā deviṃ ovadanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2386_0: Tattha aniccā vata saṅkhārāti bhadde subhaddādevi,
atk-s0513a1:2386_1: yattakā kehici paccayehi samāgantvā katā khandhāyatanādayo saṅkhārā,
atk-s0513a1:2386_11: sabbe hete uppādadhammino ceva vayadhammino ca uppajjanabhijjanasabhāvāyeva,
atk-s0513a1:2386_18: Tesaṃ uppāde satiyeva ca ṭhiti nāma hoti,
atk-s0513a1:2386_22: Iti sabbepi saṅkhārā tīṇi lakkhaṇāni patvā tattha tattheva nirujjhanti,
atk-s0513a1:2386_23: tasmā sabbepime aniccā khaṇikā ittarā adhuvā pabhaṅguno calitā samīritā anaddhaniyā payātā tāvakālikā nissārā,
atk-s0513a1:2386_27: evaṃ pana gaṇha tesaṃ vūpasamo sukhoti,
atk-s0513a1:2387_0: Evaṃ mahāsudassano amatamahānibbānena desanāya kūṭaṃ gahetvā avasesassapi mahājanassa “dānaṃ detha,
atk-s0513a1:2387_2: uposathakammaṃ karothā”ti ovādaṃ datvā devalokaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2388_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2392_0: Samatittikaṃ anavasesakanti idaṃ satthā sumbharaṭṭhe sedakaṃ nāma nigamaṃ upanissāya aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe
atk-s0513a1:2393_5: sā kho panassa janapadakalyāṇī paramapāsāvinī nacce,
atk-s0513a1:2393_10: Atha puriso āgaccheyya jīvitukāmo amaritukāmo sukhakāmo dukkhapaṭikūlo.
atk-s0513a1:2393_13: samatittiko telapatto antarena ca mahājanakāyassa antarena ca janapadakalyāṇiyā pariharitabbo,
atk-s0513a1:2393_14: puriso ca taṃ ukkhittāsiko piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhissati ‘yattheva naṃ thokampi chaḍḍessasi,
atk-s0513a1:2393_18: api nu so puriso amuṃ telapattaṃ amanasikaritvā bahiddhā pamādaṃ āhareyyā”ti?
atk-s0513a1:2393_29: evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘kāyagatā no sati bhāvitā bhavissati susamāraddhā’ti evañhi vo,
atk-s0513a1:2395_1: janapadakalyāṇīti janapadamhi kalyāṇī uttamā chasarīradosarahitā pañcakalyāṇasamannāgatā.
atk-s0513a1:2395_13: vayokalyāṇanti imehi pana pañcahi kalyāṇehi samannāgatattā pañcakalyāṇasamannāgatā nāma.
atk-s0513a1:2395_15: attano sarīrobhāseneva dvādasahatthe ṭhāne ālokaṃ karoti,
atk-s0513a1:2395_18: Cattāro panassā hatthapādā mukhapariyosānañca lākhārasaparikammakataṃ viya rattapavāḷarattakambalasadisaṃ hoti.
atk-s0513a1:2395_20: Vīsati nakhapattāni maṃsato amuttaṭṭhāne lākhārasapūritāni viya,
atk-s0513a1:2395_23: Dvattiṃsa dantā suphusitā sudhotavajirapanti viya khāyanti.
atk-s0513a1:2395_25: Vīsativassasatikāpi pana samānā soḷasavassuddesikā viya hoti nibbalipalitā.
atk-s0513a1:2396_5: Nacce ca gīte ca uttamappavatti seṭṭhakiriyā.
atk-s0513a1:2397_0: Atha puriso āgaccheyyāti na attano ruciyā āgaccheyya,
atk-s0513a1:2397_2: athevaṃ mahājanamajjhe janapadakalyāṇiyā naccamānāya “sādhu sādhū”ti sādhukāresu aṅguliphoṭanesu celukkhepesu
atk-s0513a1:2397_3: ca pavattamānesu taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā rājā bandhanāgārato ekaṃ corapurisaṃ pakkosāpetvā nigaḷāni chinditvā
atk-s0513a1:2397_4: samatittikaṃ suparipuṇṇaṃ telapattaṃ tassa hatthe datvā ubhohi hatthehi daḷhaṃ gāhāpetvā ekaṃ asihatthaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2397_5: purisaṃ āṇāpesi “etaṃ gahetvā janapadakalyāṇiyā samajjaṭṭhānaṃ gaccha.
atk-s0513a1:2397_6: Yattheva cesa pamādaṃ āgamma ekampi telabinduṃ chaḍḍeti,
atk-s0513a1:2397_8: So puriso asiṃ ukkhipitvā taṃ tajjento tattha nesi.
atk-s0513a1:2397_9: So maraṇabhayatajjito jīvitukāmatāya pamādavasena taṃ amanasikaritvā sakimpi akkhīni ummīletvā taṃ janapadakalyāṇiṃ na olokesi.
atk-s0513a1:2398_0: Upamā kho myāyanti ettha pana telapattassa tāva kāyagatāsatiyā opammasaṃsandanaṃ katameva.
atk-s0513a1:2398_1: Ettha pana rājā viya kammaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2398_5: Iti bhagavā “kāyagatāsatiṃ bhāvetukāmena bhikkhunā telapattahatthena tena purisena viya satiṃ avissajjetvā
atk-s0513a1:2398_6: appamattena kāyagatāsati bhāvetabbā”ti imaṃ suttaṃ āharitvā dassesi.
atk-s0513a1:2399_0: Bhikkhū imaṃ suttañca atthañca sutvā evamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0513a1:2399_2: tena purisena kataṃ tathārūpiṃ janapadakalyāṇiṃ anoloketvā telapattaṃ ādāya gacchantenā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2399_8: Yaṃ pana pubbe paṇḍitā appamādena satiṃ avissajjetvā abhisaṅkhataṃ dibbarūpampi indriyāni bhinditvā anoloketvāva gantvā rajjaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:2400_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa rañño puttasatassa sabbakaniṭṭho hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0513a1:2400_2: Tadā ca rañño gehe paccekabuddhā bhuñjanti,
atk-s0513a1:2400_5: lacchāmi nu kho ahaṃ imasmiṃ nagare kulasantakaṃ rajjaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2400_8: So dutiyadivase paccekabuddhesu āgatesu dhamakaraṇaṃ ādāya pānīyaṃ parissāvetvā pāde dhovitvā telena
atk-s0513a1:2400_9: makkhetvā tesaṃ antarakhajjakaṃ khāditvā nisinnakāle vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno tamatthaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:2400_11: na tvaṃ imasmiṃ nagare rajjaṃ labhissasi,
atk-s0513a1:2400_12: ito pana vīsayojanasatamatthake gandhāraraṭṭhe takkasilānagaraṃ nāma atthi,
atk-s0513a1:2400_13: tattha gantuṃ sakkonto ito sattame divase rajjaṃ lacchasi.
atk-s0513a1:2400_15: taṃ aṭaviṃ pariharitvā gacchantassa yojanasatiko maggo hoti,
atk-s0513a1:2400_18: Tattha yakkhiniyo antarāmagge gāme ca sālāyo ca māpetvā upari suvaṇṇatārakavicittavitānaṃ mahārahaseyyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2400_19: paññāpetvā nānāvirāgapaṭasāṇiyo parikkhipitvā dibbālaṅkārehi attabhāvaṃ maṇḍetvā sālāsu nisīditvā āgacchante
atk-s0513a1:2400_20: purise madhurāhi vācāhi saṅgaṇhitvā “kilantarūpā viya paññāyatha,
atk-s0513a1:2400_21: idhāgantvā nisīditvā pānīyaṃ pivitvā gacchathā”ti pakkositvā āgatāgatānaṃ āsanāni datvā attano rūpalīlāvilāsehi
atk-s0513a1:2400_22: palobhetvā kilesavasike katvā attanā saddhiṃ ajjhācāre kate tattheva ne lohitena paggharantena khāditvā
atk-s0513a1:2400_29: Sace indriyāni bhinditvā tā anoloketvā satiṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā gamissasi,
atk-s0513a1:2401_1: tumhākaṃ ovādaṃ gahetvā kiṃ tā olokessāmī”ti paccekabuddhehi parittaṃ kārāpetvā parittavālukañceva parittasuttañca
atk-s0513a1:2401_2: ādāya paccekabuddhe ca mātāpitaro ca vanditvā nivesanaṃ gantvā attano purise āha –
atk-s0513a1:2401_5: Atha naṃ pañca janā āhaṃsu “mayampi anugacchāmā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2401_7: antarāmagge kira yakkhiniyo rūpādigocare manusse evañcevañca rūpādīhi palobhetvā gaṇhanti,
atk-s0513a1:2401_11: mayaṃ tumhehi saddhiṃ gacchantā attano piyāni rūpādīni olokessāma,
atk-s0513a1:2401_13: Bodhisatto “tena hi appamattā hothā”ti te pañca jane ādāya maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0513a1:2402_1: Tesu rūpagocaro puriso tā yakkhiniyo oloketvā rūpārammaṇe paṭibaddhacitto thokaṃ ohīyi.
atk-s0513a1:2402_10: “Tena hi paññāyissasī”ti itare cattāro ādāya agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2402_12: Tā attanā saddhiṃ ajjhācāre kate taṃ tattheva jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā purato gantvā aññaṃ sālaṃ māpetvā nānātūriyāni gahetvā gāyamānā nisīdiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:2402_14: Purimanayeneva tampi khāditvā purato gantvā nānappakāre gandhakaraṇḍake pūretvā āpaṇaṃ pasāretvā nisīdiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:2402_16: Tampi khāditvā purato gantvā nānaggarasānaṃ dibbabhojanānaṃ bhājanāni pūretvā odanikāpaṇaṃ pasāretvā nisīdiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:2402_18: Tampi khāditvā purato gantvā dibbasayanāni paññāpetvā nisīdiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:2403_1: ahaṃ taṃ khāditvāva nivattissāmī”ti bodhisattassa pacchato pacchato agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2403_2: Aṭaviyā parabhāge vanakammikādayo yakkhiniṃ disvā “ayaṃ te purato gacchanto puriso kiṃ hotī”ti pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2403_4: ayaṃ evaṃ sukumālā pupphadāmasadisā suvaṇṇavaṇṇā kumārikā attano kulaṃ chaḍḍetvā bhavantaṃ takketvā nikkhantā,
atk-s0513a1:2403_5: kasmā etaṃ akilametvā ādāya na gacchasī”ti? “Nesā, ayyā,
atk-s0513a1:2403_9: purisā nāma kuddhakāle attano pajāpatiyo yakkhiniyopi karonti petiniyopī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2403_10: Sā gacchamānā gabbhinivaṇṇaṃ dassetvā puna sakiṃ vijātavaṇṇaṃ katvā puttaṃ aṅkena ādāya bodhisattaṃ anubandhi,
atk-s0513a1:2403_12: Bodhisattopi tatheva vatvā gacchanto takkasilaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a1:2403_14: Bodhisatto nagaradvāraṃ gantvā ekissā sālāya nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:2403_15: Sā bodhisattassa tejena pavisituṃ asakkontī dibbarūpaṃ māpetvā sālādvāre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2404_0: Tasmiṃ samaye takkasilarājā uyyānaṃ gacchanto taṃ disvā paṭibaddhacitto hutvā “gaccha,
atk-s0513a1:2404_6: etāya me pañca manussā khāditā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2404_7: Sāpi “purisā nāma ayyā kuddhakāle yaṃ icchanti,
atk-s0513a1:2404_10: Rājā “assāmikabhaṇḍaṃ nāma rājasantakaṃ hotī”ti yakkhiniṃ pakkosāpetvā ekahatthipiṭṭhe nisīdāpetvā nagaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2404_11: padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pāsādaṃ abhiruyha taṃ aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:2405_0: So nhātavilitto sāyamāsaṃ bhuñjitvā sirīsayanaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0513a1:2405_1: Sāpi yakkhinī attano upakappanakaṃ āhāraṃ āharitvā alaṅkatapaṭiyattā sirisayane raññā saddhiṃ nipajjitvā
atk-s0513a1:2405_2: rañño rativasena sukhaṃ samappitassa nipannakāle ekena passena parivattitvā parodi.
atk-s0513a1:2405_7: ahaṃ sapattīnaṃ antare vasamānā kathāya uppannāya ‘ko tuyhaṃ mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā gottaṃ vā jātiṃ vā jānāti,
atk-s0513a1:2405_8: tvaṃ antarāmagge disvā ānītā nāmā’ti sīse gahetvā nippīḷiyamānā viya maṅku bhavissāmi.
atk-s0513a1:2405_9: Sace tumhe sakalarajje issariyañca āṇañca mayhaṃ dadeyyātha,
atk-s0513a1:2405_10: koci mayhaṃ cittaṃ kopetvā kathetuṃ na sakkhissatī”ti. “Bhadde,
atk-s0513a1:2405_13: Ye pana rājāṇaṃ kopetvā akattabbaṃ karonti,
atk-s0513a1:2405_15: Iminā kāraṇena na sakkā tuyhaṃ sakalaraṭṭhe vā nagare vā issariyañca āṇañca dātu”nti. “Tena hi, deva,
atk-s0513a1:2405_16: sace raṭṭhe vā nagare vā āṇaṃ dātuṃ na sakkotha,
atk-s0513a1:2405_17: antonivesane antovaḷañjanakānaṃ upari mama vasaṃ vattanatthāya āṇaṃ dethā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2405_18: Rājā dibbaphoṭṭhabbena baddho tassā vacanaṃ atikkamituṃ asakkonto “sādhu, bhadde,
atk-s0513a1:2405_20: tvaṃ ete attano vase vattāpehī”ti āha.

atk-s0513a1:2406_1: aṭṭhikaparikiṇṇaṃ disvā “saccaṃ vata so puriso āha ‘nāyaṃ mayhaṃ pajāpati,
atk-s0513a1:2406_3: Rājā pana kiñci ajānitvā taṃ gahetvā attano bhariyaṃ akāsi,

atk-s0513a1:2407_0: Satthā imaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā abhisambuddho hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –

atk-s0513a1:2430_0: Patthayāno disaṃ agatapubbanti imasmiṃ kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhāne kammaṃ ārabhitvā anamatagge saṃsāre agatapubbaṃ

atk-s0513a1:2434_0: Etā disā namasseyya, alamatto kule gihī”ti. –

atk-s0513a1:2441_4: Anamatagge pana saṃsāre kenaci bālaputhujjanena supinenapi agatapubbatāya agatapubbā disā nāmāti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2442_0: Evaṃ satthā nibbānena desanāya kūṭaṃ gahetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2446_0: Jīvakañca mataṃ disvāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ nāmasiddhikaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2446_1: Eko kira kulaputto nāmena pāpako nāma.
atk-s0513a1:2446_2: So sāsane uraṃ datvā pabbajito bhikkhūhi “ehāvuso, pāpaka,
atk-s0513a1:2446_4: pāpakā”ti vuccamāno cintesi “loke pāpakaṃ nāma lāmakaṃ kāḷakaṇṇibhūtaṃ vuccati,
atk-s0513a1:2446_15: Athekadivasaṃ dhammasabhāyaṃ sannisinnā bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso,
atk-s0513a1:2446_16: asuko kira bhikkhu nāmasiddhiko maṅgalaṃ nāmaṃ āharāpetī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2446_19: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:2447_0: Atīte takkasilāyaṃ bodhisatto disāpāmokkho ācariyo hutvā pañca māṇavakasatāni mante vācesi.
atk-s0513a1:2447_1: Tasseko māṇavo pāpako nāma nāmena. So “ehi, pāpaka, yāhi,
atk-s0513a1:2447_8: janapadacārikaṃ caritvā attano abhirucitaṃ ekaṃ maṅgalanāmaṃ gahetvā ehi,
atk-s0513a1:2447_9: āgatassa te nāmaṃ parivattetvā aññaṃ nāmaṃ karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2447_10: So “sādhū”ti pātheyyaṃ gahetvā nikkhanto gāmena gāmaṃ caranto ekaṃ nagaraṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a1:2447_11: Tattha ceko puriso kālakato jīvako nāma nāmena.
atk-s0513a1:2447_12: So taṃ ñātijanena āḷāhanaṃ nīyamānaṃ disvā “kiṃ nāmako esa puriso”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:2447_19: So taṃ kathaṃ sutvā nāme majjhatto hutvā antonagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:2448_0: Athekaṃ dāsiṃ bhatiṃ adadamānaṃ sāmikā dvāre nisīdāpetvā rajjuyā paharanti,
atk-s0513a1:2448_2: So antaravīthiyā gacchanto taṃ pothiyamānaṃ disvā “kasmā imaṃ pothethā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:2448_6: Nāmena dhanapālī samānāpi bhatimattaṃ dātuṃ na sakkotīti dhanapāliyopi adhanapāliyopi duggatā honti,
atk-s0513a1:2448_9: So nāme majjhattataro hutvā nagarā nikkhamma maggaṃ paṭipanno antarāmagge maggamūḷhapurisaṃ disvā “ambho kiṃ karonto vicarasī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:2448_15: nāmaṃ nāma paṇṇattimattaṃ tvaṃ pana bālo maññeti”.

atk-s0513a1:2448_26: Bodhisatto tena diṭṭhañca katañca saṃsandetvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2452_0: Tattha punarāgatoti imāni tīṇi kāraṇāni disvā puna āgato, ra-kāro sandhivasena vutto.
atk-s0513a1:2457_0: Sādhu kho paṇḍito nāmāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ kūṭavāṇijaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2457_1: Sāvatthiyañhi dve janā ekato vaṇijjaṃ karontā bhaṇḍaṃ sakaṭenādāya janapadaṃ gantvā laddhalābhā paccāgamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2457_2: Tesu kūṭavāṇijo cintesi “ayaṃ bahū divase dubbhojanena dukkhaseyyāya kilanto,
atk-s0513a1:2457_3: idāni attano ghare nānaggarasehi yāvadatthaṃ subhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā ajīrakena marissati.
atk-s0513a1:2457_4: Athāhaṃ imaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ tayo koṭṭhāse katvā ekaṃ tassa dārakānaṃ dassāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2457_7: sve bhājessāmā”ti bhaṇḍaṃ bhājetuṃ na icchi.
atk-s0513a1:2457_8: Atha naṃ paṇḍitavāṇijo akāmakaṃ nippīḷetvā bhājāpetvā vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā katapaṭisanthāro “atipapañco te kato,
atk-s0513a1:2457_9: idhāgantvāpi cirena buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ āgatosī”ti vutte taṃ pavattiṃ bhagavato ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:2457_14: pubbe paṇḍitepi vañcetuṃ ussahī”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2458_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto bārāṇasiyaṃ vāṇijakule nibbatti,
atk-s0513a1:2458_2: So vayappatto aññena vāṇijena saddhiṃ ekato hutvā vaṇijjaṃ karoti,
atk-s0513a1:2458_4: Te bārāṇasito pañcahi sakaṭasatehi bhaṇḍaṃ ādāya janapadaṃ gantvā vaṇijjaṃ katvā laddhalābhā puna bārāṇasiṃ āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2458_5: Atha nesaṃ bhaṇḍabhājanakāle atipaṇḍito āha “mayā dve koṭṭhāsā laddhabbā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2458_12: tvaṃ kasmā dve koṭṭhāse laddhuṃ arahasī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2458_14: Evaṃ te kathaṃ vaḍḍhetvā kalahaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2459_0: Tato atipaṇḍito “attheko upāyo”ti cintetvā attano pitaraṃ ekasmiṃ susirarukkhe pavesetvā “tvaṃ amhesu
atk-s0513a1:2459_1: āgatesu ‘atipaṇḍito dve koṭṭhāse laddhuṃ arahatī’ti vadeyyāsī”ti vatvā bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “samma,
atk-s0513a1:2459_2: mayhaṃ dvinnaṃ koṭṭhāsānaṃ yuttabhāvaṃ vā ayuttabhāvaṃ vā esā rukkhadevatā jānāti, ehi,
atk-s0513a1:2459_3: taṃ pucchissāmā”ti taṃ tattha netvā “ayye rukkhadevate,
atk-s0513a1:2459_5: Athassa pitā saraṃ parivattetvā “tena hi kathethā”ti āha. “Ayye,
atk-s0513a1:2459_12: Bodhisatto evaṃ vinicchitaṃ aṭṭaṃ sutvā “idāni devatābhāvaṃ vā adevatābhāvaṃ vā jānissāmī”ti palālaṃ āharitvā susiraṃ pūretvā aggiṃ adāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2459_13: atipaṇḍitassa pitā jālāya phuṭṭhakāle aḍḍhajjhāmena sarīrena upari āruyha sākhaṃ gahetvā olambanto bhūmiyaṃ patitvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2461_0: “Sādhu kho paṇḍito nāma, na tveva atipaṇḍito;
atk-s0513a1:2463_0: Tattha sādhu kho paṇḍito nāmāti imasmiṃ loke paṇḍiccena samannāgato kāraṇākāraṇaññū puggalo sādhu sobhano.
atk-s0513a1:2463_1: Atipaṇḍitoti nāmamattena atipaṇḍito kūṭapuriso na tveva varaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2463_4: Te ubhopi majjhe bhinditvā samaññeva koṭṭhāsaṃ gaṇhitvā yathākammaṃ gatā.
atk-s0513a1:2464_0: Satthā “pubbepi esa kūṭavāṇijoyevā”ti imaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –

atk-s0513a1:2469_1: uggaṇhitvā kāme pahāya isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā pañcābhiññā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā himavante vihāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2469_3: Athassa jeṭṭhantevāsiko vassārattasamaye upaḍḍhaṃ isigaṇaṃ ādāya loṇambilasevanatthāya manussapathaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2469_6: kataro vo guṇo laddho”ti adhigamaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2469_8: Bodhisattā hi arūpasamāpattilābhino hutvāpi abhabbaṭṭhānattā āruppe na nibbattanti.
atk-s0513a1:2469_9: Antevāsikā “ācariyassa adhigamo natthī”ti āḷāhane sakkāraṃ na kariṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2470_0: Jeṭṭhantevāsiko āgantvā “kahaṃ ācariyo”ti pucchitvā “kālakato”ti sutvā “api ācariyaṃ adhigamaṃ pucchitthā”ti āha. “Āma,
atk-s0513a1:2470_4: athassa amhehi sakkāro na kato”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2470_7: Te tasmiṃ punappunaṃ kathentepi na saddahiṃsu.

atk-s0513a1:2470_9: Imaṃ tesaṃ kāraṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ karissāmī”ti brahmalokā āgantvā assamapadamatthake mahantenānubhāvena ākāse
atk-s0513a1:2470_10: ṭhatvā jeṭṭhantevāsikassa paññānubhāvaṃ vaṇṇento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2473_0: Ekova seyyo puriso sapañño, yo bhāsitassa vijānāti attha”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2474_1: Samāgatānanti sannipatitānaṃ bhāsitassa atthaṃ jānituṃ asakkontānaṃ bālānaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2474_2: Kandeyyuṃ te vassasataṃ apaññāti te evaṃ samāgatā apaññā ime bālatāpasā viya vassasatampi vassasahassampi rodeyyuṃ parideveyyuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2474_3: rodamānāpi pana atthaṃ vā kāraṇaṃ vā neva jāneyyunti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a1:2474_4: Ekova seyyo puriso sapaññoti evarūpānaṃ bālānaṃ parosahassatopi eko paṇḍitapurisova seyyo varataroti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2474_6: Yo bhāsitassa vijānāti atthaṃ ayaṃ jeṭṭhantevāsiko viyāti.
atk-s0513a1:2475_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto ākāse ṭhitova dhammaṃ desetvā tāpasagaṇaṃ bujjhāpetvā brahmalokameva gato.
atk-s0513a1:2476_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2480_0: Asātaṃ sātarūpenāti idaṃ satthā kuṇḍiyanagaraṃ upanissāya kuṇḍadhānavane viharanto koliyarājadhītaraṃ suppavāsaṃ upāsikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2480_1: Sā hi tasmiṃ samaye satta vassāni kucchinā gabbhaṃ pariharitvā sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhā ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:2480_3: Sā evaṃ adhimattavedanābhibhūtāpi “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā,
atk-s0513a1:2480_4: yo evarūpassa dukkhassa pahānāya dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0513a1:2480_8: yattheva rūpaṃ dukkhaṃ natthī”ti imehi tīhi vitakkehi adhivāsesi.
atk-s0513a1:2480_9: Sā sāmikaṃ pakkosetvā tañca attano pavattiṃ vandanasāsanañca ārocetuṃ satthu santikaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0513a1:2480_10: Satthā vandanasāsanaṃ sutvāva “sukhinī hotu suppavāsā koliyadhītā,
atk-s0513a1:2480_11: sukhinī arogā arogaṃ puttaṃ vijāyatū”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2480_12: Saha vacaneneva pana bhagavato suppavāsā koliyadhītā sukhinī arogā arogaṃ puttaṃ vijāyi.
atk-s0513a1:2480_13: Athassā sāmiko gehaṃ gantvā taṃ vijātaṃ disvā “acchariyaṃ vata,
atk-s0513a1:2480_14: bho”ti ativiya tathāgatassa ānubhāvena acchariyabbhutacittajāto ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2481_0: Suppavāsāpi puttaṃ vijāyitvā sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa dānaṃ dātukāmā puna nimantanatthāya taṃ pesesi.
atk-s0513a1:2481_1: Tena kho pana samayena mahāmoggallānassa upaṭṭhākena buddhappamukho saṅgho nimantito hoti.
atk-s0513a1:2481_2: Satthā suppavāsāya dānassa okāsadānatthāya theraṃ tassa santikaṃ pesetvā taṃ saññāpetvā sattāhaṃ tassā dānaṃ paṭiggahesi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena.
atk-s0513a1:2481_3: Sattame pana divase suppavāsā puttaṃ sīvalikumāraṃ maṇḍetvā satthārañceva bhikkhusaṅghañca vandāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2481_4: Tasmiṃ paṭipāṭiyā sāriputtattherassa santikaṃ nīte thero tena saddhiṃ “kacci te, sīvali,
atk-s0513a1:2481_7: svāhaṃ satta vassāni lohitakumbhiyaṃ vasi”nti therena saddhiṃ evarūpaṃ kathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2481_8: Suppāvāsā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “sattāhajāto me putto anubuddhena dhammasenāpatinā saddhiṃ mantetī”ti somanassappattā ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2481_9: Satthā “api nu suppavāse aññepi evarūpe putte icchasī”ti āha. “Sace, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:2481_12: Satthā udānaṃ udānetvā anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:2481_13: Sīvalikumāropi kho sattavassikakāleyeva sāsane uraṃ datvā pabbajitvā paripuṇṇavasso upasampadaṃ labhitvā
atk-s0513a1:2481_14: puññavā lābhaggappatto hutvā pathaviṃ unnādetvā arahattaṃ patvā puññavantānaṃ antare etadaggaṭṭhānaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a1:2482_1: sīvalitthero nāma evarūpo mahāpuñño patthitapatthano pacchimabhavikasatto satta vassāni lohitakumbhiyaṃ vasitvā sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhabhāvaṃ āpajji,
atk-s0513a1:2482_3: kiṃ nu kho kammaṃ akaṃsū”ti kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2482_6: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “bhikkhave,
atk-s0513a1:2482_7: sīvalino mahāpuññatova satta vassāni lohitakumbhiyaṃ nivāso ca sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhabhāvappatti ca attanā katakammamūlakāva,
atk-s0513a1:2482_8: suppavāsāyapi satta vassāni kucchinā gabbhapariharaṇadukkhañca sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhadukkhañca attanā katakammamūlakamevā”ti
atk-s0513a1:2483_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhitvā
atk-s0513a1:2483_1: vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā pitu accayena rajjaṃ patvā dhammena rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a1:2483_2: Tasmiṃ samaye kosalamahārājā mahantena balenāgantvā bārāṇasiṃ gahetvā rājānaṃ māretvā tasseva aggamahesiṃ attano aggamahesiṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2483_3: Bārāṇasirañño pana putto pitu maraṇakāle niddhamanadvārena palāyitvā balaṃ saṃharitvā bārāṇasiṃ āgantvā
atk-s0513a1:2483_4: avidūre nisīditvā tassa rañño paṇṇaṃ pesesi “rajjaṃ vā detu yuddhaṃ vā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2483_6: Rājakumārassa pana mātā taṃ sāsanaṃ sutvā “yuddhena kammaṃ natthi,
atk-s0513a1:2483_8: tato dārūdakabhattaparikkhayena kilantamanussaṃ nagaraṃ vināva yuddhena gaṇhissasī”ti paṇṇaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0513a1:2483_9: So mātu sāsanaṃ sutvā satta divasāni sañcāraṃ pacchinditvā nagaraṃ rundhi,
atk-s0513a1:2483_10: nāgarā sañcāraṃ alabhamānā sattame divase tassa rañño sīsaṃ gahetvā kumārassa adaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2483_11: Kumāro pana nagaraṃ pavisitvā rajjaṃ gahetvā jīvitapariyosāne yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2484_0: So etarahi satta divasāni sañcāraṃ pacchinditvā nagaraṃ rundhitvā gahitakammanissandena satta vassāni
atk-s0513a1:2484_2: Yaṃ pana so padumuttarassa bhagavato pādamūle “lābhīnaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti mahādānaṃ datvā patthanaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2484_3: yañca vipassibuddhakāle nāgarehi saddhiṃ sahassagghanakaṃ guḷadadhiṃ datvā patthanamakāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2484_6: tātā”ti pesitabhāvena satta vassāni kucchinā gabbhaṃ pariharitvā sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhā jātā.
atk-s0513a1:2485_0: Satthā imaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā abhisambuddho hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2489_1: Pamattamativattatīti asātaṃ appiyaṃ dukkhanti etaṃ tividhampi etena sātarūpādinā ākārena sativippavāsavasena
atk-s0513a1:2489_2: pamattaṃ puggalaṃ ativattati abhibhavati ajjhottharatīti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2489_3: Idaṃ bhagavatā yañca te mātāputtā iminā gabbhapariharaṇagabbhavāsasaṅkhātena asātādinā pubbe nagararundhanasātādipatirūpakena ajjhotthaṭā,
atk-s0513a1:2489_4: yañca idāni sā upāsikā punapi sattakkhattuṃ evarūpaṃ asātaṃ appiyaṃ dukkhaṃ pemavatthubhūtena puttasaṅkhātena
atk-s0513a1:2490_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2503_0: Ekova seyyo puriso sapañño, yo bhāsitassa vijānāti attha”nti. –
atk-s0513a1:2504_0: Idaṃ jātakaṃ vatthuto ca veyyākaraṇato ca samodhānato ca parosahassajātakasadisameva.
atk-s0513a1:2504_4: evaṃ olokentāpi pana atthaṃ vā kāraṇaṃ vā na passanti,
atk-s0513a1:2508_0: Yo dukkhaphuṭṭhāya bhaveyya tāṇanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ paṇṇikaṃ upāsakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2508_1: So kira sāvatthivāsī upāsako nānappakārāni mūlapaṇṇādīni ceva lābukumbhaṇḍādīni ca vikkiṇitvā jīvikaṃ kappeti.
atk-s0513a1:2508_2: Tassekā dhītā abhirūpā pāsādikā ācārasīlasampannā hirottappasamannāgatā kevalaṃ niccappahasitamukhā.
atk-s0513a1:2508_3: Tassā samānakulesu vāreyyatthāya āgatesu so cintesi “imissā vāreyyaṃ vattati,
atk-s0513a1:2508_5: Kumārikādhamme pana asati kumārikāya parakulaṃ gatāya mātāpitūnaṃ garahā hoti,
atk-s0513a1:2508_8: So ekadivasaṃ dhītaraṃ pacchiṃ gāhāpetvā paṇṇatthāya araññaṃ gantvā vīmaṃsanavasena kilesasannissito
atk-s0513a1:2508_9: viya hutvā rahassakathaṃ kathetvā taṃ hatthe gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a1:2508_15: atthi dāni te kumārikādhammo”ti. “Āma, tāta, atthi.
atk-s0513a1:2508_16: Mayā hi lobhavasena na koci puriso olokitapubbo”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2508_17: So dhītaraṃ assāsetvā gharaṃ netvā maṅgalaṃ katvā parakulaṃ pesetvā “satthāraṃ vandissāmī”ti gandhamālādihattho
atk-s0513a1:2508_18: jetavanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā pūjetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi,
atk-s0513a1:2508_22: tvaṃ pana na idāneva evaṃ vīmaṃsasi,
atk-s0513a1:2508_23: pubbepi vīmaṃsiyevā”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2509_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto araññe rukkhadevatā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:2509_2: Tena pana sā vīmaṃsanatthāya hatthe gahitamattā paridevamānā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2511_0: “Yo dukkhaphuṭṭhāya bhaveyya tāṇaṃ, so me pitā dubbhi vane karoti;
atk-s0513a1:2512_0: Sā kassa kandāmi vanassa majjhe, yo tāyitā so sahasaṃ karotī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2513_0: Tattha yo dukkhaphuṭṭhāya bhaveyya tāṇanti kāyikacetasikehi dukkhehi phuṭṭhāya tāyitā paritāyitā patiṭṭhā bhaveyya.
atk-s0513a1:2513_1: So me pitā dubbhi vane karotīti so mayhaṃ dukkhaparitāyako pitāva imasmiṃ vane evarūpaṃ mittadubbhi kammaṃ karoti,
atk-s0513a1:2513_2: attano jātāya dhītari vītikkamaṃ kātuṃ maññatīti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2513_5: Yo tāyitā so sahasaṃ karotīti yo mayhaṃ tāyitā rakkhitā avassayo bhavituṃ arahati,
atk-s0513a1:2514_3: So taṃ gharaṃ netvā maṇḍetvā maṅgalaṃ katvā parakulaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0513a1:2515_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a1:2516_2: taṃ kāraṇaṃ paccakkhato diṭṭharukkhadevatā pana ahameva ahosinti.
atk-s0513a1:2520_0: Yattha verī nivisatīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto anāthapiṇḍikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2520_1: Anāthapiṇḍiko kira bhogagāmaṃ gantvā āgacchanto antarāmagge core disvā “antarāmagge vasituṃ na yuttaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2520_2: sāvatthimeva gamissāmī”ti vegena goṇe pājetvā sāvatthimeva āgantvā punadivase vihāraṃ gato satthu etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:2520_3: Satthā “pubbepi gahapati paṇḍitā antarāmagge core disvā antarā avilambamānā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva gamiṃsū”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2521_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto mahāvibhavo seṭṭhi hutvā ekaṃ gāmakaṃ nimantanaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2521_1: bhuñjanatthāya gantvā paccāgacchanto antarāmagge core disvā antarāmagge avasitvāva vegena goṇe pājento
atk-s0513a1:2521_2: attano gehameva āgantvā nānaggarasehi bhuñjitvā mahāsayane nisinno “corānaṃ hatthato muccitvā nibbhayaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2521_3: attano gehaṃ āgatomhī”ti udānavasena imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2523_0: “Yattha verī nivisati, na vase tattha paṇḍito;
atk-s0513a1:2524_0: Ekarattaṃ dirattaṃ vā, dukkhaṃ vasati verisū”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2525_2: Na vase tattha paṇḍitoti so verīpuggalo yasmiṃ ṭhāne patiṭṭhito hutvā vasati,
atk-s0513a1:2525_3: tattha paṇḍito paṇḍiccena samannāgato na vaseyya.
atk-s0513a1:2525_7: verīnañhi antare vasanto ekāhampi dvīhampi dukkhameva vasatīti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2526_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto udānaṃ udānetvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2527_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “tadā ahameva bārāṇasiseṭṭhi ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2531_0: Catubbhi aṭṭhajjhagamāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ dubbacabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2531_3: Tasmiñhi kāle uracakkaṃ ukkhipitvā niraye paccamāno eko nerayikasatto “bhante,
atk-s0513a1:2531_4: kiṃ nu kho pāpakammaṃ akāsi”nti bodhisattaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:2531_5: Bodhisatto “tayā idañcidañca pāpakammaṃ kata”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2536_0: Tattha catubbhi aṭṭhajjhagamāti samuddantare catasso vimānapetiyo labhitvā tāhi asantuṭṭho atricchatāya parato gantvā aparā aṭṭha adhigatosīti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2536_2: Atricchaṃ cakkamāsadoti evaṃ sakalābhena asantuṭṭho atra atra icchanto parato parato lābhaṃ patthento idāni cakkamāsado idaṃ uracakkaṃ pattosi.
atk-s0513a1:2536_3: Tassa te evaṃ icchāhatassa posassa taṇhāya hatassa upahatassa tava cakkaṃ bhamati matthake.
atk-s0513a1:2536_5: ayacakkanti imesu dvīsu khuradhāraṃ ayacakkaṃ tassa matthake punappunaṃ patanavasena bhamantaṃ disvā evamāha.
atk-s0513a1:2536_6: Vatvā ca pana attano devalokameva gato.
atk-s0513a1:2536_7: Sopi nerayikasatto attano pāpe khīṇe yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2537_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2541_0: Bahumpetaṃ vane kaṭṭhanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ uttasitabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2541_1: So kira sāvatthivāsī eko kulaputto satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pabbajitvā maraṇabhīruko ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:2541_2: rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānesu vātassa vā vījantassa sukkhadaṇḍakassa vā patantassa pakkhicatuppadānaṃ vā saddaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2541_8: Tassa so maraṇabhīrukabhāvo bhikkhusaṅghe pākaṭo jāto.
atk-s0513a1:2542_1: asuko nāma bhikkhu maraṇabhīruko maraṇaṃ bhāyati,
atk-s0513a1:2542_2: bhikkhunā nāma ‘avassaṃ mayā maritabba’nti maraṇassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2542_5: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte taṃ bhikkhuṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ maraṇabhīruko”ti pucchitvā “saccaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2543_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto himavante rukkhadevatā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:2543_1: Tasmiṃ kāle bārāṇasirājā attano maṅgalahatthiṃ āneñjakāraṇaṃ sikkhāpetuṃ hatthācariyānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2543_2: Taṃ āḷāne niccalaṃ bandhitvā tomarahatthā manussā parivāretvā āneñjakāraṇaṃ kārenti.
atk-s0513a1:2543_3: So taṃ kāraṇaṃ kāriyamāno vedanaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto āḷānaṃ bhinditvā manusse palāpetvā himavantaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:2543_6: vātasaddāni sutvā kampamāno maraṇabhayatajjito soṇḍaṃ vidhunitvā vegena palāyati,
atk-s0513a1:2543_7: āḷāne bandhitvā āneñjakāraṇaṃ karaṇakālo viyassa hoti,
atk-s0513a1:2543_8: kāyassādaṃ vā cittassādaṃ vā alabhanto kampamāno vicarati.
atk-s0513a1:2544_0: Rukkhadevatā taṃ disvā khandhaviṭape ṭhatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2547_0: Tassa ce bhāyasi nāga, kiso nūna bhavissasī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2548_1: yaṃ etaṃ dubbalaṃ kaṭṭhaṃ puratthimādibhedo vāto bhañjati,
atk-s0513a1:2548_5: evaṃ sante niccaṃ bhīto maṃsalohitakkhayaṃ patvā kiso nūna bhavissasi,
atk-s0513a1:2548_6: imasmiṃ pana vane tava bhayaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:2549_0: Evaṃ devatā tassa ovādaṃ adāsi, sopi tato paṭṭhāya nibbhayo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2550_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a1:2554_0: Sukhaṃ vata maṃ jīvantanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto thullakumārikāpalobhanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2554_2: Taṃ pana bhikkhuṃ satthā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti pucchitvā “saccaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2554_3: bhagavā”ti vutte “kattha te cittaṃ paṭibaddha”nti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:2554_5: Atha naṃ satthā “ayaṃ te bhikkhu anatthakārikā,
atk-s0513a1:2554_6: pubbepi tvaṃ etaṃ nissāya sīlabyasanaṃ patvā kampanto vicaramāno paṇḍite nissāya sukhaṃ labhī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2555_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārenteti atītavatthupi cūḷanāradakassapajātakeyeva āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:2555_1: Tadā pana bodhisatto sāyaṃ phalāphale ādāya āgantvā paṇṇasālādvāraṃ vivaritvā pavisitvā puttaṃ cūḷatāpasaṃ etadavoca “tāta,
atk-s0513a1:2555_5: ajja pana ekampi akatvā kasmā dummukho pajjhāyanto nipannosī”ti? “Tāta,
atk-s0513a1:2555_6: tumhesu phalāphalatthāya gatesu ekā itthī āgantvā maṃ palobhetvā ādāya gantuṃ ārabhi,
atk-s0513a1:2555_7: ahaṃ pana ‘tumhehi vissajjito gamissāmī’ti na gacchiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2555_10: Bodhisatto “na sakkā etaṃ nivattetu”nti ñatvā “tena hi, tāta, gaccha,
atk-s0513a1:2555_11: esā pana taṃ netvā yadā macchamaṃsādīni vā khāditukāmā bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:2555_14: Tadā mayhaṃ guṇaṃ saritvā palāyitvā idheva āgaccheyyāsī”ti vissajjesi.
atk-s0513a1:2555_16: Atha naṃ sā attano vasaṃ gametvā “maṃsaṃ āhara,
atk-s0513a1:2555_17: macchaṃ āharā”ti yena yena atthikā hoti,
atk-s0513a1:2555_19: Tadā so “ayaṃ maṃ attano dāsaṃ viya kammakāraṃ viya ca katvā pīḷetī”ti palāyitvā pitu santikaṃ āgantvā pitaraṃ vanditvā ṭhitakova imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2559_0: Tattha sukhaṃ vata maṃ jīvantanti tāta,
atk-s0513a1:2559_6: cāṭito vā kūpato vā udakaussiñcanaghaṭikāyetaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2559_11: Corī jāyappavādenāti “bhariyā”ti nāmena ekā corī maṃ madhuravacanena upalāpetvā tattha netvā telaṃ loṇañca yañca aññaṃ icchati,
atk-s0513a1:2559_13: dāsaṃ viya kammakāraṃ viya ca katvā āharāpetīti tassā aguṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2560_4: So na cirasseva abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca uppādetvā brahmavihāre bhāvetvā saddhiṃ pitarā brahmaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:2561_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a1:2566_0: Sādhū kho sippakaṃ nāmāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ haṃsapaharanakaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2566_1: So kireko sāvatthivāsī kulaputto sālittakasippe nipphattiṃ patto.
atk-s0513a1:2566_3: So ekadivasaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā sāsane uraṃ datvā pabbajitvā upasampadaṃ labhi,
atk-s0513a1:2566_6: So ekadivasaṃ ekaṃ daharabhikkhuṃ ādāya aciravatiṃ gantvā nhāyitvā nadītīre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2566_7: Tasmiṃ samaye dve setahaṃsā ākāsena gacchanti.
atk-s0513a1:2566_8: So taṃ daharaṃ āha “imaṃ pacchimahaṃsaṃ sakkharāya akkhimhi paharitvā pādamūle pātemī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2566_14: “Tena hi upadhārehī”ti ekaṃ tikhiṇasakkharaṃ gahetvā aṅguliyā pariyante katvā tassa haṃsassa pacchato khipi.
atk-s0513a1:2566_16: haṃso “parissayena bhavitabba”nti nivattitvā saddaṃ sotuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a1:2566_17: Itaro tasmiṃ khaṇe ekaṃ vaṭṭasakkharaṃ gahetvā tassa nivattitvā olokentassa parabhāge akkhiṃ pahari.
atk-s0513a1:2566_20: Tato tato bhikkhū āgantvā garahitvā “ananucchavikaṃ te kata”nti satthu santikaṃ netvā “bhante,
atk-s0513a1:2566_21: iminā idaṃ nāma kata”nti tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2566_25: pubbepi kusaloyeva ahosī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2567_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tassa amacco ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2567_1: Tasmiṃ kāle rañño purohito atimukharo hoti bahubhāṇī,
atk-s0513a1:2567_2: tasmiṃ kathetuṃ āraddhe aññe okāsameva na labhanti.
atk-s0513a1:2567_3: Rājā cintesi “kadā nu kho etassa vacanupacchedakaṃ kañci labhissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2567_4: So tato paṭṭhāya tathārūpaṃ ekaṃ upadhārento vicarati.

atk-s0513a1:2629_16: phāletvā nikkhantasadiso udakaṃ āluḷento pacchimabhāge pati.
atk-s0513a1:2629_17: Kevaṭṭā “macchā jālaṃ phāletvā gatā”ti maññamānā jālakoṭiyaṃ gahetvā ukkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2629_18: Te dvepi macchā jālato muccitvā udake patiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2629_19: Iti tehi mitacintiṃ nissāya jīvitaṃ laddhaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2630_0: Satthā imaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā abhisambuddho hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2634_2: Ubho tattha samāgatāti mitacintiṃ nissāya laddhajīvitā tattha udake puna ubhopi janā mitacintinā saddhiṃ samāgatāti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2635_0: Evaṃ satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a1:2635_2: Tadā bahucintī ca appacintī ca ime dve ahesuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2639_0: Yāyaññe manusāsatīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ anusāsikaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2639_1: Sā kira sāvatthivāsinī ekā kuladhītā pabbajitvā upasampannakālato paṭṭhāya samaṇadhamme ananuyuttā āmisagiddhā
atk-s0513a1:2639_2: hutvā yattha aññā bhikkhuniyo na gacchanti,
atk-s0513a1:2639_5: Sā rasataṇhāya bajjhitvā “sace imasmiṃ padese aññāpi bhikkhuniyo piṇḍāya carissanti,
atk-s0513a1:2639_8: evaṃ mayā kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā bhikkhunūpassayaṃ gantvā “ayye,
atk-s0513a1:2639_14: mā tattha piṇḍāya caritthā”ti bhikkhuniyo anusāsati.
atk-s0513a1:2639_15: Tassā vacanaṃ sutvā ekā bhikkhunīpi taṃ padesaṃ gīvaṃ parivattetvā na olokesi.
atk-s0513a1:2639_16: Tassā ekasmiṃ divase tasmiṃ padese piṇḍāya carantiyā vegenekaṃ gehaṃ pavisantiyā caṇḍo meṇḍako paharitvā ūruṭṭhikaṃ bhindi.
atk-s0513a1:2639_17: Manussā vegena upadhāvitvā dvidhā bhinnaṃ ūruṭṭhikaṃ ekato bandhitvā taṃ bhikkhuniṃ mañcenādāya bhikkhunūpassayaṃ nayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2639_18: Bhikkhuniyo “ayaṃ aññā bhikkhuniyo anusāsitvā sayaṃ tasmiṃ padese carantī ūruṭṭhikaṃ bhindāpetvā āgatā”ti parihāsaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2639_19: Tampi tāya katakāraṇaṃ na cirasseva bhikkhusaṅghe pākaṭaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2640_1: asukā anusāsikā bhikkhunī aññaṃ anusāsitvā sayaṃ tasmiṃ padese caramānā caṇḍena meṇḍakena ūruṃ bhindāpesī”ti tassā aguṇakathaṃ kathesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2640_4: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:2640_8: niccakālaṃ dukkhameva anubhotī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2641_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto araññe sakuṇayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā vayappatto sakuṇajeṭṭhako
atk-s0513a1:2641_2: Tassa tattha vasanakāle ekā caṇḍasakuṇikā mahāvattanimaggaṃ gantvā gocaraṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0513a1:2641_3: Sā tattha sakaṭehi patitāni vīhimuggabījādīni labhitvā “yathā idāni imaṃ padesaṃ aññe sakuṇā nāgacchanti,
atk-s0513a1:2641_4: tathā karissāmī”ti cintetvā sakuṇasaṅghassa ovādaṃ deti “vattanimahāmaggo nāma sappaṭibhayo,
atk-s0513a1:2642_0: Sā ekadivasaṃ vattanimahāmagge carantī atimahāvegena āgacchantassa yānassa saddaṃ sutvā nivattitvā oloketvā “dūre tāvā”ti caratiyeva.
atk-s0513a1:2642_1: Atha naṃ yānaṃ vātavegena sīghameva sampāpuṇi,
atk-s0513a1:2642_4: Sakuṇajeṭṭhako sakuṇe samānento taṃ adisvā “anusāsikā na dissati,
atk-s0513a1:2642_6: Sakuṇā upadhārentā taṃ mahāmagge dvidhā chinnaṃ disvā sakuṇajeṭṭhakassa ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2642_7: Sakuṇajeṭṭhako “sā aññā sakuṇikā vāretvā sayaṃ tattha caramānā dvidhā chinnā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2645_0: Sāyaṃ vipakkhikā seti, hatā cakkena sāsikā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2646_3: Sāyaṃ vipakkhikā setīti sā esā vihatapakkhā hutvā mahāmagge sayati.
atk-s0513a1:2646_4: Hatā cakkena sāsikāti yānacakkena hatā sāsikā sakuṇikāti.
atk-s0513a1:2647_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2647_1: “tadā anusāsikā sakuṇikā ayaṃ anusāsikā bhikkhunī ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:2651_0: Atikaramakarācariyāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ dubbacabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2651_1: Tassa vatthu navakanipāte gijjhajātake āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:2651_2: Satthā pana taṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantetvā “bhikkhu na tvaṃ idāneva dubbaco,
atk-s0513a1:2651_4: Dubbacabhāveneva paṇḍitānaṃ ovādaṃ akaronto sattippahārena jīvitakkhayaṃ pattosī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2652_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto laṅghanaṭakayoniyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā vayappatto paññavā upāyakusalo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2652_1: So ekassa laṅghanakassa santike sattilaṅghanasippaṃ sikkhitvā ācariyena saddhiṃ sippaṃ dassento vicarati.
atk-s0513a1:2652_2: Ācariyo panassa catunnaṃyeva sattīnaṃ laṅghanasippaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0513a1:2652_4: So ekadivasaṃ ekasmiṃ gāmake sippaṃ dassento surāmadamatto “pañca sattiyo laṅghissāmī”ti paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:2652_10: So suṭṭhu mattatāya “tvañhi mayhaṃ pamāṇaṃ na jānāsī”ti tassa vacanaṃ anādiyitvā catasso laṅghitvā pañcamāya
atk-s0513a1:2652_11: sattiyā daṇḍake madhukapupphaṃ viya āvuto paridevamāno nipajji.
atk-s0513a1:2652_12: Atha naṃ bodhisatto “paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ akatvā imaṃ byasanaṃ pattosī”ti imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2656_0: Tattha atikaramakarācariyāti ācariya ajja tvaṃ atikaraṃ akari,
atk-s0513a1:2656_1: attano karaṇato atirekaṃ karaṇaṃ akarīti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2656_2: Mayhampetaṃ na ruccatīti mayhaṃ antevāsikassapi samānassa etaṃ tava karaṇaṃ na ruccati,
atk-s0513a1:2656_3: tena te ahaṃ paṭhamameva kathesinti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a1:2656_4: Catutthe laṅghayitvānāti catutthe sattithale apatitvā attānaṃ laṅghayitvā.
atk-s0513a1:2656_5: Pañcamāyasi āvutoti paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ aggaṇhanto idāni pañcamāya sattiyā āvutosīti.
atk-s0513a1:2656_6: Idaṃ vatvā ācariyaṃ sattito apanetvā kattabbayuttakaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2657_0: Satthā imaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2661_0: Accuggatātibalatāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kokālikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2661_1: Tassa vatthu terasakanipāte takkāriyajātake āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:2661_4: kokāliko idāneva attano vācaṃ nissāya naṭṭho,
atk-s0513a1:2662_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto udiccabrāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2662_1: sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā kāme pahāya isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā pañcābhiññā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattesi.
atk-s0513a1:2662_2: Himavantappadese sabbo isigaṇo sannipatitvā taṃ ovādācariyaṃ katvā parivāresi.
atk-s0513a1:2662_3: So pañcannaṃ isisatānaṃ ovādācariyo hutvā jhānakīḷaṃ kīḷanto himavante vasati.
atk-s0513a1:2662_4: Tadā eko cettha paṇḍurogī tāpaso kuṭhāriṃ gahetvā kaṭṭhaṃ phāleti.
atk-s0513a1:2662_5: Atheko mukharatāpaso tassa santike nisīditvā “idha pahāraṃ dehi,
atk-s0513a1:2662_6: idha pahāraṃ dehī”ti taṃ tāpasaṃ rosesi.
atk-s0513a1:2662_7: So kujjhitvā “na dāni me tvaṃ dāruphālanasippaṃ sikkhāpanakācariyo”ti tiṇhaṃ kuṭhāriṃ ukkhipitvā naṃ ekappahāreneva jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2662_9: Tadā assamato avidūre ekasmiṃ vammikapāde eko tittiro vasati.
atk-s0513a1:2662_10: So sāyaṃ pātaṃ tasmiṃ vammikamatthake ṭhatvā mahāvassitaṃ vassati.
atk-s0513a1:2662_11: Taṃ sutvā eko luddako “tittirena bhavitabba”nti cintetvā saddasaññāya tattha gantvā taṃ vadhitvā ādāya gato.
atk-s0513a1:2663_0: Bodhisatto tassa saddaṃ asuṇanto “asukaṭṭhāne tittiro vasati,
atk-s0513a1:2663_1: kiṃ nu kho tassa saddo na sūyatī”ti tāpase pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:2663_3: So ubhopi tāni kāraṇāni saṃsandetvā isigaṇamajjhe imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2667_3: Tittiraṃ vātivassitanti yathā tittiraṃ ativassitaṃ hanati,
atk-s0513a1:2667_4: tathā evarūpā vācā dummedhaṃ bālapuggalaṃ hanatīti.
atk-s0513a1:2668_0: Evaṃ bodhisatto isigaṇassa ovādaṃ datvā cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2669_2: kokāliko idāneva attano vacanaṃ nissāya naṭṭho,
atk-s0513a1:2669_3: pubbepi naṭṭhoyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2673_0: Nācintayanto purisoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto uttaraseṭṭhiputtaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2673_1: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira uttaraseṭṭhi nāma ahosi mahāvibhavo.
atk-s0513a1:2673_2: Tassa bhariyāya kucchiyaṃ eko puññavā satto brahmalokā cavitvā paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā vayappatto abhirūpo pāsādiko ahosi brahmavaṇṇī.
atk-s0513a1:2673_3: Atha ekadivasaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ kattikachaṇe nakkhatte ghuṭṭhe sabbo loko nakkhattanissito ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2673_4: Tassa sahāyakā aññe seṭṭhiputtā sapajāpatikā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2673_5: Uttaraseṭṭhiputtassa pana dīgharattaṃ brahmaloke vasitattā kilesesu cittaṃ na allīyati.
atk-s0513a1:2673_6: Athassa sahāyakā “uttaraseṭṭhiputtassapi ekaṃ itthiṃ ānetvā nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmā”ti sammantayitvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā “samma,
atk-s0513a1:2673_8: tuyhampi ekaṃ itthiṃ ānetvā nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2673_9: “Na me attho itthiyā”ti ca vuttepi punappunaṃ nibandhitvā sampaṭicchāpetvā ekaṃ vaṇṇadāsiṃ sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2673_10: katvā tassa gharaṃ netvā “tvaṃ seṭṭhiputtassa santikaṃ gacchā”ti sayanigharaṃ pesetvā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2673_11: Taṃ sayanigharaṃ paviṭṭhampi seṭṭhiputto neva oloketi, nālapati.
atk-s0513a1:2673_12: Sā cintesi “ayaṃ evaṃ rūpasobhaggappattaṃ uttamavilāsasampannaṃ maṃ neva oloketi, nālapati,
atk-s0513a1:2673_13: idāni naṃ attano itthikuttalīlāya olokāpessāmī”ti itthilīlaṃ dassentī pahaṭṭhākārena aggadante vivaritvā hasitaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2673_16: sakalampi taṃ sarīraṃ aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikā viya paññāyi.
atk-s0513a1:2674_0: Taṃ tassa gharā otiṇṇaṃ eko issaro antaravīthiyaṃ disvā paribbayaṃ datvā attano gharaṃ nesi,
atk-s0513a1:2674_2: Vaṇṇadāsiyā mātā dhītu āgamanaṃ adisvā seṭṭhiputtānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā “kahaṃ sā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:2674_3: Te uttaraseṭṭhiputtassa gharaṃ gantvā “kahaṃ sā”ti pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2674_5: Athassā mātā rodantī “dhītaraṃ me na passāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2674_6: dhītaraṃ me samānethā”ti uttaraseṭṭhiputtaṃ ādāya rañño santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2674_7: Rājā aṭṭaṃ vinicchinanto “ime te seṭṭhiputtā vaṇṇadāsiṃ ānetvā tuyhaṃ adaṃsū”ti pucchi. “Āma, devā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2674_15: Atha naṃ pacchābāhaṃ bandhitvā “rājāṇaṃ karissāmā”ti gahetvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2674_16: “Seṭṭhiputtaṃ kira vaṇṇadāsiṃ samānetuṃ asakkontaṃ rājā rājāṇaṃ kāretī”ti sakalanagaraṃ ekakolāhalaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2674_17: Mahājano ure hatthe ṭhapetvā “kiṃ nāmetaṃ, sāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2674_19: Seṭṭhipi puttassa pacchato pacchato paridevanto gacchati.
atk-s0513a1:2675_0: Seṭṭhiputto cintesi “idaṃ mayhaṃ evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ agāre vasanabhāvena uppannaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2675_3: Sāpi kho vaṇṇadāsī taṃ kolāhalasaddaṃ sutvā “kiṃsaddo nāmeso”ti pucchitvā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā vegena otaritvā “ussaratha,
atk-s0513a1:2675_5: maṃ rājapurisānaṃ daṭṭhuṃ dethā”ti attānaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0513a1:2675_6: Rājapurisā taṃ disvā mātaraṃ paṭicchāpetvā seṭṭhiputtaṃ muñcitvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2675_7: So sahāyakaparivutova nadiṃ gantvā sasīsaṃ nhāyitvā gehaṃ gantvā bhuttapātarāso mātāpitaro vanditvā pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2675_8: anujānāpetvā cīvarasāṭake ādāya mahantena parivārena satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā pabbajjaṃ yācitvā
atk-s0513a1:2675_9: pabbajjañca upasampadañca labhitvā avissaṭṭhakammaṭṭhāno vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā na cirasseva arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2676_1: uttaraseṭṭhiputto attano bhaye uppanne sāsanassa guṇaṃ jānitvā ‘imamhā dukkhā muccamāno pabbajissāmī’ti cintetvā tena sucintitena maraṇamutto ceva,
atk-s0513a1:2676_2: pabbajito ca aggaphale patiṭṭhito”ti tassa guṇakathaṃ kathesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2676_5: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:2676_7: uttaraseṭṭhiputtova attano bhaye uppanne ‘iminā upāyena imamhā dukkhā muccissāmī’ti cintetvā maraṇabhayā mutto,
atk-s0513a1:2676_8: atīte paṇḍitāpi attano bhaye uppanne ‘iminā upāyena imamhā dukkhā muccissāmā’ti cintetvā maraṇabhayato mucciṃsuyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2677_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto cutipaṭisandhivasena parivattanto vaṭṭakayoniyaṃ nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:2677_1: Tadā eko vaṭṭakaluddako araññā bahū vaṭṭake āharitvā gehe ṭhapetvā gocaraṃ datvā mūlaṃ gahetvā āgatāgatānaṃ hatthe vaṭṭake vikkiṇanto jīvikaṃ kappeti.
atk-s0513a1:2677_2: So ekadivasaṃ bahūhi vaṭṭakehi saddhiṃ bodhisattampi gahetvā ānesi.
atk-s0513a1:2677_3: Bodhisatto cintesi “sacāhaṃ iminā dinnaṃ gocarañca pānīyañca paribhuñjissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2677_4: ayaṃ maṃ gahetvā āgatānaṃ manussānaṃ dassati.
atk-s0513a1:2677_7: atha maṃ milāyantaṃ disvā manussā na gaṇhissanti.
atk-s0513a1:2677_10: So tathā karonto milāyitvā aṭṭhicammamatto ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2677_12: Luddako bodhisattaṃ ṭhapetvā sesesu vaṭṭakesu parikkhīṇesu pacchiṃ nīharitvā dvāre ṭhapetvā bodhisattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2677_13: hatthatale katvā “kiṃ nu kho ayaṃ vaṭṭako”ti cintetvā oloketuṃ āraddho.
atk-s0513a1:2677_14: Athassa pamattabhāvaṃ ñatvā bodhisatto pakkhe pasāretvā uppatitvā araññameva gato.
atk-s0513a1:2677_15: Aññe vaṭṭakā taṃ disvā “kiṃ nu kho na paññāyasi,
atk-s0513a1:2677_16: kahaṃ gatosī”ti pucchitvā “luddakena gahitomhī”ti vutte “kinti katvā muttosī”ti pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2677_17: Bodhisatto “ahaṃ tena dinnaṃ gocaraṃ aggahetvā pānīyaṃ apivitvā upāyacintāya mutto”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2681_1: puriso dukkhaṃ patvā “iminā nāma upāyena imamhā dukkhā muccissāmī”ti acintayanto attano dukkhā mokkhasaṅkhātaṃ visesaṃ nādhigacchati.
atk-s0513a1:2681_2: Idāni pana mayā cintitakammassa phalaṃ passa.
atk-s0513a1:2681_4: maraṇato ca bandhanato ca muttosmi ahanti.
atk-s0513a1:2682_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2686_0: Amātāpitarasaṃvaddhoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ akālarāviṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2686_1: So kira sāvatthivāsī kulaputto sāsane pabbajitvā vattaṃ vā sikkhaṃ vā na uggaṇhi.
atk-s0513a1:2686_6: paṭhamayāmepi majjhimayāmepi pacchimayāmepi pabuddhapabuddhakkhaṇeyeva mahāsaddaṃ karoti,
atk-s0513a1:2686_9: asuko nāma bhikkhu evarūpe ratanasāsane pabbajitvā vattaṃ vā sikkhaṃ vā kālaṃ vā akālaṃ vā na jānātī”ti tassa aguṇakathaṃ kathesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2686_12: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:2686_16: kālākālaṃ ajānanabhāvena ca gīvāya vaṭṭitāya jīvitakkhayaṃ patto”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2687_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto udiccabrāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto sabbasippesu
atk-s0513a1:2687_1: pāraṃ gantvā bārāṇasiyaṃ disāpāmokkho ācariyo hutvā pañcasate māṇave sippaṃ vāceti.
atk-s0513a1:2687_2: Tesaṃ māṇavānaṃ eko kālarāvī kukkuṭo atthi,
atk-s0513a1:2687_3: te tassa vassitasaddena uṭṭhāya sippaṃ sikkhanti.
atk-s0513a1:2687_6: Atheko māṇavako susānavane dārūni uddharanto ekaṃ kukkuṭaṃ disvā ānetvā pañjare ṭhapetvā paṭijaggati.
atk-s0513a1:2687_7: So susāne vaḍḍhitattā “asukavelāya nāma vassitabba”nti ajānanto kadāci atirattiṃ vassati,
atk-s0513a1:2687_9: Māṇavā tassa atirattiṃ vassitakāle sippaṃ sikkhantā yāva aruṇuggamanā sikkhituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0513a1:2687_11: Atipabhāte vassitakāle sajjhāyassa okāsameva na labhanti.
atk-s0513a1:2687_12: Māṇavā “ayaṃ atirattiṃ vā vassati atipabhāte vā,
atk-s0513a1:2687_13: imaṃ nissāya amhākaṃ sippaṃ na niṭṭhāyissatī”ti taṃ gahetvā gīvaṃ vaṭṭetvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā “akālarāvī
atk-s0513a1:2687_15: Ācariyo “ovādaṃ aggahetvā saṃvaḍḍhitabhāvena maraṇaṃ patto”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2690_0: Nāyaṃ kālaṃ akālaṃ vā, abhijānāti kukkuṭo”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2691_0: Tattha amātāpitarasaṃvaddhoti mātāpitaro nissāya tesaṃ ovādaṃ aggahetvā saṃvaḍḍho.
atk-s0513a1:2691_3: Nāyaṃ kālaṃ akālaṃ vāti “imasmiṃ kāle vassitabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2691_4: imasmiṃ na vassitabba”nti evaṃ vassitabbayuttakaṃ kālaṃ vā akālaṃ vā esa kukkuṭo na jānāti,
atk-s0513a1:2691_6: Idaṃ kāraṇaṃ dassetvā bodhisatto yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2692_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2696_0: Abaddhā tattha bajjhantīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ciñcamāṇavikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2696_1: Tassā vatthu dvādasakanipāte mahāpadumajātake āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0513a1:2697_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto purohitassa gehe nibbattitvā vayappatto pitu accayena tasseva purohito ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2697_4: Sā evamāha “na mayhaṃ añño varo nāma dullabho,
atk-s0513a1:2697_5: ito pana te paṭṭhāya aññā itthī kilesavasena na oloketabbā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2697_6: So paṭikkhipitvā punappunaṃ nippīḷiyamāno tassā vacanaṃ atikkamituṃ asakkonto sampaṭicchitvā tato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a1:2697_7: soḷasasu nāṭakitthisahassesu kilesavasena ekitthimpi na olokesi.
atk-s0513a1:2698_1: paccante ṭhitā yodhā corehi saddhiṃ dve tayo saṅgāme katvā “ito uttari mayaṃ na sakkomā”ti rañño paṇṇaṃ pesesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2698_2: Rājā tattha gantukāmo balakāyaṃ saṃharitvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “bhadde,
atk-s0513a1:2698_9: mayā nivattitu”nti punappunaṃ raññā paṭikkhittā āha “tena hi ekekaṃ yojanaṃ gantvā mayhaṃ sukhadukkhajānanatthaṃ ekekaṃ manussaṃ peseyyāthā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2698_10: Rājā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā bodhisattaṃ nagare ṭhapetvā mahantena balakāyena nikkhamitvā gacchanto
atk-s0513a1:2698_11: yojane yojane ekekaṃ purisaṃ “amhākaṃ ārogyaṃ ārocetvā deviyā sukhadukkhaṃ jānitvā āgacchā”ti pesesi.
atk-s0513a1:2698_12: Sā āgatāgataṃ purisaṃ “rājā kimatthaṃ taṃ pesetī”ti pucchitvā “tumhākaṃ sukhadukkhajānanatthāyā”ti vutte
atk-s0513a1:2698_13: “tena hi ehī”ti tena saddhiṃ asaddhammaṃ paṭisevati.
atk-s0513a1:2698_14: Rājā dvattiṃsayojanamaggaṃ gacchanto dvattiṃsa jane pesesi,
atk-s0513a1:2698_15: sā sabbehipi tehi saddhiṃ tatheva akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2699_0: Rājā paccantaṃ vūpasametvā janapadaṃ samassāsetvā puna āgacchantopi tatheva dvattiṃsa jane pesesi,
atk-s0513a1:2699_2: Rājā āgantvā jayakkhandhāvāraṭṭhāne ṭhatvā “nagaraṃ paṭijaggāpetū”ti bodhisattassa paṇṇaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0513a1:2699_3: Bodhisatto sakalanagaraṃ paṭijaggāpetvā rājanivesanaṃ paṭijaggāpento deviyā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2699_4: Sā bodhisattassa rūpasobhaggappattaṃ kāyaṃ disvā saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontī “ehi, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0513a1:2699_9: na sakkā mayā evaṃ kātu”nti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2699_16: “Ahaṃ pana jānamāno evarūpaṃ sāhasiyakammaṃ na karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2699_21: attabhāvasahassepi sīse chijjante na sakkā mayā evarūpaṃ kātu”nti. Sā “hotu,
atk-s0513a1:2699_22: jānissāmī”ti bodhisattaṃ tajjetvā attano gabbhaṃ pavisitvā sarīre nakhavaḷañjaṃ dassetvā telena gattāni
atk-s0513a1:2699_23: abbhañjitvā kiliṭṭhavatthaṃ nivāsetvā gilānālayaṃ katvā dāsiyo āṇāpesi ‘raññā kahaṃ devī’ti vutte ‘gilānā’ti
atk-s0513a1:2700_1: Rājā nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pāsādaṃ āruyha deviṃ apassanto “kahaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2700_3: Sopi sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā tassā piṭṭhiṃ parimajjanto “kiṃ te, bhadde,
atk-s0513a1:2700_11: Tumhehi nagaraṃ rakkhanatthāya ṭhapito purohito “tumhākaṃ nivesanaṃ paṭijaggāmī”ti idhāgantvā attano
atk-s0513a1:2700_12: vacanaṃ akarontiṃ maṃ paharitvā attano manaṃ pūretvā gatoti.
atk-s0513a1:2700_13: Rājā aggimhi pakkhittaloṇasakkharā viya kodhena taṭataṭāyanto sirigabbhā nikkhamitvā dovārikapādamūlikādayo pakkosāpetvā “gacchatha, bhaṇe,
atk-s0513a1:2700_14: purohitaṃ pacchābāhaṃ bandhitvā vajjhabhāvappattaṃ katvā nagarā nīharitvā āghātanaṃ netvā sīsamassa chindathā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2700_15: Te vegena gantvā taṃ pacchābāhaṃ bandhitvā vajjhabheriṃ carāpesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2701_2: ajja dānāhaṃ attano baleneva attānaṃ mocessāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2701_4: tumhe maṃ mārentā rañño dassetvāva mārethā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2701_12: mayā rañño sāpateyye ācikkhite pacchā kātabbaṃ karothā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2701_16: kasmā te evarūpaṃ pāpakammaṃ kata”nti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2701_21: lobhavasena paresaṃ itthī akkhīni ummīletvāpi na olokitapubbā,
atk-s0513a1:2701_25: Sā pana bālā lobhavasena maṃ hatthe gahetvā mayā paṭikkhittā maṃ tajjetvā attanā kataṃ pāpaṃ uttānaṃ katvā mama ācikkhitvā antogabbhaṃ paviṭṭhā.
atk-s0513a1:2701_27: paṇṇaṃ gahetvā pana āgatā catusaṭṭhi janā sāparādhā,
atk-s0513a1:2701_30: Rājā te catusaṭṭhi jane bandhāpetvā deviṃ pakkosāpetvā “tayā etehi saddhiṃ pāpaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2701_32: devā”ti vutte te pacchābāhaṃ bandhāpetvā “imesaṃ catusaṭṭhijanānaṃ sīsāni chindathā”ti āṇāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2702_9: Tasmā etissāpi khamathā”ti nānappakārena rājānaṃ saññāpetvā te catusaṭṭhipi jane tañca bālaṃ mocāpetvā sabbesaṃ yathāsakāni ṭhānāni dāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2702_10: Evaṃ te sabbe mocetvā sakaṭṭhāne patiṭṭhāpetvā bodhisatto rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “mahārāja,
atk-s0513a1:2702_11: andhabālānaṃ nāma avatthukena vacanena abandhitabbayuttakāpi paṇḍitā pacchābāhaṃ baddhā,
atk-s0513a1:2702_12: paṇḍitānaṃ kāraṇayuttena vacanena pacchābāhaṃ baddhāpi muttā.
atk-s0513a1:2702_14: paṇḍitā baddhepi mocentī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2705_0: Baddhāpi tattha muccanti, yattha dhīrā pabhāsare”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2706_0: Tattha abaddhāti abandhitabbayuttā. Pabhāsareti pabhāsanti vadanti kathenti.
atk-s0513a1:2707_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto imāya gāthāya rañño dhammaṃ desetvā “mayā imaṃ dukkhaṃ agāre vasanabhāvena laddhaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2707_3: devā”ti pabbajjaṃ anujānāpetvā assumukhaṃ ñātijanaṃ mahantañca vibhavaṃ pahāya isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā
atk-s0513a1:2707_4: himavante vasanto abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2708_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2718_0: Kare sarikkhoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto anāthapiṇḍikassa mittaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2718_1: Anāthapiṇḍikassa hi mittasuhajjañātibandhavā ekato hutvā “mahāseṭṭhi ayaṃ tayā jātigottadhanadhaññādīhi neva sadiso,
atk-s0513a1:2718_5: Anāthapiṇḍiko pana “mittasanthavo nāma hīnehipi samehipi atirekehipi kattabboyevā”ti tesaṃ vacanaṃ aggahetvā
atk-s0513a1:2718_6: bhogagāmaṃ gacchanto taṃ kuṭumbarakkhakaṃ katvā agamāsīti sabbaṃ kāḷakaṇṇivatthusmiṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2718_7: Idha pana anāthapiṇḍikena attano ghare pavattiyā ārocitāya satthā “gahapati,
atk-s0513a1:2718_10: mitto nāma attanā samopi hīnopi seṭṭhopi gahetabbo.
atk-s0513a1:2718_12: idāni tāva tvaṃ attano nīcamittaṃ nissāya kuṭumbassa sāmiko jāto,
atk-s0513a1:2718_13: porāṇā pana nīcamittaṃ nissāya vimānasāmikā jātā”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2719_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto rañño uyyāne kusanāḷigacche devatā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:2719_1: Tasmiṃyeva ca uyyāne maṅgalasilaṃ nissāya ujugatakkhandho parimaṇḍalasākhāviṭapasampanno rañño santikā laddhasammāno rucamaṅgalarukkho atthi,
atk-s0513a1:2719_5: Tadā rājā ekasmiṃ ekatthambhake pāsāde vasati,
atk-s0513a1:2719_10: ekaṃ sāratthambhaṃ āharitvā taṃ niccalaṃ karothā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2719_12: devā”ti rañño vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā tadanucchavikaṃ rukkhaṃ pariyesamānā aññattha adisvā uyyānaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0513a1:2719_13: taṃ mukhakarukkhaṃ disvā rañño santikaṃ gantvā “kiṃ, tātā,
atk-s0513a1:2719_14: diṭṭho vo tadanucchaviko rukkho”ti vutte “diṭṭho, deva,
atk-s0513a1:2719_15: apica taṃ chindituṃ na visahāmā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2719_17: Mayañhi aññattha rukkhaṃ apassantā uyyānaṃ pavisimha,
atk-s0513a1:2719_18: tatrapi ṭhapetvā maṅgalarukkhaṃ aññaṃ na passāma.
atk-s0513a1:2719_19: Iti naṃ maṅgalarukkhatāya chindituṃ na visahāmāti.
atk-s0513a1:2719_23: Te “sādhū”ti balikammaṃ gahetvā uyyānaṃ gantvā “sve chindissāmā”ti rukkhassa balikammaṃ katvā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2720_0: Rukkhadevatā taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā “sve mayhaṃ vimānaṃ nāsessanti,
atk-s0513a1:2720_1: dārake gahetvā kuhiṃ gamissāmī”ti gantabbaṭṭhānaṃ apassantī puttake gīvāya gahetvā parodi.
atk-s0513a1:2720_2: Tassā sandiṭṭhasambhattā rukkhadevatā āgantvā “kiṃ eta”nti pucchitvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ sutvā sayampi vaḍḍhakīnaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2720_3: paṭikkamanūpāyaṃ apassantiyo taṃ parissajitvā rodituṃ ārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2720_4: Tasmiṃ samaye bodhisatto “rukkhadevataṃ passissāmī”ti tattha gantvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ sutvā “hotu,
atk-s0513a1:2720_7: sve vaḍḍhakīnaṃ āgatakāle mama kāraṇaṃ passathā”ti tā devatā samassāsetvā punadivase vaḍḍhakīnaṃ āgatavelāya
atk-s0513a1:2720_8: kakaṇṭakavesaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhakīnaṃ purato gantvā maṅgalarukkhassa mūlantaraṃ pavisitvā taṃ rukkhaṃ susiraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2720_9: viya katvā rukkhamajjhena abhiruhitvā khandhamatthakena nikkhamitvā sīsaṃ kampayamāno nipajji.
atk-s0513a1:2720_10: Mahāvaḍḍhakī taṃ kakaṇṭakaṃ disvā rukkhaṃ hatthena paharitvā “susirarukkho eso nissāro,
atk-s0513a1:2720_11: hiyyo anupadhāretvāva balikammaṃ karimhā”ti ekaghanaṃ mahārukkhaṃ garahitvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:2720_12: Rukkhadevatā bodhisattaṃ nissāya vimānassa sāminī jātā.
atk-s0513a1:2721_0: Tassā paṭisanthāratthāya sandiṭṭhasambhattā bahū devatā sannipatiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2721_1: Rukkhadevatā “vimānaṃ me laddha”nti tuṭṭhacittā tāsaṃ devatānaṃ majjhe bodhisattassa guṇaṃ kathayamānā “bho, devatā,
atk-s0513a1:2721_2: mayaṃ mahesakkhā hutvāpi dandhapaññatāya imaṃ upāyaṃ na jānimha,
atk-s0513a1:2721_3: kusanāḷidevatā pana attano ñāṇasampattiyā amhe vimānasāmike akāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2721_4: mitto nāma sadisopi adhikopi hīnopi kattabbova.
atk-s0513a1:2721_5: Sabbepi hi attano thāmena sahāyakānaṃ uppannaṃ dukkhaṃ nittharitvā sukhe patiṭṭhāpentiyevā”ti mittadhammaṃ vaṇṇetvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2723_0: “Kare sarikkho atha vāpi seṭṭho, nihīnako vāpi kareyya eko;
atk-s0513a1:2724_0: Kareyyumete byasane uttamatthaṃ, yathā ahaṃ kusanāḷi rucāya”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2725_0: Tattha kare sarikkhoti jātiādīhi sadisopi mittadhammaṃ kareyya.
atk-s0513a1:2725_1: Atha vāpi seṭṭhoti jātiādīhi adhikopi kareyya.
atk-s0513a1:2725_2: Nihīnako vāpi kareyya ekoti eko jātiādīhi hīnopi mittadhammaṃ kareyya.
atk-s0513a1:2725_3: Tasmā sabbepi ete mittā kātabbāyevāti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a1:2725_5: Kareyyumete byasane uttamatthanti sabbepete sahāyassa byasane uppanne attano attano pattabhāraṃ vahamānā uttamatthaṃ kareyyuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2725_11: yathā ahaṃ rucāyaṃ nibbattadevatā ayañca kusanāḷidevatā,
atk-s0513a1:2725_13: tatrapāhaṃ mahesakkhāpi samānā attano uppannadukkhaṃ bālatāya anupāyakusalatāya harituṃ nāsakkhiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2725_14: imaṃ pana appesakkhampi samānaṃ paṇḍitadevataṃ nissāya dukkhato muttomhi.
atk-s0513a1:2725_15: Tasmā aññehipi dukkhā muccitukāmehi samavisiṭṭhabhāvaṃ anoloketvā hīnopi paṇḍito mitto kātabboti.
atk-s0513a1:2726_0: Rucādevatā imāya gāthāya devasaṅghassa dhammaṃ desetvā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā saddhiṃ kusanāḷidevatāya yathākammaṃ gatā.
atk-s0513a1:2727_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2731_0: Yasaṃ laddhāna dummedhoti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2731_3: āveḷāveḷābhūtā yamakayamakabhūtā ghanabuddharasmiyo vissajjentaṃ paramasobhaggappattaṃ attabhāvañca oloketvā
atk-s0513a1:2731_6: ‘Buddhā nāma evarūpena sīlena samādhinā paññāya vimuttiyā vimuttiñāṇadassanena samannāgatā’ti vuccamāne vaṇṇaṃ sahituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0513a1:2731_10: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:2731_12: idāneva devadatto mama vaṇṇe bhaññamāne usūyaṃ karoti,
atk-s0513a1:2732_0: Atīte magadharaṭṭhe rājagahanagare ekasmiṃ magadharāje rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto hatthiyoniyaṃ nibbattitvā
atk-s0513a1:2732_1: sabbaseto ahosi heṭṭhā vaṇṇitasadisāya rūpasampattiyā samannāgato.
atk-s0513a1:2732_2: Atha naṃ “lakkhaṇasampanno aya”nti so rājā maṅgalahatthiṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2732_3: Athekasmiṃ chaṇadivase sakalanagaraṃ devanagaraṃ viya alaṅkārāpetvā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ maṅgalahatthiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2732_4: abhiruhitvā mahantena rājānubhāvena nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2732_5: Mahājano tattha tattha ṭhatvā maṅgalahatthino rūpasobhaggappattaṃ sarīraṃ disvā “aho rūpaṃ, aho gati, aho līḷā,
atk-s0513a1:2732_7: evarūpo nāma sabbasetavaravāraṇo cakkavattirañño anucchaviko”ti maṅgalahatthimeva vaṇṇesi.
atk-s0513a1:2733_0: Rājā maṅgalahatthissa vaṇṇaṃ sutvā sahituṃ asakkonto usūyaṃ uppādetvā “ajjeva taṃ pabbatapāde pātetvā
atk-s0513a1:2733_1: jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpessāmī”ti hatthācariyaṃ pakkosāpetvā “kinti katvā tayā ayaṃ nāgo sikkhāpito”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2733_8: “Tena hi ehī”ti sayaṃ otaritvā hatthācariyaṃ āropetvā pabbatapādaṃ gantvā hatthācariyena hatthipiṭṭhiyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2733_9: nisīditvāva hatthimhi vepullapabbatamatthakaṃ āropite sayampi amaccagaṇaparivuto pabbatamatthakaṃ abhiruhitvā
atk-s0513a1:2733_10: hatthiṃ papātābhimukhaṃ kāretvā “tvaṃ ‘mayā esa susikkhāpito’ti vadesi,
atk-s0513a1:2733_11: tīhiyeva tāva naṃ pādehi ṭhapehī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2733_12: Hatthācariyo piṭṭhiyaṃ nisīditvāva “bho tīhi pādehi tiṭṭhā”ti hatthissa paṇhikāya saññaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2733_15: mahāsatto dve pacchimapāde ukkhipitvā purimapādehi aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2733_16: “Pacchimapādehiyevā”ti vuttepi dve purimapāde ukkhipitvā pacchimapādehi aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2733_17: “ekenā”ti vuttepi tayo pāde ukkhipitvā ekeneva aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2734_1: “sakalajambudīpe iminā sadiso susikkhito hatthī nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:2734_2: nissaṃsayaṃ panetaṃ esa papāte pātetvā māretukāmo bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2734_4: ayaṃ rājā taṃ papāte pātetvā māretukāmo,
atk-s0513a1:2734_6: Sace te ākāsena gantuṃ balaṃ atthi,
atk-s0513a1:2734_7: maṃ yathānisinnaṃyeva ādāya vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā bārāṇasiṃ gacchā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2734_8: Puññiddhiyā samannāgato mahāsatto taṅkhaṇaññeva ākāse aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2734_13: tādisā nāma mandapuññā evarūpaṃ vāhanaṃ labhitvā tassa guṇaṃ ajānantā tañceva vāhanaṃ avasesañca yasasampattiṃ
atk-s0513a1:2734_14: nāsentiyevā”ti vatvā hatthikkhandhe nisinnova imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2738_1: tādiso dummedho nippañño puggalo parivārasampattiṃ labhitvā attano anatthaṃ carati.
atk-s0513a1:2738_3: So hi yasamadamatto kattabbākattabbaṃ ajānanto attano ca paresañca hiṃsāya paṭipajjati.
atk-s0513a1:2739_0: Evaṃ imāya gāthāya rañño dhammaṃ desetvā “tiṭṭha dāni tva”nti vatvā ākāse uppatitvā bārāṇasinagaraṃ gantvā rājaṅgaṇe ākāse aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2739_1: Sakalanagaraṃ saṅkhubhitvā “amhākaṃ rañño ākāsena setavaravāraṇo āgantvā rājaṅgaṇe ṭhito”ti ekakolāhalaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2739_7: tātā”ti vutte “rājagahato”ti vatvā sabbaṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:2739_9: kataṃ idhāgacchantenā”ti tuṭṭhahaṭṭho nagaraṃ sajjāpetvā vāraṇaṃ maṅgalahatthiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā sakalarajjaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2739_10: tayo koṭṭhāse katvā ekaṃ bodhisattassa adāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2739_13: Bodhisattassa āgatakālato paṭṭhāyeva pana rañño sakalajambudīpe rajjaṃ hatthagatameva jātaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2739_14: So jambudīpe aggarājā hutvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2740_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2744_0: Asabbatthagāmiṃ vācanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto lāḷudāyittheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2744_1: So kira dhammaṃ kathento “imasmiṃ ṭhāne idaṃ kathetabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2744_2: imasmiṃ ṭhāne idaṃ na kathetabba”nti yuttāyuttaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0513a1:2744_4: sandhisiṅghāṭakesu cā”ti idaṃ avamaṅgalaṃ maṅgalaṃ katvā anumodanaṃ katheti.
atk-s0513a1:2744_5: Avamaṅgalesu anumodanaṃ karonto “bahū devā manussā ca,
atk-s0513a1:2744_6: maṅgalāni acintayu”nti vatvā “evarūpānaṃ maṅgalānaṃ satampi sahassampi kātuṃ samatthā hothā”ti vadati.
atk-s0513a1:2744_12: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:2744_14: lāḷudāyī idāneva dandhaparisakkano yuttāyuttaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0513a1:2744_16: niccaṃ lāḷakoyeva eso”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2745_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbattitvā vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2745_1: sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā bārāṇasiyaṃ disāpāmokkho ācariyo hutvā pañca māṇavakasatāni sippaṃ vācesi.
atk-s0513a1:2745_2: Tadā tesu māṇavesu eko dandhaparisakkano lāḷako māṇavo dhammantevāsiko hutvā sippaṃ uggaṇhāti,
atk-s0513a1:2745_6: Athekadivasaṃ bodhisatto sāyamāsaṃ bhuñjitvā sayane nipanno taṃ māṇavaṃ hatthapādapiṭṭhiparikammāni katvā gacchantaṃ āha “tāta,
atk-s0513a1:2745_8: Māṇavo ekaṃ pādaṃ upatthambhetvā ekassa upatthambhakaṃ alabhanto attano ūrumhi ṭhapetvā rattiṃ khepesi.
atk-s0513a1:2746_0: Bodhisatto paccūsasamaye uṭṭhāya taṃ disvā “kiṃ, tāta,
atk-s0513a1:2746_2: ekassa mañcapādassa upatthambhakaṃ alabhanto ūrumhi ṭhapetvā nisinnomhī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2746_3: Bodhisatto saṃviggamānaso hutvā “ayaṃ ati viya mayhaṃ upakāro,
atk-s0513a1:2746_4: ettakānaṃ pana māṇavakānaṃ antare ayameva dandho sippaṃ sikkhituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0513a1:2746_5: kathaṃ nu kho ahaṃ imaṃ paṇḍitaṃ kareyya”nti cintesi.
atk-s0513a1:2746_7: ahaṃ imaṃ māṇavaṃ dāruatthāya paṇṇatthāya ca vanaṃ gantvā āgataṃ ‘ajja te kiṃ diṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2746_9: Atha me ‘idaṃ nāma ajja mayā diṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2746_11: Atha naṃ ‘tayā diṭṭhañca katañca kīdisa’nti pucchissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2746_12: so ‘evarūpaṃ nāmā’ti upamāya ca kāraṇena ca kathessati.
atk-s0513a1:2746_13: Iti naṃ navaṃ navaṃ upamañca kāraṇañca kathāpetvā iminā upāyena paṇḍitaṃ karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2746_15: ito paṭṭhāya dāruatthāya vā paṇṇatthāya vā gataṭṭhāne yaṃ te tattha diṭṭhaṃ vā sutaṃ vā bhuttaṃ vā pītaṃ vā khāditaṃ vā hoti,
atk-s0513a1:2747_0: So “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā ekadivasaṃ māṇavehi saddhiṃ dāruatthāya araññaṃ gato tattha sappaṃ disvā āgantvā “ācariya,
atk-s0513a1:2747_9: Māṇavo puna ekadivasaṃ araññe hatthiṃ disvā “hatthī me ācariya diṭṭho”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2747_16: Ayaṃ pana bālatāya vibhajitvā kathetuṃ asakkonto soṇḍaṃ sandhāya kathesi maññe”ti tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2747_20: Ācariyo “thokaṃ patirūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ kathesī”ti tuṇhī jāto.
atk-s0513a1:2748_0: Punekadivasaṃ nimantane ekacce māṇavā guḷaṃ dadhinā bhuñjiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:2748_3: ajja mayaṃ dadhinā khīrena ca bhuñjimhā”ti vatvā “dadhikhīraṃ nāma kīdisaṃ hotī”ti vutte “seyyathāpi naṅgalīsā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2748_4: Ācariyo “ayaṃ māṇavo ‘sappo naṅgalīsasadiso’ti kathento tāva sukathitaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0513a1:2748_5: ‘hatthī naṅgalīsasadiso’ti kathentenāpi soṇḍaṃ sandhāya lesena kathitaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2748_7: ‘dadhikhīrāni pana niccaṃ paṇḍarāni pakkhittabhājanasaṇṭhānānī’ti idha sabbena sabbaṃ upamaṃ na kathesi,
atk-s0513a1:2748_8: na sakkā imaṃ lāḷakaṃ sikkhāpetu”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2751_0: Nāyaṃ dadhiṃ vedi na naṅgalīsaṃ, dadhippayaṃ maññati naṅgalīsa”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2752_1: yā vācā opammavasena sabbattha na gacchati,
atk-s0513a1:2752_2: taṃ asabbatthagāmiṃ vācaṃ bālo dandhapuggalo sabbattha bhāsati,
atk-s0513a1:2752_5: Evaṃ vadanto nāyaṃ dadhiṃ vedi na naṅgalīsaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2752_14: kiṃ imināti antevāsikānaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathetvā paribbayaṃ datvā taṃ uyyojesi.
atk-s0513a1:2753_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2757_0: Vāyametheva purisoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ vattasampannaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2757_1: So kira sāvatthivāsī kulaputto sāsane uraṃ datvā pabbajito vattasampanno ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:2757_3: cuddasasu mahāvattesu asītikhandhakavattesu ca paripūrakārīyeva hoti,
atk-s0513a1:2757_7: Manussā tassa vattasampattiyaṃ pasīditvā pañcasatamattāni dhuvabhattāni adaṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:2757_11: asuko nāma bhikkhu attano vattasampattiyā mahantaṃ lābhasakkāraṃ nibbattesi,
atk-s0513a1:2757_12: etaṃ ekaṃ nissāya bahūnaṃ phāsuvihāro jāto”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2757_15: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:2757_18: pubbepetaṃ ekaṃ nissāya pañca isisatāni phalāphalatthāya araññaṃ agantvā eteneva ānītaphalāphalehi yāpesu”nti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2758_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto udiccabrāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto isipabbajjaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2758_5: Atha tesu tāpasesu eko tāpaso tesaṃ pipāsadukkhaṃ disvā ekaṃ rukkhaṃ chinditvā doṇiṃ katvā pānīyaṃ ussiñcitvā doṇiṃ pūretvā tesaṃ pānīyaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2758_6: Bahūsu sannipatitvā pānīyaṃ pivantesu tāpasassa phalāphalatthāya gamanokāso nāhosi.
atk-s0513a1:2758_8: Migagaṇā cintesuṃ “ayaṃ amhākaṃ pānīyaṃ dento phalāphalatthāya gantuṃ okāsaṃ na labhati,
atk-s0513a1:2758_11: Te katikaṃ akaṃsu “ito paṭṭhāya pānīyaṃ pivanatthāya āgacchantena attano balānurūpena phalāphalaṃ gahetvāva āgantabba”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2758_12: Te tato paṭṭhāya ekeko tiracchāno attano attano balānurūpena madhuramadhurāni ambajambupanasādīnigahetvāva āgacchati.
atk-s0513a1:2758_13: Ekassa atthāya ābhataṃ phalāphalaṃ aḍḍhateyyasakaṭabhārappamāṇaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2759_0: Bodhisatto taṃ disvā “ekaṃ nāma vattasampannaṃ nissāya ettakānaṃ tāpasānaṃ phalāphalatthāya agantvā yāpanaṃ uppannaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2759_1: vīriyaṃ nāma kātabbamevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2762_0: Vāyāmassa phalaṃ passa, bhuttā ambā anītiha”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2763_5: Iti mahāsatto “vāyāmo nāmesa saphalova hotī”ti isigaṇaṃ ālapanto “vāyāmassa phalaṃ passā”ti āha. Kīdisaṃ?
atk-s0513a1:2763_9: Tesu sampannatarānaṃ ussannatarānaṃ vā vasena “ambā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2763_10: Ye imehi pañcahi isisatehi sayaṃ araññaṃ agantvā ekassa atthāya ānītā ambā bhuttā,
atk-s0513a1:2763_13: “iti āha iti āhā”ti evaṃ itihītihena gahetabbaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0513a1:2764_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2768_0: Bahumpi so vikattheyyāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ vikatthakabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2769_0: Atīte pana bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto mahāvibhavo seṭṭhi ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2769_4: Seṭṭhiputte lekhaṃ sikkhante dāsopissa phalakaṃ vahamāno gantvā teneva saddhiṃ lekhaṃ sikkhi,
atk-s0513a1:2769_7: So anukkamena vacanakusalo vohārakusalo yuvā abhirūpo ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:2769_9: So seṭṭhighare bhaṇḍāgārikakammaṃ karonto cintesi “na maṃ ime sabbakālaṃ bhaṇḍāgārikakammaṃ kāressanti,
atk-s0513a1:2769_10: kiñcideva dosaṃ disvā tāḷetvā bandhitvā lakkhaṇena aṅketvā dāsaparibhogenapi paribhuñjissanti.
atk-s0513a1:2769_11: Paccante kho pana seṭṭhissa sahāyako seṭṭhi atthi,
atk-s0513a1:2769_12: yaṃnūnāhaṃ seṭṭhissa vacanena lekhaṃ ādāya tattha gantvā ‘ahaṃ seṭṭhiputto’ti vatvā taṃ seṭṭhiṃ vañcetvā tassa dhītaraṃ gahetvā sukhaṃ vaseyya”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2769_13: So sayameva paṇṇaṃ gahetvā “ahaṃ asukaṃ nāma mama puttaṃ tava santikaṃ pahiṇiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2769_16: tasmā tvaṃ imassa dārakassa attano dhītaraṃ datvā etaṃ tattheva vasāpehi,
atk-s0513a1:2769_17: ahampi okāsaṃ labhitvā āgamissāmī”ti likhitvā seṭṭhisseva muddikāya lañjetvā yathārucitaṃ paribbayañceva
atk-s0513a1:2769_18: gandhavatthādīni ca gahetvā paccantaṃ gantvā seṭṭhiṃ disvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2770_6: Tasmiṃ khaṇe kaṭāhako “idaṃ disvā jānissathā”ti paṇṇaṃ adāsi.
