atk-s0513a1:2770_7: Seṭṭhi paṇṇaṃ vācetvā “idānāhaṃ jīvāmi nāmā”ti tuṭṭhacitto dhītaraṃ datvā patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2770_9: So yāgukhajjakādīsu vā vatthagandhādīsu vā upanītesu “evampi nāma yāguṃ pacanti,
atk-s0513a1:2770_15: pupphāni ganthituṃ na jānantī”ti vatthakammantikādayo garahati.
atk-s0513a1:2771_3: Tesu eko tattha gantvā taṃ disvā sañjānitvā attānaṃ ajānāpetvā āgantvā bodhisattassa ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:2771_4: Bodhisatto taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “ayuttaṃ tena kataṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2771_5: gantvā naṃ gahetvā āgacchissāmī”ti rājānaṃ āpucchitvā mahantena parivārena nikkhami.
atk-s0513a1:2771_6: “Seṭṭhi kira paccantaṃ gacchatī”ti sabbattha pākaṭo jāto.
atk-s0513a1:2771_7: Kaṭāhako “seṭṭhi kira āgacchatī”ti sutvā cintesi “na so aññena kāraṇena āgacchissati,
atk-s0513a1:2771_12: Mama sāmikassa paṭipathaṃ gantvā dāsakammaṃ katvā tameva ārādhessāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2771_13: So tato paṭṭhāya parisamajjhe evaṃ bhāsati “aññe bālamanussā attano bālabhāvena mātāpitūnaṃ guṇaṃ ajānantā
atk-s0513a1:2771_14: tesaṃ bhojanavelāya apacitikammaṃ akatvā tehi saddhiṃyeva bhuñjanti,
atk-s0513a1:2771_15: mayaṃ pana mātāpitūnaṃ bhojanakāle paṭiggahaṃ upanema,
atk-s0513a1:2771_18: pānīyampi bījanimpi gahetvā upatiṭṭhāmā”ti yāva sarīravaḷañjanakāle udakakalasaṃ ādāya paṭicchannaṭṭhānagamanā
atk-s0513a1:2772_0: So evaṃ parisaṃ uggaṇhāpetvā bodhisattassa paccantasamīpaṃ āgatakāle sasuraṃ avoca “tāta,
atk-s0513a1:2772_1: mama kira pitā tumhākaṃ dassanatthāya āgacchati,
atk-s0513a1:2772_6: Kaṭāhako bahuṃ paṇṇākāramādāya mahantena parivārena gantvā bodhisattaṃ vanditvā paṇṇākāraṃ adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2772_7: Bodhisattopi paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā pātarāsakāle khandhāvāraṃ nivāsetvā sarīravaḷañjanatthāya paṭicchannaṭṭhānaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:2772_8: Kaṭāhako attano parivāraṃ nivattetvā kalasaṃ ādāya bodhisattassa santikaṃ gantvā udakakiccapariyosāne pādesu patitvā “sāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2772_13: natthi te mama santikā antarāyo”ti samassāsetvā paccantanagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:2772_16: Atha naṃ ekāya velāya sukhanisinnaṃ paccantaseṭṭhi āha “mahāseṭṭhi,
atk-s0513a1:2772_17: mayā tumhākaṃ paṇṇaṃ disvāva tumhākaṃ puttassa dārikā dinnā”ti bodhisatto kaṭāhakaṃ puttameva katvā tadanucchavikaṃ piyavacanaṃ vatvā seṭṭhiṃ tosesi.
atk-s0513a1:2772_18: Tato paṭṭhāya kaṭāhakassa mukhaṃ ulloketuṃ samattho nāma nāhosi.
atk-s0513a1:2773_1: sīse me ūkā vicināhī”ti vatvā taṃ āgantvā ūkā gahetvā ṭhitaṃ piyavacanaṃ vatvā “kathehi, amma,
atk-s0513a1:2773_2: kacci te mama putto sukhadukkhesu appamatto,
atk-s0513a1:2773_3: ubho janā sammodamānā samaggavāsaṃ vasathā”ti pucchi. “Tāta,
atk-s0513a1:2773_4: mahāseṭṭhi tumhākaṃ puttassa añño doso natthi,
atk-s0513a1:2773_7: apica te ahaṃ tassa mukhabandhanamantaṃ dassāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2773_8: taṃ tvaṃ sādhukaṃ uggaṇhitvā mama puttassa bhojanakāle garahantassa uggahitaniyāmeneva purato ṭhatvā
atk-s0513a1:2773_9: vadeyyāsī”ti gāthaṃ uggaṇhāpetvā katipāhaṃ vasitvā bārāṇasimeva agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2773_10: Kaṭāhakopi bahuṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ ādāya anumaggaṃ gantvā bahudhanaṃ datvā vanditvā nivatti.
atk-s0513a1:2773_11: So bodhisattassa gatakālato paṭṭhāya atirekamānī ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2773_12: So ekadivasaṃ seṭṭhidhītāya nānaggarasabhojanaṃ upanetvā kaṭacchuṃ ādāya parivisantiyā bhattaṃ garahituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a1:2773_13: Seṭṭhidhītā bodhisattassa santike uggahitaniyāmeneva imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2777_1: aññaṃ janapadaṃ gatoti yo attano jātibhūmito aññaṃ janapadaṃ gato hoti,
atk-s0513a1:2777_5: Anvāgantvāna dūseyyāti imaṃ tāva vāraṃ sāmikassa paṭipathaṃ gantvā dāsakiccassa katattā kasāhi paharitvā
atk-s0513a1:2777_8: puna aññasmiṃ āgamanavāre tava sāmiko anvāgantvāna dūseyya,
atk-s0513a1:2777_9: imaṃ gehaṃ anuāgantvā kasābhighātehi ceva lakkhaṇāhananena ca jātippakāsanena ca taṃ dūseyya upahaneyya.
atk-s0513a1:2777_10: Tasmā imaṃ anācāraṃ pahāya bhuñja bhoge kaṭāhaka,
atk-s0513a1:2777_11: mā pacchā attano dāsabhāvaṃ pākaṭaṃ kāretvā vippaṭisārī ahosīti ayamettha seṭṭhino adhippāyo.
atk-s0513a1:2778_0: Seṭṭhidhītā pana etamatthaṃ ajānantī uggahitaniyāmena byañjanameva payirudāhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2778_1: Kaṭāhako “addhā seṭṭhinā mama kulaṃ ācikkhitvā etissā sabbaṃ kathitaṃ bhavissatī”ti tato paṭṭhāya puna bhattaṃ garahituṃ na visahi,
atk-s0513a1:2779_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā kaṭāhako vikatthakabhikkhu ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:2783_0: Tathevekassa kalyāṇanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kosalarañño asilakkhaṇapāṭhakaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2783_1: So kira kammārehi rañño asīnaṃ āhaṭakāle asiṃ upasiṅghitvā asilakkhaṇaṃ udāharati.
atk-s0513a1:2783_6: Atheko kammāro asiṃ katvā kosiyaṃ sukhumaṃ maricacuṇṇaṃ pakkhipitvā rañño asiṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2783_8: Brāhmaṇassa asiṃ ākaḍḍhitvā upasiṅghantassa maricacuṇṇāni nāsaṃ pavisitvā khipitukāmataṃ uppādesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2783_9: Tassa khipantassa nāsikā asidhārāya paṭihatā dvidhā chijji.
atk-s0513a1:2783_10: Tassevaṃ nāsikāya chinnabhāvo bhikkhusaṅghe pākaṭo jāto.
atk-s0513a1:2783_12: rañño kira asilakkhaṇapāṭhako asiṃ upasiṅghanto nāsikaṃ chindāpesī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2783_15: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:2783_17: idāneva so brāhmaṇo asiṃ upasiṅghanto nāsikāchedaṃ patto,
atk-s0513a1:2784_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente tassa asilakkhaṇapāṭhako brāhmaṇo ahosīti sabbaṃ paccuppannavatthusadisameva.
atk-s0513a1:2784_1: Rājā pana tassa vejje datvā nāsikākoṭiṃ phāsukaṃ kārāpetvā lākhāya paṭināsikaṃ kāretvā puna taṃ upaṭṭhākameva akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2784_3: ekā dhītā ceva bhāgineyyo ca ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2784_4: So ubhopi te attano santikeyeva vaḍḍhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2784_5: Te ekato vaḍḍhantā aññamaññaṃ paṭibaddhacittā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2784_6: Rājāpi amacce pakkosāpetvā “mayhaṃ bhāgineyyopi imassa rajjassa sāmikova,
atk-s0513a1:2784_7: dhītaraṃ etasseva datvā abhisekamassa karomī”ti vatvā puna cintesi “mayhaṃ bhāgineyyo sabbathāpi ñātakoyeva,
atk-s0513a1:2784_8: etassa aññaṃ rājadhītaraṃ ānetvā abhisekaṃ katvā dhītaraṃ aññassa rañño dassāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2784_11: So amaccehi saddhiṃ sammantetvā “ubhopete visuṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti bhāgineyyaṃ aññasmiṃ nivesane,
atk-s0513a1:2785_0: Te soḷasavassuddesikabhāvaṃ pattā ativiya paṭibaddhacittā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2785_1: Rājakumāro “kena nu kho upāyena mātuladhītaraṃ rājagehā nīharāpetuṃ sakkā bhaveyyā”ti cintento “attheko
atk-s0513a1:2785_2: upāyo”ti mahāikkhaṇikaṃ pakkosāpetvā tassā sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ datvā “kiṃ mayā kattabba”nti vutte “amma,
atk-s0513a1:2785_4: kiñcideva kāraṇaṃ vatvā yathā mama mātulo rājā dhītaraṃ antogehā nīharāpeti,
atk-s0513a1:2785_9: ahaṃ rājadhītaraṃ asukadivase nāma rathaṃ āropetvā bahuāvudhahatthe purise ādāya mahantena parivārena
atk-s0513a1:2785_10: susānaṃ gantvā maṇḍalapīṭhikāya heṭṭhāmañce matamanussaṃ nipajjāpetvā uparimañce rājadhītaraṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0513a1:2785_11: gandhodakaghaṭānaṃ aṭṭhuttarasatena nhāpetvā kāḷakaṇṇiṃ pavāhessāmī”ti evaṃ vatvā rājadhītaraṃ susānaṃ nessāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2785_12: tvaṃ amhākaṃ tattha gamanadivase amhehi puretarameva thokaṃ maricacuṇṇaṃ ādāya āvudhahatthehi attano
atk-s0513a1:2785_13: manussehi parivuto rathaṃ abhiruyha susānaṃ gantvā rathaṃ susānadvāre ekapadese ṭhapetvā āvudhahatthe
atk-s0513a1:2785_14: manusse susānavanaṃ pesetvā sayaṃ susāne maṇḍalapīṭhikaṃ pasāretvā matako viya paṭikujjo hutvā nipajja.
atk-s0513a1:2785_15: Ahaṃ tattha āgantvā tava upari mañcakaṃ attharitvā rājadhītaraṃ ukkhipitvā mañce sayāpessāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2785_16: tvaṃ tasmiṃ khaṇe maricacuṇṇaṃ nāsikāya pakkhipitvā dve tayo vāre khipeyyāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2785_17: Tayā khipitakāle mayaṃ rājadhītaraṃ pahāya palāyissāma.
atk-s0513a1:2785_18: Atha tvaṃ rājadhītaraṃ sīsaṃ nhāpetvā sayampi sīsaṃ nhāyitvā taṃ ādāya attano nivesanaṃ gaccheyyāsīti.
atk-s0513a1:2786_4: Sā nikkhamanadivase kumārassa saññaṃ datvā mahantena parivārena susānaṃ gacchantī ārakkhamanussānaṃ bhayajananatthaṃ āha –
atk-s0513a1:2786_5: “mayā rājadhītāya mañce ṭhapitakāle heṭṭhāmañce matapuriso khipissati,
atk-s0513a1:2786_6: khipitvā ca heṭṭhāmañcā nikkhamitvā yaṃ paṭhamaṃ passissati,
atk-s0513a1:2786_9: Rājakumāro puretaraṃ gantvā vuttanayeneva tattha nipajji.
atk-s0513a1:2786_10: Mahāikkhaṇikā rājadhītaraṃ ukkhipitvā maṇḍalapīṭhikāṭhānaṃ gacchantī “mā bhāyī”ti saññāpetvā mañce ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:2786_11: Tasmiṃ khaṇe kumāro maricacuṇṇaṃ nāsāya pakkhipitvā khipi.
atk-s0513a1:2786_12: Tena khipitamatteyeva mahāikkhaṇikā rājadhītaraṃ pahāya mahāravaṃ ravamānā sabbapaṭhamaṃ palāyi,
atk-s0513a1:2786_13: tassā palātakālato paṭṭhāya ekopi ṭhātuṃ samattho nāma nāhosi,
atk-s0513a1:2786_15: Kumāro yathāsammantitaṃ sabbaṃ katvā rājadhītaraṃ ādāya attano nivesanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2787_0: Ikkhaṇikā gantvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ rañño ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:2787_2: pāyāse chaḍḍitasappi viya jāta”nti sampaṭicchitvā aparabhāge bhāgineyyassa rajjaṃ datvā dhītaraṃ mahādeviṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a1:2787_3: So tāya saddhiṃ samaggavāsaṃ vasamāno dhammena rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0513a1:2787_5: Tassekadivasaṃ rājūpaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā paṭisūriyaṃ ṭhatvā upaṭṭhahantassa lākhā vilīyi,
atk-s0513a1:2787_13: mayaṃ pana khipantā mātuladhītaraṃ labhitvā rajjaṃ pāpuṇimhā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2790_0: Tasmā sabbaṃ na kalyāṇaṃ, sabbaṃ vāpi na pāpaka”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2791_0: Tattha tathevekassāti tadevekassa. Ayameva vā pāṭho. Dutiyapadepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0513a1:2792_0: Iti so imāya gāthāya taṃ kāraṇaṃ āharitvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2793_0: Satthā imāya desanāya lokasammatānaṃ kalyāṇapāpakānaṃ anekaṃsikabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2797_0: Te desā tāni vatthūnīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ vikatthakabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2798_0: Idha panesa bārāṇasiseṭṭhino dāso kalaṇḍuko nāma ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2798_1: Tassa palāyitvā paccantavāsiseṭṭhino dhītaraṃ gahetvā mahantena parivārena vasanakāle bārāṇasiseṭṭhi
atk-s0513a1:2798_3: kalaṇḍukaṃ pariyesā”ti attanā puṭṭhaṃ sukapotakaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0513a1:2798_4: Sukapotako ito cito ca vicaranto taṃ nagaraṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a1:2798_5: Tasmiñca kāle kalaṇḍuko nadīkīḷaṃ kīḷitukāmo bahuṃ mālāgandhavilepanañceva khādanīyabhojanīyāni ca gāhāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:2798_6: nadiṃ gantvā seṭṭhidhītāya saddhiṃ nāvaṃ āruyha udake kīḷati.
atk-s0513a1:2798_7: Tasmiñca padese nadīkīḷaṃ kīḷantā issarajātikā tikhiṇabhesajjaparibhāvitaṃ khīraṃ pivanti,
atk-s0513a1:2798_8: tena tesaṃ divasabhāgampi udake kīḷantānaṃ sītaṃ na bādhati.
atk-s0513a1:2798_9: Ayaṃ pana kalaṇḍuko khīragaṇḍūsaṃ gahetvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā taṃ khīraṃ nuṭṭhubhati.
atk-s0513a1:2798_10: Nuṭṭhubhantopi udake anuṭṭhubhitvā seṭṭhidhītāya sīse nuṭṭhubhati.
atk-s0513a1:2798_11: Sukapotakopi nadītīraṃ gantvā ekissā udumbarasākhāya nisīditvā oloketvā kalaṇḍukaṃ sañjānitvā seṭṭhidhītāya sīse nuṭṭhubhantaṃ disvā “are,
atk-s0513a1:2798_14: khīragaṇḍūsaṃ gahetvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā jātisampannāya sukhasaṃvaḍḍhāya seṭṭhidhītāya sīse mā nuṭṭhubhi,
atk-s0513a1:2798_15: attano pamāṇaṃ na jānāsī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2801_0: Anuvicca kho taṃ gaṇheyyuṃ, piva khīraṃ kalaṇḍukā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2802_0: Tattha te desā tāni vatthūnīti mātukucchiṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0513a1:2802_6: Atha kho dāsikucchiyaṃ tvaṃ vasi ceva patiṭṭhito cāti.
atk-s0513a1:2802_7: Ahañca vanagocaroti tiracchānabhūtopi etamatthaṃ jānāmīti dīpeti.
atk-s0513a1:2802_8: Anuvicca kho taṃ gaṇheyyunti evaṃ anācāraṃ caramānaṃ mayā gantvā ārocite anuvicca jānitvā tava sāmikā
atk-s0513a1:2802_9: tāḷetvā ceva lakkhaṇāhatañca katvā taṃ gaṇheyyuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2802_11: tasmā attano pamāṇaṃ ñatvā seṭṭhidhītāya sīse anuṭṭhubhitvā piva khīraṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2803_0: Kalaṇḍukopi suvapotakaṃ sañjānitvā “maṃ pākaṭaṃ kareyyā”ti bhayena “ehi, sāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2803_3: gīvaṃ pana me vaṭṭetvā māretukāmo”ti ñatvāva “na me tayā attho”ti tato uppatitvā bārāṇasiṃ gantvā yathādiṭṭhaṃ seṭṭhino vitthārena kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2803_4: Seṭṭhi “ayuttaṃ tena kata”nti vatvā gantvā tassa āṇaṃ kāretvā bārāṇasimeva naṃ ānetvā dāsaparibhogena paribhuñji.
atk-s0513a1:2804_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2808_0: Yo ve dhammaṃ dhajaṃ katvāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ kuhakabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2808_1: Tadā hi satthā tassa kuhakabhāve ārocite “na,
atk-s0513a1:2809_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto mūsikayoniyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā vuḍḍhimanvāya
atk-s0513a1:2809_1: mahāsarīro sūkaracchāpakasadiso hutvā anekasatamūsikāhi parivuto araññe viharati.
atk-s0513a1:2809_2: Atheko siṅgālo ito cito ca vicaranto taṃ mūsikayūthaṃ disvā “imā mūsikā vañcetvā khādissāmī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0513a1:2809_3: mūsikānaṃ āsayassa avidūre sūriyābhimukho vātaṃ pivanto ekena pādena aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2809_4: Bodhisatto gocarāya caramāno taṃ disvā “sīlavā eso bhavissatī”ti tassa santikaṃ gantvā “bhante,
atk-s0513a1:2809_7: “Cattāro pāde bhūmiyaṃ aṭhapetvā kasmā ekeneva ṭhitosī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2809_8: “Mayi cattāro pāde pathaviyaṃ ṭhapente pathavī vahituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0513a1:2809_15: Bodhisatto tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “sīlavā eso bhavissatī”ti tato paṭṭhāya mūsikagaṇena saddhiṃ sāyaṃ pātaṃ tassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0513a1:2810_0: Athassa upaṭṭhānaṃ katvā gamanakāle siṅgālo sabbapacchimaṃ mūsikaṃ gahetvā maṃsaṃ khāditvā ajjhoharitvā mukhaṃ puñchitvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0513a1:2810_6: kiṃ nu kho eta”nti bodhisattassa taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2810_7: Bodhisatto “kena nu kho kāraṇena musikā tanuttaṃ gatā”ti cintento siṅgāle āsaṅkaṃ ṭhapetvā “vīmaṃsissāmi
atk-s0513a1:2810_8: na”nti upaṭṭhānakāle sesamūsikā purato katvā sayaṃ pacchato ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2810_10: bodhisatto attano gahaṇatthāya taṃ pakkhandantaṃ disvā nivattitvā “bho siṅgāla,
atk-s0513a1:2810_12: paresaṃ pana vihiṃsanatthāya dhammaṃ dhajaṃ katvā carasī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2812_0: “Yo ve dhammaṃ dhajaṃ katvā, nigūḷho pāpamācare;
atk-s0513a1:2813_0: Vissāsayitvā bhūtāni, biḷāraṃ nāma taṃ vata”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2814_0: Tattha yo veti khattiyādīsu yo kocideva.
atk-s0513a1:2814_1: Dhammaṃ dhajaṃ katvāti dasakusalakammapathadhammaṃ dhajaṃ karitvā,
atk-s0513a1:2814_2: kūṭaṃ karonto viya ussāpetvā dassentoti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2814_4: Biḷāraṃ nāma taṃ vatanti taṃ evaṃ dhammaṃ dhajaṃ katvā raho pāpāni karontassa vataṃ kerāṭikavataṃ nāma hotīti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2815_0: Mūsikarājā kathentova uppatitvā tassa gīvāyaṃ patitvā hanukassa heṭṭhā antogalanāḷiyaṃ ḍaṃsitvā galanāḷiṃ phāletvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2815_1: Mūsikagaṇo nivattitvā siṅgālaṃ “muru murū”ti khāditvā agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2816_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2820_0: Nāyaṃ sikhā puññahetūti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kuhakaññeva bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2821_0: Atītasmiñhi bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto mūsikarājā hutvā araññe vasati.
atk-s0513a1:2821_1: Atheko siṅgālo davaḍāhe uṭṭhite palāyituṃ asakkonto ekasmiṃ rukkhe sīsaṃ āhacca aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2821_3: rukkhaṃ āhacca ṭhitaṭṭhāne pana matthake cūḷā viya thokāni lomāni aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2821_4: So ekadivasaṃ soṇḍiyaṃ pānīyaṃ pivanto chāyaṃ olokento cūḷaṃ disvā “uppannaṃ dāni me bhaṇḍamūla”nti araññe
atk-s0513a1:2821_5: vicaranto taṃ mūsikādariṃ disvā “imā mūsikā vañcetvā khādissāmī”ti heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva avidūre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2821_6: Atha naṃ bodhisatto gocarāya caranto disvā “sīlavā aya”nti saññāya upasaṅkamitvā “tvaṃ kinnāmosī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:2821_12: tumhākaṃ pātova nikkhamitvā gocarāya gamanakāle ‘ettakā’ti gaṇetvā paccāgamanakālepi gaṇessāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2821_15: So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā nikkhamanakāle “eko dve tayo”ti gaṇetvā paccāgamanakālepi tatheva gaṇetvā sabbapacchimaṃ gahetvā khādati.
atk-s0513a1:2822_0: Idha pana mūsikarājā nivattitvā ṭhito “bho aggikabhāradvāja,
atk-s0513a1:2822_1: nāyaṃ tava dhammasudhammatāya matthake cūḷā ṭhapitā,
atk-s0513a1:2822_2: kucchikāraṇā pana ṭhapitā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2825_0: Nāguṭṭhigaṇanaṃ yāti, alaṃ te hotu aggikā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2826_1: ayaṃ mūsikagaṇo aṅguṭṭhagaṇanaṃ na gacchati na upeti na pūreti,
atk-s0513a1:2826_3: Alaṃ te hotu aggikāti siṅgālaṃ nāmena ālapanto āha.
atk-s0513a1:2826_6: Amhehi vā tayā saddhiṃ saṃvāso alaṃ hotu,
atk-s0513a1:2826_7: na mayaṃ idāni tayā saddhiṃ vasissāmātipi attho.
atk-s0513a1:2827_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā siṅgālo ayaṃ bhikkhu ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:2831_0: Yathā vācā ca bhuñjassūti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ mātugāmaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2831_1: Sā kirekassa saddhāsampannassa upāsakabrāhmaṇassa brāhmaṇī dussīlā pāpadhammā rattiṃ aticaritvā divā
atk-s0513a1:2831_2: kiñci kammaṃ akatvā gilānālayaṃ dassetvā nitthunamānā nipajjati.
atk-s0513a1:2831_3: Atha naṃ brāhmaṇo “kiṃ te bhadde aphāsuka”nti pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:2831_10: Sā pana brāhmaṇassa gehaṃ paviṭṭhakāle nipajjati,
atk-s0513a1:2832_0: Atha brāhmaṇo “imissā sarīre vijjhanavātānaṃ pariyanto na paññāyatī”ti ekadivasaṃ gandhamālādīni ādāya
atk-s0513a1:2832_1: jetavanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ pūjetvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīditvā “kiṃ, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0513a1:2832_3: brāhmaṇiyā kira me sarīre vātā vijjhanti,
atk-s0513a1:2832_4: svāhaṃ tassā sappitelādīni ceva paṇītapaṇītabhojanāni ca pariyesāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2832_7: Ahaṃ taṃ paṭijaggantova idhāgamanassa okāsaṃ na labhāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2832_9: ‘evaṃ nipannassa mātugāmassa roge avūpasamante idañcidañca bhesajjaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti pubbepi te paṇḍitehi kathitaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2832_10: bhavasaṅkhepagatattā pana na sallakkhesī”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2833_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbattitvā vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2833_1: sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā bārāṇasiyaṃ disāpāmokkho ācariyo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2833_2: Ekasatarājadhānīsu khattiyakumārā ca brāhmaṇakumārā ca yebhuyyena tasseva santike sippaṃ uggaṇhanti.
atk-s0513a1:2833_3: Atheko janapadavāsī brāhmaṇamāṇavo bodhisattassa santike tayo vede aṭṭhārasa ca vijjāṭṭhānāni uggaṇhitvā
atk-s0513a1:2833_4: bārāṇasiyaṃyeva kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapetvā divase divase dvattikkhattuṃ bodhisattassa santikaṃ āgacchati.
atk-s0513a1:2833_5: Tassa brāhmaṇī dussīlā ahosi pāpadhammāti sabbaṃ paccuppannavatthusadisameva.
atk-s0513a1:2834_0: Bodhisatto pana “iminā kāraṇena ovādagahaṇāya okāsaṃ na labhāmī”ti vutte “sā māṇavikā imaṃ vañcetvā nipajjatī”ti
atk-s0513a1:2834_1: ñatvā “tassā rogānucchavikaṃ bhesajjaṃ ācikkhissāmī”ti cintetvā āha “tāta,
atk-s0513a1:2834_2: tvaṃ ito paṭṭhāya tassā sappikhīrarasādīni mā adāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2834_3: gomutte pana pañcapaṇṇāni phalādīni ca pakkhipitvā koṭṭetvā navatambalohabhājane pakkhipitvā lohagandhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2834_4: gāhāpetvā rajjuṃ vā yottaṃ vā rukkhaṃ vā lataṃ vā gahetvā ‘idaṃ te rogassa anucchavikabhesajjaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2834_6: uṭṭhāya vā tayā bhuttabhattassa anucchavikaṃ kammaṃ karohī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthaṃ vadeyyāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2834_8: atha naṃ rajjuyā vā yottena vā rukkhena vā latāya vā katici pahāre paharitvā kesesu gahetvā ākaḍḍhitvā kapparena potheyyāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2834_17: Māṇavo “na tvaṃ attano ruciyā pivissasī”ti rajjuṃ gahetvā “attano rogassa anucchavikaṃ bhesajjaṃ vā piva,
atk-s0513a1:2834_18: yāgubhattānucchavikaṃ kammaṃ vā karohī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2837_0: Ubhayaṃ te na sameti, vācā bhuttañca kosiye”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2838_0: Tattha yathāvācā ca bhuñjassūti yathā te vācā,
atk-s0513a1:2838_2: “vātā me vijjhantī”ti vācāya anucchavikameva katvā bhuñjassūti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2838_6: Yathābhuttañca byāharāti yaṃ yathā te bhuttaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2838_10: atha vā arogamhīti yathābhūtameva vatvā kammaṃ karohīti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2838_12: vācābhuttañca kosiyeti yā ca te ayaṃ vācā “vātā maṃ vijjhantī”ti yañca te idaṃ paṇītabhojanaṃ bhuttaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2839_0: Evaṃ vutte kosiyabrāhmaṇadhītā “ācariyena ussukkaṃ āpannakālato paṭṭhāya na sakkā mayā esa vañcetuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2839_1: uṭṭhāya kammaṃ karissāmī”ti uṭṭhāya kammaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2839_3: idāni na sakkā ito paṭṭhāya puna evarūpaṃ kātu”nti ācariye gāravena pāpakammatopi viramitvā sīlavatī ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2839_4: Sāpi brāhmaṇī “sammāsambuddhena kiramhi ñātā”ti sattharipi gāravena na puna anācāraṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2840_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2849_0: Asampadānenitarītarassāti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2849_1: Tasmiñhi kāle bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso devadatto,
atk-s0513a1:2849_5: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:2850_0: Atīte magadharaṭṭhe rājagahe ekasmiṃ magadharaññe rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto tasseva seṭṭhi ahosi asītikoṭivibhavo saṅkhaseṭṭhīti nāmena.
atk-s0513a1:2850_3: Tesu bārāṇasiyaṃ pīḷiyaseṭṭhissa kenacideva kāraṇena mahantaṃ bhayaṃ uppajji,
atk-s0513a1:2850_5: So daliddo appaṭisaraṇo hutvā bhariyaṃ ādāya saṅkhaseṭṭhiṃ paccayaṃ katvā bārāṇasito nikkhamitvā padasāva
atk-s0513a1:2850_7: So taṃ disvāva “sahāyo me āgato”ti parissajitvā sakkārasammānaṃ katvā katipāhaṃ vītināmetvā ekadivasaṃ “samma,
atk-s0513a1:2850_13: mā bhāyī”ti bhaṇḍāgāraṃ vivarāpetvā cattālīsa hiraññakoṭiyo dāpetvā sesampi paricchadaparivāraṃ sabbaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2850_14: attano santakaṃ saviññāṇakaṃ aviññāṇakaṃ majjhe bhinditvā upaḍḍhameva adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2850_15: So taṃ vibhavaṃ ādāya puna bārāṇasiṃ gantvā nivāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a1:2851_1: So attano paṭisaraṇaṃ upadhārento “sahāyassa me mahāupakāro kato,
atk-s0513a1:2851_4: tassa santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti cintetvā bhariyaṃ ādāya padasāva bārāṇasiṃ gantvā bhariyaṃ āha “bhadde,
atk-s0513a1:2851_5: tava mayā saddhiṃ antaravīthiyā gamanaṃ nāma na yuttaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2851_6: mayā pesitayānamāruyha mahantena parivārena pacchā āgamissasi.
atk-s0513a1:2851_8: tāva idheva hohī”ti vatvā taṃ sālāya ṭhapetvā sayaṃ nagaraṃ pavisitvā seṭṭhissa gharaṃ gantvā “rājagahanagarato
atk-s0513a1:2851_9: tumhākaṃ sahāyo saṅkhaseṭṭhi nāma āgato”ti ārocāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2851_10: So “āgacchatū”ti pakkosāpetvā taṃ disvā neva āsanā vuṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2851_18: nivāpaṃ gahetvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne pacāpetvā bhuñjitvā gacchatha,
atk-s0513a1:2851_19: puna amhākaṃ gharaṃ mā pavisathā”ti vatvā “mayhaṃ sahāyassa dussante bandhitvā ekaṃ bahalapalāpatumbaṃ dehī”ti dāsaṃ āṇāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2851_20: Taṃ divasaṃ kira so rattasālīnaṃ sakaṭasahassamattaṃ ophunāpetvā koṭṭhāgāraṃ pūrāpesi,
atk-s0513a1:2851_21: cattālīsakoṭidhanaṃ gahetvā āgato akataññū mahācoro sahāyakassa tumbamatte palāpe dāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2851_22: Dāso pacchiyaṃ ekaṃ palāpatumbaṃ pakkhipitvā bodhisattassa santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2852_1: “ayaṃ asappuriso mama santikā cattālīsakoṭidhanaṃ labhitvā idāni palāpatumbaṃ dāpesi,
atk-s0513a1:2852_4: Athassa etadahosi “ayaṃ tāva akataññū mittadubbhī katavināsakabhāvena mayā saddhiṃ mittabhāvaṃ bhindi.
atk-s0513a1:2852_5: Sacāhaṃ etena dinnaṃ palāpatumbaṃ lāmakattā na gaṇhissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2852_7: Andhabālā parittakaṃ laddhaṃ aggaṇhantā mittabhāvaṃ vināsenti,
atk-s0513a1:2852_8: ahaṃ pana etena dinnaṃ palāpatumbaṃ gahetvā mama vasena mittabhāvaṃ patiṭṭhāpessāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2852_9: So palāpatumbaṃ dussante bandhitvā pāsādā oruyha sālaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2852_12: “Bhadde amhākaṃ sahāyo pīḷiyaseṭṭhi palāpatumbaṃ datvā amhe ajjeva vissajjesī”ti. Sā “ayya,
atk-s0513a1:2852_14: kiṃ etaṃ cattālīsakoṭidhanassa anucchavika”nti rodituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0513a1:2852_16: ahaṃ tena saddhiṃ mittabhāvabhedanabhayena mama vasena mittabhāvaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ gaṇhiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2852_17: tvaṃ kiṃkāraṇā rodasī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2855_0: Tasmā harāmi bhusaṃ aḍḍhamānaṃ, mā me mitti jīyittha sassatāya”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2856_4: Bālassa mittāni kalībhavantīti dandhassa apaññassa mittāni kalīni kāḷakaṇṇisadisāni honti,
atk-s0513a1:2856_6: Tasmā harāmi bhusaṃ aḍḍhamānanti tena kāraṇena ahaṃ sahāyena dinnaṃ ekapalāpatumbaṃ harāmi gaṇhāmīti dasseti.
atk-s0513a1:2856_11: Mā me mitti jīyittha sassatāyanti mama sahāyena saddhiṃ mitti mā bhijjittha,
atk-s0513a1:2857_1: Tasmiṃ khaṇe saṅkhaseṭṭhinā pīḷiyaseṭṭhissa dinno kammantadāso sālādvārena āgacchanto seṭṭhibhariyāya
atk-s0513a1:2857_2: rodanasaddaṃ sutvā sālaṃ pavisitvā attano sāmike disvā pādesu nipatitvā roditvā kanditvā “kimatthaṃ idhāgatattha,
atk-s0513a1:2857_6: mā cintayitthā”ti ubhopi assāsetvā attano gehaṃ netvā gandhodakena nhāpetvā bhojetvā “sāmikā,
atk-s0513a1:2857_7: vo āgatā”ti sesadāse sannipātetvā dassetvā katipāhaṃ vītināmetvā sabbe dāse gahetvā rājaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā uparavaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2857_9: te sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2858_0: Rājā tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā ubhopi seṭṭhī pakkosāpetvā saṅkhaseṭṭhiṃ pucchi “saccaṃ kira tayā mahāseṭṭhi pīḷiyaseṭṭhissa cattālīsakoṭidhanaṃ dinna”nti? “Āma, mahārāja,
atk-s0513a1:2858_1: mama sahāyassa maṃ takketvā rājagahaṃ āgatassa na kevalaṃ dhanaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2858_2: sabbaṃ vibhavajātaṃ saviññāṇakaṃ aviññāṇakaṃ dve koṭṭhāse katvā samabhāge adāsinti.
atk-s0513a1:2858_4: “Tayā panassa taññeva takketvā āgatassa atthi koci sakkāro vā sammāno vā kato”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2858_6: Api pana te etassa palāpatumbamattaṃ dussante pakkhipāpetvā dāpitaṃ atthīti.
atk-s0513a1:2858_8: Rājā “kiṃ kātabba”nti amaccehi saddhiṃ mantetvā taṃ paribhāsitvā “gacchatha,
atk-s0513a1:2858_9: pīḷiyaseṭṭhissa ghare sabbaṃ vibhavaṃ saṅkhaseṭṭhissa dethā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2858_14: Bodhisatto sabbaṃ attano dinnavibhavaṃ paṭilabhitvā dāsaparivuto rājagahameva gantvā kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhapetvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2859_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2863_0: Kusalūpadese dhitiyā daḷhāya cāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ajapālanigrodhe māradhītānaṃ palobhanasuttantaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2865_0: Tā tattha panudī satthā, tūlaṃ bhaṭṭhaṃva māluto”ti. ;
atk-s0513a1:2866_0: Evaṃ yāva pariyosānā tassa suttantassa kathitakāle dhammasabhāyaṃ sannipatitā bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso,
atk-s0513a1:2866_1: sammāsambuddho māradhītaro anekasatānipi dibbarūpāni māpetvā palobhanatthāya upasaṅkamantiyo akkhīnipi ummīletvā na olokesi,
atk-s0513a1:2866_5: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:2866_7: idāneva mayhaṃ sabbāsave khepetvā sabbaññutaṃ sampattassa māradhītānaṃ anolokanaṃ nāma acchariyaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2866_8: ahañhi pubbe bodhiñāṇaṃ pariyesamāno sakilesakālepi abhisaṅkhataṃ dibbarūpaṃ indriyāni bhinditvā kilesavasena
atk-s0513a1:2866_9: anoloketvāva gantvā mahārajjaṃ pāpuṇi”nti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2867_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto bhātikasatassa kaniṭṭho ahosīti sabbaṃ heṭṭhā takkasilājātake vuttanayeneva vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2867_1: Tadā pana takkasilānagaravāsīhi bahinagare sālāyaṃ bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā yācitvā rajjaṃ paṭicchāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:2867_2: abhiseke kate takkasilānagaravāsino nagaraṃ devanagaraṃ viya,
atk-s0513a1:2867_4: Tadā bodhisatto nagaraṃ pavisitvā rājabhavane pāsāde mahātale samussitasetacchattaṃ ratanavarapallaṅkaṃ abhiruyha devarājalīlāya nisīdi,
atk-s0513a1:2867_5: amaccā ca brāhmaṇagahapatikādayo ca khattiyakumārā ca sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitā parivāretvā aṭṭhaṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:2867_6: devaccharāpaṭibhāgā soḷasasahassanāṭakitthiyo naccagītavāditakusalā uttamavilāsasampannā naccagītavāditāni payojesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2867_7: Gītavāditasaddena rājabhavanaṃ meghatthanitapūritā mahāsamuddakucchi viya ekaninnādaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2867_8: Bodhisatto taṃ attano sirisobhaggaṃ olokayamānova cintesi “sacāhaṃ tāsaṃ yakkhinīnaṃ abhisaṅkhataṃ dibbarūpaṃ olokessaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2867_11: Paccekabuddhānaṃ pana ovāde ṭhitabhāvena idaṃ mayā sampatta”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2867_12: Evañca pana cintetvā udānaṃ udānento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2869_0: “Kusalūpadese dhitiyā daḷhāya ca, anivattitattā bhayabhīrutāya ca;
atk-s0513a1:2870_0: Na rakkhasīnaṃ vasamāgamimhase, sa sotthibhāvo mahatā bhayena me”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2871_2: Dhitiyā daḷhāya cāti daḷhāya dhitiyā ca,
atk-s0513a1:2871_4: Anivattitattā bhayabhīrutāya cāti bhayabhīrutāya anivattitatāya ca.
atk-s0513a1:2871_7: Idaṃ ubhayampi mahāsattassa “yakkhiniyo nāmetā manussakhādikā”ti bheravārammaṇaṃ disvāpi nāhosi.
atk-s0513a1:2871_9: Bhayabhīrutāya abhāveneva bheravārammaṇaṃ disvāpi anivattanabhāvenāti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2871_10: Na rakkhasīnaṃ vasamāgamimhaseti yakkhakantāre tāsaṃ rakkhasīnaṃ vasaṃ na agamimha.
atk-s0513a1:2871_11: Yasmā amhākaṃ kusalūpadese dhiti ca daḷhā ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:2871_13: tasmā rakkhasīnaṃ vasaṃ na agamimhāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0513a1:2871_14: Sa sotthibhāvo mahatā bhayena meti so mayhaṃ ayaṃ ajja mahatā bhayena rakkhasīnaṃ santikā pattabbena
atk-s0513a1:2872_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto imāya gāthāya dhammaṃ desetvā dhammena rajjaṃ kāretvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:2873_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2873_1: “ahaṃ tena samayena takkasilaṃ gantvā rajjappattakumāro ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2877_0: Khemaṃ yahinti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2877_1: So hi bhikkhu satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā paccantaṃ gantvā ekaṃ gāmakaṃ upanissāya araññasenāsane vassaṃ upagañchi.
atk-s0513a1:2877_2: Tassa paṭhamamāseyeva piṇḍāya paviṭṭhassa paṇṇasālā jhāyittha.
atk-s0513a1:2877_3: So vasanaṭṭhānābhāvena kilamanto upaṭṭhākānaṃ ācikkhi. Te “hotu, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:2877_7: So senāsanasappāyābhāvena kammaṭṭhānaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0513a1:2877_8: So nimittamattampi anuppādetvā vutthavasso jetavanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:2877_9: Satthā tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā “kiṃ nu kho te, bhikkhu,
atk-s0513a1:2877_13: tiracchānāpi attano sappāyāsappāyaṃ ñatvā sappāyakāle vasitvā asappāyakāle vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pahāya aññattha agamaṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:2877_14: tvaṃ kasmā attano sappāyāsappāyaṃ na aññāsī”ti vatvā tena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2878_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto sakuṇayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā viññutaṃ patvā sobhaggappatto
atk-s0513a1:2878_1: sakuṇarājā hutvā ekasmiṃ araññāyatane jātassaratīre sākhāviṭapasampannaṃ bahalapattapalāsaṃ mahārukkhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2878_3: Bahū sakuṇā tassa rukkhassa udakamatthake patthaṭasākhāsu vasantā sarīravaḷañjaṃ udake pātenti.
atk-s0513a1:2878_5: Tassa etadahosi “ime sakuṇā mayhaṃ nivāse jātassare sarīravaḷañjaṃ pātenti,
atk-s0513a1:2878_6: yaṃnūnāhaṃ udakato aggiṃ uṭṭhāpetvā rukkhaṃ jhāpetvā ete palāpeyya”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2878_7: So kuddhamānaso rattibhāge sabbesaṃ sakuṇānaṃ sannipatitvā rukkhasākhāsu nipannakāle paṭhamaṃ tāva uddhanāropitaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2878_8: viya udakaṃ pakkudhāpetvā dutiyavāre dhūmaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā tatiyavāre tālakkhandhappamāṇaṃ jālaṃ uṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2878_9: Bodhisatto udakato jālaṃ uṭṭhahamānaṃ disvā “bho, sakuṇā,
atk-s0513a1:2880_0: “Khemaṃ yahiṃ tattha arī udīrito, dakassa majjhe jalate ghatāsano;
atk-s0513a1:2881_0: Na ajja vāso mahiyā mahīruhe, disā bhajavho saraṇājja nobhaya”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2882_0: Tattha khemaṃ yahiṃ tattha arī udīritoti yasmiṃ udakapiṭṭhe khemabhāvo nibbhayabhāvo,
atk-s0513a1:2882_6: Na ajja vāsoti ajja no vāso natthi.
atk-s0513a1:2882_8: tasmiṃ imissā mahiyā jāte rukkheti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2882_10: Saraṇājja no bhayanti ajja amhākaṃ saraṇato bhayaṃ jātaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2883_0: Evaṃ vatvā bodhisatto attano vacanakare sakuṇe ādāya uppatitvā aññattha gato.
atk-s0513a1:2883_1: Bodhisattassa vacanaṃ aggahetvā ṭhitasakuṇā jīvitakkhayaṃ pattā.
atk-s0513a1:2884_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi,
atk-s0513a1:2885_0: Tadā bodhisattassa vacanakarā sakuṇā buddhaparisā ahesuṃ, sakuṇarājā pana ahameva ahosinti.
atk-s0513a1:2889_0: Ye saññinoti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto saṅkassanagaradvāre attanā saṃkhittena pucchitapañhassa dhammasenāpatino
atk-s0513a1:2889_3: atīte kira bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto araññāyatane kālaṃ karonto antevāsikehi pucchito “nevasaññīnāsaññī”ti āha…pe…
atk-s0513a1:2889_5: Bodhisatto ābhassarato āgantvā ākāse ṭhatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2891_0: “Ye saññino tepi duggatā, yepi asaññino tepi duggatā;
atk-s0513a1:2892_0: Etaṃ ubhayaṃ vivajjaya, taṃ samāpattisukhaṃ anaṅgaṇa”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2893_0: Tattha ye saññinoti ṭhapetvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanalābhino avasese sacittakasatte dasseti.
atk-s0513a1:2893_1: Tepi duggatāti tassā samāpattiyā alābhato tepi duggatā nāma.
atk-s0513a1:2893_2: Yepi asaññinoti asaññabhave nibbatte acittakasatte dasseti.
atk-s0513a1:2893_3: Tepi duggatāti tepi imissāyeva samāpattiyā alābhato duggatāyeva nāma.
atk-s0513a1:2893_4: Etaṃ ubhayaṃ vivajjayāti etaṃ ubhayampi saññibhavañca asaññibhavañca vivajjaya pajahāti antevāsikaṃ ovadati.
atk-s0513a1:2893_5: Taṃ samāpattisukhaṃ anaṅgaṇanti taṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattilābhino santaṭṭhena “sukha”nti saṅkhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2893_6: gataṃ jhānasukhaṃ anaṅgaṇaṃ niddosaṃ balavacittekaggatāsabhāvenapi taṃ anaṅgaṇaṃ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2894_0: Evaṃ bodhisatto dhammaṃ desetvā antevāsikassa guṇaṃ kathetvā brahmalokameva agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2895_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2899_0: Candābhanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto saṅkassanagaradvāre therasseva pañhabyākaraṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2899_1: Atīte kira bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto araññāyatane kālaṃ karonto antevāsikehi
atk-s0513a1:2899_4: Bodhisatto ābhassarato āgantvā ākāse ṭhito imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2903_2: Yodha paññāya gādhatīti yo puggalo idha sattaloke idaṃ kasiṇadvayaṃ paññāya gādhati,
atk-s0513a1:2903_6: yodha paññāya gādhatīti yattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ candābhā ca sūriyābhā ca patthaṭā,
atk-s0513a1:2903_7: tatthake ṭhāne paṭibhāgakasiṇaṃ vaḍḍhetvā taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā jhānaṃ nibbattento ubhayampetaṃ ābhaṃ paññāya gādhati nāma.
atk-s0513a1:2903_10: hoti ābhassarūpagoti so puggalo tathā katvā paṭiladdhena dutiyena jhānena ābhassarabrahmalokūpago hotīti.
atk-s0513a1:2904_0: Evaṃ bodhisatto tāpase bodhetvā jeṭṭhantevāsikassa guṇaṃ kathetvā brahmalokameva gato.
atk-s0513a1:2905_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2909_0: Yaṃ laddhaṃ tena tuṭṭhabbanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2909_1: Sāvatthiyañhi aññataro upāsako bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ lasuṇena pavāretvā khettapālaṃ āṇāpesi “sace bhikkhuniyo āgacchanti,
atk-s0513a1:2909_2: ekekāya bhikkhuniyā dve tayo bhaṇḍike dehī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2909_3: Tato paṭṭhāya bhikkhuniyo tassa gehampi khettampi lasuṇatthāya gacchanti.
atk-s0513a1:2909_4: Athekasmiṃ ussavadivase tassa gehe lasuṇaṃ parikkhayaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2909_5: Thullanandā bhikkhunī saparivārā gehaṃ gantvā “lasuṇenāvuso attho”ti vatvā “natthayye,
atk-s0513a1:2909_7: khettaṃ gacchathā”ti vuttā khettaṃ gantvā na mattaṃ jānitvā lasuṇaṃ āharāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2909_8: Khettapālo ujjhāyi “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo na mattaṃ jānitvā lasuṇaṃ harāpessantī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:2909_9: Tassa kathaṃ sutvā yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā, tāpi,
atk-s0513a1:2909_12: Ujjhāyitvā ca pana bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2909_14: mahiccho puggalo nāma vijātamātuyāpi appiyo hoti amanāpo,
atk-s0513a1:2909_18: uppannaṃ vā pana lābhaṃ thiraṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0513a1:2909_22: uppannaṃ vā pana lābhaṃ thiraṃ kātuṃ sakkotī”tiādinā nayena bhikkhūnaṃ tadanucchavikaṃ dhammaṃ kathetvā “na,
atk-s0513a1:2910_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto aññatarasmiṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:2910_1: Tassa vayappattassa samānajātikā kulā pajāpatiṃ āhariṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2910_2: Tassā nandā nandāvatī sundarīnandāti tisso dhītaro ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2910_3: Tāsu patikulaṃ agatāsuyeva bodhisatto kālaṃ katvā suvaṇṇahaṃsayoniyaṃ nibbatti,
atk-s0513a1:2910_5: So vayappatto suvaṇṇasañchannaṃ sobhaggappattaṃ mahantaṃ attabhāvaṃ disvā “kuto nu kho cavitvā ahaṃ idhūpapanno”ti
atk-s0513a1:2910_6: āvajjento “manussalokato”ti ñatvā puna “kathaṃ nu kho me brāhmaṇī ca dhītaro ca jīvantī”ti upadhārento
atk-s0513a1:2910_7: “paresaṃ bhatiṃ katvā kicchena jīvantī”ti ñatvā cintesi “mayhaṃ sarīre sovaṇṇamayāni pattāni koṭṭanaghaṭṭanakhamāni,
atk-s0513a1:2910_9: tena me pajāpati ca dhītaro ca sukhaṃ jīvissantī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2910_11: brāhmaṇī ca dhītaro ca bodhisattaṃ disvā “kuto āgatosi,
atk-s0513a1:2910_13: “Ahaṃ tumhākaṃ pitā kālaṃ katvā suvaṇṇahaṃsayoniyaṃ nibbatto tumhe daṭṭhuṃ āgato.
atk-s0513a1:2910_14: Ito paṭṭhāya tumhākaṃ paresaṃ bhatiṃ katvā dukkhajīvikāya jīvanakiccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0513a1:2910_16: taṃ vikkiṇitvā sukhena jīvathā”ti ekaṃ pattaṃ datvā agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2910_17: So eteneva niyāmena antarantarā āgantvā ekekaṃ pattaṃ deti,
atk-s0513a1:2910_18: brāhmaṇī ca dhītaro ca aḍḍhā sukhitā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2911_3: idānissa āgatakāle sabbāni pattānipi luñcitvā gaṇhāmā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2911_4: Tā “evaṃ no pitā kilamissatī”ti na sampaṭicchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2911_5: Brāhmaṇī pana mahicchatāya puna ekadivasaṃ suvaṇṇahaṃsarājassa āgatakāle “ehi tāva,
atk-s0513a1:2911_6: sāmī”ti vatvā taṃ attano santikaṃ upagataṃ ubhohi hatthehi gahetvā sabbapattāni luñci.
atk-s0513a1:2911_7: Tāni pana bodhisattassa ruciṃ vinā balakkārena gahitattā sabbāni bakapattasadisāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2911_9: Atha naṃ sā mahācāṭiyaṃ pakkhipitvā posesi.
atk-s0513a1:2911_10: Tassa puna uṭṭhahantāni pattāni setāni sampajjiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2911_11: So sañjātapatto uppatitvā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva gantvā na puna āgamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2912_5: Idāni pana attano mahicchatāya eva lasuṇamhāpi parihāyissati,
atk-s0513a1:2912_6: tasmā ito paṭṭhāya lasuṇaṃ khādituṃ na labhissati.
atk-s0513a1:2912_10: appaṃ labhitvā pana yathāladdheneva santoso kātabbo,
atk-s0513a1:2912_11: uttari na patthetabba”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2914_0: “Yaṃ laddhaṃ tena tuṭṭhabbaṃ, atilobho hi pāpako;
atk-s0513a1:2917_0: Idaṃ pana vatvā satthā anekapariyāyena garahitvā “yā pana bhikkhunī lasuṇaṃ khādeyya,
atk-s0513a1:2921_0: Yattheko labhate babbūti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kāṇamātusikkhāpadaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2921_1: Sāvatthiyañhi kāṇamātā nāma dhītuvasena pākaṭanāmā upāsikā ahosi sotāpannā ariyasāvikā.
atk-s0513a1:2921_2: Sā dhītaraṃ kāṇaṃ aññatarasmiṃ gāmake samānajātikassa purisassa adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2921_3: Kāṇā kenacideva karaṇīyena mātu gharaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2921_4: Athassā sāmiko katipāhaccayena dūtaṃ pāhesi “āgacchatu kāṇā,
atk-s0513a1:2921_8: Kāṇamātā “ettakaṃ kālaṃ vasitvā kathaṃ tucchahatthāva gamissasī”ti pūvaṃ paci.
atk-s0513a1:2921_9: Tasmiṃyeva khaṇe eko piṇḍacāriko bhikkhu tassā nivesanaṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2921_10: upāsikā taṃ nisīdāpetvā pattapūraṃ pūvaṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2921_14: tassapi tathevāti evaṃ catunnaṃ janānaṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2921_21: Tayopi vāre teneva upāyena gamanaṃ na sampajji,
atk-s0513a1:2921_23: Kāṇā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā rodamānā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2922_0: Satthā taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya kāṇamātāya nivesanaṃ gantvā paññattāsane
atk-s0513a1:2922_2: “Iminā nāma kāraṇenā”ti ca sutvā kāṇamātaraṃ samassāsetvā dhammiṃ kathaṃ kathetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2922_3: Atha tesaṃ catunnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ tayo vāre yathāpaṭiyattapūvaṃ gahetvā kāṇāya gamanassa upacchinnabhāvo bhikkhusaṅghe pākaṭo jāto.
atk-s0513a1:2922_5: catūhi nāma bhikkhūhi tayo vāre kāṇamātāya pakkapūvaṃ khāditvā kāṇāya gamanantarāyaṃ katvā sāmikena pariccattaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2922_9: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:2922_11: idāneva te cattāro bhikkhū kāṇamātāya santakaṃ khāditvā tassā domanassaṃ uppādesuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2923_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto pāsāṇakoṭṭakakule nibbattitvā vayappatto pariyodātasippo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2923_1: Kāsiraṭṭhe ekasmiṃ nigame eko mahāvibhavo seṭṭhi ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:2923_3: Athassa bhariyā kālaṃ katvā dhanasinehena gantvā dhanapiṭṭhiyaṃ mūsikā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:2923_4: Evaṃ anukkamena sabbampi taṃ kulaṃ abbhatthaṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2923_7: Tadā bodhisatto tasmiṃ purāṇagāmaṭṭhāne pāsāṇe uppāṭetvā koṭṭeti.
atk-s0513a1:2923_8: Atha sā mūsikā gocarāya caramānā bodhisattaṃ punappunaṃ passantī uppannasinehā hutvā cintesi “mayhaṃ dhanaṃ bahu nikkāraṇena nassissati,
atk-s0513a1:2923_9: iminā saddhiṃ ekato hutvā idaṃ dhanaṃ datvā maṃsaṃ vikkiṇāpetvā khādissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2923_10: Sā ekadivasaṃ ekaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ mukhena ḍaṃsitvā bodhisattassa santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2923_11: So taṃ disvā piyavācāya samālapanto “kiṃ nu kho, amma,
atk-s0513a1:2923_15: So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā kahāpaṇaṃ ādāya gharaṃ gantvā ekena māsakena maṃsaṃ kiṇitvā āharitvā tassā adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2923_16: Sā taṃ gahetvā attano nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā yathāruciyā khādi.
atk-s0513a1:2923_17: Tato paṭṭhāya imināva niyāmena divase divase bodhisattassa kahāpaṇaṃ deti,
atk-s0513a1:2924_9: “Yadi evaṃ ahaṃ te niccakālaṃ maṃsaṃ dassāmi,
atk-s0513a1:2924_11: Atha naṃ biḷāro “tena hi appamattā hohī”ti vissajjesi.
atk-s0513a1:2924_12: Tato paṭṭhāya sā attano ābhataṃ maṃsaṃ dve koṭṭhāse katvā ekaṃ biḷārassa deti,
atk-s0513a1:2924_14: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ aññopi biḷāro aggahesi,
atk-s0513a1:2924_16: Tato paṭṭhāya tayo koṭṭhāse katvā khādanti.
atk-s0513a1:2924_19: Tato paṭṭhāya cattāro koṭṭhāse katvā khādanti.
atk-s0513a1:2924_22: Tato paṭṭhāya pañca koṭṭhāse katvā khādanti.
atk-s0513a1:2924_23: Sā pañcamaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ khādamānā appāhāratāya kilantā kisā ahosi appamaṃsalohitā
atk-s0513a1:2925_1: kasmā milātāsī”ti vatvā “iminā nāma kāraṇenā”ti vutte “tvaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ kasmā mayhaṃ nācikkhi,
atk-s0513a1:2925_2: ahamettha kātabbaṃ jānissāmī”ti taṃ samassāsetvā suddhaphalikapāsāṇena guhaṃ katvā āharitvā “amma,
atk-s0513a1:2925_3: tvaṃ imaṃ guhaṃ pavisitvā nipajjitvā āgatāgatānaṃ pharusāhi vācāhi santajjeyyāsī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2925_11: Biḷāro phalikaguhāya nipannabhāvaṃ ajānanto kodhavasena mūsikaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti sahasāva pakkhanditvā hadayena phalikaguhāyaṃ pahari.
atk-s0513a1:2925_14: So tattheva jīvitakkhayaṃ patvā ekamantaṃ paṭicchannaṭṭhāne pati.
atk-s0513a1:2925_15: Etenūpāyena aparopi aparopīti cattāropi janā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2925_16: Tato paṭṭhāya mūsikā nibbhayā hutvā bodhisattassa devasikaṃ dve tayo kahāpaṇe deti.
atk-s0513a1:2925_17: Evaṃ anukkamena sabbampi dhanaṃ bodhisattasseva adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2925_18: Te ubhopi yāvajīvaṃ mettiṃ abhinditvā yathākammaṃ gatā.
atk-s0513a1:2926_0: Satthā imaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā abhisambuddho hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2929_0: Tatiyo ca catuttho ca, idaṃ te babbukā bila”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2930_2: Dutiyo tattha jāyatīti yattha eko mūsikaṃ vā maṃsaṃ vā labhati,
atk-s0513a1:2930_5: Evaṃ te tadā cattāro biḷārā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2930_6: Hutvā ca pana divase divase maṃsaṃ khādantā te babbukā idaṃ phalikamayaṃ bilaṃ urena paharitvā sabbepi jīvitakkhayaṃ pattāti.
atk-s0513a1:2931_0: Evaṃ satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2935_0: Kiṃ te jaṭāhi dummedhāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ kuhakabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2936_0: Atīte pana bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto godhāyoniyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a1:2936_1: Tadā eko pañcābhiñño uggatapo tāpaso ekaṃ paccantagāmaṃ nissāya araññāyatane paṇṇasālāyaṃ vasati,
atk-s0513a1:2936_3: Bodhisatto tassa caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ ekasmiṃ vammike vasati,
atk-s0513a1:2936_4: vasanto ca pana divase divase dve tayo vāre tāpasaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammūpasaṃhitaṃ atthūpasaṃhitañca
atk-s0513a1:2936_5: vacanaṃ sutvā tāpasaṃ vanditvā vasanaṭṭhānameva gacchati.
atk-s0513a1:2936_7: Pakkamante ca pana tasmiṃ sīlavatasampanne tāpase añño kūṭatāpaso āgantvā tasmiṃ assamapade vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a1:2936_8: Bodhisatto “ayampi sīlavā”ti sallakkhetvā purimanayeneva tassa santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2937_0: Athekadivasaṃ nidāghasamaye akālameghe vuṭṭhe vammikehi makkhikā nikkhamiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:2937_2: Gāmavāsino nikkhamitvā makkhikākhādakā godhā gahetvā siniddhasambhārasaṃyuttaṃ ambilānambilaṃ godhāmaṃsaṃ sampādetvā tāpasassa adaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2937_3: Tāpaso godhāmaṃsaṃ khāditvā rasataṇhāya baddho “idaṃ maṃsaṃ atimadhuraṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2937_4: kissa maṃsaṃ nāmeta”nti pucchitvā “godhāmaṃsa”nti sutvā “mama santikaṃ mahāgodhā āgacchati,
atk-s0513a1:2937_6: Cintetvā ca pana bhājanañca sappiloṇādīni ca āharāpetvā ekamante ṭhapetvā muggaramādāya kāsāvena paṭicchādetvā
atk-s0513a1:2937_7: paṇṇasālādvāre bodhisattassa āgamanaṃ olokayamāno upasantūpasanto viya hutvā nisīdi bodhisatto sāyanhasamaye
atk-s0513a1:2937_8: “tāpasassa santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti nikkhamitvā upasaṅkamantova tassa indriyavippakāraṃ disvā cintesi “nāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2937_10: ajjesa maṃ olokentopi duṭṭhindriyo hutvā oloketi,
atk-s0513a1:2937_12: So tāpasassa heṭṭhāvāte ṭhatvā godhāmaṃsagandhaṃ ghāyitvā “iminā kūṭatāpasena ajja godhāmaṃsaṃ khāditaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:2937_13: tenesa rasataṇhāya baddho ajja maṃ attano santikaṃ upasaṅkamantaṃ muggarena paharitvā maṃsaṃ pacitvā
atk-s0513a1:2937_14: khāditukāmo bhavissatī”ti tassa santikaṃ anupagantvāva paṭikkamitvā vicarati.
atk-s0513a1:2938_0: Tāpaso bodhisattassa anāgamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā “iminā ‘ayaṃ maṃ paharitukāmo’ti ñātaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:2938_2: anāgacchantassāpissa kuto muttī”ti muggaraṃ nīharitvā khipi.
atk-s0513a1:2938_4: Bodhisatto vegena vammikaṃ pavisitvā aññena chiddena sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā “ambho kūṭajaṭila,
atk-s0513a1:2938_5: ahaṃ tava santikaṃ upasaṅkamanto ‘sīlavā’ti saññāya upasaṅkamiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2938_6: idāni pana te mayā kūṭabhāvo ñāto,
atk-s0513a1:2938_7: tādisassa mahācorassa kiṃ iminā pabbajjāliṅgenā”ti vatvā taṃ garahanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2940_0: “Kiṃ te jaṭāhi dummedha, kiṃ te ajinasāṭiyā;
atk-s0513a1:2942_0: Tattha kiṃ te jaṭāhi dummedhāti ambho dummedha,
atk-s0513a1:2942_2: pabbajjāguṇarahitassa kiṃ te tāhi jaṭāhīti attho.
atk-s0513a1:2942_3: Kiṃ te ajinasāṭiyāti ajinasāṭiyā anucchavikassa saṃvarassa abhāvakālato paṭṭhāya kiṃ te ajinasāṭiyā.
atk-s0513a1:2942_4: Abbhantaraṃ te gahananti tava abbhantaraṃ hadayaṃ rāgadosamohagahanena gahanaṃ paṭicchannaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2942_5: Bāhiraṃ parimajjasīti so tvaṃ abbhantare gahane nhānādīhi ceva liṅgagahanena ca bāhiraṃ parimajjasi,
atk-s0513a1:2942_6: taṃ parimajjanto kañjikapūritalābu viya visapūritacāṭi viya āsīvisapūritavammiko viya gūthapūritacittaghaṭo viya ca bahimaṭṭhova hosi,
atk-s0513a1:2943_0: Evaṃ bodhisatto kūṭatāpasaṃ tajjetvā vammikameva pāvisi, kūṭatāpasopi tato pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:2944_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2948_0: Akkhī bhinnā paṭo naṭṭhoti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2948_1: Tadā kira dhammasabhāyaṃ bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso,
atk-s0513a1:2948_2: seyyathāpi nāma chavālātaṃ ubhatopadittaṃ majjhe gūthagataṃ nevāraññe kaṭṭhatthaṃ pharati,
atk-s0513a1:2948_4: evameva devadatto evarūpe niyyānikasāsane pabbajitvā ubhato bhaṭṭho ubhato paribāhiro jāto,
atk-s0513a1:2948_9: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:2948_12: atītepi ubhato bhaṭṭho ahosiyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2949_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto rukkhadevatā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:2949_2: Atheko bāḷisiko baḷisaṃ ādāya daharena puttena saddhiṃ yasmiṃ sobbhe pakatiyāpi bāḷisikā macche gaṇhanti,
atk-s0513a1:2949_5: Bāḷisiko taṃ ākaḍḍhituṃ asakkonto cintesi “ayaṃ baḷiso mahāmacche laggo bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:2949_6: puttakaṃ mātu santikaṃ pesetvā paṭivissakehi saddhiṃ kalahaṃ kārāpemi,
atk-s0513a1:2949_7: evaṃ ito na koci koṭṭhāsaṃ paccāsīsissatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2949_11: So puttaṃ pesetvā baḷisaṃ ākaḍḍhituṃ asakkonto rajjucchedanabhayena uttarisāṭakaṃ thale ṭhapetvā udakaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2949_12: otaritvā macchalobhena macchaṃ upadhārento khāṇukehi paharitvā dvepi akkhīni bhindi.
atk-s0513a1:2949_14: So vedanāppatto hutvā hatthena akkhīni uppīḷayamāno gahetvā udakā uttaritvā kampamāno sāṭakaṃ pariyesati.
atk-s0513a1:2950_0: Sāpissa bhariyā “kalahaṃ katvā kassaci apaccāsīsanabhāvaṃ karissāmī”ti ekasmiṃyeva kaṇṇe tālapaṇṇaṃ piḷandhitvā
atk-s0513a1:2950_1: ekaṃ akkhiṃ ukkhalimasiyā añjetvā kukkuraṃ aṅkenādāya paṭivissakagharaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2950_2: Atha naṃ ekā sahāyikā evamāha “ekasmiṃyeva te kaṇṇe tālapaṇṇaṃ piḷandhitaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2950_4: piyaputtaṃ viya kukkuraṃ aṅkenādāya gharato gharaṃ gacchasi,
atk-s0513a1:2950_7: tvaṃ pana maṃ akāraṇena akkosasi paribhāsasi,
atk-s0513a1:2950_8: idāni taṃ gāmabhojakassa santikaṃ gantvā aṭṭha kahāpaṇe daṇḍāpessāmī”ti evaṃ kalahaṃ katvā ubhopi gāmabhojakassa santikaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2950_9: Kalahe visodhiyamāne tassāyeva matthake daṇḍo pati.
atk-s0513a1:2950_10: Atha naṃ bandhitvā “daṇḍaṃ dehī”ti pothetuṃ ārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:2951_1: araññe cassā patino taṃ byasanaṃ disvā khandhantare ṭhitā “bho purisa,
atk-s0513a1:2953_0: “Akkhī bhinnā paṭo naṭṭho, sakhigehe ca bhaṇḍanaṃ;
atk-s0513a1:2954_0: Ubhato paduṭṭhā kammantā, udakamhi thalamhi cā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2955_0: Tattha sakhigehe ca bhaṇḍananti sakhī nāma sahāyikā,
atk-s0513a1:2955_1: tassā ca gehe tava bhariyāya bhaṇḍanaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2955_2: bhaṇḍanaṃ katvā bandhitvā pothetvā daṇḍaṃ dāpiyati.
atk-s0513a1:2955_3: Ubhato paduṭṭhā kammantāti evaṃ tava dvīsupi ṭhānesu kammantā paduṭṭhāyeva bhinnāyeva.
atk-s0513a1:2955_6: akkhibhedena paṭanāsena ca udake kammantā paduṭṭhā,
atk-s0513a1:2956_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā bāḷisiko devadatto ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:2960_0: Niccaṃ ubbiggahadayāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ñātatthacariyaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2961_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto kākayoniyaṃ nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:2961_1: Athekadivasaṃ rañño purohito bahinagare nadiyaṃ nhāyitvā gandhe vilimpitvā mālaṃ piḷandhitvā varavatthanivattho nagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:2961_4: ahaṃ imassa brāhmaṇassa matthake sarīravaḷañjaṃ pātessāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2961_7: issarajanena ca saddhiṃ veraṃ nāma pāpakaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2961_10: “Tena hi paññāyissasī”ti vatvā itaro kāko palāyi.
atk-s0513a1:2961_11: So toraṇassa heṭṭhābhāgaṃ sampatte brāhmaṇe olambakaṃ cālento viya tassa matthake vaccaṃ pātesi.
atk-s0513a1:2962_0: Tasmiṃ kāle ekā bhatiyā vīhikoṭṭikadāsī vīhiṃ gehadvāre ātape pattharitvā rakkhantī nisinnāva niddaṃ okkami.
atk-s0513a1:2962_1: Tassā pamādaṃ ñatvā eko dīghalomako eḷako āgantvā vīhiṃ khādi,
atk-s0513a1:2962_4: tatiyampi tassā tatheva niddāyanakāle āgantvā vīhiṃ khādi.
atk-s0513a1:2962_5: Sāpi taṃ tikkhattuṃ palāpetvā cintesi “ayaṃ punappunaṃ khādanto upaḍḍhavīhiṃ khādissati,
atk-s0513a1:2962_8: Sā alātaṃ gahetvā niddāyamānā viya nisīditvā vīhikhādanatthāya eḷake sampatte uṭṭhāya alātena eḷakaṃ pahari,
atk-s0513a1:2962_10: So sarīre jhāyante “aggiṃ nibbāpessāmī”ti vegena gantvā hatthisālāya samīpe ekissā tiṇakuṭiyā sarīraṃ ghaṃsi,
atk-s0513a1:2962_15: Vejjā hatthī aroge kātuṃ asakkontā rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2962_23: Rājā “tena hi kāke māretvā vasaṃ āharathā”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2962_24: Tato paṭṭhāya kāke māretvā vasaṃ alabhitvā tattha tattheva rāsiṃ karonti,
atk-s0513a1:2963_1: Atheko kāko gantvā kākānaṃ uppannabhayaṃ bodhisattassa ārocesi.
atk-s0513a1:2963_2: So cintesi “ṭhapetvā maṃ añño mayhaṃ ñātakānaṃ uppannabhayaṃ harituṃ samattho nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:2963_3: harissāmi na”nti dasa pāramiyo āvajjetvā mettāpāramiṃ purecārikaṃ katvā ekavegena pakkhanditvā vivaṭamahāvātapānena
atk-s0513a1:2963_5: Atha naṃ eko manusso gahitukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:2963_8: Mahāsatto thokaṃ vissamitvā mettāpāramiṃ āvajjetvā heṭṭhāsanā nikkhamitvā rājānaṃ āha –
atk-s0513a1:2963_10: raññā nāma chandādivasena agantvā rajjaṃ kāretuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0513a1:2963_16: Sace hi rājāno yaṃ kayiramānaṃ na nipphajjati,
atk-s0513a1:2963_21: Taṃ sutvā rājā pasannacitto bodhisattassa kañcanabhaddapīṭhaṃ dāpetvā tattha nisinnassa pakkhantarāni
atk-s0513a1:2963_22: satapākasahassapākatelehi makkhāpetvā kañcanataṭṭake rājārahaṃ subhojanaṃ bhojāpetvā pānīyaṃ pāyetvā
atk-s0513a1:2963_25: kena kāraṇena nesaṃ vasā na hotī”ti bodhisatto “iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenā”ti sakalanivesanaṃ ekaravaṃ katvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2966_0: Tasmā nesaṃ vasā natthi, kākānamhāka ñātina”nti.
atk-s0513a1:2967_1: kākā nāma niccaṃ ubbiggamānasā bhayappattāva viharanti,
atk-s0513a1:2967_3: khattiyādayo manussepi itthipurisepi kumārakumārikādayopi viheṭhentā kilamentāva vicaranti,
atk-s0513a1:2967_4: tasmā imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi nesaṃ amhākaṃ ñātīnaṃ kākānaṃ vasā nāma natthi.
atk-s0513a1:2968_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto imaṃ kāraṇaṃ uttānaṃ katvā “mahārāja,
atk-s0513a1:2968_1: raññā nāma anisamma anupadhāretvā kammaṃ na kattabba”nti rājānaṃ bodhesi.
atk-s0513a1:2968_3: Bodhisatto rajjaṃ raññoyeva paṭidatvā rājānaṃ pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā sabbasattānaṃ abhayaṃ yāci.
atk-s0513a1:2968_4: Rājā tassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sabbasattānaṃ abhayaṃ datvā kākānaṃ nibaddhadānaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:2968_5: Divase divase taṇḍulambaṇassa bhattaṃ pacitvā nānaggarasehi omadditvā kākānaṃ dīyati,
atk-s0513a1:2969_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2979_0: Na pāpajanasaṃsevīti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto ekaṃ vipakkhaseviṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2980_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto godhāyoniyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0513a1:2980_1: So vayappatto nadītīre mahābile anekagodhāsataparivāro vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a1:2980_2: Tassa putto godhāpillako ekena kakaṇṭakena saddhiṃ santhavaṃ katvā tena saddhiṃ sammodamāno viharanto “kakaṇṭakaṃ parissajissāmī”ti avattharati.
atk-s0513a1:2980_3: Tassa tena saddhiṃ vissāsaṃ godhārājassa ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2980_8: Sace tvaṃ tena saddhiṃ vissāsaṃ karissasi,
atk-s0513a1:2980_9: taṃ kakaṇṭakaṃ nissāya sabbampetaṃ godhākulaṃ vināsaṃ pāpuṇissati,
atk-s0513a1:2980_10: ito paṭṭhāya etena saddhiṃ vissāsaṃ mā akāsī”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:2980_12: Bodhisatto punappunaṃ kathentopi tassa tena saddhiṃ vissāsaṃ vāretuṃ asakkonto “avassaṃ amhākaṃ etaṃ kakaṇṭakaṃ nissāya bhayaṃ uppajjissati,
atk-s0513a1:2980_13: tasmiṃ uppanne palāyanamaggaṃ sampādetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ekena passena vātabilaṃ kārāpesi.
atk-s0513a1:2981_4: So kilamanto cintesi “sace ayaṃ aññāni katipayāni divasāni maṃ evaṃ parissajissati,
atk-s0513a1:2981_6: ekena luddakena saddhiṃ ekato hutvā imaṃ godhākulaṃ vināsessāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2981_7: Athekadivasaṃ nidāghasamaye meghe vuṭṭhe vammikamakkhikā uṭṭhahiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:2981_8: tato tato godhā nikkhamitvā makkhikāyo khādanti.
atk-s0513a1:2981_9: Eko godhāluddako godhābilaṃ bhindanatthāya kuddālaṃ gahetvā sunakhehi saddhiṃ araññaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:2981_10: Kakaṇṭako taṃ disvā “ajja attano manorathaṃ pūressāmī”ti taṃ upasaṅkamitvā avidūre nipajjitvā “bho purisa,
atk-s0513a1:2981_14: aggiñca palālañca ādāya ehī”ti taṃ tattha netvā “imasmiṃ ṭhāne palālaṃ pakkhipitvā aggiṃ datvā dhūmaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2981_15: katvā samantā sunakhe ṭhapetvā sayaṃ mahāmuggaraṃ gahetvā nikkhantā nikkhantā godhā paharitvā māretvā
atk-s0513a1:2981_16: rāsiṃ katvā yāhī”ti evañca pana vatvā “ajja paccāmittassa piṭṭhiṃ passissāmī”ti ekasmiṃ ṭhāne sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā nipajji.
atk-s0513a1:2981_19: godhā dhūmandhā maraṇabhayatajjitā nikkhamitvā palāyituṃ āraddhā.
atk-s0513a1:2982_0: Bodhisatto “kakaṇṭakaṃ nissāya bhayaṃ uppanna”nti ñatvā “pāpapurisasaṃsaggo nāma na kattabbo,
atk-s0513a1:2982_2: ekassa pāpakakaṇṭakassa vasena ettakānaṃ godhānaṃ vināso jāto”ti vātabilena palāyanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2986_1: pāpajanasaṃsevī puggalo accantasukhaṃ ekantasukhaṃ nirantarasukhaṃ nāma na edhati na vindati na paṭilabhati.
atk-s0513a1:2986_4: Yathā kakaṇṭakato godhākulaṃ sukhaṃ na labhati,
atk-s0513a1:2986_5: evaṃ pāpajanasaṃsevī puggalo sukhaṃ na labhati.
atk-s0513a1:2986_6: Pāpajanaṃ pana sevanto ekanteneva kaliṃ pāpeti attānaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:2986_8: ekanteneva pāpasevī attānañca aññe ca attanā saddhiṃ vasante vināsaṃ pāpeti.
atk-s0513a1:2987_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:2987_2: bodhisattassa putto anovādako godhāpillako vipakkhasevī bhikkhu,
atk-s0513a1:2991_0: Etañhi te durājānanti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattassa vadhāya parisakkanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:2991_6: sayameva pana kilanto”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:2992_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto siṅgālayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā siṅgālarājā hutvā siṅgālagaṇaparivuto susānavane vihāsi.
atk-s0513a1:2992_4: Athettha sambahulā dhuttā bahuṃ surañca maṃsañca āharāpetvā maṇḍitapasādhitā gāyitvā gāyitvā surañca pivanti,
atk-s0513a1:2992_9: “Maṃsaṃ khīṇa”nti ca vutte “mayi ṭhite maṃsakkhayo nāma natthī”ti vatvā “āmakasusāne matamanussamaṃsaṃ
atk-s0513a1:2992_10: khādanatthāya āgate siṅgāle māretvā maṃsaṃ āharissāmī”ti muggaraṃ gahetvā niddhamanamaggena nagarā nikkhamitvā
atk-s0513a1:2992_11: susānaṃ gantvā muggaraṃ gahetvā matako viya uttāno nipajji.
atk-s0513a1:2992_12: Tasmiṃ khaṇe bodhisatto siṅgālagaṇaparivuto tattha gato taṃ disvā “nāyaṃ matako”ti ñatvāpi “suṭṭhutaraṃ
atk-s0513a1:2992_13: upaparikkhissāmī”ti tassa adhovātena gantvā sarīragandhaṃ ghāyitvā tathatovassa amatakabhāvaṃ ñatvā “lajjāpetvā
atk-s0513a1:2992_14: naṃ uyyojessāmī”ti gantvā muggarakoṭiyaṃ ḍaṃsitvā ākaḍḍhi,
atk-s0513a1:2992_16: upasaṅkamantampi na olokento naṃ gāḷhataraṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0513a1:2992_19: na mayi muggaraṃ ākaḍḍhante gāḷhataraṃ gaṇheyyāsi,
atk-s0513a1:2992_20: iminā kāraṇena tava matakabhāvo vā amatakabhāvo vā dujjāno”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:2995_0: Yassa te kaḍḍhamānassa, hatthā daṇḍo na muccatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:2996_0: Tattha etañhi te durājānanti etaṃ kāraṇaṃ tava duviññeyyaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:2996_1: Yaṃ sesi matasāyikanti yena kāraṇena tvaṃ matasāyikaṃ sesi,
atk-s0513a1:2996_3: Yassa te kaḍḍhamānassāti yassa tava daṇḍakoṭiyaṃ gahetvā kaḍḍhiyamānassa hatthato daṇḍo na muccati,
atk-s0513a1:2996_4: so tvaṃ tathato matako nāma na hosīti.
atk-s0513a1:2997_0: Evaṃ vutte so dhutto “ayaṃ mama amatakabhāvaṃ jānātī”ti uṭṭhāya daṇḍaṃ khipi,
atk-s0513a1:2997_5: maṃ virajjhantopi tvaṃ aṭṭha mahāniraye soḷasa ca ussadaniraye aviraddhoyevā”ti vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:2997_6: Dhutto kiñci alabhitvā susānā nikkhamitvā parikhāyaṃ nhāyitvā āgatamaggeneva nagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:2998_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:3002_0: Lasī ca te nipphalitāti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattassa gayāsīse sugatālayassa dassitabhāvaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:3002_1: Devadatto hi parihīnajjhāno lābhasakkāraparihīno “attheko upāyo”ti cintetvā satthāraṃ pañca vatthūni
atk-s0513a1:3002_2: yācitvā alabhamāno dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ saddhivihārike adhunā pabbajite dhammavinayamhi akovide pañcasate
atk-s0513a1:3002_3: bhikkhū gahetvā gayāsīsaṃ gantvā saṅghaṃ bhinditvā ekasīmāyaṃ āveṇikaṃ saṅghakammaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:3002_4: Satthā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ñāṇaparipākakālaṃ ñatvā dve aggasāvake pesesi.
atk-s0513a1:3002_5: Te disvā devadatto tuṭṭhamānaso rattiṃ dhammaṃ desayamāno “buddhalīlaṃ karissāmī”ti sugatālayaṃ dassento “vigatathinamiddho kho,
atk-s0513a1:3002_11: Dve aggasāvakā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā maggaphalehi pabodhetvā sabbe ādāya veḷuvanameva paccāgamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:3003_0: Kokāliko vihāraṃ tucchaṃ disvā devadattassa santikaṃ gantvā “āvuso devadatta,
atk-s0513a1:3003_1: parisaṃ te bhinditvā dve aggasāvakā vihāraṃ tucchaṃ katvā gatā,
atk-s0513a1:3003_2: tvaṃ pana niddāyasiyevā”ti vatvā uttarāsaṅgamassa apanetvā bhittiyaṃ piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṃ phusanto viya paṇhiyā naṃ hadaye pahari.
atk-s0513a1:3003_6: tumhākaṃ gatakāle devadatto kiṃ akāsī”ti? Bhante,
atk-s0513a1:3003_7: devadatto amhe disvā “buddhalīlaṃ karissāmī”ti sugatālayaṃ dassetvā mahāvināsaṃ pattoti.
atk-s0513a1:3003_9: devadatto idāneva mama anukaronto vināsaṃ patto,
atk-s0513a1:3003_10: pubbepi pattoyevā”ti vatvā therena yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:3004_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto kesarasīho hutvā himavantappadese kañcanaguhāyaṃ vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a1:3004_1: So ekadivasaṃ kañcanaguhāya nikkhamitvā vijambhitvā catuddisaṃ oloketvā sīhanādaṃ naditvā gocarāya pakkanto
atk-s0513a1:3004_2: mahāmahiṃsaṃ vadhitvā varamaṃsaṃ khāditvā ekaṃ saraṃ otaritvā maṇivaṇṇassa udakassa kucchiṃ pūretvā guhaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3004_4: Atheko siṅgālo gocarappasuto sahasāva sīhaṃ disvā palāyituṃ asakkonto sīhassa purato pādesu patitvā nipajji. “Kiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:3004_9: varamaṃsāni taṃ khādāpessāmī”ti vatvā siṅgālaṃ ādāya kañcanaguhaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:3005_0: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ guhāya nipannakova sīho āha “gaccha jambuka,
atk-s0513a1:3005_1: pabbatasikhare ṭhatvā pabbatapāde sañcarantesu hatthiassamahiṃsādīsu yassa maṃsaṃ khāditukāmosi,
atk-s0513a1:3005_2: taṃ oloketvā āgantvā ‘asukamaṃsaṃ khāditukāmomhī’ti vatvā maṃ vanditvā ‘viroca,
atk-s0513a1:3005_4: ahaṃ taṃ vadhitvā madhuramaṃsaṃ khāditvā tuyhampi dassāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3005_5: Siṅgālo pabbatasikharaṃ abhiruhitvā nānappakāre mige oloketvā yasseva maṃsaṃ khāditukāmo hoti,
atk-s0513a1:3005_6: kañcanaguhaṃ pavisitvā tameva sīhassa ārocetvā pādesu patitvā “viroca,
atk-s0513a1:3005_8: Sīho vegena pakkhanditvā sacepi mattavaravāraṇo hoti,
atk-s0513a1:3005_9: tattheva naṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā sayampi varamaṃsaṃ khādati,
atk-s0513a1:3005_11: Siṅgālo kucchipūraṃ maṃsaṃ khāditvā guhaṃ pavisitvā niddāyati.
atk-s0513a1:3005_12: So gacchante gacchante kāle mānaṃ vaḍḍhesi “ahampi catuppadova,
atk-s0513a1:3005_13: kiṃkāraṇā divase divase parehi posiyamāno viharāmi,
atk-s0513a1:3005_14: ito paṭṭhāya ahampi hatthiādayo hanitvā maṃsaṃ khādissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:3005_16: sāmī’ti vuttameva padaṃ nissāya varavāraṇe vadheti,
atk-s0513a1:3005_18: jambukā’ti maṃ vadāpetvā ekaṃ varavāraṇaṃ vadhitvā maṃsaṃ khādissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3006_1: mayā dīgharattaṃ tumhehi vadhitavaravāraṇānaṃ maṃsaṃ khāditaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:3006_2: ahampi ekaṃ varavāraṇaṃ māretvā maṃsaṃ khāditukāmo,
atk-s0513a1:3006_4: tumhe pabbatapāde vicarantaṃ varavāraṇaṃ oloketvā mama santikaṃ āgantvā ‘viroca,
atk-s0513a1:3006_10: vāraṇaṃ vadhitvā maṃsaṃ khādanasamattho siṅgālo nāma loke natthi,
atk-s0513a1:3006_13: So evaṃ vuttepi viramituṃ na icchi,
atk-s0513a1:3006_15: Sīho taṃ vāretuṃ asakkonto sampaṭicchitvā “tena hi mama vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā nipajjā”ti jambukaṃ kañcanaguhāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3006_16: nipajjāpetvā sayaṃ pabbatapāde mattavaravāraṇaṃ oloketvā guhādvāraṃ gantvā “viroca,
atk-s0513a1:3006_18: Siṅgālo kañcanaguhāya nikkhamitvā vijambhitvā catuddisaṃ oloketvā tikkhattuṃ vassitvā “mattavaravāraṇassa
atk-s0513a1:3006_19: kumbhe patissāmī”ti pakkhanditvā virajjhitvā pādamūle pati.
atk-s0513a1:3006_20: Vāraṇo dakkhiṇapādaṃ ukkhipitvā tassa sīsaṃ akkami,
atk-s0513a1:3006_22: Athassa sarīraṃ vāraṇo pādena saṅgharitvā rāsiṃ katvā upari laṇḍaṃ pātetvā koñcanādaṃ nadanto araññaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:3007_0: Bodhisatto imaṃ pavattiṃ disvā “idāni viroca, jambukā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:3009_0: “Lasī ca te nipphalitā, matthako ca padālito;
atk-s0513a1:3010_0: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, ajja kho tvaṃ virocasī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3011_2: Evaṃ bodhisatto imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:3012_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:3016_0: Bahumpetaṃ asabbhi jātavedāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ājīvakānaṃ micchātapaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:3016_1: Tadā kira ājīvakā jetavanapiṭṭhiyaṃ nānappakāraṃ micchātapaṃ caranti.
atk-s0513a1:3016_2: Sambahulā bhikkhū tesaṃ ukkuṭikappadhānavaggulivatakaṇṭakāpassayapañcātapatapanādibhedaṃ micchātapaṃ disvā bhagavantaṃ pucchiṃsu “atthi nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:3016_3: imaṃ micchātapaṃ nissāya kusalaṃ vā vuḍḍhi vā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3016_6: evarūpaṃ micchātapaṃ nissāya kusalaṃ vā vuḍḍhi vā atthi,
atk-s0513a1:3016_7: pubbe paṇḍitā ‘evarūpaṃ tapaṃ nissāya kusalaṃ vā vuḍḍhi vā bhavissatī’ti saññāya jātaggiṃ gahetvā araññaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3016_8: pavisitvā aggijuhanādivasena kiñci vuḍḍhiṃ apassantā aggiṃ udakena nibbāpetvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā
atk-s0513a1:3016_9: abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā brahmalokaparāyaṇā ahesu”nti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:3017_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto udiccabrāhmaṇakule nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:3017_1: Tassa jātadivase mātāpitaro jātaggiṃ gahetvā ṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:3017_2: Atha naṃ soḷasavassakāle etadavocuṃ “mayaṃ te, putta,
atk-s0513a1:3017_7: aggiṃ gahetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā aggiṃ paricaranto mahābrahmānaṃ ārādhetvā brahmalokaparāyaṇo hohī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3017_8: So “na mayhaṃ agārena attho”ti aggiṃ gahetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā assamapadaṃ māpetvā aggiṃ paricaranto araññe vihāsi.
atk-s0513a1:3017_9: So ekadivasaṃ paccantagāmake godakkhiṇaṃ labhitvā taṃ goṇaṃ assamapadaṃ netvā cintesi “aggibhagavantaṃ gomaṃsaṃ khādāpessāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3017_12: gāmato loṇaṃ āharitvā aggibhagavantaṃ saloṇakaṃ khādāpessāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3017_13: So taṃ tattheva bandhitvā loṇatthāya gāmakaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:3017_14: Tasmiṃ gate sambahulā luddakā taṃ ṭhānaṃ āgatā.
atk-s0513a1:3017_15: Goṇaṃ disvā vadhitvā maṃsaṃ pacitvā khāditvā naṅguṭṭhañca jaṅghañca cammañca tattheva chaḍḍetvā avasesamaṃsaṃ ādāya agamaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:3018_0: Brāhmaṇo āgantvā naṅguṭṭhādimattameva disvā cintesi “ayaṃ aggibhagavā attano santakampi rakkhituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0513a1:3018_3: natthi itonidānaṃ kusalaṃ vā vuḍḍhi vā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3018_5: tvaṃ attanopi santakaṃ rakkhituṃ asakkonto maṃ kadā rakkhissasi,
atk-s0513a1:3018_7: ettakenapi tussāhī”ti naṅguṭṭhādīni aggimhi pakkhipanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:3021_0: Maṃsārahassa natthajja maṃsaṃ, naṅguṭṭhampi bhavaṃ paṭiggahātū”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3022_3: Aggi hi jātamattova vediyati paññāyati pākaṭo hoti,
atk-s0513a1:3022_5: Yaṃ taṃ vāladhinābhipūjayāmāti yaṃ ajja mayaṃ attanopi santakaṃ rakkhituṃ asamatthaṃ bhagavantaṃ vāladhinā abhipūjayāma,
atk-s0513a1:3022_7: Maṃsārahassāti maṃsaṃ arahassa tuyhaṃ natthi ajja maṃsaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:3022_8: Naṅguṭṭhampi bhavaṃ paṭiggahātūti attano santakaṃ rakkhituṃ asakkonto bhavaṃ imaṃ sajaṅghacammaṃ naṅguṭṭhampi paṭiggaṇhātūti.
atk-s0513a1:3023_0: Evaṃ vatvā mahāsatto aggiṃ udakena nibbāpetvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā brahmalokaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:3024_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi – “nibbutaggitāpaso ahameva tena samayenā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3028_0: Na tvaṃ rādha vijānāsīti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto purāṇadutiyikāpalobhanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:3028_2: Satthā pana taṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantetvā “bhikkhu mātugāmo nāma arakkhiyo,
atk-s0513a1:3028_3: ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā rakkhantāpi rakkhituṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0513a1:3028_4: Tvampi pubbe etaṃ ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā rakkhantopi rakkhituṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0513a1:3028_5: idāni kathaṃ rakkhissasī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:3029_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto sukayoniyaṃ nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:3029_1: Kāsiraṭṭhe eko brāhmaṇo bodhisattañca kaniṭṭhabhātarañcassa puttaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā posesi.
atk-s0513a1:3029_4: Tassa pana brāhmaṇassa bhariyā anācārā hoti dussīlā.
atk-s0513a1:3029_5: So vohāratthāya gacchanto ubhopi bhātaro āha – “tātā,
atk-s0513a1:3029_6: sace vo mātā brāhmaṇī anācāraṃ ācarati,
atk-s0513a1:3029_11: Evaṃ brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇiṃ sukānaṃ niyyādetvā vohāratthāya gato.
atk-s0513a1:3030_0: Tassa pana gatadivasato paṭṭhāya brāhmaṇī aticarituṃ āraddhā,
atk-s0513a1:3030_2: tassā kiriyaṃ disvā rādho bodhisattaṃ āha – “bhātika,
atk-s0513a1:3030_3: amhākaṃ pitā ‘sace vo mātā anācāraṃ ācarati,
atk-s0513a1:3030_8: tvaṃ attano abyattatāya bālabhāvena evaṃ vadesi,
atk-s0513a1:3030_9: mātugāmaṃ nāma ukkhipitvā carantāpi rakkhituṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0513a1:3030_11: na taṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:3034_3: aḍḍharatte anāgate paṭhamayāmeyeva ettakā janā āgatā,
atk-s0513a1:3034_7: Virattā kosiyāyaneti mātā no kosiyāyanī brāhmaṇī virattā amhākaṃ pitari nippemā jātā.
atk-s0513a1:3034_8: Sacassā tasmiṃ sineho vā pemaṃ vā bhaveyya,
atk-s0513a1:3034_9: na evarūpaṃ anācāraṃ kareyyāti imamatthaṃ etehi byañjanehi pakāsesi.
atk-s0513a1:3035_0: Evaṃ pakāsetvā ca pana brāhmaṇiyā saddhiṃ rādhassa vattuṃ na adāsi.
atk-s0513a1:3035_1: Sāpi yāva brāhmaṇassa anāgamanā yathāruciyā vicari.
atk-s0513a1:3035_4: Bodhisatto brāhmaṇassa sabbaṃ yathābhūtaṃ kathetvā “kiṃ te, tāta,
atk-s0513a1:3035_6: amhehi mātuyā dosassa kathitakālato paṭṭhāya na sakkā idha vasitu”nti brāhmaṇassa pāde vanditvā saddhiṃ rādhena uppatitvā araññaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:3036_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā saccāni pakāsesi,
atk-s0513a1:3036_2: “Tadā brāhmaṇo ca brāhmaṇī ca eteyeva dve janā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0513a1:3040_0: Api nu hanukā santāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sambahule mahallake bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:3040_1: Te kira gihikāle sāvatthiyaṃ kuṭumbikā aḍḍhā mahaddhanā aññamaññasahāyakā ekato hutvā puññāni karontā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā “mayaṃ mahallakā,
atk-s0513a1:3040_3: satthu santike ramaṇīye buddhasāsane pabbajitvā dukkhassantaṃ karissāmā”ti sabbaṃ sāpateyyaṃ puttadhītādīnaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3040_4: datvā assumukhaṃ ñātisaṅghaṃ pahāya satthāraṃ pabbajjaṃ yācitvā pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:3040_5: Pabbajitvā pana pabbajjānurūpaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ na kariṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:3040_7: gihikāle viya pabbajitakālepi vihārapariyante paṇṇasālaṃ kāretvā ekatova vasiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:3040_8: Piṇḍāya carantāpi aññattha agantvā yebhuyyena attano puttadārasseva gehaṃ gantvā bhuñjiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:3040_9: Tesu ekassa purāṇadutiyikā sabbesampi mahallakattherānaṃ upakārā ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:3040_10: tasmā sesāpi attanā laddhaṃ āhāraṃ gahetvā tassāyeva gehe nisīditvā bhuñjanti.
atk-s0513a1:3040_13: Atha te mahallakattherā vihāraṃ gantvā aññamaññaṃ gīvāsu gahetvā “madhurahattharasā upāsikā kālakatā”ti vihārapaccante rodantā vicariṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:3040_14: Tesaṃ saddaṃ sutvā ito cito ca bhikkhū sannipatitvā “āvuso,
atk-s0513a1:3040_16: Te “amhākaṃ sahāyassa purāṇadutiyikā madhurahattharasā kālakatā amhākaṃ ativiya upakārā,
atk-s0513a1:3040_17: ‘idāni kuto tathārūpiṃ labhissāmā’ti iminā kāraṇena rodimhā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:3041_0: Tesaṃ taṃ vippakāraṃ disvā bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso,
atk-s0513a1:3041_1: iminā nāma kāraṇena mahallakattherā aññamaññaṃ gīvāsu gahetvā vihārapaccante rodantā vicarantī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3041_4: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:3041_7: pubbepete imaṃ kākayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā samudde mataṃ nissāya ‘samuddaudakaṃ ussiñcitvā etaṃ nīharissāmā’ti
atk-s0513a1:3041_8: vāyamantā paṇḍite nissāya jīvitaṃ labhiṃsū”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:3042_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto samuddadevatā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:3042_1: Atheko kāko attano bhariyaṃ kākiṃ ādāya gocaraṃ pariyesamāno samuddatīraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:3042_2: Tasmiṃ kāle manussā samuddatīre khīrapāyāsamacchamaṃsasurādīhi nāgabalikammaṃ katvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:3042_3: Atha so kāko balikammaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā khīrādīni disvā saddhiṃ kākiyā khīrapāyāsamacchamaṃsādīni bhuñjitvā bahuṃ suraṃ pivi.
atk-s0513a1:3042_4: Te ubhopi surāmadamattā “samuddakīḷaṃ kīḷissāmā”ti velante nisīditvā nhāyituṃ ārabhiṃsu athekā ūmi āgantvā kākiṃ gahetvā samuddaṃ pavesesi.
atk-s0513a1:3042_7: Athassa paridevanasaddaṃ sutvā bahū kākā sannipatitvā “kiṃkāraṇā rodasī”ti pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:3042_10: Atha nesaṃ etadahosi “idaṃ samuddaudakaṃ nāma amhākaṃ kiṃ pahosi,
atk-s0513a1:3042_11: udakaṃ ussiñcitvā samuddaṃ tucchaṃ katvā sahāyikaṃ nīharissāmā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3042_12: Te mukhaṃ pūretvā pūretvā udakaṃ bahi chaḍḍenti,
atk-s0513a1:3042_13: loṇūdakena ca gale sussamāne uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya thalaṃ gantvā vissamanti.
atk-s0513a1:3043_0: Te hanūsu kilantesu mukhesu sukkhantesu akkhīsu rattesu dīnā kilantā hutvā aññamaññaṃ āmantetvā “ambho,
atk-s0513a1:3043_3: samuddaṃ tucchaṃ kātuṃ na sakkhissāmā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0513a1:3047_0: Tattha api nu hanukā santāti api no hanukā santā,
atk-s0513a1:3047_2: Oramāma na pāremāti mayaṃ attano balena mahāsamuddaudakaṃ ākaḍḍhāma osārema,
atk-s0513a1:3047_3: tucchaṃ pana naṃ kātuṃ na sakkoma.
atk-s0513a1:3048_0: Evañca pana vatvā sabbepi te kākā “tassā kākiyā evarūpaṃ nāma tuṇḍaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:3048_4: Sā no imaṃ corasamuddaṃ nissāya naṭṭhā”ti bahuṃ vippalapiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:3048_5: Te evaṃ vippalapamāne samuddadevatā bheravarūpaṃ dassetvā palāpesi,
atk-s0513a1:3049_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:3053_0: Nayidaṃ dukkhaṃ aduṃ dukkhanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:3053_1: So hi bhagavatā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhu ukkaṇṭhito”ti vutte “sacca”nti vatvā “kena ukkaṇṭhāpitosī”ti
atk-s0513a1:3053_2: ca puṭṭho “purāṇadutiyikāyā”ti vatvā “madhurahattharasā, bhante, sā itthī,
atk-s0513a1:3053_3: na sakkomi taṃ vinā vasitu”nti āha.
atk-s0513a1:3053_4: Atha naṃ satthā “esā te bhikkhu anatthakārikā,
atk-s0513a1:3053_5: pubbepi tvaṃ etaṃ nissāya sūle uttāsito etaññeva patthayamāno kālaṃ katvā niraye nibbatto,
atk-s0513a1:3053_6: idāni naṃ kasmā puna patthesī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:3054_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto ākāsaṭṭhadevatā ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:3054_4: Ekassa pana duggatamanussassa ekameva ghanasāṭakayugaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:3054_5: So taṃ sudhotaṃ dhovāpetvā obhañjāpetvā satavalikaṃ sahassavalikaṃ kāretvā ṭhapesi.
atk-s0513a1:3054_7: ekaṃ kusumbharattaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā tava kaṇṭhe laggā kattikarattivāraṃ caritu”nti. “Bhadde,
atk-s0513a1:3054_14: purisassa icchāya sati kiṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:3054_21: rattibhāge andhakāre sati purisassa agamanīyaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3054_22: Iti so tāya punappunaṃ kathentiyā kilesavasena tassā vacanaṃ gahetvā “hotu bhadde,
atk-s0513a1:3054_23: mā cintayitthā”ti taṃ samassāsetvā rattibhāge jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā nagarā nikkhamitvā rañño kusumbhavatthuṃ gantvā vatiṃ madditvā antovatthuṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:3054_24: Ārakkhamanussā vatisaddaṃ sutvā “coro coro”ti parivāretvā gahetvā paribhāsitvā koṭṭetvā bandhitvā pabhātāya rattiyā rañño dassesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:3054_27: Atha naṃ pacchābāhaṃ bandhitvā vajjhabheriyā vajjamānāya nagarā nikkhamāpetvā sūle uttāsesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:3054_29: kākā sīse nilīyitvā kaṇayaggasadisehi tuṇhehi akkhīni vijjhanti.
atk-s0513a1:3055_0: So tathārūpampi dukkhaṃ amanasikaritvā tameva itthiṃ anussaritvā “tāya nāmamhi ghanapuppharattavatthanivatthāya
atk-s0513a1:3055_1: kaṇṭhe āsattabāhuyugaḷāya saddhiṃ kattikarattivārato parihīno”ti cintetvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:3057_0: “Nayidaṃ dukkhaṃ aduṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ maṃ tudati vāyaso;
atk-s0513a1:3059_1: yaṃ maṃ tudati vāyasoti yañca idaṃ sūle lagganapaccayaṃ kāyikacetasikadukkhaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:3059_2: yañca lohamayehi viya tuṇḍehi vāyaso tudati,
atk-s0513a1:3059_4: aduṃ dukkhaṃ etaṃyeva pana me dukkhanti attho. Kataraṃ?
atk-s0513a1:3059_7: yaṃ sā piyaṅgusāmā mama bhariyā ekaṃ kusumbharattaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā evaṃ ghanapuppharattena
atk-s0513a1:3059_8: vatthayugena acchannā mama kaṇṭhe gahetvā kattikarattivāraṃ nānubhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:3059_11: So evaṃ mātugāmaṃ ārabbha vippalapantoyeva kālaṃ katvā niraye nibbatti.
atk-s0513a1:3060_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:3060_2: taṃ kāraṇaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā ṭhitā ākāsaṭṭhadevatā pana ahameva ahosi”nti.
atk-s0513a1:3064_0: Nāhaṃ punaṃ na ca punanti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kilesaniggahaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:3064_1: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira pañcasatamattā sahāyakā mahāvibhavā seṭṭhiputtā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sāsane uraṃ
atk-s0513a1:3064_3: Athekadivasaṃ tesaṃ aḍḍharattasamaye kilesanissito saṅkappo uppajji.
atk-s0513a1:3064_4: Te ukkaṇṭhitvā attanā jahitakilese puna gaṇhituṃ cittaṃ uppādayiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:3064_5: Atha satthā aḍḍharattasamanantare sabbaññutaññāṇadaṇḍadīpakaṃ ukkhipitvā “katarāya nu kho ratiyā jetavane
atk-s0513a1:3064_6: bhikkhū viharantī”ti bhikkhūnaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ olokento tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abbhantare kāmarāgasaṅkappassa uppannabhāvaṃ aññāsi.
atk-s0513a1:3064_7: Satthā ca nāma ekaputtikā itthī attano puttaṃ viya,
atk-s0513a1:3064_8: ekacakkhuko puriso cakkhuṃ viya attano sāvake rakkhati.
atk-s0513a1:3064_9: Pubbaṇhādīsu yasmiṃ yasmiṃ samaye tesaṃ kilesā uppajjanti,
atk-s0513a1:3064_10: te tesaṃ kilese tato paraṃ vaḍḍhituṃ adatvā tasmiṃ tasmiṃyeva samaye niggaṇhāti.
atk-s0513a1:3064_11: Tenassa etadahosi “ayaṃ cakkavattirañño antonagareyeva corānaṃ uppannakālo viya vattati,
atk-s0513a1:3064_12: idāneva tesaṃ dhammadesanaṃ katvā te kilese niggaṇhitvā arahattaṃ dassāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3064_13: So surabhigandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā madhurassarena “ānandā”ti āyasmantaṃ dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ ānandattheraṃ āmantesi.
atk-s0513a1:3064_18: Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “sacāhaṃ teyeva pañcasate bhikkhū pakkosāpessāmi.
atk-s0513a1:3064_19: ‘Satthārā no abbhantare kilesānaṃ uppannabhāvo ñāto’ti saṃviggamānasā dhammadesanaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ na sakkhissantī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3064_22: bhante”ti avāpuraṇaṃ ādāya pariveṇena pariveṇaṃ āhiṇḍitvā sabbe bhikkhū gandhakuṭipariveṇe sannipātetvā buddhāsanaṃ paññapesi.
atk-s0513a1:3065_0: Satthā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya silāpathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhahamāno sineru viya paññatte buddhāsane
atk-s0513a1:3065_2: Tāpi rasmiyo pātimattā chattamattā kūṭāgārakucchimattā chijjitvā chijjitvā gaganatale vijjulatā viya sañcariṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:3065_4: Bhikkhusaṅghopi satthāraṃ vanditvā garucittaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā rattakambalasāṇiyā parikkhipanto viya parivāretvā nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:3065_7: bhikkhunā nāma kāmavitakkaṃ byāpādavitakkaṃ vihiṃsāvitakkanti ime tayo akusalavitakke vitakketuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0513a1:3065_8: Anto uppannakileso hi ‘parittako’ti avamaññituṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0513a1:3065_12: evameva appamattakopi kileso uppajjitvā vaḍḍhituṃ labhanto mahāvināsaṃ pāpeti.
atk-s0513a1:3065_13: Kileso nāmesa halāhalavisūpamo uppāṭitacchavigaṇḍasadiso āsīvisapaṭibhāgo asaniaggisadiso allīyituṃ na yutto āsaṅkitabbo.
atk-s0513a1:3065_14: Uppannuppannakkhaṇeyeva paṭisaṅkhānabalena bhāvanābalena yathā muhuttampi hadaye aṭṭhatvā paduminipattā udakabindu viya vivaṭṭati,
atk-s0513a1:3065_16: Porāṇakapaṇḍi tāpi appamattakampi kilesaṃ garahitvā yathā puna abbhantare nuppajjati,
atk-s0513a1:3066_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto siṅgālayoniyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā araññe nadītīre nivāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a1:3066_2: Siṅgālo gocarappasuto taṃ matahatthisarīraṃ disvā “mahā me gocaro uppanno”ti gantvā taṃ soṇḍe ḍaṃsi,
atk-s0513a1:3066_14: So “etthāpi natthi khāditabbayuttaka”nti sabbattha assādaṃ alabhanto vaccamagge ḍaṃsi,
atk-s0513a1:3066_16: So “laddhaṃ dāni me imasmiṃ sarīre mudu khāditabbayuttakaṭṭhāna”nti tato paṭṭhāya khādanto antokucchiṃ
atk-s0513a1:3066_17: pavisitvā vakkahadayādīni khāditvā pipāsitakāle lohitaṃ pivitvā nipajjitukāmakāle udaraṃ pattharitvā
atk-s0513a1:3067_3: kiṃ dāni me aññattha kamma”nti so aññattha agantvā hatthikucchiyaṃyeva maṃsaṃ khāditvā vasati.
atk-s0513a1:3067_4: Gacchante gacchante kāle nidāghe vātasamphassena ceva sūriyarasmisantāpena ca taṃ kuṇapaṃ sussitvā valiyo gaṇhi,
atk-s0513a1:3067_10: So nikkhamanadvāraṃ alabhanto bhayappatto hutvā sandhāvanto ito cito ca paharitvā nikkhamanadvāraṃ pariyesamāno vicarati.
atk-s0513a1:3067_11: Evaṃ tasmiṃ ukkhaliyaṃ piṭṭhapiṇḍi viya antokucchiyaṃ paccamāne katipāhaccayena mahāmegho pāvassi.
atk-s0513a1:3067_12: Atha naṃ kuṇapaṃ temetvā uṭṭhāya pakatisaṇṭhānena aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0513a1:3067_13: Vaccamaggo vivaṭo hutvā tārakā viya paññāyi.
atk-s0513a1:3067_14: Siṅgālo taṃ chiddaṃ disvā “idāni me jīvitaṃ laddha”nti yāva hatthisīsā paṭikkamitvā vegena pakkhanditvā vaccamaggaṃ sīsena paharitvā nikkhami.
atk-s0513a1:3067_16: So tālakkhandhasadisena nillomena sarīrena ubbiggacitto muhuttaṃ dhāvitvā nivattitvā nisinno sarīraṃ oloketvā “idaṃ dukkhaṃ mayhaṃ na aññena kataṃ,
atk-s0513a1:3067_17: lobhahetu pana lobhakāraṇā lobhaṃ nissāya mayā etaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0513a1:3067_18: ito dāni paṭṭhāya na lobhavasiko bhavissāmi,
atk-s0513a1:3067_19: puna hatthisarīraṃ nāma na pavisissāmī”ti saṃviggahadayo hutvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:3069_0: “Nāhaṃ punaṃ na ca punaṃ, na cāpi apunappunaṃ;
atk-s0513a1:3071_4: tato ca punāti vuttavārato puna tatopi ca punappunaṃ vāraṇasarīrasaṅkhātaṃ hatthibondiṃ na pavekkhāmi.
atk-s0513a1:3071_7: tathā hi ahaṃ imasmiññeva pavesane bhayatajjito maraṇabhayena santāsaṃ saṃvegaṃ āpāditoti.
atk-s0513a1:3072_0: Evañca pana vatvā tatova palāyitvā puna taṃ vā aññaṃ vā hatthisarīraṃ nivattitvāpi na olokesi.
atk-s0513a1:3073_1: anto uppannakilesassa nāma vaḍḍhituṃ adatvā tattha tattheva naṃ niggaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā saccāni pakāsetvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi.
