atk-s0513a1:3073_2: Saccapariyosāne pañcasatāpi te bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu,
atk-s0513a1:3077_0: Ekapaṇṇo ayaṃ rukkhoti idaṃ satthā vesāliṃ upanissāya mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ viharanto vesālikaṃ duṭṭhalicchavikumāraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:3077_1: Tasmiñhi kāle vesālinagaraṃ gāvutagāvutantare tīhi pākārehi parikkhittaṃ tīsu ṭhānesu gopuraṭṭālakayuttaṃ paramasobhaggappattaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:3077_2: Tattha niccakālaṃ rajjaṃ kāretvā vasantānaññeva rājūnaṃ satta sahassāni satta satāni satta ca rājāno honti,
atk-s0513a1:3077_6: Tesaṃ rājakumārānaṃ antare eko duṭṭhalicchavikumāro nāma ahosi kodhano caṇḍo pharuso sāhasiko,
atk-s0513a1:3077_7: daṇḍena ghaṭṭitaāsīviso viya niccaṃ pajjalito kodhena.
atk-s0513a1:3077_8: Tassa purato dve tīṇi vacanāni kathetuṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0513a1:3077_12: Athassa mātāpitūnaṃ etadahosi “ayaṃ kumāro atipharuso sāhasiko,
atk-s0513a1:3077_13: ṭhapetvā sammāsambuddhaṃ añño imaṃ vinetuṃ samattho nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:3077_15: Te taṃ ādāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā āhaṃsu “bhante,
atk-s0513a1:3077_16: ayaṃ kumāro caṇḍo pharuso kodhena pajjalati,
atk-s0513a1:3078_1: imesu nāma sattesu caṇḍena pharusena sāhasikena viheṭhakajātikena na bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:3078_2: pharusavāco ca nāma vijātamātuyāpi pitunopi puttadārassapi bhātibhaginīnampi pajāpatiyāpi mittabandhavānampi appiyo hoti amanāpo,
atk-s0513a1:3078_5: khādituṃ āgacchanto yakkho viya ca ubbejanīyo hutvā dutiyacittavāre nirayādīsu nibbattati.
atk-s0513a1:3078_6: Diṭṭheyeva ca dhamme kodhano puggalo maṇḍitapasādhitopi dubbaṇṇova hoti,
atk-s0513a1:3078_7: puṇṇacandasassirikampissa mukhaṃ jālābhihatapadumaṃ viya malaggahitakañcanādāsamaṇḍalaṃ viya ca virūpaṃ hoti duddasikaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:3078_8: Kodhaṃ nissāya hi sattā satthaṃ ādāya attanāva attānaṃ paharanti,
atk-s0513a1:3078_12: Evaṃ kodhavasena kālaṃ katvā nirayādīsu uppajjanti,
atk-s0513a1:3078_13: viheṭhakajātikāpi diṭṭheva dhamme garahaṃ patvā kāyassa bhedā nirayādīsu uppajjanti,
atk-s0513a1:3078_14: puna manussattaṃ labhitvā vijātakālato paṭṭhāya rogabahulāva honti.
atk-s0513a1:3078_15: Cakkhurogo sotarogotiādīsu ca rogesu ekato uṭṭhāya ekasmiṃ patanti,
atk-s0513a1:3078_16: rogena aparimuttāva hutvā niccaṃ dukkhitāva honti,
atk-s0513a1:3078_17: tasmā sabbesu sattesu mettacittena hitacittena muducittena bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:3078_18: Evarūpo hi puggalo nirayādibhayehi na parimuccatī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3078_19: So kumāro satthu ovādaṃ sutvā ekovādeneva nihatamāno danto nibbisevano mettacitto muducitto ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:3078_20: Aññaṃ akkosantampi paharantampi nivattitvā na olokesi,
atk-s0513a1:3079_0: Tassa taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso,
atk-s0513a1:3079_3: sammāsambuddho pana taṃ ekovādeneva dametvā nibbisevanaṃ katvā mattavaravāraṇaṃ viya samuggahitāneñjakāraṇaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0513a1:3079_7: hatthidammo sārito ekaṃyeva disaṃ dhāvati puratthimaṃ vā pacchimaṃ vā uttaraṃ vā dakkhiṇaṃ vā.
atk-s0513a1:3079_13: arahatā sammāsambuddhena purisadammo sārito aṭṭha disā vidhāvati,
atk-s0513a1:3079_16: so vuccati ‘yoggācariyānaṃ anuttaro purisadammasārathī’ti. Na hi, āvuso,
atk-s0513a1:3079_20: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:3079_23: pubbepāhaṃ imaṃ ekovādeneva damesi”nti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:3080_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto udiccabrāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto takkasilāyaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3080_1: tayo vede sabbasippāni ca uggahetvā kiñci kālaṃ gharāvāsaṃ vasitvā mātāpitūnaṃ accayena isipabbajjaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3080_2: pabbajitvā abhiññā ca samāpattiyo ca nibbattetvā himavante vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0513a1:3080_3: Tattha ciraṃ vasitvā loṇambilasevanatthāya janapadaṃ gantvā bārāṇasiṃ patvā rājuyyāne vasitvā punadivase
atk-s0513a1:3080_4: sunivattho supāruto tāpasākappasampanno bhikkhāya nagaraṃ pavisitvā rājaṅgaṇaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0513a1:3080_5: Rājā sīhapañjarena olokento taṃ disvā iriyāpathe pasīditvā “ayaṃ tāpaso santindriyo santamānaso yugamattadaso,
atk-s0513a1:3080_6: padavāre padavāre sahassatthavikaṃ ṭhapento viya sīhavijambhitena āgacchati.
atk-s0513a1:3080_8: imassa tenabbhantare bhavitabba”nti cintetvā ekaṃ amaccaṃ olokesi.
atk-s0513a1:3080_13: devā”ti bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā hatthato bhikkhābhājanaṃ gahetvā “kiṃ,
atk-s0513a1:3080_21: Amacco gantvā bodhisattaṃ vanditvā yācitvā rājanivesanaṃ pavesesi.
atk-s0513a1:3081_0: Rājā bodhisattaṃ vanditvā samussitasetacchatte kañcanapallaṅke nisīdāpetvā attano paṭiyattaṃ nānaggarasabhojanaṃ bhojetvā “kahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0513a1:3081_7: amhākaññeva uyyāne vasathā”ti paṭiññaṃ gahetvā sayampi bhuñjitvā bodhisattaṃ ādāya uyyānaṃ gantvā paṇṇasālaṃ
atk-s0513a1:3081_8: māpetvā rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāpi kāretvā pabbajitaparikkhāre datvā uyyānapālaṃ paṭicchāpetvā nagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0513a1:3081_10: Rājāpissa divase divase dvattikkhattuṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0513a1:3082_0: Tassa pana rañño duṭṭhakumāro nāma putto ahosi caṇḍo pharuso,
atk-s0513a1:3082_5: evaṃ kātuṃ na labbhā”ti kujjhitvā kathentāpi kathaṃ gāhāpetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:3082_6: Rājā cintesi “ṭhapetvā mama ayyaṃ himavantatāpasaṃ añño imaṃ kumāraṃ dametuṃ samattho nāma natthi,
atk-s0513a1:3082_8: So kumāraṃ ādāya bodhisattassa santikaṃ gantvā “bhante,
atk-s0513a1:3082_11: tumhe naṃ ekena upāyena sikkhāpethā”ti kumāraṃ bodhisattassa niyyādetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:3082_12: Bodhisatto kumāraṃ gahetvā uyyāne vicaranto ekato ekena,
atk-s0513a1:3082_13: ekato ekenāti dvīhiyeva pattehi ekaṃ nimbapotakaṃ disvā kumāraṃ āha – “kumāra,
atk-s0513a1:3082_14: etassa tāva rukkhapotakassa paṇṇaṃ khāditvā rasaṃ jānāhī”ti?
atk-s0513a1:3082_15: So tassa ekaṃ pattaṃ khāditvā rasaṃ ñatvā “dhī”ti saha kheḷena bhūmiyaṃ nuṭṭhābhi.
atk-s0513a1:3082_19: vaḍḍhanto pana bahū manusse māressatī”ti taṃ nimbapotakaṃ uppāṭetvā hatthehi parimadditvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:3086_1: Na bhūmyā caturaṅguloti bhūmito caturaṅgulamattampi na vaḍḍhito.
atk-s0513a1:3086_4: Evaṃ khuddakopi samāno evarūpena tittakena paṇṇena samannāgatoti attho.
atk-s0513a1:3086_5: Mahāyaṃ kiṃ bhavissatīti yadā panāyaṃ vuddhippatto mahā bhavissati,
atk-s0513a1:3086_7: addhā manussamārako bhavissatīti etaṃ uppāṭetvā madditvā chaḍḍesinti āha.
atk-s0513a1:3087_3: kuto imaṃ nissāya vuḍḍhī’ti uppāṭetvā madditvā chaḍḍesi?
atk-s0513a1:3087_5: evameva tava raṭṭhavāsinopi ‘ayaṃ kumāro daharakāleyeva evaṃ caṇḍo pharuso,
atk-s0513a1:3087_6: mahallakakāle rajjaṃ patvā kiṃ nāma karissati,
atk-s0513a1:3087_7: kuto amhākaṃ etaṃ nissāya vuḍḍhī’ti tava kulasantakaṃ rajjaṃ adatvā nimbapotakaṃ viya taṃ uppāṭetvā raṭṭhā pabbājanīyakammaṃ karissanti,
atk-s0513a1:3087_8: tasmā nimbarukkhapaṭibhāgataṃ hitvā ito paṭṭhāya khantimettānuddayasampanno hohī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3087_9: So tato paṭṭhāya nihatamāno nibbisevano khantimettānuddayasampanno hutvā bodhisattassa ovāde ṭhatvā pitu
atk-s0513a1:3087_10: accayena rajjaṃ patvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0513a1:3088_3: pubbepāhaṃ etaṃ damesiṃyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0513a1:3092_0: Asantaṃ yo paggaṇhātīti idaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto ajātasattussa rañño asantapaggahaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:3092_1: So hi buddhānaṃ paṭikaṇṭakabhūte dussīle pāpadhamme devadatte pasīditvā taṃ asantaṃ asappurisaṃ paggayha
atk-s0513a1:3092_2: “tassa sakkāraṃ karissāmī”ti bahuṃ dhanaṃ pariccajitvā gayāsīse vihāraṃ kāretvā tasseva vacanaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0513a1:3092_3: pitaraṃ dhammarājānaṃ sotāpannaṃ ariyasāvakaṃ ghātetvā attano sotāpattimaggassa upanissayaṃ bhinditvā
atk-s0513a1:3092_5: So hi “devadatto pathaviyaṃ paviṭṭho”ti sutvā “kacci nu kho mampi pathavī gileyyā”ti bhītatasito rajjasukhaṃ na labhati,
atk-s0513a1:3092_11: ādittāya lohapathaviyā uttānakaṃ nipajjāpetvā ayasūlehi koṭiyamānaṃ viya ca samanupassi.
atk-s0513a1:3092_12: Tenassa pahaṭakukkuṭasseva muhuttampi kampamānassa avatthānaṃ nāma nāhosi.
atk-s0513a1:3092_13: So sammāsambuddhaṃ passitukāmo khamāpetukāmo pañhaṃ pucchitukāmo ahosi,
atk-s0513a1:3092_14: attano pana aparādhamahantatāya upasaṅkamituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0513a1:3093_0: Athassa rājagahanagare kattikarattivāre sampatte devanagaraṃ viya nagare alaṅkate mahātale amaccagaṇaparivutassa
atk-s0513a1:3093_1: kañcanāsane nisinnassa jīvakaṃ komārabhaccaṃ avidūre nisinnaṃ disvā etadahosi “jīvakaṃ gahetvā sammāsambuddhassa
atk-s0513a1:3093_3: na kho pana sakkā mayā ujukameva vattuṃ ‘ahaṃ,
atk-s0513a1:3093_7: pariyāyena pana rattisampadaṃ vaṇṇetvā ‘kaṃ nu khvajja mayaṃ samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā payirupāseyyāma,
atk-s0513a1:3093_8: yaṃ no payirupāsataṃ cittaṃ pasīdeyyā’ti vakkhāmi,
atk-s0513a1:3093_9: taṃ sutvā amaccā attano attano satthārānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ kathessanti,
atk-s0513a1:3093_11: Atha naṃ gahetvā satthu santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3093_12: So pañcahi padehi rattiṃ vaṇṇesi “lakkhaññā vata bho dosinā ratti,
atk-s0513a1:3093_17: kaṃ nu khvajja mayaṃ samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā payirupāseyyāma,
atk-s0513a1:3094_6: Rājā tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0513a1:3094_7: So hi jīvakasseva mahāamaccassa kathaṃ paccāsīsati.
atk-s0513a1:3094_8: Jīvakopi “raññā maṃ ārabbha kathiteyeva jānissāmī”ti avidūre tuṇhī nisīdi.
atk-s0513a1:3094_12: Tasmiṃ khaṇe jīvako uṭṭhāyāsanā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā “eso, deva,
atk-s0513a1:3094_13: bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho amhākaṃ ambavane viharati saddhiṃ aḍḍhateḷasehi bhikkhusatehi.
atk-s0513a1:3094_14: Taṃ kho pana bhagavantaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato”ti nava arahādiguṇe vatvā jātito paṭṭhāya
atk-s0513a1:3094_15: pubbanimittādibhedaṃ bhagavato ānubhāvaṃ pakāsetvā “taṃ bhagavantaṃ devo payirupāsatu,
atk-s0513a1:3095_2: hatthiyānāni kappāpehī”ti yānāni kappāpetvā mahantena rājānubhāvena jīvakambavanaṃ gantvā tattha maṇḍalamāḷe
atk-s0513a1:3095_3: bhikkhusaṅghaparivutaṃ tathāgataṃ disvā santavīcimajjhe mahānāvaṃ viya niccalaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ito cito
atk-s0513a1:3095_4: ca anuviloketvā “evarūpā nāma me parisā na diṭṭhapubbā”ti iriyāpatheyeva pasīditvā saṅghassa añjaliṃ
atk-s0513a1:3095_5: paggaṇhitvā thutiṃ katvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno sāmaññaphalapañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0513a1:3095_6: Athassa bhagavā dvīhi bhāṇavārehi paṭimaṇḍitaṃ sāmaññaphalasuttaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0513a1:3095_7: So suttapariyosāne attamano bhagavantaṃ khamāpetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0513a1:3095_13: rājā issariyassa kāraṇā pitaraṃ dhammikaṃ dhammarājānaṃ jīvitā na voropessatha,
atk-s0513a1:3095_14: imasmiṃyeva āsane virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ uppajjissatha.
atk-s0513a1:3095_15: Devadattaṃ nissāya asantapaggahaṃ katvā sotāpattiphalā parihīno”ti āha.
atk-s0513a1:3096_1: ajātasattu kira asantapaggahaṃ katvā dussīlaṃ pāpadhammaṃ devadattaṃ nissāya pitughātakakammassa katattā sotāpattiphalā parihīno,
atk-s0513a1:3096_5: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0513a1:3096_7: ajātasattu idāneva asantapaggahaṃ katvā mahāvināsaṃ patto,
atk-s0513a1:3096_8: pubbepesa asantapaggaheneva attānaṃ nāsesī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0513a1:3097_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto mahāvibhave brāhmaṇakule nibbattitvā vayappatto
atk-s0513a1:3097_1: takkasilaṃ gantvā sabbasippāni uggaṇhitvā bārāṇasiyaṃ disāpāmokkho ācariyo hutvā pañca māṇavakasatāni
atk-s0513a1:3097_3: Tesu māṇavesu eko sañjīvo nāma māṇavo atthi,
atk-s0513a1:3097_5: So uṭṭhāpanakamantameva gahetvā paṭibāhanamantaṃ pana aggahetvāva ekadivasaṃ māṇavehi saddhiṃ dāruatthāya
atk-s0513a1:3097_6: araññaṃ gantvā ekaṃ matabyagghaṃ disvā māṇave āha “bho,
atk-s0513a1:3097_11: Evañca pana vatvā te māṇavā rukkhaṃ abhiruhiṃsu.
atk-s0513a1:3097_12: Sañjīvo mantaṃ parivattetvā matabyagghaṃ sakkharāhi pahari,
atk-s0513a1:3097_13: byaggho uṭṭhāya vegenāgantvā sañjīvaṃ galanāḷiyaṃ ḍaṃsitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpetvā tattheva pati,
atk-s0513a1:3098_0: Māṇavā dārūni ādāya āgantvā taṃ pavattiṃ ācariyassa ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0513a1:3098_2: asantapaggahakārā nāma ayuttaṭṭhāne sakkārasammānaṃ karontā evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ paṭilabhantiyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0513a1:3101_0: Tameva ghāsaṃ kurute, byaggho sañjīviko yathā”ti.
atk-s0513a1:3102_0: Tattha asantanti tīhi duccaritehi samannāgataṃ dussīlaṃ pāpadhammaṃ.
atk-s0513a1:3102_1: Yo paggaṇhātīti khattiyādīsu yo koci evarūpaṃ dussīlaṃ pabbajitaṃ vā cīvarādisampadānena,
atk-s0513a1:3102_4: Asantaṃ cūpasevatīti yo ca evarūpaṃ asantaṃ dussīlaṃ upasevati bhajati payirupāsati.
atk-s0513a1:3102_5: Tameva ghāsaṃ kuruteti tameva asantapaggaṇhakaṃ so dussīlo pāpapuggalo ghasati saṃkhādati vināsaṃ pāpeti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0513a1:3102_7: yathā sañjīvena māṇavena mantaṃ parivattetvā matabyaggho sañjīviko jīvitasampadānena sampaggahito attano
atk-s0513a1:3102_8: jīvitadāyakaṃ sañjīvameva jīvitā voropetvā tattheva pātesi,
atk-s0513a1:3102_10: so dussīlo taṃ attano sampaggāhakameva vināseti.
atk-s0513a1:3103_0: Bodhisatto imāya gāthāya māṇavānaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0513a1:3104_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
